Until one fateful morning, almost two months since meeting with Podrick,….
12411111122224.title: Kobe Treated Cristiano

choices: Focus more on the eating and less on his future
Become a slave for the fake Georgina, obedient to all of her wishes
act against the secrecy of his sanctuary, requesting a vacation somewhere
experiment with immobility, slob and laziness
124111111222244.content:
Two more months had passed, and Cristiano had done nothing more than eat and sleep, while taking the occasional butter bath.

Podrick couldn’t have been prouder of how big and fat the once soccer player had become. The guy was now almost completely immobile, he could barely stand, and only with someone’s help. The once soccer player was already beginning to lose his own human shape, growing more and more like a small blubbery mountain. His arms had grown so large that were roughly the size of another person thighs, and his legs were even bigger. His whole body was beginning to overtake all his legs, when seated, leaving out of this belly apron his blown-out feet’s.

Nothing seemed to be capable of ruining the momentum that Cristiano had reached but, alas, something did happen. On a fateful morning Cristiano had just finished having his buttery bath, and was now enjoying the feeding/massage session with his girls when, out of nowhere, as James passed in front of him, the hugely obese player blurted out something that made James feel a cold chill behind his back.

“Hey…Coach…was…wondering. Can...I meet…my girl…one of…these days?”

James, unable to give a proper answer right back, took time.

He didn’t give a clear answer and was glad when the nurses started again to feed Cristiano, shutting him up for the moment. Still here was an issue as big as a house…better yet, as big as Cristiano!

Apart from the Company, the rest of the world knew that Cristiano Ronaldo was in a sort of break, nobody knew what had really befallen him but, how could James prevent Georgina Rodriguez to reveal the truth to the world? He had only one possibility.
Cristiano was going to meet his girl…but she wasn’t going to meet him.


James had thought long and hard on this and finally, as he was surfing the net, an idea came to his mind. What if Cristiano could meet someone that seemed to be the exact copy of his fiancée, but wasn’t really her? There were risks, no doubt about that but, there didn’t seem to be much of a choice. Quickly James began to contact people from the shady part of the deep web, handsomely paying in advance for a certain product that would allow him to play the role of a certain someone.

Even though he paid quite a hefty sum to have the product finished in the shortest time, a month still had to pass before the product was finally within his hands. As James observed the item he had just received, a wicked grin appeared on his face. With this he could take two doves with one stone. It was an oversized VR device and, along with it, came a nice little DVD package containing the installer for the custom-made software requested by Podrick.

After toying a bit with both the VR and the software, James felt confident enough to bring the good news to his soon-to-be overfed meal.

As James entered the room, he clearly saw that Cristiano was starting to grow restless. Although being constantly fed with a deluge of treats and sweets, there was animosity on his swollen face. James could see the anger growing within the ex-player as he munched harshly on whatever bit of food he had in his mouth.

“Cristiano?”

“*Urrff!* Yeah…Coach? What do…you want…now?”

“Just wanted to thank you for your patience. I may have figured out a way for you to meet with your girlfriend.”

Instantly the ultra-obese began to distend himself, letting go of the anger he was nurturing within himself.

“Really…Coach? But…you said…”

Now it was James turn to make everything believable.

“I said that you couldn’t meet her in here, since nobody has to know about your condition. In fact the Company would react harshly if I was to ask for something as foolish as to invite someone in here, when everything is done in secrecy to keep you hidden.
But, with time and a little bit of…ehm…grease in the right places… I may have found a solution to this problem.”

Cristiano began to jiggle in excitement, although he managed to move for barely a minute before stopping, feeling himself tired and void of any energies.

“I…Feel…there is…a but…somewhere…”

“Unfortunately, Cristiano, there is one. You shall not be able to meet her in person.

You see, through some friends I may have smuggled something from outside to here and to your fiancée house. Something that will enable the two of you to be in contact, even though only visually, with one another.”

It was then that James showed to Cristiano the VR device.

“This, Cristiano, is a last generation full immersion headset. With it, one can go and meet someone in a previously prepared setting. Basically, while in a room like this one you could…”

“I could…finally meet…Georgina!”

“Yes! As I’ve said, though, it would still be a connection through internet but, thanks to this headset, you’ll be able to experience almost any sensation while using it. Sense of smell, of taste…”

“That…is so…Cool! Thanks…Man! It’s a…shame…I cannot…meet her… face to face…. but…How…Can I…repay you…for all…these…troubles?”

“Your happiness and confidence in me are all the gifts I may ever want. Trust in me, Cristiano.
If you’ve got a problem…I will find a solution.”

James brought the device to Cristiano, helping him to wear it as he explained to him how to make it work and letting him know that his girlfriend had been already instructed on how to use it. All Cristiano had to do was to call and wait for her response. Ronaldo smiled as he grabbed the strange looking helmet and put it on, but his smile grew wider when he turned the machine on and found himself in this 3D recreation of the same room he was in. Although he couldn’t see his own body.

Suddenly, in front of him he realized that a form was beginning to appear, grinning excitedly he slowly saw the form of his fiancée appear right before him.

“G-Georgina? Is it really you?”

The girl smiled as she watched him, bringing a finger to her lips, as she bit slowly her nail while smiling.

“Sure am, Baby. I was getting worried about you. But then this Podrick guy contacted me and…Wow! We’re finally together!”

As the girl said so she launched herself at Cristiano, which in turn hugged her back and felt her body against his own, felt her perfume in his nostrils. She was there, with him! True, they weren’t physically there but, feeling as he was in that moment, he couldn’t care less about reality.

“Oh, Georgina…I’ve missed you so much!”


Meanwhile, as Cristiano jiggled to and fro on his bed, carefully watched by his two nurses, James was sitting comfortably in his own private room, as he checked and clicked on his personal computer. On the screen he could see the avatar of Cristiano and, at the bottom of the screen, whatever he was saying at that moment.

‘Yes…This has been a marvelous idea. Not only that fool thinks to really be with his girlfriend, but I could even use Georgina’s to push him even more into the abyss of gluttony! All I must do is to keep using this Georgina model to trick Cristiano and soon I could have him do whatever I wish…

Why, I could even force him to…’
124111111222244.title: Georgina, meet Cristiano

choices: ...Confronted the fake Georgina about his massive size
…Found himself unable to move any part of him
…Started to love how big he was getting,wishing to grow bigger and bigger still
…Began feeling constantly hungry, no matter how much he ate
1241111112222441.content:
In the following days Cristiano Ronaldo lost all of his bitterness and returned to his own normal state of being, which was acting like a glutton. Thanks to his sessions with the VR headset, he managed to explain to the fake Georgina all of his troubles and of his apparent illness.

The reaction he got from her left him speechless at first but, as she insisted on it, he quickly adapted to it.

“So you see, Georgie, due to this strange illness I’m forced to stay away from the field and, since they don’t know yet when I can be considered stable…Management has decided to keep things silent and as more quiet possible.”

“Oh god, Baby…But are you ok?”

“Yeah. Apart from feeling tired all the time I’m good…”

“Babe, I know my man doesn’t like being ordered around but, this time, do it for me…Do as they tell you. If they want to keep things quiet it must be that they’re afraid of something so, don’t go against them.”

“I won’t, Georgie…for you, anything.”

Cristiano sat on the verge of the illusionary bed, in the holographic room he was in, while keeping within his arms his fiancée, completely unaware that the person he was talking to was, in truth, James Podrick.

“Also, babe, I must say that you’re looking terrific. Whatever they’re doing to you is making wonders on your body…I wonder what would happen if you asked to intensify your treatment…”

Cristiano began to feel excited, it wasn’t often that Georgina came onto him like that so he quickly nodded to her proposal.

“Y-Yeah” he stammered a little “I’ll see what can be done but, are you sure about that, honey?”

“Oh yeah, love. Whatever it is, you seem to be way more buff than you ever were…If things keep going this way I’ll have trouble not to think about you…all day long.”

When Cristiano finally ended his session on the VR he felt hot and bothered, he would have loved to be able to stay with Georgina in real life but, he knew, that it wasn’t yet possible. Still, thanks to his wonderful coach he at least, could see her occasionally and that was good enough. As he placed the visor on the bed, he soon found himself once more to what his life had become. Him eating as girls at his side fawned around him.

As he kept on eating, he tried to look at himself and, although he couldn’t see much, he seemed to convince himself that what Georgina had told of him had to be true. He truly seemed to have been growing bigger (and in his deluded mind buffer) than before. And yet, the proposition of his fiancée had taken root in his mind and when he saw Podrick coming to see him he broached the subject to him.

“Hey…Coach… Was…wondering,… the…therapy…and…all…seem… to… be … going…great, but…maybe…we…could…enhance… it…a …bit…more?”

James Podrick, who had just entered the room, had been waiting for that request for a long time. It had been two long weeks of him impersonating Georgina until he managed to convince Cristiano.

But finally, he had managed.

Yet, he had to maintain his image and so he adopted for a dubious glance toward the massive man, almost completely paralyzed on his bed.

“Enhance it? Mmm…I don’t know, Cristiano. I don’t make the rules here.
I just bring you what the Management has agreed upon.”

“And…yet…if…I…was…to…increase…the…pace…wouldn’t…I… heal…faster?”

“Well, I suppose that’s true. But are you sure about that Cristiano? If we increase the pace, you will have less time to spend with… you know who.”

“Y-Yeah…I…know…that. Still…I…guess…could…be…better…for…me…and…my…career. Please…Coach…I…feel…I’ve…gotta…do…all…I…can.”

“Alright, alright. I’ll ask for them to produce an enhanced plan for your recovery. I’ll let you know by tomorrow morning what they decided to do.”

In the following days James gleefully watched as Cristiano went under a drastic change in his daily schedule.
His rest times were cut by half and substituted with intensified feeding sessions of the “health bars” sludge he was growing addicted to. Moreover, it was included into his mealtimes a special feeding session in which he was instructed to consume a double lunch meal in a liquefied format. This not only meant that he could ingest more calories than usual, but also that his overfed, apron like, belly would absorb the nutrients at a faster pace than before, forcing him to feel his hunger grow again sooner than before. The liquid diet, also, had the exceptional advantage that didn’t seem to tire him out, since he had only to swallow without any chewing from his part.

Barely a week passed with the enhanced diet and Cristiano already began to grow steadily fatter from it.

If before he had seemed to slow down in his gains, with the new regimen he pushed himself out of the plateau and began to grow bigger and larger once more.

James could barely restrain himself watching the ex-soccer player inflate with food and fat, as more time passed, it was getting harder and harder for him to not show his own desire to prepare Cristiano as his own meal. Often he found himself caressing the bloated and/or stuffed form of the player, massaging his belly rolls and playing with his belly fat as he imagined him ready to be placed in a roasting pan. Other times he found himself all over the guy as he was passed out from his eating, hugging as much as he could of the man body wishing only to sink in his fat and sleep there. Yet, everytime it happened he managed to recover himself before Cristiano could notice him doing and so, without arousing any suspicion. Yet, it was becoming increasingly hard to just watch the fattening of the soccer player without any of his participation.

Cristiano, instead, was pushing himself more and more to increase his own mass, still delusional about what effect that diet was really having on his body. No matter how hard he found it, he constantly pushed himself to consume always more than the day before. In his mind were engraved the words of his fiancée, which wanted him to grow bigger and stronger than ever before.

With this objective in his mind it wasn’t long before he…
1241111112222441.title: Growing to be the Biggest Star around...

choices: Sergio Aguero, pass him as infected and fatten him up too
Lionel Messi, bind and gag him. Find out why he’s there
Philippe Coutinho, force him to stay around. Hypnotize him to be a feedee.
12411111122224414.content:
With all the food that Cristiano was being fed with and all the addictive chemicals he was taking, it wasn’t really a surprise for Podrick when he realized that having Cristiano satisfied from his huger was a nearly impossible task. From the beginning James had done all he could to maximize the soccer player laziness and gluttony and he finally had managed it. The problem now was to try and keep Cristiano satisfied.

This was a problem he hadn’t imagined before, and yet, between the liquid meals and the constant assistance from the two girls, everything seemed to be feasible. Cristiano itself had started growing once more, growing bigger than ever, even losing his normal humanoid shape in the process. The ex-player in fact had begun growing so fast that his body couldn’t really keep up. Apart from his head, which had also softened, the rest of his body seemed to be growing fatter every minute, giving him a blobby and flabby appearance. Already his head had begun drowning in a sea of flabby chins, as his body grew wider and larger.

His moobs, for example, had grown hugely, spread apart on to each side of him they touched the ground near his bed, with aureole’s as big as platters. His belly then cascaded down onto him, covering almost all his body, with only his swollen feet emerging barely from under it. That tent like gut also stood proud and high, divided in four large belly rolls, since it was becoming difficult to have it filled up. Finally, his hips and ass, there the gain had also been astonishing, giving to the ultra-obese player cheeks so much filled with fat that any kind of movement sent them into a jiggling frenzy.

James knew it was almost time to finish it with Cristiano and yet, he postponed it, thinking that maybe he could grow some more before reaching his final size. What he didn’t know was that all this delay was going to present him, soon, with a difficult choice.

A couple of days later, as James was busy impersonating Georgina and fawning over the still over-confident Cristiano through the VR internet connection, the door to Cristiano’s room opened as someone entered slowly, as to not disturb the ill player. This person, though his intentions had been all in the right places, didn’t realize of the dangers he was exposing himself to.

For as he stepped inside, he initially saw only a couple of hot girls dressed as maids, a strange looking machine in the middle of the room and a rather large bed completely covered in a huge mass of some kind of gelatinous brown-ish thing. Perplexed, the person turned around and verifying that he was indeed in the right room, he realized with a start, that there was a large hose connected into the jelly-like mass, pumping who knows what inside of it.

But then, after a few seconds, he also realized that the hose wasn’t only pumping that thing up…it was also that thig that was gulping down whatever substance the hose was bringing.

This realization forced his troubled mind to really see what he was looking at.

That brownish mass, so jiggly and flabby, was in truth a human being. Someone so hugely fattened that had completely lost any resemblance to a normal human shape.

And since he was in the room of the soccer player under the name of Cristiano Ronaldo, the one who had fell ill long time before, it was rather quickly that he realized who that human being was, even though it was unrecognizable.

“C-Cristiano…!?”

As the person shouted that name, Podrick was forced to close the connection hastily with Ronaldo, hastily making up some excuses with his Georgina character, and hurried through his bedroom door to the main room where Cristiano was, realizing that someone had just entered.

As he saw the guy he didn’t recognized him immediately, James had bigger problems than that. He had now to figure out a way to keep the intruder mouth shut, while keeping the news of the fat Cristiano from being spread around. In truth there were a few methods to do that, and hastily he acted toward them as he approached the guy from behind and knocked him out.

As the intruder fell to the floor unconscious, James had finally time to see who it was and, based on that, on how to keep him quiet…
12411111122224414.title: Relentless hunger

choices: Force on him huge portions of food and the no exericses regimen
Use loads of appetite stimulants on him, causing him to feel constantly hungry
He’s called ‘El Kun’? Change him into a real caveman. a FAT one...
Take it slow on him. Let Aguero feel confident and then crush him unexpectedly
124111111222244141.content:
As James realized that it was another quite famous soccer payer that had intruded on Cristiano sanctuary, he knew that he had a very limited choice of option in dealing with him. The most obvious, and the most satisfactory for him, was to force the new guest to stay there with them, to be fattened just like Cristiano.

There were only a few problems with that plan. First he had to figure out why the guy had come and for which reason he was in the building. Then he also had to make sure that he had contacts in high enough places to cover for the disappearance of the new soccer player. Swiftly he began to pace around the room while making calls.

When the sun had begun to set on the horizon James had finally managed to solve most of the situation. Thanks to some blackmailing and to the calling of old debts, he had managed to make it so that Sergio Aguero would be considered infected with the same illness of Cristiano, forcing him so to remain there along with the other player to try and cure himself. Always under James guidance.

He also managed to find out why the guy was roaming in their building.

The player had heard of Cristiano illness and had wanted to visit to just comfort the player. James almost laughed out loud at the ingenuity of his new guest. Yet, there was one last problem that had to be solved.

Space.

Already with Cristiano in his current condition there was barely space to move around, if James were to add another player, the room wouldn’t surely be enough. So it was time for renovations since they couldn’t move Cristiano from where he was, due to his huge size. Was it expensive? Yes, but the company that James contacted was renowned for their capacity of keeping a secret so, not one of the workers that came to bring down one of the walls, to merge Cristiano’s room with the following one, said anything as they worked in record time to provide the enlargement requested by Podrick.

In less than three days, James’s Sanctuary was now large enough to host two people of Cristiano size and, since Cristiano did nothing but being stuffed with his gain shake, there was room and time to take care of Sergio Aguero.


The soccer player, woke up rather groggily feeling as if he hadn’t had a single drop of water and/or food in the last few days, which was actually true since James had been forced to keep him pharmacologically sedated. But now that he was awake, he blearily looked around trying to figure out where he was.

Last thing he remembered was seeing a hugely mass of jiggly jelly which, at the time, he had thought to be Cristiano Ronaldo.

As he tried to get his bearing, he realized he was strapped down to a bed, unable to move. Just as he was going to scream for help, he saw a figure approaching him.

“Who are you? Why am I strapped to this bed? Where are we?”

“Mr. Aguero. I’ deeply sorry of having to make your acquaintance in this way but we had no other choice.”

James spoke with a grave tone in his voice, trying to make it sound as if something very wrong had happened.

“I’ll try to explain things to you calmly but first, you need to have something to drink. I’ve been given this serum which will provide your body with the basic nutrients needed for a fast recovery…”

As he said that he moved, closer to Aguero, an unmarked container with a straw emerging from the top.

Sergio began slowly to suck from the straw, accelerating his pace as soon as the liquid passed on his taste buds. James smiled within himself, please to see that yet another player trusted him completely just because he had the face of a simple man.

While it was true that the shake was full of nutrients, it also had some of the chemicals he had used to facilitate the fattening of Cristiano. As Aguero kept drinking, Podrick continued to explain the situation to the player.

“You see, as you probably know Cristiano Ronaldo has fallen prey to a strange illness which had forced him to retire from the scene. What you probably didn’t know is that this malady is also mildly infective.

I was chosen to take care of him due to my immunity to the illness but, as you entered in contact with him…”

Here Aguero, which had quite rapidly consumed all the content of the provided container, began to close his eyes, already knowing what the guy in front of him was going to say.

“Since the encounter, you have been tested and the results indicate you’re positive to the illness. I’m truly sorry but, you must remain here and follow the treatment as we try to have you avoid the same fate of Cristiano.”

James then, seeing as Aguero had begun to lick his lips quite often, while being completely unaware of the slight rounding out of his stomach, rapidly offered him another unmarked container, this time filled with a home-made gain-shake.

“Here, sir. Have some more of it. Doctors told me you may have a craving for it at first...it should pass in a couple of days...”

The player, still unable to move began drinking once more, stopping only once to ask a question to James, before returning to his drinking, still unaware of the effects that drinking all of that gain shake was going to have on his athletic body.

“Thanks. So, who are you and what’s going to happen to me?”

“I’m James Podrick, former coach of Cristiano and now his caretaker. You’re in a wing of the quarantined area.

From here on out you’ll be staying here following the treatment that the higher up decided for you to follow. One thing I can guarantee you is that you won’t have any contact with the outside world, since nobody has to know about this situation.”

As Podrick continued to speak, Sergio assumed a more relaxed stance, as the intense hunger he had felt in the pit of his stomach was getting abated by whatever he was drinking. Still he began to grow worried once more when he heard James talking about the loss of contact from the outside world.

“Wh…*hurff*…What do you mean? I...*urp* whew...that stuff sure is good...But, you mean I can’t contact ...my family while I’m here?”

“Sorry, but any contact is denied. Your family will be informed by the company legal representative.
Now, if everything is clear I’m going to untie you but I reiterate. You’ll have to follow what they tell me to have you follow.”

In the following days, Sergio was able to stand freely in his room, although he couldn’t leave it, not even to talk with his fellow player Ronaldo. That was bothering him but what troubled him the most was that he had still cravings for that strane shake thing he had been offered when he woke up. Not that it tasted bad, the problem was the opposite. As he drank it he felt like he could keep drinking it for months, and that scared him a little. True Podrick had warned about that but, lately, he was finding hiself wishing to always have more of it.

It didn’t make any sense to him that he wanted more of that thing, since he was feeling well but, as his caretake had said to him once “The issue is that also Cristiano said the same some time ago. At that time the company didn’t press the issue…and now you’ve seen the results.”.

So, although it made him mad that he had to abandon his vegan lifestyle, he kept drinking that shake, even though he noticed that, somehow, instead of reducing the quantities, they seemed to be giving him always more than the last time.

James, as he was secretly spying his new guest through hidden cameras, could only smile as he saw the player dig into the new oversized pitcher of Gain-Shake that one of the maids had brought upon him. If with Cristiano he had to be pushy and force the player to follow the ‘Diet’, with Aguero things were easier. After all, Sergio didn’t want to share the same fate of Cristiano and so complied immediately. Probably they could pass him the full gallon size of gain shake before placing him on the fattening diet that forced Cristiano to stay in bed all the time...

James had only to decide what to do with his new test subject…
124111111222244141.title: Sergio Aguero unexpected prolongued visit

choices: Pushing Aguero & Meal making Cristiano. New Footballers to join?
Checking Aguero & Consuming Cristiano, maybe his meat is addictive?
Pushing both players to grow. Show Aguero his fate by mingling with Cristiano
1241111112222441411.content:
In the following days the situation of Sergio Aguero become to return to a semblance of normality.

He no longer ad cravings for that nutrient shakes, but still he kept consuming it in large quantities, and he himself began to see his staying there as an extended vacation. For that reason, he began to pass his days laying on the bed, watching television and doing not much else. As James saw that the guy had started to relax, he knew it was the perfect time to strike.

With four days of permanence in the quarantined area, James entered the room where Aguero was staying, he kept a grave expression to let him understand that the situation was dire.

“Mr.Aguero?”

The player was currently laying on the bed, watching a tv show, but he turned the TV off and moved his gaze on his caretaker.

“Yeah? And call me Sergio, please…”

“Alright. Sergio, I’ve just received new directives regarding your stay here and the illness you’ve found yourself subjected to. Basically, the Medical division has given me a plan that you’ve got to be following with extreme precision. I’m truly sorry about this.”

Aguero didn’t say anything for a log while then, suddenly he burst out laughing.

“C’mon, Man! I’m not dead yet. You’re just too serious…What is it? They already have taken me out of any exercise. This is basically a vacation…so, no worries man.”

As the player took the meal plan that James was bringing him, his expression first seemed shocked, then seemed to be growing angry and finally showed simply acceptance.

“So, they want me to follow his massive diet, uh? Well, what to do…If that’s what they want.
I’ll just lose the extra weight as soon as I’m out of here. No point in wasting time, bring it on and I’ll chow it down.”

From that morning Aguero began to follow the massive meal plan that Podrick had brought to him, starting to eat almost constantly throughout the day. At first the guy seemed to show a little of resistance but, after a few meals, he simply began to lay back and accept whatever it was brought to him. Podrick couldn’t believe how easy it seemed to be. Even now, as he was watching Aguero going through his third breakfast, devouring it with a voraciousness that he had never seen before, the guy kept eating without a single complaint.

Even when his belly began to bloat outward, over the shorts he was wearing, he didn’t voice a single peep.

And in the following days the situation remained unchanged, Sergio Aguero kept swallowing whatever they brought him and, naturally, his body began to absorb all those calories turning them into fat. Already Podrick could see that Sergio’s body definition was faltering, his six pack had melted away, substituted with a small potbelly, with related love handles that pooled out on his shorts, giving him a little muffin top. His legs had also lost definition already, as his arms did as well. Yet, for some reason, what seemed to be growing at an outstanding speed were his moobs.

At first, they were practically nonexistent, as it normally is.

But as more and more calories were pushed inside his system they seemed to be growing out at an outstanding speed. Already, with Sergio losing his muscles and replacing them with jiggly fat, his moobs seemed to have reached a size between the A and the B cup. Aguero though didn’t seem to be noticing it. In fact, apart from following the ‘Diet’ he didn’t seem to be recognizing much else. As a test, James, brought to him a double portion of his current meal, a pre-first lunch snack, which meant that instead of two Baconators meals with related fries and two slices of apple pies, he was currently bringing him four of everything.

And yet, Sergio seemed to simply lick hi lips as he assaulted the trays of food, gorging like a starving beast on the food. James noticed that he was starting to eat a bit more messily than usual, uncaring toward where globs of sauce were ending to, as long as more food went into his maw. And yet, the footballer, managed to consume everything up to the last fry.

“Yo…man. This is good. Really good *urp*…So, they’re upping the portions now?
S’good…s’good…was getting mildly hungry lately. *belch*…And we can’t have that…can we?”

What James couldn’t know was that Sergio Aguero had reached a conclusion in all that story, between his illness and the massive diet he had to follow. They wanted him to slow down. Maybe he had been going too fast on his conquests on the field, or maybe his prices were too high. Still They wanted him to get down and be a humbler player. That had to be the reason for all that scene about the illness.

Now, he was still scared of what happened to Cristiano Ronaldo but, he was sure that something like that couldn’t happen to him. After all, all he had to do was to follow their diet and become what they wanted him to be.

‘I can stop whenever I want. They haven’t hooked me with their lies, I won’t fall easily into their trap.’ He thought smugly, although a second thought snaked into his mind, unnoticed.

‘Still it’s all so good…I wonder if I could get some more to munch on…am starting to feel quite hungry again…’


James, in truth was began to get worried. It was way too easy.

There had to be something that he could do to verify why the player was so willingly accepting that treatment. Although he could just forget about it and push even more food onto him. Still he had to come up with something later, for now he had to meet Cristiano.

As Podrick changed room, going into the one now occupied by Cristiano Ronaldo, he remained, once again, mesmerized by the size of the ex-footballer. Cristiano had lost all contact with the human world, becoming a huge amorphous mass of fat which had still similarities with a distorted human figure.

His head, now definitively sunken beneath a cone of blubbery chins, was hidden from view, unless James went up a ladder to see things from above of the fleshy fat wall that his chins had formed. His shoulders didn’t exist anymore, merged into a sea of fat which ended with his fattened finger emerging barely from the overlapping fat of his arms. Everything else was hidden behind the hugely mass of his ultra-fattened belly. It covered everything from his torso down. Even his feet were submerged, and the girls in charge of cleaning him out had to wear breathing mask when they had to go under it. It was too risky otherwise.

And yet, between the constant feeding and the VR headset, Cristiano was blissfully unaware of anything. Sure, he had to wear it 24 hours a day, now, for t was the only way he could still be able to talk, but James didn’t care. He was so happy with the astounding size of him that he truly wasn’t sure if it was worthy to transform all that jiggly beauty into a meal…or if it was better to let it grow more and more.

And so, after admiring that work of art, feeling his inside grow fuller and fatter every minute, James returned to the sums of his issues.

First, If Sergio was so willing to eat more, who was he to stop him, especially since it served his scope? OR maybe it was better be careful and see what Aguero was thinking before going all out on him.

Then Cristiano…Turn him into a most delicious meal or not?

What to do?

1 Push Aguero to his limits, uncaring for the reason behind his willingness James starts to up his portions day after day, wanting to have a bigger Sergio, as quickly as possible. Cristiano sadly has reached his potential and need to be dealt with, also with the space freed James could find someone else to share te space with Sergio. Fattening two footballers at the same time.

2 Investigate on Sergio, go at him through hypnosis and find out why he’s so willing. While he’s under hypnosis James could always make him see something, he shouldn’t be able to see anymore. Take care of Cristiano, turn him into a vast reserve of ready to be consumed meals, maybe they could become so good to be addictive for James?

3 Push both players to consume even more. Let Sergio mingle with Cristiano, let him understand what his future is going to look like, maybe Aguero will show some fight then, when he realize he’s truly trapped.

4 Or maybe something else entirely, maybe someone else finally decided to break through the quarantine zone and find out why great Footballers are vanishing so suddenly. Someone might have noticed, right?

5 Writer’s choice….
1241111112222441411.title: Massive multi-meal diet for Aguero

choices: Sergio Aguero start to lose himself in the huge meals he’s receiving
The nurse at Sergio’s side manage to get him hooked on eating
Sergio notices that something is terribly wrong
Cristiano’s reaction to James solution for a more physical contact for the footb
12411111122224414113.content:
James knew that, as much as he wanted to taste Cristiano Ronaldo, he couldn’t. In all his career he had never seen any man reaching such a size. The guy will to live had to be as big as his current size and so, how could he stop him now? If Ronaldo could grow more, why should he stop him?

Moreover, with Cristiano around, he could push more and more on Sergio only to show him his future by letting him mingle with his predecessor. Yes, James knew that his idea fascinated him a lot. He wouldn’t lose his trophy and would recover the missing meal with the new footballer.
With his plan in motion, he moved to the room where Sergio Aguero was resting. He found the footballer lazily laying on his bed, watching something on tv, as he snacked away with a bowl of buttery popcorn one of the nurses had brought to him.

“How’s it going, Sergio?”

“Mmmph…Oh, it’s good, sir. Would prefer doing something other than laze in bed all day but, if that is the ‘diet’, I shall comply.”

“Well…Good. Then, I’ll leave you to your next mid-morning snack…”

“Actually…” Sergio voiced over James, as he kept licking his fingers now that he scraped along the almost empty bowl in his arm. “…Wanted to ask you something, if I can?”

James stopped as soon as the footballer called for him, turning around to face him once more.

“Sure. Never worry about asking me something. If I can do anything to ease your time here, you just need to tell me.”

“Well, didn’t want to bother you…Knowing you’re busy trying to help Cristiano but, I’m still finding myself craving those drinks you guys gave me when I first arrived here and so I was wondering if there is something wrong with that?”

James smiled inwardly, thinking that it was normal for Sergio to feel cravings for those shake, since those were nothing more than addictive chemicals in a bottle, yet he couldn’t say that out loud.

“Well, the doctors told me the effect could last up to two/three weeks and then it would slowly vanish away but, if you want some more of them I can ask to send a few more shipments to us.”

Sergio, already tasting those shake again in his mouth, could only nod in approval as his stare was suddenly moved from James toward one of the nurses which had just entered in his room carrying with her a tray loaded with food.

“Mr. Aguero…I have here your second mid-morning snack, no need to move, I’ll bring it directly to you.”

James grinned as he soon was completely out of the picture for the footballer, as all of Sergio’s focus was now on the tray loaded with goodies that was being moved right under his nose. The coach stood there silently admiring how the soccer player was getting engrossed with his food, noticing that the nurse had rightfully thought to bring to the guy some baked sweets, along with the same health bars that they had used on Cristiano. Aguero didn’t seem to mind about the large sized portion that he was been giving, instead he focused only on the tasty morsels that were soon going to be within his lips. As the footballer ate with abandon, James cleared his voice a bit and approached the player trying to be less invasive as possible.

“Mr.Aguero…”

“Told you, already. Please…mmph…call me, Sergio.”

“Sergio, apart from those shakes, there is anything else I can provide you with to help you with your stay?”

“Well…now that you speak of it…I noticed that these portions seem…inadequate…”

“In-inadequate?”

“Yeah, I mean…such small portions…isn’t it possible to have some more…normal sized meals around here?
I know that they’re trying to slow me down but, starving me seems…excessive?”

“I…well, I’ll see that some fairer portions are brought to you, then.”

“Thanks man! Although, if one of Cristiano's nurses would like to be with a more…shapely guy, I’m sure they know where to find me.”

“I will err… relate the message. One more thing, Sergio, just wanted you to know that I would like you to meet Cristiano in the short future. We still have to receive clearance from the Medical team but, if you shall result asymptomatic, I would like for you to meet with him to, hopefully, cheer him up a bit. It has been hard for him in the last few weeks as his condition…worsened.”

The soccer player, laying on the bed, didn’t seem to have heard a word, focused as he was on his current meal but he still nodded, before going to town on a rather large bowl of ice cream that the nurse had brought him.

James nodded back with a little smile, before leaving the room, letting the footballer to enjoy his snacks in peace. As he exited the room, he thought about the requests Sergio had made. It was too soon to be the effects of the bars, and still he asked for an upgrade in the meals brought to him. All this situation puzzled the coach. The player seemed genuinely unaware of the quantity he was eating, even though there weren’t almost any chemical induced agents in his system.

Still, if Sergio wanted more, James could only comply.
Taking out his cellphone he quickly dialed the chef’s in charge of supplying the footballers with their meals, hoping that the feeder chef wouldn’t enjoy too much the situation.

“Antoine? Yes, It’s James Podrick. About Mr. Aguero’s meal plan, please to triple all the portions related to him. Yes, that is a direct request from him. And please, try to refrain from making full twelve course meals for him. He’s not ready yet. Thank you.”

Podrick turned toward the humongous blob that was Cristiano. The hugely mass of quivering fat had stopped being human shaped since a long time already, yet that didn’t stop him from growing more and more, gulping down the nutrient goop that was brought to him through the feeding tube. James, sensing some discomfort into the blob like ex-footballer, quickly went into his private room and donned the VR device, entering in contact with the virtual world in which Cristiano was living.

As he stepped through the virtual room, he saw the normal sized figure of Cristiano, rendered to perfection thanks to the device, laying on his bed as he was currently watching some old tv series.

“Cristiano? Are you feeling okay?”

“Yes coach…it’s just…I don’t know.”

“What is it? You know that I’ll try to help you as much as I can.”

“I know that…It’s…Well, it’s Georgina. Lately all she talks about is how healthy I’m becoming and how much beautiful I’m getting but…she never touches me…she never holds me… It’s as if my life has become a fake distorted version of reality. I know that she can’t come here in person but, still…I’m a man, you know? I have some…needs…”

‘Ah.’ Thought James ‘That’s the problem. He hasn’t realized yet that this world his living in is not the real world but, the lack of personal contact is getting to him.
But how can I…mmh. Maybe there I something I can do.’

“I get your point, Cristiano. Sadly, you know as much as I that she cannot come in here. Still, there may be a solution to that issue. If you want, I can try to talk with her and see if this potential solution of mine would be acceptable. What do you say?”

“Well…I don’t know… I... I don’t know if I want to know about it, do I?”

“Well, let me first verify with her. If you know not about it, you can’t be blamed, can you?”

“True…mmm…I’ll leave it to you then. Thanks coach…mmm…getting hungry. Must be almost time for my meal.”

As Podrick saluted Cristiano, he left the room and took out his visor, returning to the room hosting the huge blob named Cristiano Ronaldo. James still couldn’t believe that the guy had yet to see the truth behind the VR device. How could he fail to notice that he was living in a virtual dream was beyond James comprehension, still it worked to his advantage so there wasn’t any loss.

Quickly, as he approached the personal nurse of Cristiano, he laid out his plan to her, knowing full well that the fake nurse would hardly refuse the deal he was giving her.

Meanwhile, the second nurse was still in Sergio Aguero’s room, standing beside the player as he kept munching on through a seemingly endless stream of snack food. The player wasn’t currently feeling hungry but, the presence of the beautiful girl at his side, pushing him to keep on eating was enough to let him push towards his own limit. Only when his PJ’s pant ripped, letting his overfull belly have finally some room to grow he seemed to snap out of it but, the girl was quickly at his side. She rapidly diverted his attention toward her own assets, distracting him enough to forget about his rising belly or the pain he felt in it.

Sergio was happy as a clam. Not only he had managed to get some normal meals, instead of the rabbit portions he was receiving, but there was also this beautiful girl at his side, attracted to his finely shaped physique. As risky as it sounded, since he still wanted to get out of that room, he had begun to think that maybe he didn’t want to actually lose the treatment he was subjected too.

As he lost himself in the two beautiful assets of the nurse beside him, he didn’t oppose any resistance as she pushed within his lips yet another of those health bars he was starting to love.

‘Man, it’s all so good…do I really want to get out of here?’
12411111122224414113.title: Wish for a bigger Sergio & an even bigger Ronaldo

choices: He was so enjoying the place, he didn’t want to leave it
He had to be growing healthier, so he redoubled his efforts
Susan was the perfect love match for him
He hadn’t heard about Cristiano for awhile
124111111222244141132.content:
Two weeks had passed already since Sergio Aguero had ended up in the quarantined zone where his fellow player, Cristiano Rolando, lived in. Yet, Sergio, although he had wanted to get out of there at the soonest, lately he was having some second thoughts on that. For once, he was finally enjoying some good old portioned meals, no more rabbit food in both taste and quantity, and also there was Susie.

Susie had been initially one of the two nurses assigned to Cristiano but, as Sergio arrived, she had seemed to have taken a shine for him. Not that he could blame her.

How could anyone feel anything but disgust in seeing the blob like ex footballer? Still, between the meals and the presence of the nurse he was reconsidering his permanence there. As of that moment, hardly past 11:00 AM, Sergio was laying down on his bed, eating away at a quite large burger, courtesy of the nurse who had brought him a little snack, while one of those shakes he was loving was waiting for him as soon as he finished with the burger.

He had noticed that his middle had seemingly grown a bit fluffier but, with the busty nurse at his side there was something else that caught his attention. And yet the girl was relentless, everytime she spent some time with him, she always brought something for him to eat. Not that he minded, but it was becoming strangely enjoyable.

For instance, as he was now awaiting her arrival, he realized he was waiting for both her presence and her delicious treats.

But, as she entered his room, and sashayed to him with her curvy body, he began to have eyes only for her…and the tray she was holding. As she sat on the verge of the bed, beside the footballer, she quickly began to tease his lips a bit with her fingers, until she simply pushed within his mouth a fragment of the healthy bars he was getting in love with.

Sergio, without noticing, was growing addicted to those bars and, although he was loving them he seemed unable to check what all that food was doing to his figure. Passing all of his days laying in bed already had forced his body to lose much of his muscle mass, but the sudden influx of heavily calorific food, in large quantities, boosted his body production of fat. Already the player was looking rather chubby, his six-pack vanished, replaced with quite a chubby belly, which Susie often played with, as his overall from began to grow heavier and softer.

Yet, for those two weeks, Sergio did nothing but eat his large meals, consume an ungodly number of snacks thanks to Susie and lay in bed all day. As soon as he cleaned out the tray, Susie offered her breasts to him, which he thoroughly enjoyed fondling. As he lowered his arms, feeling content and satisfied, Susie knelt beside him and began whispering in his ear.

“You know, Mr. Aguero…I’m sure all girls tell you this but, I find you extremely cute. If only you could be more of a man…”

“Susan? What…What do you…*urp*…excuse me…What do you mean?”

The nurse snuggled closer to the footballer, pushing her body against his, letting him feel her every curve.

“I mean, you’re looking more like a kid than a man…if only you could grow somehow at a healthier weight…”

As he felt that luscious body against his own, Sergio was barely able to think, but the girl words did register in his brain, although he didn’t think about connecting this advance with the situation of Cristiano. He simply smiled as he felt that wonderful body moving closer and closer to him.

“You would just have to eat some more…wouldn’t that be pleasant?”

He was getting downright aroused, unable to think clearly but he couldn’t do much but agree that he could use to add some pounds to his physique.

“We could start now, I could feed you sometimes…and you would be able to feel my body….wouldn’t you like it?”

Now Sergio was lost.

He simply nodded and slowly opened his mouth. No matter that he had just finished eating his mid-morning snack, here she was this beautiful girl, ready to give him paradise and all he had to do was to eat a few sweets? He would have been a fool to refuse.

Yet, as days passed, James smiled seeing as his latest scheme began to bring fruits. The use of Susie as focal point for Sergio had been a great idea and, knowing the girl and what kind of tremendous feeder she was, Podrick was fairly certain that Sergio was going to fatten up by a whole lot in no time at all.

Day by day the feeding sessions between Sergio and Susie began to grow both in length and in quantity of food consumed. Sergio soon found himself pending from her lips, a single moan from her side could let him eat throughout a seven-course meal. And still, she pushed him for more, forcing him to eat more bars, more sweets, more junk food. It wasn’t long before all this indulgence would show up on the footballer. Barely a month had passed since Susie entered in Sergio’s life and yet the Player had already asked, twice, to up his daily meals portions. Without including all the snacks that he was consuming by the hands of Susie.

Completely stricken with lust and under her control, Sergio began growing bigger and bigger, reaching soon the 240 lbs. His whole body had puffed out. His belly had grown humongous, always stuffed full of food, it had enlarged in size growing up and out, even starting to cover his lower regions. A second chin was beginning to appear, as his moobs started to inflate. Overall, he was getting definitely chubby. But, forced under such a training, he soon found himself more and more attracted to the simple act of eating, then by the simple reward of having her.

As the day started Sergio awoke with a start, his sleep interrupted by the loud rumbling of his belly. Although he had just woke up he didn’t even tried to move from the bed, while he simply moved his hand toward the night stand where he knew there were going to be a few sweets that Susan was leaving for him. Sergio quickly destroyed the contents of the full box the nurse had left for him and, he polished so quickly that he felt his hunger barely touched by the consumption.

Already he was going to shout toward the door when the same opened up, letting Susan enter with a couple trolley’s worth of food trailing behind.

“Good Morning, Lover boy. Are you hungry?”

Sergio, already salivating at the sight of the food coming toward him could barely speak, instead he nodded vigorously as his growing double chin wobbled a bit with the motion.

“Good, I need my boy to grow up to a big and strong man”

As Susan reached the player’s bed, she began to unload the first cart, basically surrounding the growing out forms of Sergio with dozens of breakfast food, all in their quite large plates. Before Sergio could even utter a word, she grabbed a forkful of pancakes, dripping with syrup and melted butter, ad moved it toward Sergio’s mouth. Surprisingly for her, Sergio didn’t make a single request but, instead, he simply opened his mouth and gladly accepted the load.

Seeing his acceptance, she tried to give him right away another load and was mildly surprised when he simply accepted it.

Smiling, she decided to take advantage of the situation.

Sergio was feeling rather good with himself, here he was, eating away a good meal, served to him by a beautiful girl. He had noticed that, lately, he seemed to be growing out quite a bit, but with the girl fawning over him and the good food she brought to him, he could care less about himself.

He barely even registered the fact that Susan was feeding him faster and faster, as morsel upon morsel was getting pushed within his mouth, forcing him to chew more and more rapidly.

It was in that exact moment that he realized something about his current situation…
124111111222244141132.title: Following bad advices…

choices: Sergio need to pack on the pounds. James devise a plan
As Sergio grows larger, Susan starts to push him to his limits
James goes into details on his plan for a happier Cristiano
The Real Georgina storm the place. She needs to see Cristiano
1241111112222441411321.content:
Sergio realized, as more and more food was pushed into his mouth that all his thoughts of leaving the place and returning to his career or his family had been simply washed away. It was a mind-blowing experience for him. At first all he had wanted was to get it done and return to his career, but now, he couldn’t see himself out of that room.

And why would he leave it? He had everything he needed right there.

An amazing girl fawning over him, good food and all the rest he could ever enjoy.

With a smile on his lips, uncaring toward the crumbs and grease around his lips, he began to eat way more greedily at whatever Susan forced upon him. As she saw that he quickened his pace, so she matched it, as she started using two forks to keep his lips always full of something, forcing him to gurgle and snort piggishly, and yet he kept going. For almost one hour and a half, Susan and Sergio seemed to battle for control until, the soccer player was feeling full. It was then that he began to slow down.

But Susan had other plans in mind.

“What’s happened, Lover boy? Already getting full?”

Sergio burbled something, his lips still closed on the last morsels she had pushed on him, as he desperately tried to chew and swallow. But his bloated middle was a clear indication that he had reached his limit.

Yet, the girl kept on taunting him, bit by bit, until she struck a nerve.

“So this is you wondrous Stamina? Oh… I get it. You’re really just a boy, aren’t you? A little boy unable to finish his meals and who go ‘wee-wee’ when he doesn’t want to continue?”

At that, something fiercely emerged from Sergio as he finally managed to swallow down the latest morsel but, instead of the angry reply he simply opened his mouth, waiting for more.

The Nurse smiled at that and, as she pushed a slice of strawberry cake within his lips, she moved her own lips toward his burgeoning belly, kissing it softly, never taking her eyes away from his. Sergio, although full to burst, could see he had managed to get back at her.

She was implying that he was but a child, uh? He was going to show her that he was a full-grown man. Bite after bite, morsel after morsel, he managed to lick clean the residual plates, although he felt rather ill after that. And yet, seeing as the girl seemed to glow with pleasure, he felt as if he had won against her.

With that feeling in mind he simply fell asleep in a deep, restorative sleep.

As the ex-soccer player slept, Susan kept caressing his bloated gut. In the short time she had been with him, it had been the first time that she managed to get him so full. Taking note of his pride, she smiled impishly as she realized she now had a new weapon to use against him. Podrick was going to be very happy with her job, Sergio was going to be fattened up really quick.

That evening, as soon as Sergio woke up from his latest food coma, he found himself still laying on his bed. IN the shadowed room he looked lazily around, as he unconsciously caressed his softening stomach, trying to figure out what he was doing there. For a moment, thoughts of returning to his career came back to him but, the memory of the curvaceous body of Susan, tightly pressed against his own, quickly put those thoughts away. For a moment he almost wished to rise from the bed to walk around the room for a bit but, almost immediately he rejected the idea.

‘Why should I rise from here? I’m so comfy here…and it’s not like I need to train, I’m in the best shape of my life…’

As he thought that, his belly grumbled a bit, requesting the nutrients it had been trained to expect by this time. Just as that sound filled the room, almost as if Susan had been waiting for it, she entered the room carrying with her a small little train of trolley’s with Sergio’s meal.

“Hey there, Handsome. It’s time for your pre-dinner meal, you’re ready?”

“Hey…I’m always ready…”

The nurse moved closer to the bed, sitting beside Sergio, as she uncovered the first platter, she had brought to him. It was a rather large bowl filled with fried spring rolls and overfilled gyoza, these lasts were so stuffed with meat that seemed ready to burst at a moment notice.

“Here we go, enjoy it, Lover Boy…”

Sergio, taking a more seated position on his bed, quickly grabbed the bowl and began to stuff his mouth with those delicacies. With each bite he felt in heaven, everything tasted so delicious on his taste buds that he even began to take bigger and bigger bites, trying to stuff as much as he could within his mouth. Even the heavy oily and greasy taste didn’t seem to disturb him anymore but, instead, pushed him to greedily eat faster. Sooner than he would have liked he felt his fingers scraping the end of the bowl, but before he could frown about that, Susan took the empty bowl and brought to him a large container with fried Chinese noodles with pork and egg.

“Now, now, we’ve just started Handsome…”

Sergio didn’t even reply, he just picked the fork and began scooping up forkful of it bringing it into his mouth.

Once more the taste was incredible. He already had Chinese food before, but it had never been so good, so tasty. Going at it faster and faster, he began to smear his mouth with oil and sauce, yet he didn’t seem to care, nor he was noticing how his stomach was bloating up, filling up with the food he was devouring. It took him less than ten minutes to clean out the large container but, as before, Susa quickly swapped the empty one with a new one.

This time it was white rice with Takoyaki sauce and fried pieces of beef. Before that, though, the nurse offered to him a milkshake as she began to slowly kiss his bloating belly, as if urging him to continue. With such encouragement Sergio began to guzzle down the milkshake, feeling it landing heavily into his gut and, a few minutes later, as he burped in satisfaction, he felt his hunger rising stronger than before. Overcome by this feeling he attacked anew the container he had been given, eating at it like a starving animal, sending rice and sauce almost everywhere.

It didn’t matter, he wanted nothing but to sate his hunger.

The meal continued in this way for more than two hours, with Sergio feeling his hunger growing every time he downed one of Susan shake’s, yet he never did question it. He was just too hungry to discuss it on the moment and, when he finally finished his ten-course meal, he was way too spent and full to raise an issue.

As he gobbled up the last fortune cookie, he burbled stupidly for a moment before exhaling an exhausted burp, feeling his stomach once again overstuffed with food. As Susan helped him lie down once more, it didn’t seem to matter that his belly blocked his view with how large and stuffed it was, he was just too tired to do anything.

“Did I…do…*urp*…good?“

“You’re getting there, Handsome. Now, rest for a bit…I’ll be back in half an hour to bring you your first dinner…sleep well…”

As she said that she kissed him softly on the lips, feeling herself the greasy taste of the food, he had ingested in those two hours. Sergio, trying as hard as he could to overcome his exhaustion, did all he could to kiss her back but was too tired to keep gong and soon fell asleep.

As he slept he dreamed of being in a nice little house, sitting at a table as Susan, dressed only with a cooking dress, was busily working herself at the stove.

“There you are, Handsome! Welcome back, your lunch is almost ready…I’ve prepared you a snack on the table. Be a good boy and have at it while I finish to prepare.”

Looking down, he saw that the table had seemingly filled with food.

The entire banquet table was now covered in platters and bowls, each of them full of delicacies for him to have.
Dreaming Sergio didn’t even question how all that humongous spread of food could be counted as snack, but he immediately began to dig in…or at least, he tried to. For some reason he couldn’t move his arms too well, yet, almost magically, Susan appeared beside him, as she began feeding him morsel after morsel, spoonful after spoonful. Sergio had only to chew and swallow, and he felt he was working at it just like a pro.

Under his own eyes, the food began to dwindle from the table, vanishing as he kept eating it until, finally the entire table had only dirty platters and crumbs of food. Burping in satisfaction, he tried again to move his arms but still, he couldn’t manage.
He tried to look down, but something was blocking his view. Still, Susan brought his stare up high again, as she kissed him with a passion he never had felt before. Melting under that kiss, he wasn’t surprised in seeing that the table was quickly being refilled by his lovely Susan.

Platters upon platters of food being piled on it until it was completely refilled and, once more, she appeared at his side helping him to eat every single crumb of it.

Dreaming Sergio felt in paradise.

As he kept eating at the endless meal he noticed that he was slowly growing, getting wider and wider, his body rising higher from the ground, as his entire forms seemed to inflate with food, but it was of no importance to him, even when Susan had began climbing his body to push more food within his lips. Nothing had importance beside having Susan beside him.
And more food to sate his hungry, growing, body.

As Sergio woke up suddenly, he couldn’t remember much except that he was strangely ravenous and that Susan was the best thing that had ever happened in his life.

As he saw the door opening and she entering he idly wondered why he had wanted to leave that place?

‘Susan loves me, and food is good …why should I ever leave this paradise?’
1241111112222441411321.title: Loving the place...and dreaming about it

Nastassja make it so that Cristiano is interested more in food than relief…
Susan start to train Sergio to obey at her commands…
12411111122224414113213.content:
James was feeling decisively happy that day.

As much as he had gathered from Susan, Sergio Aguero seemed to have renounced to the idea of escaping his room, starting so his travel down the same road that Cristiano had once taken. It would take some time, but Sergio was going to grow and then, James could finally make a meal out of him.

At the moment, instead he had to focus on how to make Cristiano a happier man.

It was rather simple, really, he had already discussed it with his Nurse, Nastassja, and she had agreed wholeheartedly to his plan. While Cristiano was living in his fake universe through the VR, James was going to warn him to lay down on the bed for he had a surprise for him. Then, all Podrick had to do was to mimicking Nastassja actions on the Georgina character he had made into the VR, so that Cristiano could finally be relieved from his…manly needs. Naturally, James would make it appear as it was all agreed beforehand with Cristiano girlfriend but, done that, everything would go smoothly.

That evening, after having prepared everything between the software and the hardware, James entered into the virtual world Cristiano was actually living in and warned him that in a few Georgina was going to arrive and explain him how things were going to go. Podrick, beforehand, had already created a link to a sub chat in the VR system. Every time Cristiano, who was already living in the VR (although he wasn’t aware of it), were to place the VR on his avatar’s head, said sub chat would open letting him believe to having just been moved into the VR.

A few minutes later, Georgina’s character appeared and, while mimicking the nurse movements in the real world, it began getting closer to the player currently sitting on the bed.

“Hey babe. I’ve…um…I’ve talked with your Coach about your needs.”

“Eurgh…Ok? And…what…what have you decided? You know that I’ll follow your wishes.”

The virtual Georgina moved closer to him, a smile on her lips.

“I know you’re a faithful partner, sweetie. That is why I’ve agreed with our coach.

While I’ll be here sharing this with you…someone else will be giving you the relief you need. Don’t worry though, I trust in my man, especially since he's growing so handsomely.”

For the following hour, Cristiano believed to be in paradise.

Not only he was feeling the relief he so hardly had needed in the real world but, since his eyes told him that it was his fiancée performing it he couldn’t have been happier. Still, he seemed somewhat distressed to be feeling tired after only one go at it but with Georgina there complimenting him and reminding him to be having still need for time to recover from his malady, the player stopped worrying about it.

As the hour passed, Georgina moved away, telling him that she had to go but that she would be back for a similar experience whenever he wanted. Shortly, they agreed to make it a weekly appointment to let him release steam. Sometime later, James character appeared in the virtual room.

“Hey Cristiano…so, how did it go?”

“Oh wow…’t was…fantastic…coach. So tired…though…”

“Don’t you worry Cristiano. Just follow the diet and you’ll be ready to go soon.”

After a bit more of a chitchat, Podrick left the VR room and returned into the real world, there he went ad complimented the nurse for the marvelous job, then he turned his stare toward the blobby mass that was Cristiano Ronaldo. Weighing roughly over the ton, the guy had already become an amorphous blob of jelly like flesh, and still, given the voracity with which he was slurping on hi feeding tube, James could see that these ‘relief sessions’ were going to add so many pounds to the already hugely mass that the soccer player had become. Still, as much as Cristiano was gaining, Podrick dreamed of an even bigger version of him.


If Cristiano was now happy as a clam, Sergio Aguero was getting there.

Having renounced to a life out of that room, the increasingly fatter player was now starting on his adventure toward becoming Cristiano’s rival, although he wasn’t aware of that. Yet, as time passed between the almost constant meals provided by Susan and her company in said moments, Sergio began to notice that he was growing increasingly less interested in her physical touch, and more passionate about the goodies she was bringing him. Still, he didn’t make a fuss over it. It didn’t matter to him the why’s of it.

All he needed, lately, was food in his body and her presence at his side.

That evening, as he heard Cristiano moan, he smiled for the guy.

‘Eh, I wonder who Coach Podrick hired to take care of that huge mass of lard.

Poor lady. Not like my Susan, who can get her hands on someone of my caliber.’

As Sergio had thoe thoughts he could not imagine that he was starting jut as Cristiano had before him. The player, in fact, was currently laying on his back, on the bed. At one side a bowl with those health bars he loved, on the other another bowl with several donuts and, right in the middle, his growing belly. His demeanor changed, though, as soon as the door to his room opened. As if he had been trained to answer to a pavlovian command, as soon as the door opened, he began feeling hungry, even if he had done nothing but eat the entire afternoon.

Grunting a bit he tried to heave himself off the bed, so to seat more comfortably but, without Susan intervention, he wouldn’t have moved. None of this was noticed by him, all he seemed to care at the moment was to gorge on whatever Susan had brought to him. And plenty she had brought.

“Here we go, Lover boy…your first pre dinner…afterwards, you will continue for your next three dinners and then, maybe a few desserts too…what do you say?”

“Umf…yeah…I…I need it…give it to me…give it all to me…”

As Susan bega bringing him plates she could see that he was getting nice and greedy, trying to gorge on everything he could.

‘Yes. Good Piggy. Keep on eating, keep on growing…You’ll be so Fat by the time I’ve finished with you…’

None of these encouragements were needed though, Sergio Aguero went at it like a starving beast, stuffing his face with a ferociousness that Susan had never seen before. He gorged like a madman, eating and gorging almost non stop, he didn’t even stop to drink his milkshakes and, what left stupefied Susan was that after a full ten course meal, he still turned to her demanding more.

“Mfhm…*Burp!*…mmm…so good…need more, though…much more. Su…Susan?

Has something...happened to...the diet?

I’m back to…*urp*…rabbit portions?”

The nurse smiled seeing him reaching a new level on his gluttony, here he was, having eaten enough food for two, a feat that usually left him tired and spent, and yet he had just asked for more. She couldn’t believe her ears, and still, she was very happy to let him indulge some more.

“Good Job, Handsome…You noticed it. I was just checking if you were faking it or not…don’t worry, I’ve got your back…eat up and grow like any man should, baby.”

As she said so she exited the room and brought in a new set of trolley’s. Initially she had wanted to use them to goad him to have some more but, if he was really requesting an increase in his portions size, who was she to say no?

Offering to him a massive platter covered with sausages and fries, deeply immersed into a thick gooey BBQ sauce, she kept staring as his already overfilled belly kept growing bigger and larger as more food he ate with reckless abandon.

‘Oh God…it’s all so good…I need more of it…She brings me so much happiness.

Want her? No. Food first…then maybe some snack…and later on, maybe, her too.

Yeah. It’s all so good…’
12411111122224414113213.title: Happier ultra-obese Cristiano & Growing Aguero

124111111222244141132134.content:
With James currently focusing more on Cristiano’s well being, Susan decided that it was time for her to take a more active role in managing her charge. True, under her guidance, Sergio had managed to finally lose any conscious thought about leaving the place, preferring to stay there and enjoy both her company and the food she brough to him but, for Susan, this wasn’t enough.

It was for this reason that, as morning came and she entered Sergio’s room with her deluge of treats for his four breakfasts, she decided to play the situation a bit differently than normal. As she moves closer to the bed, where the soccer player was still sleeping, she marveled once more at the sheer size he had managed to reach. As he was laying on his bed, she could see that he already had swelled up quite a bit. A larger than most paunch already on his torso, having completely erased his washboards abs. His moobs starting to grow large and jelly like, as a similar fate were subjected both his arms and legs. As she inche closer to him she could clearly see that his thighs were touching and would be separated only if he consciously moved them apart.

His face, though, hadn’t yet gotten bigger. It was somewhat softer but, there wasn’t still any sign of a big, juicy, double chin.

Still, She needed more of him and so, as she woke him up, seeing his hungry tare she decided to start his training.

“Good Morning Sergio, it time for your breakfasts…”

“Uh..? Oh…yea…breakfasts sounds…good. I’m hungry…”

“But before we do that, Sergio, what do you say of a little game?”

Sergio Aguero, having been ‘trained’ by stuffing his belly to the fullest, wasn’t really interested in any game but, since it was from His Susan that the request was coming, he decided to let herself explain, at least.

“I…Don’t know…I’m hungry…”

“C’mon…It will be fun…and the prize is good too…”

“What…prize?”

Here Susan smiled as she grabbed from one of the trolley she had brought with her a large, five liters, jug, choked full of the melted health bars he had grown addicted to.

“If you win…you get to have this jug here…even if you shouldn’t have it before lunch…”

As Sergio realized what the jug contained, he began feeling the urge to drink from it, to empty it all into his gullet. Feeling as a Drug addict would in front of a cache of his favorite drugs, Sergio was acutely aware and waiting for Susan instructions.

“Well now, all you’ve got to do is eat…Normally you should have four breakfasts…But if you want the prize you shall eat eight of them…will you do it for me?”

The soccer player, although knowing that he usually felt full after his first three, managing to clean the fourth out of sheer willpower, vigorously nodded to the request, his eyes still glued to the jug full of health bars sludge. The nurse smiled, seeing this as the first stepping stone toward her goal of having Sergio obey all of her commands, still, she quickly began to pile the food around him, helping him then to maintain a more comfortable seated position on his bed.

The ex-soccer player, now that had food all around him, quickly began to clear out plate after plate, scooping out at times, whole plates, only to let their contents flow down in his mouth to be chewed and swallowed. Still, as he cleaned away three breakfasts worth of food he began to feel himself getting stuffed up. Yet, he truly did want the prize and so he plowed through another two full breakfast, before feeling himself overstuffed and unable to continue.

“What’s the matter? Big Boy isn’t able to continue on this measly little meal?”

Huffing and puffing from both the fatigue of having eaten way too much and the feeling of all the food weighing him down, Sergio tried desperately to continue but he found himself unable to. Almost crying he looked at Susan, pleading and begging for help. The nurse, smiling inwardly, moved closer to him, massaging his overfilled gut, helping him in finding more space, although she still whispered in his ear something that both worried and aroused the soccer player.

“Alright…I’ll help you out this time but…this mean that tomorrow you shall do better than today…all on your own.”

With Susan help, both in massaging his belly and in the end, with seven meals downed, with a bit of force feeding from her part, Sergio managed finally to clear out all the meals that Susan had brought to him. The player was mostly left in a similar state of shock, as he felt himself so full that he got the feeling of be ready to burst at any minute. Yet, as full as he was, when he saw Susan giving him the jug, he couldn’t stop himself from bringing it to his lips as he started chugging it, swallowing painfully all the sludge in it.

As he released his hold on the jug a massive belch escaped from his lips and quickly, he fell asleep back on his bed, as his humongous filled and taut stomach churned and burbled angrily having been filled way more than its supposed capacity.

As weeks passed, Susan kept providing more and more food to Sergio Aguero, pushing him every time to go over his limits and, as time passed, the easier it quickly became for her to order him around. True, some time he couldn’t reach the quota she had ordered him and, in those instances, she had to punish him by giving him less to eat but, soon he practically had become a slave to her words.

As it was proven that morning, a full month of training under his belt.

As Susan entered the room, she marveled at the sheer size her pet had managed to reach. Sergio, overfed by massive quantities of food, had grown astonishingly fast. After a month of eating almost to bursting point, already he had increased his mass of several times. His torso had swelled up hugely, as he now sported a gut that completely covered his crotch and that he was unable to hug with his own two arms. Both arms and legs had softened up similarly, forcing him to keep them rigidly, since it was becoming harder and harder for him to bend them. Even his hips and ass had widened considerably, although not as massively as his belly. His ass had quickly become a massive set of cushions he could use to sit even on the harshest grounds, without feeling but a minor discomfort.

Finally, what Susan loved more than anything, his face finally sported a large double chin, with a third roll starting to appear underneath his other two.

Finished with her inspection she moved closer and softly patted him on his wobbly gut, waking him up.

“Good Morning Pet…How are you doing today?”

“Mmrf…m’hungry…”

“Good. A hungry pet is a healthy one. Stand up, then, pet. Do it for me.
Do it for your Mistress.”

Sergio, used now to having Susan as a Master, slowly began to move from his reclined position. Sweating profusely, he moved both of his legs to the side of his bed, as he mustered all of his energies to comply with what Susan had ordered. He took nearly twenty minutes but, in the end, he managed to stand although he couldn’t do it for more than a few moments, before falling on his behind, managing to keep himself seated on the bed.

“Good, Pet. Here’s your reward…”

Susan then left on his fattened thighs a humongous triple layered cake, covered in frosting, which the soccer player quickly proceeded to devour as if it was nothing more than a light snack.

“Now, Pet, show me how good of a pet you are… Today I will give you twice as much as you usually get. You will eat up to the last crumb.

If you manage…I’ll have a good prize for you…but if you fail…”

“N-No…Won’t fail…Will eat all…I’m a good pet.”

“Good…Eat up then…will bring you your doubled mid-morning snack soon…”
124111111222244141132134.title: Training an overfed Sergio to obey

choices: What happens when Real Georgina meet Cristiano?
1241111112222441411321344.content:
James Podrick was actually living his dream. Surrounded by the two fattest soccer player the world had ever seen he rarely thought back at how the situation he was in had started at all. Yet, suddenly, he was forced to wake up from this dreamland and face the real world once more.

One morning, well into the they year and something since Cristiano had vanished from the scene, one of James informants let him know that the CEO had grown restless and was planning a ‘surprise’ visit to see how the two players were faring. Luckily for James, the informants told him that the visit was going to happen in a week, so there may be going to be just enough time to find a solution. Podrick, although initially in a panic, managed to calm himself and think rationally. With his web of contacts, for sure he was going to find a solution for the CEO impending visit.

Medical records weren’t going to be an issue. Everything that had been done to both Cristiano and Aguero, had been accurately masked under fool proof papers. The real issue was, unfortunately, Cristiano.

The player, under James wishful desires, had grown way to massive to justify any kind of treatments intended to cure him from his ‘Illness’. As much as the thought destroyed him, James was seriously thinking that Cristiano had to go. Although there were a few people that would share with James the bounty offered by the massively ultra-obese soccer player, James didn’t like the idea of getting rid of him.
