True, a fantastic meal was going to come out of him, a literal bounty that would keep James and his friends fed for a long time but, he had grown rather attached to Cristiano. Almost as if he was a pet.

Yet, James didn’t see any other escape route.

He couldn’t transfer the player away safely. He had no one that he could trust to take care of Cristiano, keeping him alive and fed, and he couldn’t let the CEO to see the blobby mountain that Cristiano had become. There were papers but, even a fool would have realized that, at that size, a hospital would have been a better choice.

No. There was nothing to it. With only a last resort in his head, James did what he needed to do.

He called Georgina. The real fiancée of Cristiano.

As he talked to her he told her a series of disturbing lies, something that seemed to shock her out of the blue, after having missed her boyfriend for so long. And yet, James knew it was the only way that he could keep Cristiano alive.

“…So, Miss, I know it may be hard to believe but we had no other choice. The higher-ups wanted to shut down what had happened, make it so that Cristiano had died due to this strange illness…Yet, I couldn’t do it. So, I hid him.

I’ve kept him hidden as the illness wreaked his body, as he lost almost all things that made him the Cristiano Ronaldo I’ve known. And yet, it was better than having him…taken off.

I’m sorry to call upon you in such a dire circumstance to reveal you this secret but…I’ve got no other choice.”

On the other side, Georgina Rodriguez was speechless.

She had tried time and time again to reach Cristiano but they had always told her he was gravely ill with a very infective malady and so she couldn’t manage to contact him. But now, as she heard the words of his Coach, as she felt the pain in his voice, she was crestfallen in realizing how horrible those people were.

To even think of disposing of her fiancée as if he was nothing more than a rag on the floor.

“I... I don’t know what to say…but…But What I can do to help? Why are you telling me all of this? You want me to go public?”

“No. No, going public would only make matters worse. I may have a place where he could hide, but I need someone trustworthy to take care of him as the malady run its course. I can’t think of anyone else but you, Miss.

If you really love him as much as Cristiano told me…”

Georgina, even though she didn’t know what to expect, didn’t wait not even the blink of an eye to answer.

“What do you need of me? I’ll do all I can to save him.”

“Thanks, Miss… I’ll organize his transfer by using a flatbed truck with a massive refrigerated container on top of it. Cristiano will be moved in there and then transferred to the safe location I told you about.

I need you to get on board of the truck and assist Cristiano as much as possible.”


With Georgina’s help, James began to organize everything. Swiftly, a secure transport was arranged, and Cristiano’s bed swiftly moved from the room he was, into the container that was going to hold him until he reached the safe location. Moving Cristiano proved to be a massive feat and yet, somehow, they managed.

James was sad in letting Cristiano’s go but, the hope that he could still be alive, and reachable, was enough to make it all become a reality.

In truth, James would have preferred to give Cristiano to his friends but, as big as he was, he was sure that they would have fallen prey of their own hedonism and needs to feed. No, with Georgina guarding him, he at least could hope to meet Cristiano again and then made a meal out of him when situation had calmed down.

Now, all James had to do was provide some new papers, certifying the death of Cristiano Ronaldo and wait for the CEO to arrive. When the fateful morning came, Podrick made sure of looking sad enough to convince anyone of what had befallen to his protégé, and yet the CEO didn’t seem truly perturbed.

As the man entered the rooms, wearing a full hazmat suit, James noticed right away that the old man was rather excited and lively for one who had been just informed of the demise of his most precious player.

Still, James played his part to the best of his capacities, he even showed Sergio to the guy, telling him that Sergio too seemed to be falling under the same fat of Cristiano, although, he was faring a bit better and so they hoped for a recovery.

Still, after all the followers of the CEO left the room that had once hosted Cristiano, the old man turned upon Podrick, taking him apart and speaking to him in private.

“So, James… May I call you James?”

“S-Sure, Sir.”

“Good. You see, James. Most people think I’m a baffling buffoon. Someone that has all the power but knows not how to use it wisely.

You too, for example, have thought that this…this charade was going to be enough to fool me.

It hasn’t.

I know what you did. And I know that Cristiano is still alive, secluded somewhere.”

James was baffled and stunned. He tried to say something, anything, but the old man shut him up with a gesture of his hand.

“Now, now…let me finish. Did you really think you could do something in here, without people telling me what you were doing?

Still, there is no reason to worry. Instead, I wanted to give my congratulations to you for a job well done. I, sincerely, have no idea why you find fattening up these guys so fascinating, but it doesn’t matter.

In the time that Cristiano Ronaldo was…out of commission… Not only we managed to hire new younger players who shows a lot of promises but, thanks to this ‘Illness’ we hadn’t to spend a penny for his Contract.

So, you can see, you’ve done us a huge favor.

Most importantly, I wish for you to keep doing it. I’ll personally grant you, and your staff, all the funds you may need to keep people under your care, for as long as you want.

A short list of names will soon be provided to you, targets that you will have to…work your magic upon. Nobody will put the nose in what you do, as long as the people on that list will be taken care of.

I’m especially surprised at how you’ve dealt the situation of Mr. Ronaldo. I was expecting to see him in here, all blobby like and yet, you managed in a few days to have him out of here and with forged papers stating his death.

Wonderful.”

James, at this point was stunned into silence. All of his silent jobs, trying to be as stealthy as possible, and yet the old man had known it all along. Even more worrying still, the guy wanted him to continue.

What was this, a dream?

“Er… Sir? With…with all due respect…what should I…I mean, how should I…?”

“Don’t worry about it. As I said a list will be given to you. How you acquire the persons on that list will be up to you but, to seal the deal, you must make sure that none shall be wiser about what’s going on.

One word to the media and…if we go down, you’ll be coming with us.
Clear?”

“C-Crystalline…Sir.”

“Good! Now, Enjoy the rest of your day. We will fax you the list within the day.”

As the old man, the CEO, left the room, James literally crumbled upon a chair. He still couldn’t believe that the guy was aware of what he was doing and, even more stupefying, he was allowing him to continue!

True, his targets were going to be specific but, he could keep doing what he had for the past year. And, most importantly, as soon as the situation calmed down, he could bring back Cristiano!

As he was thinking about that, the printing machine came to life, printing out a simple paper sheet with some names on it. There were no markings, no indications. Only those names.

Some he recognized them immediately, after all they belonged to famous soccer players. Others, instead, he noticed were of a few girls, probably partners of said soccer players and then, at the bottom of the list, even a few managers of their own group.

As he scrolled through the list, he wondered how he should approach them and, most importantly, from whom was better to start….
1241111112222441411321344.title: CEO visits to see the status of the players.

choices: Focus on Dybala, leaving Aguero to Susan
Direct both guys growth from backstage as the other nurse care for Paulo
As the nurses take care of each player, James seeks another target from the list
12411111122224414113213442.content:
Podrick spent the following two days evaluating the names on the list he was provided with. As per instruction received there was no real order that he had to follow in order to reach his target. Due to that and, considering the closeness that one soccer player had had in particular with Cristiano Ronaldo, he finally decided to set his target on Paulo “La Joya” Dybala.

In the following days, as James made sure that Sergio Aguero was still being taken care from the nurse assigned to him, he began to lay down his plan. During a common medical examination, someone injected a weakened strain of the Flu virus to Paulo, making so that as the exams continued, something seemed out of the ordinary. With the hidden assistance of the top management it was child’s play to make it believable that Paulo was showing symptoms similar to the alleged ones related to Mr. Ronaldo’s case.

Within a week, Mr. Dybala found himself sitting in a spartan white room with Podrick sitting in front of him.

“What’s going on? They’ve told me to make myself available for a private meeting here but, nobody explained me exactly what the meeting is about…”

James, offering a cup of coffee to the player, smiled at him as he checked his papers for a bit and then, finally addressed the player.

“Mr. Dybala, may I call you Paulo? Thanks.
So, Paulo, you’ve been called here due to the results of your last medical examinations. Apparently, something out of the ordinary was found within your organism and, after more in depth checks, it was confirmed that you seem to be suffering from the initial symptoms of a rare, and yet extremely virulent, illness.”

“Oh, God! Am I going to die?”

“No…Well, in truth, it shouldn’t be that grave of an illness, at least in the early stages of it. Do you recollect of what has befallen to Cristiano Ronaldo?”

Here, Dybala, looked puzzled for a moment until he answered back.
“Yeah…As I recall he had been removed from the roster due to a sudden malady that forced him to be placed in isolation…recently heard he was risking his life but, apparently, they managed to stabilize him somehow…”

James grinned within himself. Thanks to the CEO support, the lie that Cristiano had died quickly changed into he had risked to die, until they managed to save him by his hairs. Forcing them to keep him secluded somewhere, until a cure was ready for him. This way, in the future, James could easily access to the mountainous blob of a man he had created. But, now, he had to focus on the new target.

“Yes, exactly so. I’m Podrick, James Podrick. I’ve been following Cristiano as he fell prey of this illness, trying my best to have him to follow the medical advices we received in order for him to recover from the illness but, alas, Mr. Ronaldo kept thinking that he knew better and the situation evolved as we know it today.

You, Paulo, seem to be affected by the early stages of the same illness that Cristiano had. Due to this, and to the fact that I’m somewhat immune to it, I’ve been assigned to you so that you can receive the best treatments and advices in order to avoid the direst consequences of this illness.

I’m sorry to inform you, also, that starting from this moment, you will be relocated in a secluded facility with no connection to the outside, your family has been already informed but you shall not have any contact with any of them, except through me.”

Paulo seemed stunned by the turn of events. He at first didn’t believe a word of what this man was telling him but, as the guy kept talking about Ronaldo’s situation, the more Paulo began to be afraid. He wasn’t sure what was going on but, everything seemed too official to be just a joke. Still, he had to try it.

“Y-You’re joking, right? Right?”

“Afraid not, Paulo. The threat here is very real. I can understand how overwhelmed you may feel, Cristiano had been feeling the same but, I can assure you that this is no joke. Most importantly, if not treated correctly, the illness may advance of its stages pretty quickly becoming a serious menace for your health.

It is for this reason that I urge you, once again, to follow the prescribed treatment under my care, so to avoid the advancing of the illness to a more dangerous stage.”

At this, Paulo, seemed to deflate in defeat. If it was really such a dangerous situation he was in, what could he do but comply to what Mr. Podrick was telling him?

“Alright…God…Ok, I…I’ll do what I have to…I’m in your hands, Mr. Podrick.”

“Please, call me James, and don’t worry Paulo. I’ll do my utmost to help you overcome this situation, as well as try to make your permanence in the facility as comfortable as I can. If you ever shall need of something, let me know and I’ll do my best to provide it to you.”

With that said, James escorted the soccer player to the renovated structure that was now going to be used only by Podrick and his “ill” patients. In the week that had taken to plan the fall of Mr. Dybala, the entire building was renovated, providing to every needs and comfort for those that were going to inhabit the place.

No more restricted to a single floor, Podrick had now at his disposal an entire five floor building, with four wings, giving him no less than twelve apartments, three on each floor, where his patients could reside for as long as James dictated. One wing of each floor was going to be dedicated to the staff that was going to be following each patient and, the top most floor given mostly to those that were going to take care of all general services, as catering, laundry and similar, and of course, to James penthouse.

As Paulo saw the place where he was going to live he stood dumbfounded by the luxury of it, often turning around giving Podrick a puzzled look as more and more of the lavish apartment was revealed to him.

“Are…Are you sure we’re in the right place? I mean…it’s not that I expected a three-star place but this…this seems beyond the five-star!”

“Paulo…” James said “As I said to you before, despite the illness that has befallen you, we truly are trying to let you stay in the most relaxing and comfortable place we can provide. So, yes. This is all true and will be yours.

Alas, I must warn you that the treatment to assess and cure your malady, can be pretty harsh. Especially or someone used to certain rhythms.

An example? Starting from today, a strict ‘No Exercise rule’ is in place. Physical activity is often a trigger for the advance to more harmful stages of the illness. Your mealtimes and snack times will be provided by a group of dietitians who has followed closely Cristiano’s illness and you will have to comply to what they will schedule for you.

These are only a few examples, but I think you’ve got the idea.”

Dybala, seating on a nearby sofa, turned his stare upon the figure of James, sitting quietly on a nearby chair, as he realized that what was happening was really true.

“So…it is true. I... I was still thinking that maybe this was all a joke…a test of some sorts…”

James moved closer to the player, closing his hand on the guy shoulder, gently squeezing it.

“I’m sorry Paulo, but yes. It is all true. Unfortunately, you are in a dangerous situation and the Company is doing all it can to save you from reaching a critical situation. All we can do is follow the treatment they will provide you and take the medicines they will order you to take.

Oh, before I forget. Here…”

James then brought forward an unmarked bottle, containing a hundred or so, of small blue and white pills, leaving it in the hands of the player.

“…these are the first batch that the doctors told me to give you. You’ll have to take two of those before every meal, swallowing them with a glass of water. As they said, these will soon become your staple, for at least the first few weeks of your permanence here.”

“Weeks!? You mean I’ll have to stay here for more than…”

“I’m afraid so. We hope to keep you isolated for the shortest time but, considering how virulent the illness is and how resistant it is to pharmaceutical treatments, it may take a few months before you’re allowed to leave the premises.”

Dybala, utterly destroyed by the news, simply stared at the floor, as Podrick took his leave, reminding him that he was always available, no matter the time, if he needed anything.

“Just pick the phone and dial ’ 5 5 5 ‘ and I’ll come to you as fast as I can.”

As Podrick left the player to adapt to his new home for the next few months, he smiled widely knowing that thanks to the appetite enhancers he had given to him, the guy was going to be ravenous at every meal.

As he left Paulo’s room he quickly went to check on Sergio, finding the guy in a deep sleep onto his bed. As he moved closer, he saw that the guy was stuffed up to his gills, as he let out trembling breaths in between of burps. By eye estimation, Sergio had to be already at around 500 lbs, if not more. His overall form had grown quite a bit, with his belly creating an apron like avalanche of fat tissue over his crotch, his face was the most remarkable feature.

His cheeks were soft and cascading onto his neck, fighting for space with his third chin, his eyes constantly forced to be squeezed, forcing him to squint around without being able to fully look around and then, his lips. His mouth was so covered in fat, surrounded by it that, for sure, he wasn’t able anymore to speak normally but was forced to grumble his requests.

As James enjoyed the view, he reminded himself to grant a bonus to Susan, the girl had done an amazing work with Sergio.

He had only to decide who he was going to visit first in the coming morning…
12411111122224414113213442.title: “La Joya” is in for a surprise

choices: Switch back to Sergio and Susan, as she submits him even more
Podrick decides to use hypnosis on Paulo, turning him in an eating machine
Meanwhile, how Georgina is faring with the gluttonous Cristiano?
124111111222244141132134421.content:
James, in the end, decided to let Sergio Aguero in the care of Nurse Susan, while he and the other Nurse would focus instead of Paulo Dybala.

As morning came, first thing he did was to collect the fake papers that he had asked to be prepared to confirm Paulo Dybala’s situation, in case the player happened to resist to his lies. Then he moved through the building until he reached the apartment of the player and, upon entering the place he saw that Paulo had just met with his personal Nurse. As James entered the room, in fact, Paulo was sitting on his bed, amiably chatting with Nurse Nastassja, as she handed him quite the rich breakfast.

On the player lap, in fact, was lying a tray with five one-inch thick pancakes, drowned in chocolate syrup and melted butter, while right beside that plate another one was filled with fried bacon strips and fried eggs. To close the meal, two milkshakes were on the nearby bedpost. Seeing as the nurse was taking great care in doing the talking as she, gently and slowly, fed the player, James swiftly returned from where he came, deciding to wait a few minutes before entering the room.

Half an hour later, the door to Paulo’s room opened and out came the Nurse, smiling widely, as she conspiratorially leaned in toward James, making sure to let him see that the tray and both shakes were empty. As Podrick entered the apartment again he made sure to cough loudly so to make his presence known to the player, watching with a little smile as the guy seemed to be enjoying his stuffed stomach very much.

“Good Morning, Paulo. Hope you’ve had a good night sleep.”

“Oh…Hey, Sir. Y-Yeah…it was...good, I guess...” as he composed himself, trying in vain to cover his stuffed belly with his too short shirt, the player turning red for the embarrassment, and yet, seeing as Podrick seemed unaware of anything, he quickly relaxed and acted more normally.

“So, Sir, what news have you got for me? I have, really to stay here for weeks…if not months?”

“I’m afraid so. In fact, right this morning I’ve received the diet plan and medical treatment you’ll have to follow as the doctors will try to find a permanent cure for this illness. Here, is all in these documents, if you want to check…”

As Paulo took the papers, he didn’t seem as upset as he had been the night before.

“Say, Paulo, have you met the Nurse that will be following y…”

“Yes! Uh…I mean…yeah…eh eh…I’ve met her this morning…she seems a nice girl.”

“Only the best for you guys. Still, I’m not here only to chit chat. Unfortunately, I’ve also to let you know how your daily schedule will be from now on, unless new updates will arrive from the Medical dept.

Starting from today you will follow a four meal per day treatment, which will be served by Nastassja, your personal nurse, whom will also be at your disposal for any additional request you may have.

From time to time, or when you will need it, I will also come to assist you in following additional medical therapies as soon as the Doctors will inform me.”

The player, now starting to feel the effect of the heavy breakfast didn’t seem to take great care in James words, as he nodded to him a few times before falling asleep in a well-earned digestive nap. As Paulo slept, James called to his side the nurse.

“I hope you gave him, apart from the breakfast, also the pills, right?”

The girl, a slender example of feminine beauty, with long dark braided hair, smiled as she nodded.

“Of course, Sir. A matter of few minutes after and he didn’t need coaxing to clean out the tray. Will I be taking care of him, Sir?”

“Yes, you will. One thing though. Although I appreciate the results brought forward from your colleague, I would prefer not to have Paulo here, to follow the same path of submission that Sergio is taking with Susan.”

The nurse, as she turned to Paulo, caressing his face delicately, and then his stuffed belly, whispered back.

“Oh no, Sir. I’ll be gentle with this one…”

A couple hours later, Paulo woke up slowly, feeling a bit groggy. As he woke up properly, he looked down and saw that his belly had greatly reduced in size, sig that his large breakfast had been completely digested.

With his mind eased by the disappearance of the bloated stomach he grabbed the papers that the coach had brought him and began reading them, starting to realize that the prescribed activities in there didn’t seem very healthy. Still, the signature on the bottom was the one of the Medical dept. Chief so, he couldn’t really refuse to follow them, and yet, it was all so very strange.

‘Man, four main meals each day…plenty of snacks pauses throughout the day…no exercises…Basically they want me to stay here in bed all day long and eat what they bring me?

It doesn’t seem the classic diet but, I guess, this illness isn’t a common one…’

As he was going through the papers more in detail, he heard the door of his apartment open up and, looking in that direction he saw the nurse he had met that same morning, coming toward him while pushing before her a small-ish trolley.

“H-Hey…I guess this is one of the…snack times, right?”

“Right you are, Sir. It’s mid-morning snack pause. I’ve got here something for you to have right away and a few things to tide you up until lunch time.”

As the nurse moved closer to the bed, Paulo could smell a marvelous aroma coming from that trolley and, without noticing it, he began to slightly drool in anticipation.

“Before that Sir, there are the vitamins you’ve got to take.”

As she said this, she gave to him three pills, same as the ones he had that same morning, and to wash them down she gave him also a tall glass filled with milkshake. Paulo, partially following the medical instruction and, partially, in awe of the girl before him, rapidly took the pills and drank all the milkshake quickly, before adjusting himself against the back of the bed in order to be more or less seated with his back against the wall.

As he did so, the nurse left on his lap a tray as big as the one received in the early morning, and yet this time there was a small bowl filled with donut holes, a plate of butter cookies and a similar plate with a slice of chocolate cake and two scoops of vanilla ice-cream. Alongside of these, there were also another two tall glasses of milkshakes.

“Here you go, Sir…”

Paulo, as surprised as he was for the large quantity of food in front of him, began to actually feel pretty hungry and so, began eating, quickly clearing out the donut holes and the cookies, taking then a breather to wash it all down with the first shake. As he ate, his belly began anew to bloat out and yet, thanks to the nurse gently rubbing it, he barely noticed any distress from it.

Yet, as he began eating the slice of cake, he began to feel himself pretty much full, not used to eat as much sugary goodies in one sitting. Nastassja was there to assist him, though, as she gently took the spoon from his hand and began to gently feeding him the rest of the cake slice and the remaining ice-cream, as she also kept rubbing his taut belly with one hand, easing his discomfort.

Once the tray was cleared, Paulo felt himself stuffed to the gills once again, idly promising himself to not overeat this much again…although the gentle touch of the girl beside him left him feeling nice and not too much burdened by pain.

“Good job, Sir. Now, a few more vitamins for you to take, these ones will slowly work into your body, easing it and making you feel much better, you’ll see.”

The player, feeling drowsy once again, didn’t question it and quickly swallowed the new pills, barely noticing that they were different from the ones he had taken before the mid-morning snack, washing them down then, with the last shake the girl had given to him. As he felt himself fall asleep one more, he barely heard the girl telling him that he was going to leave a few treats for him, if he should have felt hungry before lunch.

Nastassja, instead, watched with rapt fascination as Paulo fell asleep once more, forced by his body in order to speed up the digestion process of the large meal he just had. Quickly she left beside him a large bowl filled to the brim with cream filled donuts and a similar bowl chocked full of assorted chocolates, knowing well enough that, with the additional appetite enhancer she had given to him, although less potent than the ones she had given him prior the meal, he for sure was going to keep eating all morning.

As she left the room, letting Paulo to enjoy his much needed rest, she could only eagerly wait for lunch time to come, just to be back at his side, watching him stuff himself full of all those calories he was going to need to grow big and fat.
124111111222244141132134421.title: Dybala needs some attention….

choices: His clothes. His shirt and pants rips at the seams
The bed, a few planks below the mattress break up
his necklace. It brokes in countless pieces
Something breaks…but he doesn’t notice or care.
1241111112222441411321344211.content:
When the player woke up he found himself still on his bed, his belly had deflated somewhat, once again, and yet, he still felt some residual hunger within himself.

Looking at the clock near his bedpost he saw that it was still an hour before lunch time and yet, he didn’t want to disturb his nurse for such a trivial thing.
As he watched at his surroundings, he noticed right away that a few piles of snacks had been left all around him, probably by Nastassja, and so he began to eat again, grabbing a few chocolate bars from his bedpost, as he used his free hand to turn on the tv, starting to watch mindlessly whatever show was currently on. As he took the first bite to the chocolate bar he was holding, a smile appeared on his face.

He couldn’t read the brand of the treat he was eating but, it was by far the most delicious thing he ever had. Speeding up, he began to take larger and larger bites, smearing his lips with chocolate, uncaring of how uncouth he may seem to appear.

‘Man…This thing is delicious…I’ll have just one more… and maybe another one next…Then I’ll stop…’

And yet, he didn’t stop.

If anything else he began grabbing those bars with both hands, stuffing his mouth with both bars at once, as he felt the pleasant feeling of his stomach filling up, and yet, his hunger didn’t seem to be cinched at all. It was only when his hand moved to the pile to grab another bar, finding it empty, that he stopped. And yet, as he burped loudly in satisfaction, as his belly rumbled hungrily, Nastassja made her appearance bringing with her a couple of trolley’s loaded with food.

“Sir? It’s lunch time. Can I come in?”

“Please…*urp*…come forward…I’m rather famished…today…”

“That is good, Sir, a healthy appetite is the sign of a healthy body.”

As the nurse approached the player, he stared silently at her, as she began to place tray upon tray on the bed and on his lap, as the bed began to be covered in plates and platters. Before he could feast, however, she handed him the three vitamins pills he was getting used to take before each meal. As soon as he had swallowed them, she began laying on him the platefuls of food he was going to be having as lunch.

“Sir, today, as per your program, Lunch will consist in the following servings…
As a starter, we have a dozen chicken nuggets with a side of fries, all surrounded by BBQ sauce.”

Paulo, while listening to his nurse, already was grabbing the small-ish nuggets and fries, stuffing his face with them as he softly moaned for the taste spreading into his mouth, as he pushed handfuls upon handfuls of both into his mouth.

“…Then, as first course, we have fried pork noodles, with ham and fried eggs…”

As Paulo cleaned the nuggets in record time, he began assaulting the plate that the nurse left in front of him, taking massive forkful of the noodles, fueled by the growing hunger he was feeling deep within himself, unaware of how his belly was filling up as more and more food was being pushed in there.

“First second course, pork steak in a buttery sauce, a chinch of wine added in to give it a bit more flavor, with a side of roasted potatoes”

Dybala, burping loudly in satisfaction, his senses overridden by the delectable flavors on his taste buds, licked clean in record time the noodles, and the he proceeded to demolish the rather large steak awaiting him, helping himself to the sauce, as soon as the steak had been consumed, with a loaf of sweet bread.
At this point, although massaging his own belly with one hand, the player didn’t seem to be fazed by the fact that his toned abs seemed to have vanished, replaced by a growing softer middle.

“Second second-course, a six-eggs stuffed omelet, with cheese on the top and filled with a mix of beef and pork cuts of meat, all coated together in a sauce similar, and yet more delicate, of the previous course.”

As Paulo cut the large omelet, he could see the sauce dripping out from the middle of the omelet, the arome coming from it only fueling his hunger and desire for having a taste of that delicacy. As soon as he had the first mouthful he found himself ensorcelled by that taste. With a furious pace he rapidly glutted on the omelet, clearing the plate clean in a record time, as he huffed and burped in satisfaction.

“It’s all… so good… give praise…to the Chef…”

“I will, Sir. As Mr. Podrick says, only the best for you… Now, Sir, it’s time for dessert…”

This time she didn’t say a word as she left a plate with a large quarter of a chocolate cake right under the player eyes. The massive sweet was covered in a thick chocolate coating, and inside it was made mostly of chocolate with paper thin divisors made of some kind of cookie crumble.

Dybala, although starting to feel full, and yet still so hungry, he quickly took a forkful of the massive slice and loudly moaned as his tastebuds were overloaded with pleasure as he tasted the cake. No matter how full he felt, he began scooping larger and larger pieces from the cake, relishing every second of that delectable taste within his mouth.

As his fork scratched against the empty plate he seemed to wake up from the reverie, feeling full and yet, not completely satisfied. Before he could utter a single word, though, Nastassja left under his nose a new plate, offering him a platter with a dozen donuts, some covered in sugar and sprinkles and some cream filled. The guy, flashed her a thankful smile and resumed his eating, finally starting to feel contently full and a bit stuffed.

Nastassja was watching the soccer player eating with attentiveness and, as soon as he cleared the last donut, seeing him as he breathed out in tiredness, she took the empty plate and tried to coax him into continuing by leaving a new plate in front of him, giving him a few gooey chocolate brownies.

“Sir, would you like some more?”

“I…I really… shouldn’t…already overdone it…”

“But, Sir, you’re in need of your energies. The Illness might…”

“I…I understand but…I feel so full…”

And yet, as full as he felt, with the treats so close to him, enticing him, he could barely resist the temptation to give in and enjoy. Plus, Nastassja, he noticed, seemed to be quite intrigued with him and he thought that she may remain somewhat deluded if he was to refuse.

“Alright…J-Just this once…though…”

Tiredly, he took the first brownie and brought it to his lips, biting into it he felt the gooey chocolate spread within his mouth, filling his taste buds with pleasure. Moaning softly, he tried to bring what remained of that treat to his lips but found himself too tired.

Seeing as he was trying to keep going, the nurse began to bend over him, gently feeding him the chocolaty treats, one by one, giving Paulo time to chew and swallow until he finally fell asleep, stuffed to the gills. As Nastassja cleaned him out, and took away the empty plates, she took her time caressing and massaging his bloated and taut belly, as she wished to see him growing bigger and fatter.

From that day, a sort of routine started to form for Paulo Dybala.

As the hunger enhancers slowly worked within his system, he began to feel perpetually hungry, forcing him to almost constantly snack through the day, going full on at the main mealtimes. But it wasn’t only his stomach that was pushing him forward, it was also the presence of the nurse, which seemed to be growing more and more attached to him. And yet, as he passed his days lazily on the bed, stuffing himself up at every occasion, it wasn’t long before he began to notice that his clothes seemed to be growing rather tight on him.

At first, he denied that fact, forcing himself to believe that they had just provided him with a wrong sized PJ then, as the discomfort grew, he lied to himself saying that they had been just shrunk in the washing machine. But, after two weeks of constant indulging and plentiful meals, something had to give.

It was almost midnight and Dybala was currently finishing his late night snack. In truth, by the sheer quantity of food he had eaten up to that point, it could have been considered a full-fledged meal, and yet he wasn’t paying attention to that. All his focus was now on the half sheet cake that Nas was feeding him.

No matter that he had eaten himself to stuffing point up until that moment, as the girl offered him that last treat all he wanted, no. All he needed was to have that delicacy within himself.

Mouthful after mouthful, his stomach billowed out more and more, filling up even more, growing rounder and higher as more food and calories were being pushed in there. But, as bottomless his hunger could be, the same couldn’t be said for…
1241111112222441411321344211.title: Paulo’s pleasant diet

choices: He keeps working out but, he also eats way more than before
As he keeps working out, he notices that he’s still growing bigger
In less than a week, he forgot about the exercises
Switch to Aguero, he seems to be having problems moving around lately
12411111122224414113213442111.content:
Paulo had been in bliss for the last two weeks.

Between the loving gaze of Nastassja and the endless onslaught of food, he had almost forgot why he was being quarantined in that apartment. Such a gluttonous lifestyle had left its mark, though, on the player. Gone were the trained muscles, the sculpted abs, the toned arms and legs, his entire body had softened up quite a bit under the vast deluge of treats and the constant snacking he did on his own. Already a soft layer of pudge covered every inch of his body, making his face appear softer and pudgy, as well as having a small potbelly sprouting where his abs had once been.

Still, the guy didn’t seem to mind, engrossed as he was to enjoy this treatment.

Yet, after a full day of eating, having finished his midnight snack a few minutes before, he found himself pleasantly full, but not yet stuffed. A status which he had gotten used to feel in, one that he was doing all he could to feel again. For this reason, although full after the last official snack time, he didn’t say a word as Nastassja brought to him half of a sheet cake. He had eyes only for the massive cake and, especially for the forkful of it that the nurse was bringing to his lips.

As he was fed forkful after forkful, as the feeling of being stuffed to the gills came closer and closer to be reached, Paulo suddenly heard an ominous sound that was starting to make its appearance around him, more and more often. As he kept chewing and swallowing, the creaking sound began to resonate more and more loudly until, as he swallowed one of the last few pieces of the cake, the creaking turned into a ripping sound, as his clothes were torn to pieces by his enlarging middle.

Choking a bit in surprise, as he saw with his own eyes his shirt rip in shreds around his middle, he stopped eating and tried to rise a bit more from the distended position he had on the bed. The nurse too had been affected by the scene, distracted from her duties she could only watch in amazement as both shirt and pants had ripped open, unable anymore to contain the growing girth of the fattening soccer player.

Paulo, in the past weeks, had constantly lied to himself about his gain. He had consciously decided to forget and ignore those feelings that were warning him of growing fatter and pudgier, but now, having it seen with his own eyes he couldn’t lie to himself anymore.

“What…? What happened? Have I…grown so big…that I’ve ripped…my clothes?”

The nurse, seeing that the situation was turning for the worst, tried her best to assuage her charge, to distract him but, met only partial success.

“Oh, Sir…Maybe a pound or two. Nothing to worry too much about. Just last week I’ve told you that we’ve been having issues with the washing machines. Your clothes probably shrunk and have been weakened with further washings.”

“Maybe…but still…I can’t let go…myself like…this. Gotta get…in shape…be healthy…”

Seeing that the shock was way too recent, the nurse didn’t oppose him, instead, offering aid…from the following morning.

“I can understand how you feel, Sir. I know that it is against the rule but, from tomorrow, I’ll help you doing some exercises if so you wish…”

“Thanks...Nas…you’re an…angel…”

As Paulo, proved by the sudden shock and the humongous meal he had consumed, began to fall asleep, the nurse cleaned him of any food stain and let him rest, preparing herself mentally for the following day, to sabotage his plans as much as she could.

As morning came, Paulo woke up at around 10 AM feeling refreshed and, already, a bit hungry. The situation he had seen the night before was still within his thoughts but, as he had gone for almost nine hours without any food, it seemed to him almost secondary against the need for a breakfast. He slowly moved within the bed, seating with his back against the wall when the door to his apartment bedroom opened and in came Nas, bringing him his breakfast. Since a couple of weeks had passed already, and with the acknowledgment of Podrick, Nastassja had started the next phase for fattening up the player, as she was bringing him now some news about this diet, along with his breakfast.

“Good Morning, Sir. Did you sleep well?”

“Hey, Nas…Yeah…like a log.”

“That’s good to know. Now, I’ve got your breakfast here but, before we get into that I’ve got some news for you.”

“Hm-mh…Tell me.”

“Mr. Podrick has received words from the medical division, I’ve talked to him about your will to do some light exercise and they have agreed but, including some slight changes in the diet plan you’ll have to follow. Basically, you’re allotted some time during the day for some light exercise but, due to this, your main mealtimes have been increased from four to six per day and your snacking time has also been extended abit.

The doctors understand your will to exercise but, they feel necessary to have you consume enough nutrients during the day.

That being said, enjoy your breakfast.”

As she said her piece, she began handing him his trays of breakfast food, passing to him a tray full of pancakes smothered in butter, chocolaty cupcakes and buttery cookies sprinkled with sugar, then a second tray with one massive platter filled with four fried eggs, a rather large mound of bacon strips and four hot dogs, along with two, tall, shakes and the three pill sized vitamins he had t take before all of his meals.

As Paulo began to dig in, feeling his belly demanding for sustenance, he already began to plan for his exercises. With every morsel passing through his lips and falling down his throat, as his soft belly started to fill up, he laid down his exercise schedule into his mind.

But, between thinking of doing something, and start doing it, there was a massive difference.
As Dybala cleaned all the food that Nas had brought to him, he caressed his bloated and stuffed middle for a while, telling himself that in a few minutes he was going to go for a light jog.

But, as time passed, so did his desire of partaking in any exercise.

‘I should go and run for a bit…but I’ve just ate. I can’t run like this…I should at least wait for my meal to digest a little…But what if I fell asleep?’

Reluctantly, Paulo began to move toward the side of the bed, putting down both of his legs from it and, slowly, standing up from it. As he did so, he already felt strangely short of breath and yet, he knew he had to do a bit of exercise, even if only for a few minutes. Seeing the soccer player rising from his comfortable position, the nurse grabbed a plate from under the trolley, bringing it closer to the guy

“Sir, if I may be so bold, we could try with a simple reward-based exercise. Every few repetitions, I shall give you a reward for your performance. In this way, you shall be able to both exercise and refill the energies you will spend working out.”

Paulo smiled at the idea and quickly nodded, as his belly grumbled noisily in background, clearly approving the idea. As he stood, his nurse directed him toward the couch, pointing to him to seat there. Clearly confused he did as he was told and tried to pose a question about the routine she wanted him to do but, before he could, she showed him how to do a few reps of some simple exercise.

“Now, Sir, extend your arms parallel to the floor…yes, just like that, and bring them up and down. You could start with a three by three series.”

The player, confused a bit by the simplistic exercise, raised both of his arms and then brought them down, feeling curiously embarrassed for doing something so simple. As he was starting to raise them up again, he saw Nastassja place in front of him a large quart of chocolate cake from under the trolley she had stationed nearby.

“Good Job Sir…here’s the reward.”

Paulo, although dubious about the true effectiveness of such an exercise, could not deny that between his moving around and his routine of snacking every moment, he was feeling pretty hungry already. So, without waiting anymore, he began digging into the cake reward he had been given. As he munched on it he thought that, maybe there was something good from exercises if this was the rewards.

Almost two hours passed this way, with Paulo doing something as easy as lifting or curling his empty arm and being rewarded with a massive treat. In these hours, only about twenty minutes were spent exercising, the rest of the time he spent it on eating.

Still, after two weeks of lazily glutting himself, even such an easy activity was extremely tiring for his fatter body. So much so, that as Nastassja told him to stop, he was covered in sweat.

“Wow…how long…did I…workout?”

“I’m impressed, Sir. Two whole hours.

For someone under such a strict rest-oriented regime, you’ve done greatly on your first session.

Here, Sir, let me help you get back to bed. You must feel absolutely tired after all this work…”

With the nurse assistance, Paulo managed to return to his bed, tired but satisfied. As he laid down in the bed, catching his breath, he gladly accepted a few more donuts to snack on as lunch was going to roll around in less than an hour.

All he had to do now was to follow the diet regime he was on and continue doing these exercise routines with Nas. As he munched on the donuts, he couldn’t be more satisfied of how it had gone.

‘A few weeks of this and I’ll get for sure back into in shape! Sure, working out is tiring but, nothing I can’t recover with a few good meals…Mh…I’m feeling quite hungrier than usual.
The workout must be already working then!’
12411111122224414113213442111.title: Ripping out of his clothes

choices: Paulo needs to see Podrick, something seems very wrong to him
As Paulo’s weight skyrockets, he needs more assistance
With Sergio fully under her thumb, Susan starting to get lazy
Switch to Georgina’s as she enjoys feeding Cristiano
124111111222244141132134421111.content:
James Podrick was reviewing the security tapes from Dybala’s room.

The guy, for who knows what reason, had requested to do some exercises a few weeks before. At first James was going to reject the idea, he needed his guest’s fat, not fit. But, as he mulled it over, he realized that thanks to that request he had an opportunity to having the guy grow even bigger. So, he had consented it.

Instructing Nastassja on which kind of exercises she was going to let the guy perform had been quick, and even quicker had been applying the modification to the player diet. Sure, everyday Paulo Dybala ‘worked out’, sitting on a comfortable couch, raising and lowering his arms for twenty minutes tops. But for more than one hour and half, the nurse forced on him treats and sweets with the highest content in calories.

Not only that, Paulo was moved from four to six meals a day, including a mid afternoon meal and a midnight feast to his previous schedule, while also increasing the quantities of snacks he had around all day long. This exercise routines had surely boosted the guy ego, but he hadn’t stopped growing, far from it. If anything, he was gaining even faster than before. Due to Paulo’s exercising he was getting hungrier faster and, with the addition of the metabolism reducers and the appetite enhancers, he could barely stay a few moments without eating something big and filling.

As James watched the screen, he could see the guy struggling out of bed.
It was morning, the usual time when Paulo did his routine. That morning though things seemed to be harder than before on the guy. James drank in the figure of the once soccer player. One month of constant indulgence and chemically induced hunger had managed to turn the fit player into a fat version of himself. Getting toward the 250 lbs, Paulo’s arms had remained mostly the same, as were his legs, although a small layer of pudge was visible. His face had softened up even more, with a second chin making its appearance every time he craned his head. But his torso had taken the brunt of the weight. Once lean and fit, he now sported a pair of moobs which jiggled whenever he moved and a small-ish gut had already started to protrude forward, cutting out of his vision even the point of his feet.

Still, although he had finished his breakfast not so long ago, he was still feeling quite hungry but, he knew that now was time for his morning working out. Slowly, as he felt his legs weighing him down as if they were made of lead, he began to rise from the bed. He didn’t seem worried about feeling himself so heavy on these days, for him it only meant that his muscles were sore from the workout and so he only had to keep exercising. As he managed to place himself on the verge of the bed, Nastassja came forward to help him stand. She had scolded him a few time in the previous weeks for working out too much, forcing her to help him stand but, he took this as a small price to pay to return to his usual shape.

After a few steps, she helped him sit on a couch nearby, at first he had thought that the couch had been farther away but, since he always felt tired he told himself that had to be another result of his working out.

In truth, Nastassja had moved the couch closer and closer to the bed, knowing full well that at the rate he was growing, soon he wasn’t going to be able to reach the other room on his own.

“Here, Sir. Now, for today’s workout we will work on your hands tendons. For this reason I want you to open your hands at the maximum, wait a few seconds and then close them to a fist as fast as you can.”

Paulo had never heard of these kind of workouts but, had to admit that they really were working wonders for his body, not only he always ended up tired and sweaty, meaning he was doing the right thing to get back into shape, but he also was feeling more and more hungry as he kept exercising, which meant in his mind, that he was consuming a lot of energies. Huffing and puffing, still a bit short of breath from having moved from the bed, he quickly opened and closed his hands, just as hs nurse had shown to him. As soon as he had done it, she gave him a tray with four double bacon cheeseburgers as a reward.

“Here you go, Sir. A good reward for a job well done!”

Dybala, without any ado, began tearing the burgers apart, feeling his rumbly belly getting hungrier by the minute. As he munched on the burgers he seemed to notice the strangeness of such a reward for a so simple exercise but, as used as he had become to have bigger and bigger rewards, he didn’t lost too much time thinking about it choosing to dedicate himself to the food on his plate, instead of worrying about probable nonsense.

As time passed, so his exercises began to be easier to perform, while the rewards from each repetition grew only bigger in size, due to this Paulo kept growing larger and heavier. But, more importantly, he was reaching that kind of size for which were needed custom clothes for him. Nastassja, to avoid another surge of suspect toward his clothes, had started already to measure him at night, ordering his clothes online but still, week by week, each new dress was getting tighter faster. She knew It wasn’t only due to his ‘working out’ that he was expanding so rapidly.

Apart from the influx of the Rewards, Paulo ate constantly and in massive quantities, indulging especially during the humongous meals he was receiving six times a day. In truth, since he ate with reckless abandon, more than once she had seen him gorge on meals lasting from dawn to the middle of the afternoon.

Paulo, although busy most of his time thinking about food, had noticed that something seemed wrong. He was now with two months of work out sessions with Nastassja under his belt and yet, as he looked around everything around him seemed to be smaller than him. The same bed that had seemed so huge when he had arrived, now it looked to him as big as normal bed for two people. Also the remote for his TV seemed to have srunk. All these examples told him that something was wrong but, since stuffing himself full had become his favorite activity, he didn’t want to lose too much time dwindling on something so strange.

Nastassja had noticed that Paulo was getting confused and, to help him remaining focused on what she deemed important, raised a request to James, request that was happily accepted and readily implemented.

The following day, just as Paulo had finished his two-hour long workout session, Nas brought to him an anticipated lunchtime meal, eager to see his reaction to what she and Podrick had prepared only for him. The guy, seeing the most filling meal of his day, as far as he thought it, being anticipated of almost an hour tried to question but, seeing that there were much more trolley’s being moved toward him than what he was used to see, he began drooling unconsciously.

“Is…already…lunch time…Nas?”

“Yes, Sir. I hope you’ll find it of your pleasure.”

“It couldn’t…be any…different…you guys…have the…best cooks…around…”

“Thank you, Sir, for your kind words…Here’s the first course…”

As she said that she brought onto his gut a massive bowl filled almost to the top with pasta covered in a thick cheesy sauce. From Paulo point of view the massive bowl looked like the usual plate of food he had always received. In truth, the bowl was so massive that had in it enough food for at least three people. Dybala, using a ladle, which he mistakenly confused with a large spoon, began taking massive mouthfuls of pasta, enjoying immensely the delicious taste of the plate, although many large dollops of sauce fell from the ladle every time he brought it to his lips.

“Here, Sir, the next course…”

Taking the now empty bowl, she left in front of him a platter with a veritable pyramid of burgers and hot dogs, each of these were hand made to be three times bigger than their normal size. It had costed them a veritable fortune but, seeing as Dybala began scarfing them down, not anymore worried by their little size was profit enough for both feeders.

Paulo, from his side was enjoying this meal more than usual. Finally, something that seemed to have remained of the same size he was used to, grabbing one of the burgers with both hands and biting into it, he munched it in silence, happily aware of not having wasted energies on asking about the shinking things.

Judging by the meal he was having, it had all been in his head.

As five long hours passed, Dybala had finally reached the end of his ‘Lunch’, having scarfed down enough food to feed an army, his body had bloated up so much that he himself was having trouble seeing what was in front of him. Still, although feeling much fuller than he had ever felt before, when he saw Nas coming to his side, offering him what he thought was a short cake, he couldn’t stop his gluttony from rise to new levels.

Nastassja, trembling with excitement, seeing as the guy had eaten himself almost completely round, could not resist from tempting him with one last treat. Lifting the massive cake with both hands, she moved closer to him and began feeding it to him, feeling more and more enthusiastic as the cake was swiftly demolished.

“*BURP!* Uff…that...was…a…good…meal.
Feel…strangely…full…though. Work…out…must…be…curbing…my…appetite…*Urp*…I’m…gonna…napâ€ ¦a bit…wake me…in one…hour.”

“Um? Sorry, Sir? Why would you interrupt your nap time?”

“If…gonna…get…muscles…need…to…eat…more…to get…more…mass…”

Nastassja, speechless as she heard that, could only nod as Paulo quickly fell asleep into a coma like sleep, as his body worked overtime to digest and process the ungodly number of calories that had been forced in it.
124111111222244141132134421111.title: A little Fit…a lot more Fat

choices: It’s the illness. We must reinforce the diet and implement new therapies for you
It’s a pretty common case of fear induced by stress. There isn’t nothing wrong.
The medical division is investigating. A doctor may come in few days
It’s time for the truth. You’re not ill. You’re being prepared to be a feast!
1241111112222441411321344211111.content:
James had seen something amazing in the last few months.

Paulo Dybala, the latest guest into his con, had gone from being fit and trim to massive in a truly short time. As they had shown him the path of the sloth and of the glutton, the guy had adapted to it so fast that it had almost seem a miracle.

Not even Sergio Aguero had been turned so fast into gaining weight.

Cristiano? He at least had tried to fight back at the beginning.

Paulo didn’t.

Dybala, probably unsure of himself, probably smitten by Nastassja, had fallen into their trap without raising any fuss, excepted for the working out session he requested. But, even as fake as those were, he never raised any complaint…up until that moment.

That same morning, as Nastassja had brought him his breakfast, he told her that had the need to see him. What made the thing worrying was that he didn’t started to eat until the nurse didn’t confirm his request.

This worried James. Paulo was growing so rapidly and to such a size that in a few more months, he could finally enjoy his first soccer player meal. But what if Paulo had realized what they were doing to him? True, he hadn’t many ways of escaping or means to tell anyone, but if the guy managed to get one word out, it would be all over.

As James hurried along the corridors, he managed to calm himself down just in time to enter Paulo’s room. As he knocked and entered, he saw that the guy was lying on his bed boringly watching the television as he ate mindlessly from several snack filled bowls surrounding him. As James approached him, he saw that Paulo had grown larger still since the last time he had checked his weight. Last time he had been around the 250’s, but, standing now beside him, watching his humongous gut rising and falling as he breathed with difficulty, staring entranced to his moobs as they had grown into jiggly, hills full of fat.

At his fingers that were growing to look like stuffed sausages, or his legs, having grown to tree trunk size.

All in all, Paulo Dybala had to be around the 400 lbs now, and wanted something from him.

“Hey…*munch*…Coach…*gulp*…wanted to…speak with…you about…a few…things…”

“Tell me, Paulo. If there is something I can help you with…”

“It’s about…my…hunger. I’m…always hungry…nowadays…and yet…meals… are getting… smaller and… shorter… is there…a change…in the…diet? Also…although….I do…the work out…sessions…I don’t…seem…to see…much…improvements. Can I…ask for…some more…intensive…training?”


“Ah, I see.
Yes, Paulo, we received a request from the Medical division to reduce for some time your meals. It was a test of theirs to see how the Illness is advancing…if at all. Starting from this afternoon, your meals will return to the normal schedule, I think.

And you should be happy to know that, thanks to the diet and regime you’re following, the Illness seems to be slowing down on its advance against your system.

Alas, for your workout session, I don’t think I can do much.
Already it was a hard battle with them doctors to allow you to do them. Fighting even more about them, could easily have them removed as a result.

What we can try is to extend their duration, if you feel ready for it. Instead of two hours we could try with three…”

As James said that, Paulo stopped eating and slowly turned his head toward the coach, staring at him with a slow smile.

“I’m…happy…about the…illness…and…I think…I can…do longer…workouts.”

“Good, Happy to have helped, although I couldn’t do very much…”

“One more…thing…would be…possible…to have…more…energy…shakes? I’m…often…feeling…very…tired.”

James moved closer to the massive ex player, patting him on the shoulder, enjoying how squishy the contact felt against his body.

“Not a problem at all. You just need to ask or let me know if you need anything. I’ll make sure that, starting tomorrow, Nastassja brings you…let’s say, six shakes every five hours?”

Paulo’s smile grew a bit larger, his belly already rumbling in pleasure, although he never stopped bringing more and more delicacies to his mouth.

“Thanks…*munch*….Coach….*gulp*…for…everything…”

As James left the apartment he couldn’t refrain from almost collapsing against a wall in the corridors. As big as he was getting, as much as he was eating, Paulo still thought of his portions to be small and his mealtimes shorts?

James couldn’t believe it.

‘Maybe, it’s better if we stop giving him the appetite enhancers for a while and see how well he performs without them within his body.’

As he mentally noted that, he also added to double the order for the weight gain shakes to be brought to him everyday, under the disguise of energy shakes.

‘My god…How big will he end up? Will he get as big as Cristiano…or even bigger? No, focus James. Three more months and then he will be my meal. I deserve it.’

Rushing back to his room, James quickly verified how heavy Paulo had gotten. Quickly checking with the digital wifi scale mounted within his bed, he stared speechless to the numbers on screen.

‘462 lbs! This is his current weight !?
True, gotta take out ten or so pounds off this number due to the still undigested food into his belly but, my god…he’s getting huge! And he wants even more to eat…I can’t wait for these three months to pass…

First things first, I need to rearrange his schedule as he asked…’


As the days passed, with his meals getting bigger and longer, with all the weight gain shake he was drinking on a daily basis, Paulo Dybala’s working out session reached a point of no return. As he prepared himself to move from the bed toward the couch, he wasn’t really sure he wanted to keep working out.

He had to admit that for a while it had seemed to be working but, lately, he wasn't seeing any improvement coming from it. He had tried for a bit to increase the time, as Podrick suggested, but it didn’t seem to work. What Paulo wasn’t able to see was that although he nominally exercised for three hours, he spent only ten minutes doing something that could barely be considered as exercise. The rest of the time it was only him being fed by Nastassja.

So, on that morning, as Nas moved closer to the bed to help the humongous obese guy to leave his bed, he decided to stop entirely with it.

‘I must’ve reached my plateau weight. Can’t seem to lose more than this. Oh, well…it has been fun until it lasted.’

“Sir, ready for your workout?”

“Mph…not…today…Nas…not…feeling…about…it. Would you…please…bring me… some snacks…though? Am getting…quite…hungry…”

‘It’s true…apart from eating, I don’t seem to be capable of doing much else. I wonder why’s that? Workout did work at first, so I’ve got to have lost some weight…and yet…Can’t manage to lose more weight than this.’

As a couple of weeks passed, Paulo began to notice that something was strange indeed. He had thought that the workout had been working since he felt tired all the time. And yet, now that he wasn’t doing it anymore, not only he felt tired the same but, also, he was starting to find harder to move his arms or his legs.

Feeling curious about this phenomenon he began to watch carefully what happened all around of him. As he drank the energy shakes, he noticed that he needed much more of them than before to feel the rush of energy through his body. As he gorged at his meals he soon realized that he was spending, on average, since some time he got distracted, more than four hours to clean each one. And he also saw that, not only his bed was still shrinking down, but also Nas appeared much smaller than he remembered.

He noticed it a few times as she brought to him one of his plates, which he thought to be right sized for him but, in Nastassja hands it seemed to be huge. But what set him off the most was himself. He could have sworn that, when he had just arrived, he was able to watch the TV by laying down, whereas now he was forced to lay with his back against to wall, otherwise he couldn’t see the screen.

As he kept following the regime, he tried to mull it over, to find something that would make it believable for him to ask around. He didn’t want to appear crazy to both Podrick or Nastassja.

Yet, as things and persons around him kept shrinking down compared to him, he began to think that maybe, since it was a strange new illness, it could be a symptom of something far more serious. Suddenly afraid for having been so foolish about not informing anyone about this, considered his conditions, he called his nurse to him and asked her.

“Nas? There is…something I… need to… tell you.
I didn’t…want to… sound… crazy, so…. I stayed… silent… but… considering…my situation… I wouldn’t…want to… make matters… worse.

Lately… I’ve… noticed that… apart from… the food… everything…. around me… you included… seems to be… shrinking down.

Am I…hallucinating…or what?”

Nastassja, not knowing how to respond called Podrick, which, understanding the situation hurried to Paulo’s room, ready to defuse the situation.

“Paulo…you should have said it sooner…you’ve got to trust us. We only want to get you back on your feet and into the field.

Still, I’ve got to tell you that…”
1241111112222441411321344211111.title: Urgent meeting with the coach

choices: The hallucinations are coming from his hunger. He needs to be constantly full.
the issue comes from not having eaten enough sugar. The diet is revised
Dybala is too skinny! Need to be healthier to prevent hallucinations to come.
As Paulo grows, Sergio seems to be reaching his plateau…
12411111122224414113213442111113.content:
Paulo Dybala was still laying on his bed, nervous to his core he kept shoveling handfuls of chocolates candies in his mouth, trying to keep his cool as James Podrick stood beside him with a scowl on his face.

"Still, I've got to tell you that the medical division is investigating the matter. A doctor will be coming in the next few days to give you a more thorough check.

As of now, they're not sure why you’re having these hallucinations. In any case, what they suggested to do is to continue with the regimen you’ve been treated so far, although including a few more vitamins and some more calories into your diet.

And, please Paulo, let us know beforehand next time. We were lucky that the Medical division were already aware of this possibility, otherwise it could have gone terribly wrong…”

Podrick, giving a few pats to Paulo, left the room leaving the obese guy only with the nurse.

“I’m…sorry…Nas…”

The girl smiled at the guy, giving him a quick peck on the cheek.

“Don’t worry, Sir, we understand how you’re feeling.

Anyway, let’s not make a bigger issue of this, alright? Now, how about a snack to ease your mind?”

As she said that, she left the room, quickly returning with a few trolley’s trailing behind her. As she neared the massive guy she began surrounding him with platters filled with food. Paulo began drooling as he saw quite large trays filled to the brim with massive sized burgers, hot dogs and even, he could barely believe it, am entire fried chicken.

Try as he might, although he had managed to sit with his back on the wall, he could not reach any of the platters that were surrounding him. Luckily for him, Nastassja was still beside him and she began to bring tray after tray nearer to him. With a guttural moan, Paulo began to grab burger after burger, keeping them tightly within his hands, as he munched through them as fast as he could.

Eating like a savage, letting his hunger taking the wheel, bits of food began to fall on both himself and his bed. The guy didn’t seem to mind as he swallowed each bite, only to give an even bigger one on the next treat.

The nurse stood there, watching raptured Paulo as he gorged through the massive meal sized snack she had brought him, wondering how could he not be aware of how much he was eating. For hours, Dybala kept eating, gobbling up whatever was around him, even mixing fast foods and dessert altogether, until he seemed to reach his stopping point.

The nurse noticed that out of the trays she had brought him only one had been barely touched. Lifting it from the bed, she moved it closer to the engorged guy.

“Sir, care for a few more pancakes?”

“*Ouarp!*I…I…really…don’t know…if I…can…feel…so full…”

Nastassja, though, knew that by giving him enough time she could convince. For this reason, she moved the tray even closer, letting the aroma from the platter to reach Paulo’s nostrils. The guy, although he was feeling full, as he sniffed the tantalizing smell, couldn’t refrain from feeling his hunger awakening deep within himself, forcing him to stuff himself even more.

“I…I really…oh…a few… more…wouldn’t…hurt…right?”

“I believe you are correct, Sir.”

As she hand-fed him pancake after pancake she could see he wasn’t joking when he had said that he was full, his gut, fully bloated and round as a balloon, pushed more and more out as she placed the last few pancakes within his lips, until the tray was empty and Paulo was way more than stuffed.

“Good Job, Sir. Now have a rest, I’ll return later with your dinner.”

The next couple of days passed without any further trouble. Under Nastassja supervision Paulo Dybala was left stuffed to the gills at his every main meal, while the gluttonous guy kept eating throughout the days snacking by himself.

It was five days later that James entered Paulo’s room, before his mid-afternoon meal, informing him that the doctor from the medical division had arrived. As Paulo collected himself, as much as he could, Podrick opened the door to the supposed ‘Doctor’. This one was none other than another feeder hired on the spot by James to fill the role of medic, as well as try and speed up the gain of the already obese Paulo as much as possible.

Paulo, sweating a bit from the nervousness, was soon left alone with this guy entirely covered in a hazmat suit. The guy moved a few steps forward, before presenting himself.

“Hello Mr. Dybala. I’m Doctor Joshua Fleming, I’ve been informed that lately you’ve been suffering from hallucinations, seeing things smaller than they actually were. Is that correct?”

“Yes…it is…correct….Doc.”

As the Doctor got closer and closer, he kept talking to the guy, chatting with him trying to keep him at ease, until he managed to calm him down from the visible nervousness that was shaking him.

“Now, Paulo, I need to do a few exams and to ask you a few questions. Can I? If you’re not feeling at ease we can recall this meeting and the division will send someone else. I want you to be comfortable.”

“No…we…can…proceed.”

“Good. Tell me, then, how many meals you have each day?”

Paulo, trying as hard as he could not to stuff his mouth with the food surrounding him managed to answer as best as he could.

“I’m… at six… main… meals… per… day.
And I… snack on… something… every so… often… through… the day…”

“Mh. Next question, at what time of day you get most often sweets and sugary treats?”

As the doctor kept asking him question, he prodded and touched the massive body of the ex-soccer player, staring in amazement at how deep his hands sagged within the belly fat of the guy.

This procedure kept going for almost an hour, until the doctor moved aside, calling toward the door for Podrick to enter the room. As James sat beside the massive Paulo, the doctor gave his results.

“First, these are only initial tests, we shall analyze blood and cellule samples to have a most precise answer. As I’ve seen, though, there are no physical trauma’s that could have caused the hallucinations. For the moment I would suggest to ignore them and carrying forward.

Still, I must admit that I’m surprised to hear that Mr. Dybala here has been following a diet of only six meals per day. As per his physical condition I would suggest to increase it up to eight, if not ten, meals per day.

This not only would reducing the snacking but would also grant Mr. Dybala the healthy nutritional amount he needs to let his organism fight the illness.

Also, but take this only as a suggestion, I would say that he needs more sugar and iron in his diet.

So I would suggest an increase in sweets and meat based meals.”

The doctor made to leave the room, but before doing that he turned once more toward Paulo.

“I wish you all the best Mr. Dybala. And remember to follow the diet, you are in a critical spot, the minimum loss of calories could have terrible repercussions.”

As they remained alone, James turned toward the fattened guy laying on the bed.

“Paulo, everything alright?”

“Yes. He’s… been… kind. So… what’s… in the… future… for me?”

James stood from his chair, trying to look pensive as he knew already how to answer to the massively obese soccer player.

“As the doctor said, I think it best to follow his advices. So, we will bring you up to nine meals per day, doubling the main meals of the day and turning snacking time from morning to night into focalized meals.

Apart from that, I’ll make sure that sugar, proteins and carbs will not be missing anymore from your regimen. Then, we’ll just wait for the medical division to analyze the samples and give us a more precise way to fight this symptom.”

As the new diet was implemented Paulo noticed right away that something was going to be different than before. If before he had to snack constantly just to feel himself full for most of the day, with the new mealtimes added into the plan he barely had to since he was just able to stuff himself up to his limits and beyond, almost every three hours.

Still, thanks to Nastassja support and assistance, Paulo began to grow even faster than before, much to the pleasure of Podrick which wanted to see how big and fat Paulo could get before being turned into the meal he was destined to be. In barely that week, due to the massive avalanche of high calories foods that were thrown at him, Paulo managed to reach the big 500 and go over it just as quick, stopping his gain at 535 lbs.

The humongous guy was now finding himself almost immobile on his bed, requiring the assistance of Nastassja more and often and yet, as the nurse kept reminding him, it was the illness that was sucking out all of his energies.

Dybala, forced on his back to eat massive quantities of food every few hours, could only agree to the nurse, as he kept eating and fattening up. His face had softened up even more, his cheeks puffing out and his third chin completely covering his neck. His arms and legs, too, had started to catch up to the rest of him, growing bigger and jigglier. His moobs, too, had taken quite the brunt of the weight, growing out to be as big as most women’s chests.

But the most impressive had to be his huge gut, constantly engorged, had grown so big and vast that was starting to shift toward his legs, covering his crotch while growing so much in height that he could not see over it when laying down.

As he kept gorging endlessly throughout the week, Nastassja came to him one day to give him some news about the hallucinations he had in the past…
12411111122224414113213442111113.title: The medical division is investigating. A doctor...

choices: emptied the tank that was supposed to keep him full for the day.
started to realize what they were doing to him
124111111222244141132134421111133.content:
Paulo Dybala didn’t do much after the encounter with the doctor from the medical division, he passed his days laying on his bed, following the diet and, when he managed, looking at the tv screen. His mind focused on only two things, food and television, had already been dulled since his initial arrival but, with the new diet for him to be followed, it slowed down even more; up to the point that he was barely capable of following discussions more complicated than a grocery list.

This, naturally, worked as an advantage for both Podrick and Nurse Nastassja, although the latter one felt a bit of pity for what had befallen on the once soccer player. Still, the two of them made great care of using this new weakness against the already supersized man. With him following the new scheduled diet, there was barely time for Paulo to snack anymore. Those few moments under which he wasn’t involved into a meal, he was too stuffed to eat anymore. Even those little tricks that Nastassja had often used on him weren’t working anymore.

Yet, for Podrick, the guy wasn’t big enough yet.

Once the Nurse had been informed that Paulo had reached the 600 lbs, she had thought that Podrick would grant some slack to the overfed Paulo, but it didn’t happen. When the nurse went to discuss the question with James, she remained shocked in hearing the coach telling her that Paulo wasn’t big enough yet.

“We will force on him a diet based on appetite stimulants and liquid calories, in the form of a weight gain shake. We will feed him continuously, on a daily basis. I’ll provide him with the medical justification and will find something to distract him through the feeding. The most important thing is that Paulo keeps on growing. I would like for him to reach Cristiano, if it is feasible, in the shortest time possible.”


A week later, Nastassja was currently bringing the first breakfast to Dybala. But this time, she was going to bringing him not only food. As Nastassja entered the room, she saw his opulent form sprawled on the massive bed, she noticed right away that he was starting to grow so big and large, that his own body fat was soon going to go over the edge of the bed he was resting upon. Seeing him asleep she decided to check him out first. Paulo, after having followed the new nine meals a day plan for a week, had grown quite a bit.

At 600 pounds of weight, he was currently losing his humanoid shape, getting closer and closer to resembling a massive sphere with vestigial legs and arms. His face, completely covered in squishy fat, forced him to lay down, unable anymore to even bend his neck, since he barely had one anymore. With four definite chins jutting out under his visage, he wouldn’t have been able to move his head if he tried. His arms, they were so covered in fat, that he was barely able to lift them anymore. Forcing him to keep them constantly close to his face, so that he could bring food to his mouth. His legs too, had inflated with fat, literally rendering him immobile, without considering the enormous apron like gut that covered them up to the knees.

In all of this, Dybala seemed oblivious to his current conditions. Constantly stuffed throughout the day, forced to lay back on the bed, barely able to see the television over his engorged mountainous belly, passing his days loudly chewing through the plethora of meals provided to him by Nastassja.

As she finished checking him up, she began crawling on the bed on all fours, trying her best not to hurt the fattened player still asleep. As she neared his face she quickly woke him up with a quick loving peck on the cheek, letting him open his bleary eyes, squinting a bit as his massive cheeks pushed against him, without letting him open his eyes at the fullest.

“Mm..?... Nas? Is… that... you?”

“Yes, Sir. I’ve brought you your first breakfast. Although there is something that we need to talk about.”

“What…about…?”

“Yesterday has arrived the results from your medical. The coach told me to inform you that your diet need to be changed some more.”

“Al…right…what…need…me…to…do?”

“Sir, as per the medical results, you’re simply skinny. Podrick is working on a schedule that will let you reach a healthier weight in the shortest time available… Otherwise your illness may pass into the next, and more serious, stage.”

Dybala took the news well enough. Of course, since he wasn’t able to recall a time when he was smaller than how he currently appeared, he took for granted that his size wasn’t really big as he thought it should be.
