Yet, as food was being discussed, his dulled-out mind sparkled for a moment, letting him focus a bit more than usual.

“H-How? More… food …is… welcome…but… don’t… know… if… can… have… even… more…”

“Sir, you underestimate yourself. You’re just skin and bones. For sure, you can manage to be healthier than this…Look at you, you barely have the energy to move. You’ve got to eat more, Sir.”

As Nastassja said that, she grabbed one of his thick belly rolls and shook it a bit, as if that was demonstration enough that he wasn’t yet healthy as he can be.

Paulo, unable to see what was happening over the massive dome of his engorged gut, could only moan a bit as he felt the touch of the nurse on his body, as his gluttony began to steer his will toward having more and more.

‘Maybe she’s right. Maybe I’m too skinny. She’s right on something…I can’t move. I’m so weak that I can’t move…but was I able to move before? And if so, why can’t I move anymore? Is it due to this illness they talk about?’

The nurse stood by his side as she fed him tray upon tray of massive sized breakfast foods, ranging from pancakes drowned in syrup and butter, to chocolate covered waffles, donuts and, even, a few short cakes. As Paulo glutted himself, he grabbed whatever he could from the tray’s pushing it within his maw, although, after half an hour he found himself utterly tired and unable to move his heavy arms anymore. Nastassja was right beside just for that.

As soon as she saw that he couldn’t move anymore, she began to take massive forkful of his breakfast, feeding them to him, forcing Paulo to constantly chew and swallow until everything had been cleared from the numerous tray’s. As he laid there, his belly once more engorged and tauter with food, she began caressing it, kneading it a bit, helping his digestion process, as he burped away some small pockets of gas from his intestines. As he began to feel drowsy, she left his side, informing him that for second Breakfast, it was going to be Podrick to help him out.

A few hours later, just as the sun began to rise at the horizon, James entered Paulo Dybala’s room. As he entered, he saw immediately, through the open doorway, the massive figure of the fattened player laying down on his bed. Moving closer he could see that his belly, although had deflated a bit since the digestion process had already started, remained proudly engorged. Still, as much as James would have loved nothing less than jump himself atop that veritable mountain of lard, he was there for a job. Moving closer to the bed, he began fastening a series of tubes all around the obese player, leaving one end atop his face, while the other end at floor level beside his bed. As soon as he finished, James began to gently prod the player, until he managed to wake him up.

“Good Morning Paulo.”

“Uhm? *Oarp!*…uh…oh…Sorry… Coach. Morning… to… you… too.”

“Hope you’ve slept well after your first Breakfast. Now, as Nastassja probably already told you, the results of your medical arrived and we’ve had to reconsider your diet plan.”

“yeah…she…told…me.”

“Good. Let me explain to you how it’s going to work.

Starting from this meal, you’ll be having your meals directly in a liquid form, expressly from this feeding tube over here… All you will need to do is to place the nozzle into your mouth and swallow whatever comes out of it. For your comfort, there are these two little tubes that you’ll have to place into your nostrils, so that you’ll be able to freely breath.”

Paulo, already feeling his hungry belly rumbling since it hadn’t been fed in few hours, decided he didn’t have time to ask any questions and grabbed the nozzle mask, placing it atop of his mouth, making sure to push the nozzle deep within his maw.

As he did so, James, ecstatically, placed the small tubes into his nose, letting him get used to having them to breathe, before connecting the feeding system to the pump that was going to shoot countless liter of weight gain shake down Paulo’s throat.

The player, unable to speak by having the nozzle in his mouth, simply nodded slowly as he began to feel the feeding tube tighten within his maw, until a veritable flood of delicious shake began pouring out if it. As soon as the shake was in his mouth, Paulo began swallowing it as fast as he could, getting soon used to its flow and even managing to suppress his gag reflex.

From then on, the flow kept coming until Dybala was completely stuffed, until not even one inch of space was available within his digestive tract.

What the guy wasn’t aware of was that the machine was programmed to fill him up as soon as some space was freed within his body, rendering him stuffed to the gills all day along, either by day or night.

James couldn’t be happier, as he watched Paulo Dybala breaking out of his plateau and starting actively gaining once more. Leaving the nurse to always station nearby Paulo, to read to him or to simply talk to him, he made sure that Paulo would never grow bored, as he kept fattening up at a ludicrous speed.

It was just a couple of days later, one month short from his scheduled end and Paulo had…
124111111222244141132134421111133.title: Paulo’s ‘Skinny’ Obesity

choices: Resist! Better starve than give in…
Have more! GIVE ME MY FOOD!
Nastassja decide to intervene…forcing a cookie into Paulo!
Nastassja decide to intervene…defending Paulo from James!
1241111112222441411321344211111334.content:
Although Paulo Dybala was kept constantly interested via interactions with Nastassja, there were moments in his day when he found himself alone. In those instances, as he was now unable to speak due to the feeding tube in his mouth, he could do nothing else but think. And as he thought about his situation, about the fact that two weeks had already passed and still he was attached to the feeding tube, about his limitation in moving around, he realized that something wasn’t right.

At first, he had these stray thoughts about himself, which were soon forgotten as soon as Nastassja sat beside him, entertaining him.

But as time passed, he began to focus on those thought, silencing anything surrounding him, even the nurse words or the flow of the shake passing through his lips. His mind began to wake up from the slumber in which it had ended, returning to work properly as it had been before he was subjected to the ‘Illness’. And as his mind strengthened, so did his memories, and through this process, he began to remember everything that had happened to him.

How everything had started, why he was there, on that bed, being fed gallons of shake day after day.

‘Everything started with me resulting positive to an illness.

A highly contagious illness to which Podrick and Nas seems to be immune. From there they’ve both started to feed me loads of foods, they’ve told me to take pills to help curb the illness…but I’ve grown only hungrier and hungrier.

And yet, they provided more and more food to me.

It’s strange…what kind of illness requires this many calories pumped into you?
How would this massive diet plan counteract the fact that Cristiano Ronaldo grew hugely?

Unless…

Unless this is all a lie.

But could they do that? Those two on their own, could they be able to make up something like this?

No, that’s crazy…’

As Paulo couldn’t believe these thoughts, he didn’t do nothing to stop himself, resulting only in growing fatter and fatter. And yet, as days passed and he saw himself growing wider and heavier, feeling his back being crushed by the sheer weight of his fat, those thought returned stronger and stronger, as he tried to make sense in what was happening to him.

‘I’m growing bigger.

The more I drink this stuff… the fatter I become. But why would they do this? What reason could they have to make me as huge as I currently am?

Is it for the money? No, that can’t be. If money were involved, they would have stopped long time ago, as soon as I wasn’t able to move…instead they push me constantly to grow bigger.

Even Nastassja does it!
She tempts me every day, talking about food and cooking, but why?

What kind of interest could drive them to have me grow as big as I am?
Yet…doesn’t matter the reason. They’re doing it.

They’re fattening me up.

Podrick said something about a couple of days with this machine…but weeks have passed and yet, I’m still being fed these shakes!

I’m growing huge.

So big I can’t even see over the massive belly I’ve got…’

As days kept on passing, bigger and bigger Paulo grew, gaining at breakneck speed, as time passed, he seemed to be growing wider and larger, until he himself felt parts of him he couldn’t see, touching something very cold. Forced to lay back, his head on several orthopedic pillows, his field of vision was restricted by the humongous gut he sported. So, he was unable to see how his moobs had grown so large and massive that, due to gravity, they had fallen on both sides of his bed, ending up against the cold floor of the room he was in.

His ass cheeks, similarly, were starting to spread on both sides of him, pushing out of the confines of his bed, getting closer and closer to the floor, as his body added strata upon strata of thick, heavy fat, trying futilely to store the humongous quantities of calories being forced within its confines.

When Paulo began to see his horizon changing, moving from his constantly engorged belly, to a small valley created by his own chins, multiplying all around him as his body hadn’t anymore space to store all those calories he kept swallowing day after day, at that point, Paulo began to cry.

At first, Nastassja, didn’t even notice.

It was just so hard to see any difference in the massive blob that had once been Paulo Dybala. Applying this liquid diet to him, made it easier for him to gain weight, since digestion time were mostly halved and, feeding after feeding, quantities kept increasing. Still, after a while, as she at beside his massive engorged body, through the whirring of the feeding machine and the harsh gulping of his own, she began to hear a little sob, every so often.

Intrigued, she climbed on the bed, forced partially to climb also his body, and then she saw tears escaping his squinting eyes.

Suddenly afraid of hi being in pain she contacted Podrick through the internal line and stopped the feeding, fearing that Dybala was crying in pain. When James arrived in the room he stood a moment in an ecstatic reverie. There it was, his soon to be meal, having grown almost as big as Cristiano, laying on his massive bed which, he noticed with a smile, it had broken all four of its legs who knows when. Returning in himself he moved closer to the Paulo’s face, ignoring the almost panicking nurse, as he tried t understand what Paulo issue was.

“What’s the matter, Paulo? Any issues?”

“Y…Y…yheesss…”

Dybala forced himself to speak, using a tongue that had grown atrophied by haven’t been used for so long, making him croak few words, instead of being able to talk normally.

“….havhe….prohb…lem…”

“What is it? Paulo, please, let me help you…”

“Youhhh… Youh…is… prohb…lem…

Youhhh…fatthed…mehh...too…much…

Why…? Stop….nohhh…mhore….”

As James stood from his seat, standing atop the bed, right beside the jiggling mass that Paulo had become, he smiled. Apparently he had been found out by his first guest. As James looked at his creation with pride, for a moment, for a brief moment, he also flashed a grinning leer to Paulo.

“Why, you ask, Paulo?
Because I can. Because I like seeing you unable to stop me. Because I love the feeling of control I have over you. You may be crying now over your old physique, wishing to have it back, deciding to make a stand against me… But if I were to leave you without food for one hour, you would beg me to satisfy your gut.

Understand this, Paulo, I’ve changed you into a Glutton. An hedonist glutton unable to see after his next plate of food, unable to stop, unable to return to your old self.

A purpose behind this? There may be one…but you will find out only when I decide you’ve grow enough.

And as of now, for me, you still have room to grow.”

As Podrick was saying that, he moved closer and closer to Paulo’s face, watching raptly as the guy’s tears flew down from his squinting eyes.

“Cry all you want…it doesn’t matter to me. In these weeks you’ve almost doubled your weight…You’ve grown from the big 600 to an astounding 1.128 lbs. You are one of the very few who managed to reach this size in a, almost, healthy condition.

But you will grow more for me.

And in a few hours…as soon as the hunger building inside of you will reach painful levels, it will be you begging me to give you more food.

And I will give you more, enjoying much more knowing that as much as you despise me…you’ll be unable to stop yourself.

So, please, take your time. Be angry at me, promise vengeance against me…in the end, you will crawl to me asking for more…

I only have to wait.”

With that, laughing maniacally, James moved away from the gigantic blob of fat that Paulo had grown into, from his multiples chins, forcing his head to sunk down amidst of his own fat, to his apron like gut, which covered everything up to his ow feet from view. From those huge sack of lard that had once been moobs, to his own double door wide ass cheeks, overflowing the broken bed he was forced to lay upon.

In all of this, as Paulo cried angrily at the betrayal of what he had considered a friend, he realized that Podrick was probably right.

‘I’m so addicted to eating that for real I may have to beg him to give me more of it…But I’ve got to try and resist…even though already I can feel my hungry gut rumbling in anger, demanding sustenance…
I….
I have to…
To…’
1241111112222441411321344211111334.title: Waking up from the slumber

choices: First, though, I’m gonna have some fun with you!
You’ll be moved where we can take care of you (Keep the lie)
You have the honor of becoming my meal. (Reveal the truth)
Enjoy this last meal… (Tube feed him some more)
12411111122224414113213442111113343.content:
Paulo had suspected that Podrick had wanted to fatten him up but, learning that the guy seemed so entertained by doing so shocked him to his core. And yet, the words of the coach still rang in his head

‘And in a few hours…as soon as the hunger building inside of you will reach painful levels, it will be you begging me to give you more food.
I only have to wait’.

Dybala, tears over his swollen cheeks, began to lightly jiggle all over himself, trembling out of fear and already feeling the need to have food stuffed within himself. Yet, he didn’t want to give up, he didn’t want to end up bigger than he already was. He wanted to be able to get back to his field, to be able to run, hell, even being able to move would be a step up from its current situation. Still, despite his thoughts, all his body wanted was more food.

Nastassja had watched from the sidelines, seeing how Podrick revealed his intentions to Dybala, seeing how the guy was trying to resist, to fight back. In a sense, Nas was feeling proud of Paulo. Although he had been transformed in an almost eating machine, the guy was doing all he could to resist. This, in her eyes, increased the value that Paulo had. Yet also she had similar desires to the coach. Now that she had seen how easy it had been for Dybala to almost, double his own weight, she wanted to see what his limits were.

But if Paulo wouldn’t eat, he wouldn’t grow.

Smiling she began moving closer to the bed bound, jiggling, mass of lard that Paulo was.

The ex-player wasn’t in any position to look behind. His body had accumulated so much fat, in such a short time, that even if he had the strength to move, he wouldn’t have been able to, given the fact that he wasn’t used to this body of his. So, as he felt the painful hunger pangs coming from his humongous, bed-sized, gut, he closed his eyes and tried to focus only on the need to show to that bastard that had fattened him up, that Paulo Dybala wasn’t an easy target as he had thought.

Alas, closing in himself, he didn’t see the nurse creeping closer and closer, while holding a single innocent looking cookie in her hands. As soon as she was standing beside Paulo, she began to stealthily move the cookie from her hand to his mouth, until she managed to have it fall from her grasp, falling into his open maw. Paulo didn’t notice immediately what was going on, so focused he was on trying to resist that he dismissed all sensations coming from his body, focalizing only on his hunger, trying to keep it at bay.

His body, though responded well enough to Nastassja actions, trained by weeks of constant stuffing, without his conscious thoughts, his lips opened for more when the cookie was quickly swallowed.

Nas didn’t waste the opportunity. While holding the feeding tube, moving it inches from his open mouth, she started the flow of weight gain shake, watching with passion as the shake went from the tube into the fattened player mouth. She never pushed the nozzle into his mouth, afraid that the guy could wake up from his reverie, instead she held it there, letting the shake freely flow, as Paulo’s trained body did the rest.
After a few hours, Dybala noticed that his hunger seemed to be quieting down and began to grunt and moan as he tried to release the focus, he had on himself.

Seeing as the guy was waking up, Nas quickly stopped the flow, and moved back, noticing to be just in time as Dybala began to assess his surroundings.

‘Did I do it? Have I managed to resist?

My hunger seems to have calmed down quite a bit, so I think so…yet, I don’t feel starving. I was expecting my body to react badly from not giving it any food and instead, everything seems to be working fine.

This was a glaring success! I’ll show you, Podrick!

I won’t back down so easily!’


So happy he was from his success, that he failed to notice the lingering sweet after taste that still was in his mouth, as his body began once more to digest the shake, converting it into even more fat tissue on his body.

These events kept replaying more and more, during the week, with Dybala focusing on himself to resist his hunger, while Nastassja fed him gallons of the shake without his knowledge. Paulo, once again, began to grow even more. With his will to resist he had managed to stop for some time but, thanks to the nurse intervention, he rapidly began anew to grow. Day after day, his body swelled larger and larger, becoming a veritable sea of lard, his forms growing so big that he began to cover the entire bed he was on from view, only with his body. His arms, pumped full of fat, grew bigger and rounder, pushed by the same fat on them to lay down straight from his shoulder, unable to ben anymore. His hands, and even his fingers, began to be swollen with fat, resembling more fat sausages, than the finger they were.

His torso and shoulders expanded hugely, both on the front and on the side. On the front, weighed down by his monstrous moobs, which had grown so massive that two persons were needed to lift one of it. While on the back a countless slide of back rolls made its way up to his ass. His neck had vanished from view, his head was actually being dragged down as a multitude of jiggly chins created a sort of funnel around it. His gut, though, was the one that had grown the most. Overflowing the boundaries placed by the bed he was in, it overflowed it, reaching the ground and covering the front of the broken bed he was laying upon, everything from his feet to his crotch, was hidden under it, completely covered by the sheer mass of adipose tissue that filled his body.

Dybala, though, wasn’t aware of these changes. As big as he was, he didn’t think he could grow any bigger, without considering that he firmly belied to be showing restrain in his eating habits. He was so convinced of what he was doing, in fact, that for the last three days Nastassja had pushed the nozzle right within his mouth once more, and yet the guy didn’t seem to notice it.

The Nurse was joyously happy about this although, she knew from Porick that, in a few short days, Dybala was going to leave their care.

“Sir? What do you mean, leave our care? You’re going to release him?”

It was the evening before the last day that James had scheduled for Paulo, and he was currently explaining to the nurse, what the future was going to be.

“Of course not, Nastassja. Still, he’s grown so big that we can’t keep him here contained. That is why tomorrow, since is your day of freedom from this work, I will have him moved somewhere else.

In the new facility he will be going to be placed under a better care than we can provide here.”

Nastassja, who was growing rather attached to the mountainous tanker of lard that Dybala had become, tried once more to get a clear answer from her boss.

“Then why move him when I’m not around?”

“Nas, you’ve grown rather…affectious with him. I don’t want to fight every step of the way as he’s moved somewhere else. That is the reason we’re doing his transfer tomorrow.

So that when you get back, you’ll find a new guest for you to take care of.
Understood?”

“Yes, sir.”


The following morning, as Podrick entered the room hosting Dybala he was ecstatic.
He had to let loose of Cristiano, force by events, but now Dybala was more than ready to substitute him.

‘Yes. Paulo will be quite an excellent source of food for me and those like me.

I only need to look at him.

He’s almost at 1.400 lbs, and while I’m sure he could keep growing a bit bigger, it is high time I get my reward.’

“Good Morning, Paulo.

No, don’t answer.

You can’t do it anyway. You’ve grown way too fat to be able to speak coherently.

I admit that you didn’t beg to be given more food. Still, whether you realized it or not, we didn’t stop feeding you.

Yes, Paulo, as you concentrated yourself to resist, you never noticed we had started to tube feeding you once more.

And now, now you’re more than ready for the end of this journey…”
12411111122224414113213442111113343.title: Forcing a decision

choices: April interrupts suddenly the two of them
Susan and Sergio, meanwhile, are quite busy on something
124111111222244141132134421111133433.content:
James Podrick, as he stood over the immobile mass of fat that had once been a soccer player, couldn’t resist the temptation as he watched the ultra-obese guy laying down on the broken bed. As he watched him, he licked his lips feverishly, already imagining the taste of such a scrumptious dish.

Paulo, although he couldn’t move a muscle, noticed the strange stare that Podrick was giving him and, with a trembling voice, afraid of what the guy had in mind for him, tried to speak. Unfortunately for him, even his speech had been taken away from him as the fat had amassed onto his form.

James, hearing the gargling grumble coming from Dybala, only smiled even more, as he began bending on his knees, moving closer to the guy as he whispered to him.

“You must be afraid, aren’t you, Paulo? Well, you should be…for I’m going to reveal a secret to you.

You see, it’s not only a passion of mine to see you guys balloon up and grow bigger and fatter. The main reason behind this all is due to a catering of sorts that I’ve to provide to myself and to those like me that are unable to sustain themselves.
You see, we are an insignificant percentage of the world population and due to this, and to the fact that many abhor what we do, we are often left empty handed or, even, hunted down as if we’re criminals.

We, my dear, dear Paulo, are only seeking a way of sustaining ourselves.
And to do that, we have to rely on people like you who, knowingly or not, offer themselves to us.

That is why I’ve done the utmost to let you live a life without any stress, without any disturbances…So that when the time to offer yourself comes, you can go without regrets.

But I’m digressing…

You, Paulo, will end up becoming the staple for my people…and there is nothing you can do about it.”

As Paulo heard James whispers, he began trembling in fear, faster and faster as he thought that the guy was crazier that he had ever thought. Still, that last phrase, the one in which James referred him to as ‘the staple of his people’ made him worry even more, although it also confused him.

“I see you haven’t understood yet. No worries. I’ll try to be more explicit.
We, me and my people, are Cannibals, Paulo.

You, instead, are our meal.

Do you understand now?”

As James said that he quickly grabbed the topmost roll from Dybala’s belly, shaking it for emphasis, as he squeezed harshly the thick strata of fat.

“All of this…will soon become our food for months to come…”

Dybala froze in terror at first, too shocked by the revelation but, as James began to move away, he tried with all of his strength to move, to walk away.

To get away from that maniac.

But it was all for naught. Buried under almost 1.400 pounds of flesh, Paulo could do nothing more than jiggle his body in a frenzy, making himself shake and wobble as a massive, blob shaped, jelly. As Podrick moved away, four men entered the apartment, each dressed in hazmat suits, they brought with them a small mobile crane. James watched from the sidelines as the brutes he had hired to move Paulo, began their work.

They were unnamed workers, similar to mercenaries who were interested only into their pay.

James had already organized everything. Already had been in strict contact with one of the few places where those like him could go to get a freshly prepared meal. The people there, once had heard of his proposition, were dubious at first that an opportunity like that could be real but, as they saw surveillance videos of Paulo Fattening up, they immediately agreed to help James when the time arrived.

And now, it was that time. Finally, after many months of waiting, James could get what he desired the most. An expertly made meal from a famous soccer player. He truly couldn’t wait to have a nice grilled steak out of Paulo’s thigh, or maybe a stew made with his moobs? Possibilities were endless.

But, before he could lose himself in those dreams, he swiftly followed the brutes to their transport truck, joining them as they made together the final trip for Paulo Dybala. The trip in itself was uneventful, but when they arrived in the underground location, where Paulo was going to be treated, from there, James began to have fun.

In not even an hour, Paulo had been moved from the truck to a special pallet like structure and placed on a mechanical belt, which began to take him away from the cargo area. As James watched interested as his soon to be meal was moved away, he noticed two figures approaching him.

The first was a middle-aged man, white haired and with a similarly colored moustache. He had to be the contact to which James had spoken to when organizing this exact day. The second one, instead, was a young bubbly red headed girl, clothed in a dress two sizes too small for her she walked slowly behind the man, as she nibbled on some sort of doughnut.

“Mr. Podrick, I presume? I’m Edwards. Ralph Edwards, we spoke on the phone.”

“Pleasure to meet you Mr. Edwards.”

“She, instead, is my secretary, April. She usually takes care of showing our facility to the guests but, considering the specimen you’ve brought to us, I’ll do the honors.”

As they moved through the underground facility, James noticed quite rapidly that April seemed to be doing nothing much apart eating quite a lot, as he was at a safe distance from the girl he began to enquire with the owner beside him.

“Oh, you’ve noticed then.

Yes, April is helping us out on testing a new serum our lab guys have been tinkering with for some time. Naturally, she isn’t aware of this but, considering the way less than satisfactory job she’s done lately, she deserves a little punishment.

So far, the results are optimistic.”

As Edwards talked, James quickly looked at the girl ambling behind them, as she stopped wuite often to any vending machine she found on their way, purchasing snacks upon snacks, which she then proceeded to devour just before the next vending machine was beside her.

“Mr. Edwards, I must admit that this serum of ours seems quite interesting. I wonder if it was possible to receive some of it, as soon as the final product will be released.”

“Ha! I knew you would have been interested. Unfortunately, there are still some issues with the current batch of serum. To name a few, the test subject find itself so addicted to the stuff that will grow aggressive if none is given within half an hour and the nature itself of the serum, which has to be prepared with a taxing process, and so it isn’t easy to be manufactured.

Still, we’re improving it and, in the next few years, we may be able to give you a final version, free of any issues.”

James nodded at that, as he kept stealing glances of the young woman behind them, still eating as if her life depended on it. He could only imagine how easier his job would become of he could simply inject his victims with such a serum. HE wouldn’t have anymore any need for subterfuge as they would eat themselves fat without any worry.

Mr. Edwards, after a bit, noticing how James was daydreaming, coughed a bit to make him aware of something.

“Still, Let’s talk business, shall we?

Now, you’ve brought us a really nice specimen. Although quite dangerous since he’s a celebrity, he still is one of the biggest we ever received. And you managed to do this all by yourself? That’s impressive.

In any case, as I mentioned to you through the phone, we can proceed in two different ways…

Either, we treat him right away, making sure that he’s moved straight to production, so to start immediately the process of turning him into a prepackaged mountain of A+ Grade meat; Or, we can have him moved on the Kobe Treatment. Following this second procedure he won’t be immediately available on the market but, when the three months of treatments have gone, we will have a final product that will surpass any other you’ve ever tasted.

Usually, I must confess, we let our experts deciding who follows which treatment but, as this is a particular case, one where the Client himself provided us with the main ingredient, I’ll leave you, Mr. Podrick, to the choice… ”
124111111222244141132134421111133433.title: Truths and revelations…

choices: Susan try to enforce a one hour schedule for his feedings
Susan wakes him up after barely half an hour, for his next meal
1241111112222441411321344211111334334.content:
As the new guy arrived in the quarantined building, Susan noticed that Podrick seemed to be intently focused only on him. She wasn’t exactly sure on what made Mr. Podrick tick, he seemed to be an efficient feeder and yet, he didn’t seem to be relishing the gain of his targets as much as she or the other nurse did.

Still, she pushed away those thoughts, she had her own toy to play with, one named Sergio.

For the last few weeks she had been content in ordering him about, every time pushing him to his limits, making sure he was always stuffed to the gills and wanting nothing else than being fed by her. Still, as of late, this routine seemed to become boring for her, so she thought about spicing things up a bit. As she entered the room where the fattened player was resting, she marveled once more at his size.

Sergio was laying upon his bed, sleeping above the covers, wearing nothing but a tight pair of shorts and a way too small t-shirt, leaving his ample gut to protrude forward and at his sides. As he kept eating whatever she brought to him, his gain rate kept being constant, as he already was having issues moving around.

Sitting beside him, as she watched him sleep, she gently caressed his dome shaped gut, feeling it gurgle as it digested the last meal he had consumed, barely an hour before. She had been quite cruel to him, bringing more than the double of what he usually was having. And yet, such was his loyalty to her, he managed to squeeze every last crumb within himself, even if at the end he had almost begged her to push the last few items into his mouth.

Susan was proud of his transformation.

When she had first arrived there, Sergio Aguero wanted nothing more than dominate her, to impress her with his toned body, as if she was below him and she had to be grateful for his company. But Susan quickly changed the attitude of the guy, shoveling mountains of food into his gullet, making him so addicted that he had to submit to her.

Until, recently, when she made it clear that he had to call her ‘Mistress’.

And Sergio obeyed.

Even now, as she caressed his gut and his pendulous moobs, he murmured into his sleep about her, hearing that, she quickly stood and began taking out the breakfast she had ordered from the kitchen, making sure to be as loud as possible, until she saw that Sergio began to stir into awakening.

“Mh? Wha…? Oh, it’s you, Mistress…Is time already?”

‘No, it isn’t but I’ve gotta make you bigger…’

“Yes, Sergio…it’s time for your third breakfast…”

“Good…’M hungry…”

Sergio Aguero, although feeling still pretty sated from his latest meal, know better than admit it in front of his Mistress. She was all he needed in his life and yet, she could be nice and gentle as a kitten, and just as easily become callous as a snake. In the past he had tried once or twice to go against her wishes but, soon learned that it was better to avoid such situation. Slowly, as he pushed against the bed to reach a seating position against the backwall, he rose from his sleeping position, preparing himself to receive his breakfast.

As it was usual, he began to receive the trays with his food directly under his nose, without realizing that Susan was placing them directly on his already massive belly.

“Here you go, Pet. An eight eggs omelet, with half a pound of sausages, same quantity of fries and a full pound of fried bacon strips.

Clean it all and I’ll give you your next course.”

The guy sniffed the aroma coming from the plate and, quite rapidly, began to clean out the tray she had brought him, chewing and swallowing both eggs and meats as fast as he could. As he did so, the grease and the oil from the fries began to slowly leak on his face and down on his three chins, still he didn’t mind. All he wanted was to please his Mistress. As of late, he had noticed something peculiar, something which didn’t made lot of sense for him.

He had noticed that he was having troubles moving around, even rising from his own bed had seemed to become quite the chore, and yet he didn’t trouble himself when food was presented to him. He barely could maintain focus on what was going on around him as he focused mainly on eating what he had in front of him.

Sergio Aguero had grown much in the time he had been quarantined, yet he had stopped caring about that. True, he wondered sometimes at what was going on outside of those four walls that made his own apartment but, with food under his nose and the gentle touch of his Mistress, he could care less about everything else.

As the guy cleaned the first tray, Susan bent toward him, cleaning his lips and chins with a napkin, before giving him a quick peck on top of his gurgling belly, just before passing onto him a new tray, full to the brim with more delicious food.

“Here you go, Pet. Second course is ready for you…we have a couple of cakes and a few dozen’s donuts…also, there are three shakes for you to have. Doctor’s order…”

He didn’t even reply, simply grabbed a quarter of the first cake and began to mow it down, pushing it as much as he could, into his open mouth before starting to chew and swallow. As he kept eating, so his gut began to fill up, starting to rumble noisily. Yet, just as the first hint of discomfort crossed his face, Susan smiled to him and began to massage gently his overworked stomach, making space for him where to store more and more food. Aguero felt himself, not for the first time, as if he was in paradise.

A beautiful woman at his side as he could eat whatever he wanted, without worrying about anything, and yet, he had a nagging feeling that he was forgetting something, something important. Something that seemed related to his presence there. But with both the pull from the food and from Susan, he pushed away those thoughts, focusing only on her and his meals. As the meal progressed, and Susan brought to him his sixth course, she noticed that he was starting to slow down, as the energy he had to move his arms was starting to dwindle to nothing.

“Now, now, Pet…you don’t want to stop, do you?”

“N-No! No, Mistress…*oaurp!*...just...so…tired...”

“Ohh…my poor little pet is tired…well, let Susie help you then…”

As she said that, she sat on the bed, in what little space was available beside the massive guy, taking notice of what was available on the tray, seeing as it was filled with powdered cream puffs, eclairs and a quite large sheet cake. Taking a spoon from the tray, she rapidly filled it as much as it could ad brought it toward Sergio’s lips.

“Here, open wide, Pet…Let’s make sure you eat all of your meal, shall we?”

Sergio didn’t do much except opening his mouth and eating what she gave him, and yet, feeling her so close to him seemed to give him the power to clean out everything on his last tray, although he was beginning to feel pretty much stuffed. Still, he didn’t want to upset her, knowing full well that an upset Susan would mean no food and no touching for days. As he swallowed the last morsel of food from his final tray, he burped quite loudly, already starting to feel a bit drowsy and yet, he saw that she was moving closer to him, her hand roaming his gut as she scooted even closer.

“Good job, Pet. You’ve eaten well…but what would you say if I mention that there is another tray, waiting for you?”

Sergio, full as he was, feeling her soft touch on his taut gut, could hardly refuse. As he managed to burp once more, trying to make some more room, he nodded slowly, as he saw her turning around and offering him…a tube?

“He he…oopsie daisy…it isn’t a real tray but, more of a keg of beer…can you do it, though?”

Aguero didn’t even reply, as he opened his lips and closed them around the tube into his mouth, biting on the tube so that it wouldn’t escape his grasp. Soon, he felt the refreshing taste of beer on his tongue and eagerly began to swallow, gulping it down without stopping himself, timing his breaths so that he hadn’t to stop for oxygen. In barely fifteen minutes, the small keg had been completely empty and Sergio, now feeling tipsy and drowsy, began to lay down once more on his bed.

“Such a good little Pet you are. Now sleep well, I’ll return with your next meal…”


As Susan saw that Aguero had fallen asleep like a log she admired her job for a minute more, seeing his gut, all filled up like a beach ball, rock hard to the touch as it loudly digested the massive meal he had already consumed, and yet a bit sloshy too due to the liters of beer she had managed to have him swallow. Without his noticing she had, once more, increased his portions and reduced the resting time between one meal and the next, and yet Sergio had managed to clean out everything just as before.

As she bent down toward the end of the bed, she rapidly moved some cover away as she revealed the scale mounted into the bed, eager to see how big he had grown since the previous week. She quickly scanned her notes and smiled widely in seeing he had gained no less than 34 pound in less than three days.

As she quickly did the math, she proudly realized that Sergio was finally approaching the big 500 pounds.

‘I’ll have to make him a special meal when he reaches it…just to make sure he keeps on growing properly.’
1241111112222441411321344211111334334.title: Susan ad Sergio

choices: As Sergio grows, he sees problems arising around him
With Sergio eating so much, Susan start enjoying some snacks too
12411111122224414113213442111113343342.content:
As Sergio slept, he began to dream.

In the dream he was still on the field, playing the ball toward the opponent’s goal but, just before he could kick the ball to score, an oversized hot dog appeared in front of him, forcing him to open his mouth and swallow it whole. As he gulped the strangely appealing snack, he felt himself full of energy and made to move forward toward the enemy goal but, he realized he wasn’t anymore standing in front of the goal.

He was actually seating on a large couch, while his team goal was behind him.

Surprised he made to rise and return to the play when he noticed the referee, which was strikingly similar to Susan, move closer to him informing him that he had to stay there for the game to continue. Perplexed, Sergio sat where he was, until he saw one of the other players move in position as if he was the goalkeeper, as they aimed the ball toward him.

Too surprised to do anything he saw the players kicking the ball astonishingly fast, too shocked to do anything he simply stared as the ball morphed into a massive, melon sized, ball of cake which traveled right toward him. As if he had one it plenty of times before, he moved his head a little and opened his mouth astonishingly wide, until the massive ball of cake entered his open lips and he swallowed entirely.

Licking his lips in pleasure he saw that the score was now reporting

“Others: 0 ; Sergio: 1”

As he burped a bit, he saw that the next player was getting closer to the ball, and now, knowing what was going to happen, he himself prepared to be on the receiving end. For some time, the game kept going this way, with the players kicking the soccer ball and Sergio gulping down whatever the ball changed into, and yet Sergio didn’t seem aware of how his body was faring. For each ball he gulped, his body seemed to grow fifty pounds heavier, starting to overcome the couch he was seating on as the score counter kept increasing in his favor.

“Others: 0 ; Sergio: 12”

And another fifty pounds were added to his frame, forcing him to stay seated down, as he wasn’t able to lift himself from the couch on his own even if he wanted to.

“Others: 0 ; Sergio: 16"

His body began to ooze out of his uniform, ripping it out in several places as the small and tight set of clothes couldn’t contain his ever-growing form any longer.

“Others: 0 ; Sergio: 20"

As he saw the score, a massive burp escaped from his lips but, as he tried to lift his arms to cover his mouth, he realized he couldn’t move them. As much as he tried, they were too heavy for him to lift them, forcing him to keep them at his sides, as his massive protruding gut also pushed them back from the front. As Sergio looked at himself, he wasn’t entirely sure on what he was seeing.

He felt himself weighted down by something but, with the referee and the other players complimenting him on the wonderful game, he refused to acknowledge his real size, choosing to pretend that he was just tired. As he saw the other team leaving, he thought that the game was finished but, before he could even attempt to move away, the referee moved straight toward him. The woman, which Sergio was surprised in seeing that she really looked like a copy of his Mistress, walked right up to him and began undressing herself as she climbed upon him and on the couch and snuggled closer under his fattened up arm.

“So, Mr. Aguero, another victory under our belt, uh?”

“Wh-What? I…I guess so.”

“Such a humble player. Why, you’re the greatest champion around. Nobody else could score as many victories as you…now, will you keep winning for me? Will you do it, Pet?”

“I…I will. I won’t lose…”

As Aguero said that in his dream he tried to rise once more from the couch, managing it just for a few moments, before his weakened legs collapsed under his weight, unable to support his massive frame. As he rolled off the couch, he began to see how big he was, how heavy he felt and, most importantly how weak he was. As his dream turned into a nightmare, seeing all the people he had known for all his life taunting him as he was unable to move on his own, his subconscious began to actively remove the memories that were causing him harm.

Thus, making him forget what he really was, choosing instead to live the dream he was having. All his memories of him being a soccer player vanished, while being replaced by the ones provided from his dream. As he began to stir in his sleep, he was no more conscious of being Sergio Aguero the soccer player, believing instead of being Sergio Aguero, the couch-ball player.

As Sergio woke up, finding himself still in his room, laying upon his bed he managed, slowly, to rise from his bed, seating on its verge as he tried to remember where he was and what he was doing in there.

‘I…I was ill…I think? Nah, that can’t be it. I’ve never felt better.

Then I was moved here in preparation for my next game? I’m a champion at it, after all… Yes, now I remember…My Mistress was the referee at my last match, and she decided to help me train for my next game…

I shall do her proud of having chosen to back me up!’

It was then that Sergio felt his fattened gut slapping slightly against this thighs and, while horrified for a fleeting moment, he soon convinced himself that it was normal for him to be at that size… And yet, as he touched himself, feeling his jiggly body, he soon realized that if he was in training it was surely meant he was still too small.

Looking at the clock he noticed that it was almost time for his first breakfast and, just as he thought of calling Susan, she appeared at the doorway.

“Good Morning, Pet. Up already? You must be hungry, then…”

“Yes, Mistress! I need to eat more for the training to be a success…”


As Susan began surrounding him with the seven trolley’s full of pancakes, waffles and bacon strips she had brought along as first pre-breakfast, she began to slowly inquire about this training he had mentioned. As far as she remembered, Podrick had never mentioned this kind of excuse for Sergio to be there. With a bit of prodding and a bit of cleverness, she managed to understand more or less what Sergio was saying.

‘So, he believes to be training for this sport where he eats all the time, uh?
Can work with it…gotta remember to inform Podrick though…’

As Aguero cleaned each and every trolley worth of food, he felt himself collapse against the bed once more, his gut stuffed full to bursting and yet, with a sense of achievement, for he had managed to clean each and every plate that Susan had brought to him. Still licking his lips, he slowly began to feel sleepy, as his body began to work overtime to digest the massive amounts of calories it had received but, before he lost consciousness he managed to leave a request to his Mistress.

“Mistress… If I may…could you…*yawn*…bring the next meal…in one hour… I know I should wait longer but…need to up my…game….”

Before he could hear the reply, already he was fast asleep. Susan, meanwhile could only grin in pleasure, if he was so dead set in upping his game, then she would manage to let him overcome the big 500 milestone quicker than expected.

‘I can’t wait to have you so big that you shan’t be able to move at all…
Then, you’ll rely only to me.

And I’ll force you to keep growing and growing…

You’ll see, Sergio… I will make you bigger than Cristiano, you can count on it.’
12411111122224414113213442111113343342.title: Sergio's Dreams becoming his new reality...

124111111222244141132134421111133433423.content:
One month had passed since the fateful dream that convinced Sergio of living into a new reality that saw him as the rising champion of the sport he had imagined, the couch-ball. In those thirty long days, Sergio Aguero had done nothing else but ‘train’ for what he believed was the incoming championship which he was determined to win. Susan, all too willingly, had done nothing to rouse him from this alternate reality he seemed to be living. It was simply too convenient for her to let him believe in that lie, as she warned also Podrick about that.

The training, by Aguero ideals, was going really swell, although his figure was swelling just as much. As per his request, Susan had shortened his resting time to an hour, giving him time to sleep longer only at nights, and even than only for four hours tops. This lack of rest, coupled with the massive chemically addicting meals that filled his days, caused Sergio to grow out at a ungodly speed. If before he was almost at the big 500 pounds, with this training brought on, he passed it just as fast, leaving him now at the mind-boggling size of almost 750 pounds. Currently asleep, in one of his few resting times, Sergio was being admired by his Mistress Susan, which stared at him with admiration and lust for what he had achieved.

He was indeed massive.

His legs, fattened beyond belief, looked more like metal barrels so covered in adipose tissue they were, and were just as heavy, considering that Sergio couldn’t move them anymore by his own will. His hips and ass too had received quite the abundant dose of fat, as if a mad doctor had just injected it right into his bum. It was now a large thing, soft like jelly, and just as jiggly, it was squished against the surface of the bed, leaving quite the indenture into the mattress, and yet it still was forced to spill at his side, overtaking the sides of his bed.

Of course, although his ass spilled at his sides, it was his humongous gut that took most of the space, as it had grown gargantuan, covering everything from below his upper torso down to his calves, leaving only his fattened feet to appear from below. His belly mound had grown so vast, in fact, that not only it covered most of his body height wise, but also by his width. As it in fact spilled over the bed, almost reaching the floor. And although it was so spread out, still it blocked his view forcing him to watch at the ceiling, unable to see what was directly on his front, when laying down on his back.

Sergio’s moobs too had grown hugely, growing obscenely large, like sacks of meat which, forced by gravity, spilled at his sides too, wobbling crazily at his every breath.

His arms were similarly inflated with fat as were his legs, forced by their sheer weight to rest upon the mattress, side by side with his humongous gut, barely on top of it although, as his body kept growing day by day, even there they were at risk of being submerged. His face and neck weren’t spared either. His neck vanished from view, covered as it was in four large chin-rolls, and yet every time he craned his head down, more appeared on the view, as if to promise their soon arrival on the permanent scene.

His face, which had managed to look relatively thin for most of his time there, had finally exploded with fat, growing round and cherubic, soft and jiggly, with his cheeks cascading down, as fat accumulated everywhere it could, forcing his eyes to squint, pushed around as they were.

Susan stared at his pet in his glorious fattened state but, what she dreamed upon was to be able to see him in a perpetual engorged state. Growing so big and massive that nothing would be able to contain him. Not the room he was currently in, nor the entire building.

It was a dream, an impossible dream and yet, nothing stopped her to try and reach that limit.

As she moved closer, she let herself go against his body, feeling her own self covered by all side by his magnificent, warm, body fat, just as if she was sleeping on the softest waterbed. And yet, she hadn’t time to lose like this. If she wanted her dream to come true, she had to get to work.

Lifting herself from him, she brought into the room the long train of trolley’s she had taken from the kitchen, preparing herself in giving him his next meal. To tell the truth she wasn’t sure anymore if this was going to be his fifth lunch or the first of many afternoon snacks, Sergio now was eating so often that was hard to distinguish between one meal and the next. Yet, it was his next meal, which would have been followed soon by another and another…

Waking herself up from her reverie, she moved at his side, slapping him a bit, rousing him from his sleep, forcing him to look at her with his bleary, squinted, eyes.

“Wakey, wakey, Pet. It’s time for your next meal.”

“*hrf* it is...time…*hrk*…already?”

“Yes, Pet. You need to train for the championship...”

Sergio didn’t lose time with words, instead replying with a shaky, half assed, nod as he began worming himself to a seated position, helped along the way by Susan, until he was seated in bed, his back against the wall. His heavy arms barely able to move, to bring food to his mouth. Susan was aware of how near immobile he was becoming and yet, the thought excited her even more.

As she left a bowl of heavily fried finger food in front of him, so that he could feed himself, as slowly as that was going to be, she also grabbed a massive spoon and began spoon feeding him loads taken directly from a long series of cakes she had at her side, forcing him to eat as fast as he could from both what he had in front and what she pushed into his maw. Aguero had had some troubles in getting used to this treatment, at first, but now that he was used to it he couldn’t imagine a life without being fed this way. In his deluded mind it was the only way of eating correctly.

How could he consume such massive amounts of food stuff, if he had to rely only on himself?

For hours he kept swallowing mouthfuls and spoonful’s of richly caloric food, feeling his massive gut filling up and out, as it grew rounder and heavier right under his eyes, as his body began to slow down due to his tiredness. This event, in particular, had been a reason of worry to him, the first few times it happened. Since he was afraid of finding himself without a mean to get more food within himself but, as Susan moved closer to him, feeding him faster and faster, as if to compensate his inability to stuff himself out, he started to feel prideful of how healthy he was going to become.

And he had to thank his Mistress for that.

Still, as massively engorged as he could get, he too had limits and yet, when he reached said limits, feeling so full that he might burst, as he felt, and saw, his humongous gut shooting out of him, covering the rest of him in its shadow. Still, Susan never stopped right away. She always pushed him to consume more than before, even as she brought him to hurting point. And yet, Sergio justified this methods, for he believed that she was helping him train, so she wanted to make sure that he was able to grow healthier and stronger and more resistant than the day, or the meal, before.

Being fed in such a way, Sergio Aguero was terribly near to lose any kind of mobility he may still had retained. But it mattered not to him, all he needed was to be in shape for his championship.


Meanwhile, James stared from the camera feed from within his room.

He was curious about the fake reality Sergio had started to believe in, how it had come to happen. It had been a by-product of Susan treatment? It had been a reaction from Sergio when he, supposedly, realized how big he had gotten?

He wasn’t going to know soon, if ever, but it hardly was of any importance.

What was important was only that Sergio kept growing.

Paulo’s figure had managed to greatly impress the people that were going to transform him into a pre-packaged, ready to be consumed, meal for the people like him. And although utterly ecstatic they had been when he had brought him, they weren’t going to use him right away, choosing instead to have him acquire a somewhat more rustic taste first.

For the next one, James wanted to bring them such a specimen that they would remain mouth agape, unable to conceive a way to have him get better but, to do that he would have needed to bring them an even bigger prey. And that was going to be Sergio, if things kept going as they were.

Yet, Paulo’s departure, had left him with an empty room with need to be filled. And he still had plenty of names since the CEO’s list had only kept growing since the day, he first received it. But, in truth, as much as he would have loved to get someone new into his grasp, there was someone he wanted to meet first.

Cristiano.

Not even a couple of days before he had been contacted by Georgina.

He had acted surprised and wanting an update, although, he wasn’t really. Even though he had let her in charge of keeping the massively obese guy, he had never stopped checking after his first, and favorite, meal-pet. Still, how the girl had reacted to Cristiano’s size, told directly from her lips, had been interesting to say the least…
124111111222244141132134421111133433423.title: Time skips: one month forward

Switch back to Podrick, as he searches for a new possible guest
Sergio is starting to outgrow his own room!
Is that a bit of a belly, Susan?
1241111112222441411321344211111334334234.content:
Georgina sat watching the sun setting on the horizon, admiring the sky as it tinged itself of dozens of colors, feeling that soothing view easing her soul. Since the call she received from that man, Podrick, all those months ago, her heart had been in turmoil. The guy had called her revealing some very distressing facts.

The truth behind the sudden vanishing of her boyfriend Cristiano Ronaldo.

Yet, as the guy spoke, telling her of what his company had done to him, and what they had planned to do, Georgina truly wanted to do the best she could for her man.

Only, when she saw him for the first time, she realized that what had been saved was only partially the man she had loved. When first she had been brought to the place where Cristiano had been hidden, to save him from the cruel machinations of his Company, at least that's what they had said to her, she couldn’t believe where she was. For the car that had brought her from her home, had left her into some kind of huge farm, with a massive villa and an even bigger set of wooden looking constructions that only nominally could be called ‘Barns’.

At first, as the guy who had brought her there moved her toward these huge structures, she thought he wanted to induct her, to prepare her for something.

But as the huge double doors opened, and she saw what was inside, she barely repressed the urge to scream.

For inside the massive building, she saw an amorphous blob, wobbling all over itself, as some kind of tube seemed to be pumping it with some sort of liquid. She stared at the mountainous blob, trying to understand what was going on, why those people had brought her there…until she noticed that a screen had been turned toward her. On that she saw that atop that massive jiggly mountain, near the point where the tube was pumping gallons of the mysterious liquid, there were two eyes.

Eyes which she recognized immediately.

“C-C-Cristiano?!”

From that moment, a few of the guards there explained her the situation, about the treatment that his Company had done to him, turning him into that huge, shapeless mass of fat, and yet, through the use of some kind of VR, Georgina was able to talk with her boyfriend. She had been warned that They had used her, or someone like her, to trap Cristiano into that slothful gluttony. And so she tried at the best of her capacity to keep him in the dark about his real size. It hadn’t been easy and, for many nights she felt guilty for betraying his trust but, what could she had done?

If she were to tell him the truth, the minimum stress could have killed him, or so the doctor there told her. So she kept the lie, trying to live with a boyfriend that wasn’t anymore as she remembered.

He was still romantic and courteous to her, as the man she had met so long ago but, he wasn’t a man anymore. So, Georgina tried her best to keep him company, to make him happy, to keep him relaxed, although she herself felt on the verge of madness. But, as time passed, as she noticed that all he seemed to be able to do was eat, she began to see him under a different light.

Everything began three weeks since she had been reunited with him.

She was sitting near him, inside the barn, as he was still being pumped full of whatever chemicals they were giving him to keep him alive, despite his humongous size. And, as she stared entranced to his jiggly body, at how it wobbled and jiggled, at how taut his gut seemed to appear having been fed for days non-stop. It was then that she began to feel amazed at him.

He wasn’t the same man she had know, true. But this Cristiano was easily as big as a couple of garbage trucks, and yet he kept eating and growing, filling up on whatever concoction given to him, as he steadily grew bigger and wider, larger and higher. She had to admit it to herself, she wasn’t sure anybody else could have become that big and still be somewhat healthy.

From then, her admiration began to turn into lust. It took her some time to actually realize that she was falling in love for a mass of fat unable to stop eating and yet, it was happening. As she began to walk on his body, roaming and exploring all of his curves, feeling how soft the thick adipose tissue covering him was, she also started to become more and more affectionate toward him, until she realized that she had forgotten her old lover.

Gone, was the old fit and trim Cristiano from her heart. When this new Cristiano was getting, day after day, as he grew bigger and bigger, more and more attractive in her eyes.

It was barely a couple of days later that, after contacting him via the VR she managed to relieve him of some of his stress, after being aided by several of the people who took care of him to go spelunking down into the depths that were his rolls of fat. And despite the hot and humid air she had found when she finally managed to reach his most intimate parts, she felt herself complete by knowing that all around her, every walls and every rolls surrounding her, it was only a fraction of her boyfriend body.

From then on, Georgina began to actively take a role in Cristiano feeding, dedicating a few hours each and every day, to feed him by hand. This slowed his gains of course but, it caused a massive spike of lust for the both of them. Georgina, finding the situation surreal and yet, she couldn’t refrain herself. She had to see Cristiano growing bigger, so big that no building would be enough to contain him. And Cristiano, that although was still convinced of being in his perfect shape, had to admit with himself that being fed by Georgina made anything she gave him, delicious. And yet, it didn’t seem enough for neither of them.

As weeks passed, Cristiano barely grew heavier, needing a massive number of calories only to maintain his weight. Yet, Georgina didn’t want to call it quits. Forcing him to go over his own limits, she began to relieve his stress more and more often, rewarding him every time he managed to fill himself up to bursting faster than he had done before. With such a prize, Cristiano began soon used to the new quantities, and yet Georgina kept pushing him, relentlessly.

That evening, after months since her epiphany in regard to her ‘new’ lover, she watched the sky’s beautiful colors, as she flopped back against his chins, sitting on one of them, using the others as support for her back. Sitting down in the cone that Cristiano had began sporting as his head sunk deeper and deeper within his body. And yet, although he could barely see anything, his eyes were riveted on Georgina’s figure right beside him, not caring a bit about the fact that she seemed so much smaller than him, nor that he was still drinking avidly from the feeding tube she had forced him to keep at all times, even as he slept.

“My love, don’t worry…everything will be fine…as soon as you are able to clear out also the next silos of food, I will go and give you some well needed relief…

You’ll see, Baby… I’ll get you back to a healthy weight…”

Cristiano couldn’t do much beside opening and closing his eyes, sign that he had understood, as he started to focus only on the food coming from the tube. He was such a lucky man to have a woman as supportive as Georgina. Even though he was still so weak, she still did her best to cheer him up or to see that he was going to go through his next meal.

‘What could I have done without her? If she hadn’t come here, to stay by my side, I don’t think I could have lived…
I love you Georgie…’

Almost as if she had heard him speak, she turned toward him, giving him a quick kiss on what she could see of his forehead.

“I love you Cristiano…My little baby…and I will bring you back to your former glory…you’ll see…”

‘Except, you shall be so big that nobody will be able to move you, or separate you from me again…’
1241111112222441411321344211111334334234.title: Georgina and Cristiano, what happened to them?

1241111112222441411321344211111334334234.content:
Sergio woke up bleary eyed.

Confused, he tried to call for Susan but no words came out of his mouth. As he tried to speak, only a gurgle came out as he realized that there was a tube pushed deep within his lips. As he started to woke up properly and remembered where he was and what he was doing he lowly calmed down. He was still in his room, in the facility where the Mistress was having him trained to win the next championship of coach-ball.

It had been she, in fact, in requesting to have him fed with the tube each and every night, when he was asleep, so to maximize his training effort. So, Sergio didn’t see anything wrong in the situation he was in, he had just to wait for Susan to come and take out the feeding tube, so that he could enjoy breakfast. In the meanwhile, although suppose to be fed only when asleep, he kept swallowing the delicious concoction pouring out from the feeding tube.

Half an hour later, the door to his room opened and, withing the light coming out from the hallway, a feminine silhouette appeared at the door frame.

“Good Morning, Pet. Hope you’re ready for breakfast.”

As the figure moved toward him, Sergio could see how beautiful she was, how her curvaceous body moved and jiggled only in the good places.

‘Mistress sure is a beautiful woman…I am a lucky man…’

A Susan moved beside him, shutting down the feeding machine and extracting the tube from his throat, Sergio could finally breathe freely. He had gotten used by now to breathe with the tube jammed within his throat but, being able to breathe through his mouth was much easier. Yet, not even a minute without food and his gut began to grumbling hungrily, something which made Susan proud.

“So, you are hungry, Pet? Good…It’s time to start on your meals…”

Saying that, Susan moved closer the dozen or so trolley’s she had brought with her, getting them closer to the once soccer player as she prepared for the arduous task of feeding him by hand. Sergio, between the increased schedule and the nightly feeding, had grown tremendously. His flabby body had completely submerged the bed he had once been laying upon. At one point, during one of his meals, Susan was almost sure of having heard it break and crash onto the floor, but with Sergio so massive that she needed to climb atop of him she couldn’t have verified it.

Within weeks since the fast paced ‘Diet’, Sergio had lost any kind of mobility, growing out to be just a massive pile of flesh, one that Susan had often to wash it with a sponge and clean it with baby powder to avoid any issue. Yet, as big as he was, it wasn’t yet enough for the manic feeder girl.

As she climbed atop of him, she noticed his massive legs, which were getting o large she could barely circle them in width with both of her arms. His feet, ridiculously small in comparison, had been lifted from the ground weeks ago and never touched the floor again. But as he had been growing, so did his hugely apron like gut that, like a tidal wave, had moved over his legs covering everything up with its sheer size.

As Susan climbed, on all fours, she suddenly lost her balance when her hand lost contact with the belly surface she had been moving on, quickly she regained balance but realized immediately where she was. Her hand had just managed to grab onto a roll of fat, after having almost fallen into the large belly button that Sergio was sporting. As she returned moving forward, she was constantly reminded how big Sergio had grown. Still she kept moving, passing between the two jiggly hills that were now his moobs, flaccid and wobbly as they were. She had been, the first time, almost afraid that she could have been buried under those and left without breathable air. Finally she began the last climb up, as she grabbed onto his large collection of chin-rolls, managing finally to arrive near his head, sunken slightly within the accumulated fat that had been once his neck.

“Hey, Pet…Sorry for taking so long…open wide now…”

As she said that, without giving him time to answer back, she began stuffing fast food junk within his mouth, forcing him to chew and swallow without a moment of peace. Sergio didn0t mind the treatment at all, he’d gotten used to it after some time and the hunger that forced his gut to grumble ad been growing steadily for quite some time. Slowly, he moved his jaw biting through massive burgers, dripping in grease and cheese, smearing his lips as he sloppily kept eating at the pace that Susan forced on him.

Bite after bite, chomping down and swallowing each morsel, Sergio kept eating in bliss, still unaware of how his body steadily, although slowly, kept growing wider and wider.

“You know, Pet? If we keep this up, I believe that by the end of the year you’ll be just about the minimum requirement for the Championship of this year...”

The inhumanly obese man heard the words but wasn’t keen on accepting them.

‘Minimum requirement? As in Light weight? I can do better than that…
I Will do better than that!’

Doing exactly as she had hoped, Sergio began to quicken up his pace, trying to use any ounce of energy he had to eat faster, although he couldn’t keep this pace for long. Susan, nonetheless was ecstatic. Teasing or threatening didn’t seem to work anymore against her humongous pet, but using his pride, always did.
As literally hundreds of pounds worth in junk food passed through his lips, Susan knew that Sergio was going to be too tired to keep on chewing his food, it had been so for the last few days.

The bigger he got, the less energies he did have.

Yet, if before she would have stopped giving him the much needed rest he may have craved, that day she wanted him to continue.

“Pet, the training require sacrifices, you know that? You simply aren’t eating enough. True, you could qualify for the minimum but, we don’t want that, do we?”

At that, as much as he could he tried to shake his head from side to side, causing only a slight movement of his head, as his fat jiggled all over him.

“So, Pet, from now, we will start with the tube feeding all day long. I’ll make sure you go over the minimum requirements, passing their check with flying colors.

Trust in me, Pet.

Can you do that?”

“Yhe…hesshh…Mhish…thr…heessh…”

Sergio could only barely spoke nowadays, his throat, his vocal cords, so entangled with fat and so weighted down by his massive size that he could only spit out parts of single words, intertwined by huge gulps of air.
Susan couldn’t be prouder of her massive pet, for trusting her so much and for accepting whatever she wished out of him.

Not that he could do anything if he wanted to refuse…

With the feeding tube in place, his growth started anew. Although slowly, she could see every few hours that more and more space in the room began to be filled with Sergio’s mass. He truly was becoming a titanic mass of wobbly, squishy, fat.

‘Nothing…’ she thought with a smile on her lips ’Nothing could make me happier than seeing this…’

A couple of hours later, as she had been entranced in watching Sergio grow wider and higher inside the room, she was awakened from her reverie by hearing a strange creaking sound. At first, she was worried it may have come from her pet and, hurriedly, she moved at his side, trying to hear it again but, as she turned around hearing it again she realized it wasn’t her over-fattened pet creating that sound…but the same walls that were trying desperately to contain him within the room.

As an even bigger smile erupted on her face, she hurriedly ran outside the room and, walking around the walls she soon found a crack in the wall. It was a small one for now, but she could see and feel the pressure applied there by Sergio’s growing body against the thick concrete walls.

‘He has to grow bigger…He has to!
My dream will come true! He shall become the biggest man on the world…So big that no building will be able to contain him!’

Returning inside she simply jumped against the growing walls of flesh that was Sergio’s side belly, feeling its’ squishy softness lessening as it was replaced by the hard and taut feeling of being over-filled with food.

“Keep growing Sergio…Keep growing my pet…Do it for me!

Break the walls that surround you! Crush anything in your path!
Become the absolute mountain of jiggly, unmoving, fat you’re shaping yourself into!

Don’t ever stop!”

As those words left her mouth she hurriedly covered her lips with one hand.

Had she really said that? Did Sergio heard her?

Worried about losing the trusty, ever hungry, pet she had changed him into, she moved her stare toward his funnel like sets of chins, wondering if he had truly heard her…

1241312.content:
James kin was sitting at his desk looking over player reports he had just been made manger of a club but what the board didn't know was that he was apart of Cult of cannibal mangers who would each pick a player from what ever club they were manging at the time and fatten that player up and gather for a grand feast once a year.
