124221111.title: A week later

1242211113.content:
Jaxon had tried with all his might to avoid eating the pie he had been presented with, after seeing what had happened to his colleague Tom Boston. Yet, the Shaman was ruthless in forcing him and so, by keeping his nose closed, the shaman managed to shove a few pieces of it into his mouth, forcing him to swallow, or choke. Although horrified by the situation Jaxon could do nothing more than swallow down piece after piece of the Tom Pie.
He felt awful.
From one side because he knew that he was eating his colleague, but also because, as much as he tried not to show it, he was loving the taste of the pie. Still, between a gap when his mouth was open, but no piece of pie was coming in, he managed to take a long breather and then closed his mouth shut. The shaman was perturbed. With a scowl he let go of the kid nose, letting him to breath spasmodically from it, his mouth firmly closed.
“Now, Boy, hear me well…You’re going to finish that pie. Either you like it or not.”

It was then that the Shaman grinned toward him evilly.
Jaxon, still fighting his internal battle, had to gulp down hardly when he saw the stare that that shaman guy was giving him. He wanted to ask them what they were going to do but, he didn’t want to risk it by opening his mouth. Suddenly though, as he felt someone grabbing him from behind, he couldn’t refrain himself from opening his mouth letting out a shrill of surprise and that was all the shaman had been waiting for.

With a quick move, the shaman, moved closer to the kid and with force shoved a slice of the Tom pie into his mouth, keeping then his hand against the boy’s mouth to prevent him to spit it out. Jaxon, so surprised that he couldn’t do anything, found his taste buds suddenly overwhelmed by the delicious taste of the pie and before he could think of doing anything, he found himself swallowing the piece. Breathless, he tried to recover but the shaman before him didn’t had any pity for his state. In a rapid succession the tribesman began shoving slice after slice of pie on Jaxon, barely giving him any rest, forcing him to succumb to the sinful taste of the baked treat.
Jaxon’s mouth soon was covered by fragments of the pie that, due to the forceful nature of the shaman, left him in a pitiful state. His eyes were glazed over, lost in a sea of shame and sinful pleasure, his entire form slumped on the chair was kept up only by the ropes tightly coiled around him.
Yet he was jolted awake when the shaman moved closer to him, his face mere inches away from Jaxon as the tribesman began licking the pie’s filling off the boy face with a grinning smile.
“You taste good, Boy. I wonder how we should prepare you…but there is still more to come before we reach that point. Still, you cleaned out the pie…must admit you did a good job but, it isn’t over…”
After a few more licks at Jaxon face, the shaman moved back, revealing what was standing behind him. Jaxon was still trying to recover both from the forceful feeding and from the shaman advances. Still, although in a sorrowful state, he managed to glance behind the tribesman and his eyes stared wide open at what was in store for him. Behind the cannibal, in fact, there were already some servants carrying plates of food toward him. With a fear filled swallow, Jaxon tried to get away from what was coming toward him, but the shaman swiftly grabbed him by his hair and forced him to remain still.
“Now, now, Boy. You’re gonna eat…and you’re gonna like it. Our Tribe has made lots of sacrifices to prepare this banquet…you will enjoy it.”

Before Jaxon could put up any resistance, a serving guard moved forward carrying a tray with a pot of boar ribs, cooked in a red sauced stew, and a few forms of banana bread, until he kneeled beside the shaman keeping the pot high. The leader then grabbed some of the bread and, using it as a spoon moved it closer to the boy’s mouth.
“Eat it, Boy. You know you want it…you know you need it…”

Jaxon tried weakly to refuse, to close his mouth but, once more, the leader just closed his nose with one hand and shoved the morsel into the kid mouth with the other, smearing his face with stew and crumbs of bread. Jaxon could do nothing to defend himself, as he found his tongue beginning to burn due to how hot the stew was, and yet, the taste was overwhelming him again. Still, choosing between choking and swallowing he had to choose the latter. As soon as the morsel was traveling down his throat a new morsel was pushed against his lips, dirtying his face even more.
“Resistance is futile…enjoy the meal, Boy. There is nothing you can do to stop me.”

Choking a bit due to the forceful feeding, Jaxon soon found himself lost in a loop, a piece of that sweet bread sponged with boar stew filling his mouth, burning his tongue and inner cheeks, forcing him to swallow it, choking on it a bit, only to be replaced by another and another still. And yet, when he tried to fight back, the shaman would shamelessly grab his nose, cutting him out of breathing, as if enjoying the pitiful attempt of resistance. As some time passed, Jaxon found himself breathless, his face covered in a layer of boar stew, dripping slowly on his clothes, his mouth bloated by the last morsel he still had in his mouth, looking desperately toward the shaman. Begging him to give him time to breath.
“Don’t fight back, Boy. Submit and everything will go smoother…”

Jaxon could see the truth behind the shaman words, he could see that the guy was enjoying all of his attempts of fighting back and realized that there would be only pain if he kept at it. With a stifled burp, as he swallowed the last morsel, red trails of stew still dripping on his chin, Jaxon breathed freely a couple of time before opening his mouth in a submissive acceptance of the treatment.
The Tribesman grinned in seeing the boy capitulate, as he motioned to some of his guards to bring forward the next dish. As the guards moved forward, the leader closed the distance with Jaxon, grabbing his bloating belly, caressing it and swatting it with his hands, enjoying the bouncing out of it.
“You growing good, Boy. Keep eating, the feast isn’t over yet…”

Jaxon grimaced in pain as the guy smacked his packed stomach, and yet he didn’t reply, he kept his submissive stance, recovering as much as he could until a new platter was brought forward, right under his nose. This time it was a small animal cooked in the oven with a greasy sauce covering it and a few sliced oranges like fruit atop of it.
“This, my boy, is a delicacy of my people. It’s an armadillo cooked in its own shell, with a few sliced Cocona slices to add a little lemony taste to it.” As the shaman said that he grabbed a few slices of the little slimy meat and brought it toward Jaxon open mouth, placing it inside gently. The kid could do nothing but enjoy the slight tangy taste, although the meat practically melted on his tongue. After tasting the morsel for a bit, he swallowed but, the tribesman found this process to be going way too slowly and so began to shove the following cuts of meat faster and faster. Jaxon couldn’t fight back, he had learned that by fighting he would only endanger himself and so tried his best to keep the pace of his feeder although, when his mouth was full, the slimy sauce began to drip out from his lips, smearing his chin even more.

As the shaman passed the feeding duty to one of his guards, he concentrated on teasing the poor boy. He started by raising his shirt up, causing the boy to stop for a moment, before being forcefully reprimanded to keep going. As the bloating belly was in front of the shaman, this one began to lick it enjoying the salty, slightly sweaty, taste of it. Giving it a few more lick and a couple of teasing bites, the shaman turned his stare on the boy, enjoying his suffering stance as he kept messily chew the slimy meats forced within his lips.

“You’re doing good, Kid. You taste real good and with all this stuffing inside of you…I know you’ll taste way better, soon. No, no…don’t speak…” As the leader said that, he placed one of his hands on the boy’s lips, preventing him to spill anything inside of it, releasing him only when the boy mouth was empty.

“E….Enough…*urp*…please….you’ve…gotta…stop!”

The shaman raised his hand, stopping his servants from delivering the next slices to the boy, watching closely how the kid was doing. With a manic grin he realized that the boy was coming along pretty nicely. His belly had bloated up quite a bit already, pushing out from his torso still tightly roped to the chair where he was forced to, straining against the hem of his pants, the button almost ready to pop away.
“You’ve done good. You going to be great, Boy. You taste right good…just need some more seasoning…I will make sure you ready soon.”

“What…you…mean?” Jaxon, tired and confused, was valiantly trying to stay awake. All those delicious cuts of meat, the boar stew and the pie he had eaten was weighing quite heavily on him.

“What do you think I mean, boy? Why do you think we are giving you all these delicious meals? Why do you think we made you eat the Tom Pie?”

“You…want…me…bigger…?”

“Sure. But why do we want that?... Cause you’re going to join us at the Tribe’s dinner. And you shall be on the menu, Boy. You’re going to be so tasty when everything is done. Soon, Boy… Let out Tribe thrive through your sacrifice!”

“No…You…You can’t mean that…I’ve done what you told me to…I’ve…”

“Enough! You may rest for a bit, now. Soon though, the oven shall be welcoming you. Not yet though…
I’ll try to teach you to be grateful to the treatment you’ve received. Pigs like you can only have one fate…And I bet you’ll look so good with an apple stuffed into your mouth…”

12422233333233232233222.title: Angelina Jolie

choices: Joao Kingstone (Deceit, lies and weight gain)
124222333332332322332221.content:
Angelina Jolie was sitting in her couch, enjoying a break from her latest movie in her mansion in Los Angeles. She had been so focused on her career that she had a nearly mental breakdown and, with her husband away filming a movie in New Zealand, she had needed to just rest somewhere while doing absolutely nothing.

And still, even though she had warned her collaborators of her break, people kept calling and disturbing her relentlessly.

All of this could not go on.

“…Therefore, I was calling, Frank. I can’t go on like this. You’re my manager, what do you suggest?”

“Well, Angie. The answer is easy. Hire a personal assistant to take care of this load from you. If you want, I know someone who could fill this spot easily…or, as I know you like to do charity for the third world countries, I’ve heard of a new agency born in west Africa.

Congo, I believe.

I heard around that they’re good and trying to get their name known worldwide. Anyway, give me five and I’ll send you both the CV’s of my contacts and the agency internet site so you can check and decide.”

Angelina mulled it over for a couple of hours, she quickly scanned the CV of the person forwarded by her Manager, but she was fascinated by the idea of helping out to an African agency.

In the end she went and checked their site and remained very surprised in finding out how professional and prepared they seemed to be. As she scanned their site, she saw exactly how the process would start.
She was to provide details on the job and the location, then the agency would forward a selection of their employees selected exactly to her specification, for her to choose which one she would prefer.

Finding herself getting excited she quickly filled out the requester form, providing as much information as she could, finding herself quite surprised when a chat-box opened informing her than an operator was going to contact her right away.

“Good Morning Miss Jolie. I’m Joao Cumbu, your referral for the purpose of hiring one of ours employees.”

Gingerly, Angelina began typing away on her keyboard.

“Good Morning Mr. Cumbu. I actually wasn’t expecting such an immediate response.”

“Miss, it’s our pledge to be of service to those who are in need, especially considering your case. With how much you’ve done for our countries how could we not give you our best?
No, Miss, it’s an honor to serve.”

As the discussion progressed, Angelina began to have a better understanding on how things were going to work out and, a few minutes later, she was already checking the CV’s they had sent to her.

First one was a middle-aged man, named Felipe Mbutu. He seemed to be quite a big guy, almost seven feet tall with a quite impressive amount of muscles on his body. He was supposed to be able to speak three languages, including English and French, and apparently was a masterful Chef with a degree taken in an institute in France.

Second one was also a male, quite young-ish. From his picture, Joao Kingstone, seemed quite the sly guy. While not as broad as the one before him he still seemed to be quite toned. Also, he was able to speak three languages, including English and Portuguese, and while he was able to cook, he wasn’t a real chef. But he had under his special characteristics section marked himself as a fitness therapist.

Last one was a girl, Felicia Joao Macunda. She appeared like a thirty-something, bubbly, little thing, staring at the camera with a happy smile on her face. As the other two she also was an expert in the latest software and had mastered the English language, but she also had remarkably good organizational and household’s managerial skills.

As Angelina checked their CV’s her eyes fell once more on the list of names provided to her by her Manager, wondering if she should try with this agency or if maybe could be better to ask Frank to find someone capable.

Meanwhile, in the Headquarters of the Agency Angelina was in contact with, Joao Cumbu was giving the news to his staff members, with a smile plastered to his face.

“Good News everyone! We may have a new Client that will bring fame and fortune to our Tribe and Company!
As of now, the world-renowned actress Angelina Jolie is taking into consideration to hire some of our brightest to help her as personal assistant. Now, it was decided that three of you had to be chosen as candidates and, while it was difficult, the Elders reached a decision…”

As all the employees stood from their chairs, turned toward their Manager and Tribe Leader, a total silence fell into the room, until it was broken by Cumbu who announced the three chosen.

“Felipe Mbutu! As a Shaman for our tribe you are the most competent in the culinary skills, so if she chooses to have you, it will be your duty to fatten her up to epic proportion so to let our Tribe able to feast on her bounties for months!

Joao Kingstone! As our Lead Hunter who better than you to feign innocence and get her to do whatever you wish? And don’t worry about food. America is one of the most fattening places on earth, all considered.

Last, but not the least, our beloved Felicia Macunda!
You, have always acted as our bait to lure the foolish into our hands, letting them feel comfortable around you as you fed them to immobility and beyond. Do the Teeth Gnasher Tribe proud, child, and bring back to us enough Angelina to have an endless feast!”


Angelina then decided to hire…
124222333332332322332221.title: Cannibal Personal Assistant

1242223333323323223322211.content:
A few weeks later, after all documents had been processed, Felipe finally reached his destination, entering through the main gate of Angelina Mansion. He had already been briefed on his duties, both officially and unofficially, all that remained was to meet the employer.

The meeting between them went on cordially, from the start Angelina requested to keep things informal and throughout the day she began pouring on Felipe all the information needed for him to perform his duties. In all that time Felipe made up a show for Angelina, to show her his capabilities leaving her impressed regarding her new hired assistant.

“Wow, Felipe. You sure are something else. You’ve done a terrific job today. I’m really glad you’ve come.”

“It’s a pleasure to serve one such as you. You’ve helped my people a lot in the past, it feels right to help you back. On this note, I was wondering if I could prepare you dinner? Just to show you how much I appreciate working here for you.”

Angelina, feeling rather embarrassed, couldn’t do much more than nod, and so as she remained sprawled on the couch, watching her television, Felipe was busying himself around the kitchen.

“So, what’s going to be on the menu, tonight?”

“Oh, Miss. I’m going to show you a taste of Africa!”

‘Oh yes. You’ll see Angelina. Not for nothing I’m the shaman of my tribe. Nobody knows as much as me about herbs and spices. I’ll make you a meal that will place you right where I want you to be.’



Later, we find Angelina asleep on her couch while the television keeps on babbling about. She’s enjoying the peaceful rest and, somewhat ruefully, she wakes up hearing the voice of her assistant calling to her.

“Miss? Miss, dinner’s ready. Miss…?”

“Hmm...What time is it? Oh, Felipe? It’s already time for dinner? You should have woken me up.”

“Miss was sleeping so peacefully; I couldn’t force myself to wake her up before everything was ready.”

Slowly she rose from the couch and walked toward the dining room, but upon entering the room she stood on the doorway speechless. On the table there wasn’t, literally, an inch of free space that wasn’t occupied by some plate or dish prepared by her assistant.

“Wow…F-Felipe? Did you invite an army for dinner? That is way too much food only for me.”

“Well, I actually didn’t mean to prepare this much but, I wanted to thank you for the chance you’re giving me.”

Still smiling, appreciating the gesture, the actress sat at the table, inviting her assistant to join her, as she still looked dumbfounded at the quantity of food spread out on the table.

“Uhm…From which dish we should start?”

“Oh, let me, Miss. Here, this is a typical stew from the ancestors of the south of Africa. It is prepared with various cuts of meat, potatoes, onions and some banana’s peels…”

As Felipe kept going in describing the recipe, he also poured a substantial amount in Angelina’s plate, adding in the end a bit of spice he had with himself, making sure that the actress wasn’t watching.

As Angelina tried the stew her expression changed. A smile a mile wide appeared on her face, as she began to consume eagerly the stew, feeling as it spread a pleasurable heat within her body. Even though it wasn’t a small portion, the actress polished it off in a matter of minutes as she began to let her hungry star wander around the table.

“Here, you could try some of this…”

He said moving a plate with a perfectly cooked steak and some roasted onions toward the actress.

“This one has been prepared through an old family recipe. After preparing the steak, before placing it on the stove to be cooked, you let it rest a few minutes within some palm trees bark, letting the aroma from the tree bark to flow into the meat…”

For the following hour Angelina found herself unable to stop eating. Everything tasted so good that she couldn’t stop, even if she wanted to. Still, even though lots of food was still on the table, as soon as Felipe judged that the actress was nearly full, he intervened and stopped her.

“Miss? Is getting late…Since tomorrow will be a busy day wouldn’t be best if…”

The actress stopped herself just as she was grabbing some more bread buns from the table and, gulping down her bite, she let out a small giggle.

“You’re right, Felipe. Still, all my compliments. Everything was perfect. If it isn’t too much trouble, would you mind…?”

The shaman grinned wickedly as he nodded to the request.

“But of course, Miss. It will be my pleasure to prepare all of your meals if that is your wish...”

“Yeah…everything tasted divine…If I weren’t so full, I may still have something else…”

The shaman smiled inwardly, thinking back to the spice he had used. It was a rare combination of herbs that in the tribe was often used to help their meals to willingly fatten themselves up. Not only was it odorless and tasteless, but it was highly addictive, and it also acted as a slight hunger enhancement.

Felipe chuckled within himself as he saw Angelina Jolie walk away from the dining room cradling her stuffed belly, and he couldn't stop himself from imagining how would she look like a few months in the future if he could manage to plan all of her meals and daily activities.
1242223333323323223322211.title: A masterful Shaman Chef

choices: Glutton Tea, prone to eat more and being hungry more often
Digestive Tea, forcing her body to gain weight faster
Soothing Tea, keeping things quiet for now
12422233333233232233222111.content:
Felipe first day started quite early, as he began following Angelina around, informing her and taking notes every time a change of plan or a new business meeting appeared.

As the morning progressed Felipe had several calls, following with all the persons who wanted to submit a request for Angelina to take in consideration.

Felipe took notices of them all, making sure to clarify that from that point on all communications had to pass through him, otherwise would be immediately rejected. As he kept updating his own appointment calendar, he already began to sort out those offer he was going to downplay and those he wanted to have Angelina take in consideration.

As he was sorting them out, he noticed a missed appointment from the last month and decided to investigate upon it. Quickly he found out it was a meeting request coming from a consortium made of the major Fast Food Companies trying to hire Angelina as a spokesperson.

Immediately Felipe saw an opportunity and began taking steps to correct the situation, as he called the number used as reference.

“Hello, I’m Felipe Mbutu, Miss Jolie Personal Assistant. As I was checking through her schedule, I noticed an invitation to a meeting bearing this number. Could I have some more information, for I believe there has been some miscommunication issue in this regard.

…Uh-uh…Oh, I see. Yes, there must have been some misunderstanding from my predecessor part. No, no, I’m sure Miss Jolie will be quite interested in this proposition, especially if some of the points indicated in the circular here are placed under a major focus.

Uh-uh…Yes…Yes, that’s exactly what I mean. Correct, also, if I may be so bold, I would suppose there could be some more incentives included for Miss Jolie. No, nothing as petty as more money but, maybe, something that could also be…let’s call it ‘free publicity’ for your employers Companies as well.

Yes, exactly. I see we understand each other.


No, no compensation is needed, nor wanted, on my part. I’m just trying to perform my job in giving the most lucrative while most relaxing opportunities to my employer. Yes, I shall inform her the soonest. Have a nice day, will call you back.”

As Felipe hung up a new plan was hatching in his mind, one that would help him speed up the growth of Miss Jolie under his care. In addition to that, as they stopped for lunch, he didn’t have to pry too much in having Angelina decide to have lunch at McDonald. And that alone was a small, victory for his plans as he wanted to start promoting the job offer, he had discovered only that morning.

As they entered in the McDonald, they both sat at a booth, ordering up as per their own tastes. Felipe ordering a medium sized meal, while Angelina decided on a very small meal consisting mostly of a Caesar salad. As they slowly ate Felipe decided to broach the matter of the new job offer.

“Miss Angelina, as I was checking your appointments to fit in your weekly schedule I noticed a job proposal coming from a Consortium of Fast Food dealers.”

“Mmph…Not so fond of those. Still, it can’t hurt to hear.”

“Well, their offer surely has to be checked in detail but, as far as they anticipated they were asking for your presence to join in a few commercials for some of their affiliates. Apparently it won’t be a long job but it should bring good profits….”

“Not inter…”

“Also, they were talking about some fund raising to improve sensibility toward third country nations.”

“Mmh…that is new. Did they say anything else?”

As she asked for more info, she didn’t realize Felipe had moved his fries toward her and was watching with glee as she begun eating them one by one.

“Actually they mentioned quite the offer but, before proceeding with any details I thought it was best to have your confirmation. Also, comparing this offer to other, while less popular, it surely seems less tiring and more adapt to a more conservative plan long term.”

“Well, it’s true I wanted to have a break from all activities, but it also is true that I can’t completely go sitting on laurels.
Alright, take contact with their representative and start the discussion with them, be sure that they’ll have to proceed with that fund raising and be aware that I won’t work for less than…”

As the day progressed, more and more snacks passed from Felipe’s hand to Angelina’s stomach, without her recognizing how much she was eating.

Although, when they returned to the mansion, Angelina did notice that she appeared to be somewhat bloated. Fortunately, she dismissed the thought as she decided for a quick shower before going to the gym for her daily exercises.

Felipe, although sorry of seeing her burn all those calories he had forced onto her during the day, didn’t do anything to prevent her, knowing full well that in a few weeks her schedule was going to change completely. After-all, he now had to contact the Fast Food Consortium and had to use all of his negotiation skills to obtain as much as he could, while having Miss Jolie do the less work as possible.

Later that evening, Angelina emerged from her shower after a long workout session in her private gym, as she dressed in a pair of short shorts and a t-shirt she moved toward the dining room where she found Felipe applying the finishing touches to the table already covered with a few platters from which a delicious aroma emerged.

“Felipe, I can’t thank you enough. Not only you’re taking care of my schedule but you also are cooking for me.”

“It is a pleasure, Miss. Now, sit and enjoy, I will gladly serve you dinner, as I will tell you what job offers I have received today for you.”

As they sat, Angelina soon fell prey once more to the delicate, and yet delicious, plates that he had prepared for her. As good as they were she found herself enthralled with them, taking no notice of how much she was actually eating. Also, she was only half hearing as he talked to her about the various job offering, letting him decide which he thought would be best for her. As dinner was reaching the end and only dessert remained, he decided to make his move toward the only offer he thought was best for her.

“…and so, Miss Angelina, there is the offer from the Consortium we received this morning. In the afternoon I went in detail on their offer and tried to get as much as possible without appearing grabby. In the end, we agreed on a certain set of conditions which are already into the draft of contract I will give you, all toward having you to be their spokesperson for twenty-four months, while having to do no less than three short commercials and a few photoshoots for them in the span of two years.

I’ve agreed on these terms considering your desire to keep yourself active, while having also time for your own relax.”

Angelina, her mind clouded with food, nodded slowly as she happily dug in the pie slice Felipe had given her while talking. But even though she was engrossed in her dessert she had to admit to herself that he had done a really good job.

Afterall, it was her directive to have a less tiring role in the foreseeable future and so this job offering seemed good enough.

“What about…*gulp*…the fund raising?”

“About that. It took a while but I managed to have it confirmed and also, if you’re ok with it, I managed to fit something else in it too. Basically, for every product you, or yours, will be purchasing from the affiliates of the Consortium, an amount calculated on a certain percentage will be included in the fund raising so to increase its actual value exponentially, while your own expenses will be covered by the Consortium itself.”

“So…*munch*…If I understood correctly, I buy from them with their money, and they will increase the fund raiser by a fixed amount? That is great. Although I don’t know if I would have to buy so much from them.”

“But even a small amount would be beneficial to the fund. Plus, just think of how much the fund itself could grow with your free contributions…”

Angelina, having finished the slice, began to tiredly nodding to the proposal, giving her written confirmation to the contract by signing it as she began to rise from the table cradling her, once more, stuffed belly.

At Felipe question if she wanted to review it herself she simply answered that with the excellent job he had done she was sure there was nothing to re-check. Saying her good night to him she began walking toward her bedroom, when she was stopped by him.

“Miss? I’ve noticed that you may feel quite…bloated. If you need I can prepare you an herbal tea that will solve that issue?”

“Thanks Felipe. That would be a godsend.”

“I will come right away then.”

As Felipe prepared the tea, he had only to decide which effect he wanted to achieve with it. He could prepare a Tea that would slow down her metabolism, making her sluggish and more prone to laziness, or maybe he could mix a few spices and herbs and have her hunger grow steadily stronger as well as enabling her to eat more and more in one sitting. Or maybe he could prepare a drink that would make her body more receptive toward fat, making her gain weight way more easily. Or, to play it safe, he could simply make her a soothing tea to help her feeling better.
So many choices…
12422233333233232233222111.title: First day on the job

choices: I’ll just have a few bites….
Better go change and feel better
Maybe I should go for a workout
Why worry? I’ll just have some more snacks before dinner
124222333332332322332221112.content:
In the end, Felipe prepared an herbal Tea that, while soothing her stomach pain, would mainly strengthen her hunger, as well as forcing her own body to accommodate more food with each, and every, cup of it she was going to consume. As Angelina went to sleep, with the herbal Tea in her belly, she quickly fell asleep feeling better already, unaware that her own body chemistry was going to change severely in the next few days.

As the days passed, a routine began to establish itself in Angelina’s Mansion.
From morning to evening, she and Felipe would go through their daily appointments. With him checking and screening them from her eyes, making sure that the following weeks and months were as work free as possible, while Angelina began to rest more and more, enjoying the break in her life. However, as she rested all day long, taking a liking to Felipe’s Tea, she didn’t seem to notice that her meals and her snacking sessions kept increasing both in frequency and size.

After a few days of this trend, as lunchtime approached, she stopped Felipe from making one of his meals, asking him a favor instead.

“Felipe, I’m feeling quite puckish today, could you please order me something from one of the affiliate from the Consortium? This way I get also to increase the fund raising, won’t I?”

“But of course, Miss. So, what should I order?”

“I don’t exactly know…How about a…no; make it two medium sized Big Whooper meals. With fries and soda.

As for dessert…mmh…could you prepare me some of those brownies you made a few days ago? They were really yummy.”

“But of course, Miss. Also, don’t forget to have your tea before Lunch, so to increase the soothing effect.”

“Wouldn’t dream to forget it. Since I started drinking your Tea, it seems I haven’t had any other stomach pain. Thanks Felipe.”

As Angelina returned to her break on her couch, Felipe quickly went into the kitchen heating up a few platter of his famed chocolate brownies, made from extra chocolate with the addition of being extremely addictive. As the brownies were heating up, he also ordered the requested food except, he didn’t order medium sized as it was requested.

“Yes, and please, could you supersize it all? Why, thank you very much.”

Felipe wasn’t taking any chances.

Now that most of her appointments were over, by having most of them screened out through Angelina’s food addled decisions, he could focus on having Angelina start relaxing more and more. Sure, he couldn’t yet go all out on her since she still had to have a presentable figure to show for the McDonald commercials. But if he managed to train her to eat more, to stop exercising and to avoid detecting her own gains, he would be in a very good position to have her reach the first milestone of five hundred pounds.

It was still a long way away but he could do it.
He was certain of it.

As he began to take out the first two platter of twenty-four brownies from the oven, he heard the doorbell ringing. Knowing it had to be the delivery guy he swiftly went to door and collected the goods from the guy, quickly bringing them to Angelina which accepted the load without any fuss, focused as she was on the soap opera on screen.

Felipe stood motionless, watching as she gave the first bite to the big hamburger, chewing it slowly, as a low moan of satisfaction escaped her.

“God…I so needed this…I swear, I must be working out too much. I’m always craving food…gotta have to slow down a bit from now on.”

As Felipe heard that, he felt like he was going to heaven.

First, thing first, though. He had to bring her the brownies and had to organize as soon as possible the commercial shoot, so after that he could completely focus on fattening her.

As he returned to Angelina he almost gasped in delight in seeing her chewing fries by the handful, as her belly began to stick out from under the tight t-shirt she was wearing, and yet she kept shoveling those oily treats into her mouth, as she kept watching the tv show. As he saw this, Felipe, went and called his contact from the Consortium, hastily reserving a spot for Angelina the following day to take the commercial.

The following day, the two of them spent the entire morning and most of the afternoon at the designated location for Angelina’s commercial of McDonald and their food. Due to the urgency of the request, they barely stopped for lunch but also this worked as an advantage for Felipe’s plan.

For as soon as they were back at the mansion, as Angelina was feeling starving, she didn’t comment on having Felipe preparing her dinner while also ordering out some Chinese takeout. As he prepared a plentiful dinner, he listened attentively to the sound coming from the TV room where Angelina was now parked watching her favorite show, while scarfing down some Chinese food. As soon as he heard her stop, he quickly moved to her side, enjoying the view of the beached Angelina.

She was laying on her couch, more asleep than awake, as she unconsciously caressed her taut stomach, which seemed to be glowing under the lights coming from the TV. Felipe almost shrieked in joy as he realized that his Mistress was laying there with her shorts unbuttoned as her belly requested more room that she had available.

“Miss? Miss, everything ok?”

Angelina, still half asleep murmured contently as she heard his voice.

“Yeah…just resting a bit…feel so tired…worked too much today…”

Felipe knew that apart from a few lines said in the commercial and a few photos taken she hadn’t done that much but, why he should have pointed it out?

“I know Miss but, see it this way. Now the next event you’re requested to participate in will be in a month. You’ll have plenty of time to recover.”

“Mmmh…good.
Felipe? When dinner will be ready?”

“Probably an hour or so. Do you need anything?”

“Well…I should go for a workout but I feel so drained, so tired…do you have anything that could ‘pick me up’?”

The man smiled widely as he bowed slightly, she had just eaten a small sized Chinese dinner and yet she was asking for something more. It was a good opportunity to test the capacity of her stomach after she had used it for almost two weeks.

“I could prepare you a bit of a Health shake, to give you a small boost of energy, if you desire?”

“Please, Felipe, do it.”

A few minutes later the man returned to Angelina, bringing with him a pitcher full of a dense pink shake, leaving it near his Mistress, with a straw emerging from it so she could simply drink it without having to move an inch. As he saw Angelina began drinking from it, smiling as she did, he couldn’t refrain from thinking back at what was inside the ‘Health Shake’.

‘Heavy cream, sugar, powdered vanilla, six spoonsful of a bulk-up powder and a pinch of my herbal hunger mix. I wonder if she will be able to finish it and have dinner also…’


Angelina felt like she was in heaven.

As she drank the energy shake Felipe had prepared for her, she felt a soothing heat spreading throughout her body. Still laying on her couch she drank fervently the shake, enjoying the taste of it, without noticing that her belly began to poke more and more from under her t-shirt.

She lay there, mesmerized by the TV show, suddenly waking up when she heard the sound from her straw as it scraped against the now empty pitcher bottom. Stifling a burp, she rose from the couch, feeling her pants a little snug against her body as she did so.

But she didn’t connect that feeling to all the food she had consumed.

As much as she could recollect from her, so tiring, day she hadn’t eaten all that much.

‘Probably it just shrank in the washing machine.’

Still, she didn’t want to be seen in a tight-fitting pants, even though she was in the privacy of her own home. But, as she entered the hallway, she smelled the delicious aromas coming from the kitchen and was torn between the desire of going in there to have a bit of appetizer and the need to go change herself in more comfortable clothes.

What was the best thing to do?
124222333332332322332221112.title: Wishing for a Hungrier Jolie

choices: The Food Network (emphasis on eating more calorie-heavy foods)
Sport channel (convincing her to be training harder than she is)
1242223333323323223322211122.content:
Angelina in the end decided it was better to change her attire, as she wanted to feel more comfortable before going to dinner. As soon as she was in her room, she quickly stripped off her clothes, although she found some difficulty in taking off her t-shirt and for a moment, she stood in front of her mirror looking at herself.

She noticed that her abs seemed less definite, while her body overall seemed slightly thicker than she used to remember but, in the end, she dismissed such thoughts. Her belly was just bloated, and she probably was too tired to be able to see such slight differences.

Not once, she thought back to all those junk food meals and snacks she had in the previous days, or about the long dinners Felipe had prepared for her.

Everything simply was dismissed from her mind as she just grabbed a pair of somewhat larger sweatpants and roomy sweatshirt, putting them on.

Feeling now comfortable, she left her room and went to the dining room.

As she crossed the hallway, smelling the aromas coming from the dining room, she felt her belly grumble in anticipation and so she moved a little bit faster, arriving just in time to see Felipe placing a dessert plate on the table, motioning her to take a seat.

“Miss, since you’ve had such a hard day, I prepared a slightly more filling dinner. I hope you enjoy it.”

“Oh, Felipe, thanks.”

“Also, If you don’t mind…Now that your weekly schedule is more malleable, I was thinking if you would like for me to plan your daily activities, so to match the rest you so much desire?”

Angelina, as she filled her plate with a couple of portions from the pan of lasagna he had prepared, simply nodded starting to wolf down the heavy and rich dish, moaning in pleasure at the amazing taste exploding in her mouth.

“Mmph…*gulp*…oh yeah, Felipe. Please to do that. This way I will be able to rest completely at peace.”

“Good, Miss. Will start working on it right this evening and will try to bring it to you tomorrow morning.
How is the lasagna?”

“Oh, it’s perfect. Such a taste…No wonder you’re a masterful chef.”

“Oh, thanks Miss. But try also the veal, I prepared this sauce to go along with it that should have made the meat to almost melt in your mouth…”

As the meal progressed, Felipe was happy to verify that Angelina’s consumptions had increased greatly. Even though she had already eaten a small dinner and a large pitcher of heavy cream shake, she also ate most of what he had prepared for her for dinner.

Yet Angelina kept on eating, bite after bite, morsel after morsel, without noticing how her own belly was bloating up from all the food she was scarfing down.
Sure, it was hidden within the sweatshirt but, still he could see the faint outline of it as it grew with every portion she consumed. Alas, although her hunger had been strengthened in the past weeks, she eventually reached the point of fullness as she had just scarfed down a third helping of dessert.

“Oof…*urp*…ohh…that was…so good, Felipe. I’ve never been so content in my life.”

“I’m pleased to hear it Miss. Could I offer you something else?”

“No…No, I’m good.”

“Not even some chocolate cookies to have as a small snack to go along with your after-dinner tea?”

“I really shouldn’t…oh, alright. But just a small plate.”

Felipe smiled, as he handed her the 1-liter bottle of his herbal tea, along with a bowl chocked full of chocolate cookies, which he had prepared personally, adding way more butter to the batter than needed. And he smiled even more as he saw Angelina take the bowl without a fuss regarding the size of it.

Now that he had her all for himself, he was surely going to let her grow as much as possible.

Angelina, from her side, went directly to bed; snuggling under the cover as she started the plasma screen TV she had mounted on the wall. As she did some zapping, she began chugging down the tea she had started to love, feeling it soothing her overburdened stomach. Yet, after a few minutes, she laid in bed she felt herself compelled in trying a cookie from the bowl Felipe had given to her. As she tasted the first one, she was immediately hooked.

“These are so Good! Goodness, they’re so soft and yet so tasty. Mmmm….”

As she kept eating the cookies, she began unconsciously to caress her bloated belly with her free hand, easing the tightness she was feeling there. And yet, she couldn’t refrain from having more and more.

Only when the bowl was half-full she began to drowsily lay back in her bed, feeling completely sated and satisfied, as she was lulled to sleep by the television that was still on.

As she slept, the television was still on and left on a specific channel that, without her knowledge, was going to influence her through the night.

The channel it was left on was…
1242223333323323223322211122.title: Wanting to be comfier

12422233333233232233222111221.content:
That night, as Angelina slept, the channel she had left on was giving a marathon of all episodes from the series ‘Man Vs Food’ and, unconsciously, as the actress slept so her dreams and her mind were influenced by it.

All night long, she dreamed about finding herself in these strange eating-places, having huge portions of deliciously prepared meals, feeling their taste in her mouth as they filled her belly. And although she dreamt of these massive meals, in her dreams she never gained an ounce. She just ate and ate with reckless abandon.

As morning rolled on, Angelina woke up feeling strangely ravenous.

She remembered about dreaming something spectacular, but she couldn’t put the finger on what it had been so good. Yet, as her belly growled once more, she rose from her bed and began to take off her PJ’s while wearing a spandex outfit that hugged her figure well, while also having a small pre-breakfast with the few handfuls of cookies that had been left in the bowl she had the night before.

As she freshened herself up, she left her room and found Felipe hard at work in the kitchen, while a place at the table was already prepared for her.

“Good Morning Miss, I hope you’ve rested well tonight.”

“Yeah. I had a few good dreams tonight and am feeling refreshed and ready for anything.”

“That’s good to hear. Also, I prepared a little bit of breakfast for you, to start the day in the right swing and your daily schedule, if you want to give it a check?”

Angelina nodded silently as she began reading the schedule while, at the same time, she began eating the breakfast Felipe had prepared her. For starters she assaulted a large bowl chocked full of dense chocolate cream, having spoonful after spoonful to her lips, moaning silently as the taste enveloped her. As she cleaned the bowl, she didn’t stop there, grabbing the nearer plate and revealing a large stack of cluffy pancakes smothered in butter and drowned in syrup. Once more, the taste surrounded her and, without even noticing, she cleared the plate in a record time.

As she kept clearing plate after plate, she also checked the schedule Felipe had prepared her but didn’t see anything wrong with it. Sure, there were a lot of rest times and snack times in it, but as she was distracted by the onslaught of food in front of her, she dismissed the issue, focusing only on what she was eating.

As she finally cleaned her third plate, mostly cookies and some pop-tarts, she burped lightly and looked toward Felipe with a strange glint in her eyes.

“Ehi, Felipe…Could you do me a favor?”

“Sure, Miss. What do you need?”

“Could you prepare, for next time, some slightly bigger portions? I’m feeling still quite hungry…”

“Sure, Miss. So, can I offer you something more? I was just preparing some brownies for later but I can give you some, if you need it…”

Angelina didn’t reply she simply cleaned her mouth and eagerly awaited.

Few minutes later, she was happily eating away at her first dozen of brownies, as the second and third dozen was placed right beside her by an enthusiastic Felipe. As the day progressed, the actress didn’t move from the kitchen table.

She sat there, eating away at whatever concoction Felipe urged onto her, uncaring of her own belly, which began to grow more and more round as food kept being shoveled down.

The actress was in heaven, she wasn’t exactly hungry but, the food was so good she just couldn’t stop shoveling it down her throat.

What was worse was that as much as she wanted to stop, every time Felipe left a new platter beside her she just couldn’t stop herself from having some of it…and then some became all of it.

Plate after plate, she kept eating away all morning long, as breakfast food like pancakes and fried bacon, became snacks like small cakes and pastries, until it almost arrived lunch time and so Felipe began giving her burgers and fries. With an all morning and lunch feast, it is comprehensible to say that by 2 PM, Angelina was at her very own limit.

Stuffed beyond her wildest dream she simply lay there on her chair, a mountain of empty plates surrounding her, and her own belly so big and round that, she could start using it as her own table.

Felipe watched her with pride in his eyes. She had performed so well, all it was needed was a bit of hunger enhancement in her food and she had eaten up to exhaustion. Yet, he couldn’t afford to let her see how much she had really eaten. Therefore, while she slept and digested in her food coma, he quickly cleaned most of her dirty plates, leaving just a couple around her. This way, when she woke up, he could convince her to have been eating only a little.

However, nothing could prepare him to what he was going to hear as soon as she woke up.

Felipe was preparing some more food, just in case she requested something else when Angelina suddenly woke up from her slumber. She tiredly stretched a little bit, feeling some tightness in her clothes but dismissing it as a more powerful desire forced its way through her.

“Felipe? Do you know how much did I exercise today?”

“Err…quite a lot actually. Why?”

“….Mmm…I’m just so hungry… I want...No, I need you to order me some takeout…and could you give me something to tide me over until it arrives? I was thinking Mexican or even Chinese…”

Felipe smiled as he joked, “Why not having both?”

His smile disappeared when the actress smiled drunkenly as she answered “Why not, indeed…”
12422233333233232233222111221.title: Angelina Vs Food marathon

choices: Disaster! No more ingredients for the shake!
Propose a different diet plan to Angie as she’s focused on eating
Angelina notice how larger her belly seems to be getting lately
124222333332332322332221112212.content:
It had been an exhausting week for Felipe.

He didn’t know what happened, his hunger enhancement herbs hadn’t ever caused such an effect, so he was raking his brain for something that could explain the different behavior in Angelina. She had acted as if starving all week long, always eating up to her bursting point. He wanted so bad to feel proud of her but, in truth, he was worried.

If she had grown slowly, she would have had the time to grow accustomed to eating massive meals. But that sudden spike in hunger could very well cause her to realize how big she was getting and disrupt everything he had worked for.

As the time for breakfast rolled in, Felipe began preparing a large sized breakfast for his Mistress, keeping ready seconds in case she was still that hungry. Eventually he heard her footsteps coming from the hallway and greeted her gently as she appeared at the doorway, even though he had faltered a bit.

Angelina surely had grown in her hunger fueled week of feastings.

When Felipe had arrived in the US Angelina was roughly around the 140/150 pounds of nicely distributed weight, but after their first week together and the last week of complete gluttony she seemed to have jumped right up to the 200 pounds range. As she walked toward the kitchen table Felipe could see the muffin top and soon-to-be-gut appearing from over the short shorts she was wearing, as also her sweater shirt failed to cover it from above. Her ass too seemed to have absorbed a lot of damage, growing plushier and wider, and it jiggled slightly at her every step.

“Good Morning Felipe…I feel so tired lately…am also quite hungry for some reason…”

“Well, Miss, You’re working out so harshly in the last few weeks, it’s only natural to feel tired and hungry.
Don’t worry though, I’ve got you covered.”

As Angelina sat, feeling strangely more comfortable on her chair, staring at the spread of food on the table she smiled at her assistant.

“Oh, Felipe…you’re a godsend. Still, if you see me overwork myself remember to stop me…Also that is part of your job. You’ve gotta help me keep track of what I am doing. So, if you see me go away from the weekly schedule, let me know at once.”

Felipe could hardly contain himself, not only she seemed to have returned to normal, but she also told him to stop her if she was over-exerting herself. That was a huge advantage for his quest to have the actress fattening up.

“Will do, Miss. And, if I may, you should start right away with breakfast, otherwise you will be late for you tanning session late this morning.”

Angelina licked her lips as she grabbed a large twinkie from the table, diving it into one of the large shakes in front of her, before chomping on it with gusto.

“I see you start right away. That’s *munch* good Felipe. Mh…Delicious…”

The actress then began mowing down all plates in front of her, clearing out pancakes smothered in butter and syrup, fried bacon strips and even a couple of quite large slices of devil’s food cake.

“*Burp!* Oh, sorry…t’was so good…everything…tasted divine, Felipe…”

“Thanks Miss, I’m happy you enjoyed it. Now, it’s time for you tanning session. I’ll come help you out in two hours…in the meantime, here, have a little shake to give you a boost of energies.”

The actress, even though had just cleaned out enough breakfast food for a family of three, gladly accepted the heavy weight gain shake, as she began drinking from it with gusto. As she made her way toward the tanning room, her ass and hips seemed to swell slightly larger, as well as her belly that was rounding out.

Entering the tanning room Angelina quickly undressed herself and began to lay on the tanning bed, when she noticed that right where the headrest was, there was a strange straw awaiting her. Quickly scanning the room she realized it had to be an innovation from Felipe and, as she sucked a couple of times from it she moaned in pleasure feeling the same shake she had just consumed.

Intrigued she moved closer and noticed a note left on the wall, right above the point from where the ‘straw’ came out of the wall.

‘Miss Angelina,
I’ve prepared a little something should you get tired as you tan yourself.
Enjoy.’

The actress smiled as she, unknowingly, caressed her bloated belly. Still she soon laid on her tanning bed and, straw between her lips, began to enjoy the delicious shake as she lay there. She couldn’t know that all that shake she was drinking down was going to add way more than a few pounds on her body. After half an hour, she already was filling out, as he body worked overspeed to store all the calories it was receiving as fat. Her whole form began to slowly bloat up and fill out, her ass growing larger and more jiggly as time went on.

On the other side of the wall, Felipe worked hard and long to constantly refill the barrel of gain shake from which Angelina was drinking while tanning. It was hard work for him, but he knew it was necessary to let her grow accustomed to having more and more calories pumped in her system until it became the new normal.

And then he could focus on making her even lazier and hungrier, making so that her new normal was going to seem only a pittance of what she needed to keep going.

He had only to keep feeding her as much as he could…
124222333332332322332221112212.title: A week of feasting

choices: Angelina decided to go for a walk around the block
1242223333323323223322211122121.content:
Angelina Jolie began to lose track of time.

As she followed the plan that her assistant prepared for her she soon found herself often spacing out in front of a television screen, either watching some soaps or playing a few games he had suggested her to try. More often than not, during these times, she also had quite a bit to eat. It was easy actually, as she simply sat there watching, listening or playing, she would just grab a handful of candies, or some chocolates left lying around and brought them into her mouth.

The taste soon began to be the only thing she would remember of those sessions.

Her working out time seemed also to be reduced more and more as the weeks passed on. Felipe often chided her for stressing out too much on it, even though she had felt to be doing it only for few minutes. Still, he had hired him just for that and so, when he called her, she stopped what she was doing and resumed the weekly schedule.

Mealtimes instead had seemed to be occupying most of her time.
Longer breakfast, lunches and dinners became soon the usual, and when she got used to them a lot of snacking times seemed to pop up everywhere. Still Angelina could see that everything was having a beneficial effect on her, all things considered. She was surely more relaxed and laid back than ever, she barely cared about what was going on outside her apartment and her working schedule had been equally forgotten.

As Felipe had said to her once, ‘Why worry about a job that is only stress inducing? You have more than enough to live comfortably until the end of times. It is so cruel to just lay back and rest?’

She realized it wasn’t and had to thanks only Felipe for that. Still, there were sometimes situations that seemed to awake her from her relaxing stance. That morning, as example, three weeks after her first tanning session with Felipe’s shake, she had just woken up and rapidly consumed her pre-breakfast fit for five people all by herself. As she swallowed down the last morsel of fried bacon, she began to dress herself, which was becoming a chore lately, for some reason.

She began by sitting on her bed and grabbing the sweatpants that she usually used. These were a bit tight the week before, but she hadn’t really taken notice of it. Sure, she had felt them getting tighter but, since food was often presented to her right after that her concentration slipped and she focused on the tasty morsels presented to her.

Still, that morning she placed first one foot and then the other inside the pants, then she began to lift them up but notice that, right after the knee, the pants did seem to meet some resistance. Thanks to her three weeks of unbridled gluttony, Angelina had gained quite a big amount already, including also the spices used by Felipe to boost even more her own capacity and hunger, it wasn’t hard to see how easily she had gained weight. Still, Angelina, heaved harder and harder trying to fit a pair of pants three sizes too small on her.

Without success.

Bewildered, she did let go the pants and, slowly, managed to stand up on her own. For a moment she looked at herself through a mirror. She noticed that her face seemed less squared and more rounded up, as her arms also seemed fluffier ad with a hint of jiggle in them. Then she looked at her middle, where once she had a definite slim belly, now there was only a large gut protruding forward. Curiously she grabbed the last belly roll and lifted it, noticing that even her undies seemed to have started becoming tighter on her.

Then she turned around and saw her butt.

A smile always appeared on her face when she saw it iggle at her every movement, as if she was admiring a nice plumped ass, and not the huge, fat filled, monstrosity she had. Turning a little bit more, she realized that something seemed to have been placed there and, with a quick manual check she realized it was the herbal tea container shehad thought of having lost from her morning breakfast. Not even for a moment she though f having an ass so large that it was a shelf by it own presence. She simply grabbed it and emptied it i her belly.

Still, she had to dress…or did she? Since nothing seemed to fit, except a large t-shirt she had started using as pajama, due to her maid doing the worst laundry ever, she simply decided to go down into the kitchen as she was. After all, Felipe didn’t seem to mind. As she moved she realized also that by walking normally her thighs began to rub against the other, with a low growl she simply spread her legs apart and began to waddle, without realizing she actually was waddling. As Angelia reached the kitchen she saw Felipe already at work, greeting her and starting with what had become their daily routine.

“Good Morning, Miss.”

“Hi Felipe…”

“Ready to start a new day?”

“Sure!”

As she said that, Felipe motioned her to come over, noticing how she had become to waddle, pointing to a usual spot on the floor where a scale had been placed a few weeks ago. Angelina then would simply walk upon it and Felipe was to warn her for any fluctuation in her weight.

As she stood there, waiting in silence, she couldn’t refrain herself from licking her lips from time to time. After almost a month of constantly snacking it was difficult for her to pass the time without eating anything. Seeing that, Felipe swiftly passed her a pan of freshly made brownies.

“Here, Miss. You might start with this before proceeding with your first breakfast.”

As The once lithe actress gulped down the sweet confectionaries, Felipe checked her weight, smiling widely in seeing her in her almost naked glory. He had no worries about her being able to see the scale, her globular belly was big enough to cover it completely from her point f view. As she kneeled he was happy to mark in his own notepad that she had gained another four pounds since the day before, bringing her to a rather hefty two hundred and eighty six pounds. As he stood up, taking the now empty pan from her hands, he was glad to announce her that she hadn’t loss, nor gained anything.

“…There is a minor fluctuation but we’re talking of grams…so no need to worry about that, Miss.”

Angelina could only smile I appreciation. It had been a condition she had placed before following his schedule and was glad it was working. This way she could see immediately if she was relaxing too much or not. Still, with that taken care she quickly took place at her usual spot, covering two chairs with her own ass, and swiftly tied a rather large napkin at her neck, preparing herself for her first breakfast.

Soon, Felipe, began to provide her with several huge portions of breakfast food, from muffins, to pancakes, from donuts to pies, from slice of cakes to tubs of ice cream. Angelina happily ate at her leisure, feeling the pleasurable weight of all that food in her growing belly. As several plates were being cleared, Felipe gave her the herbal tea she had grown used to drink every time she finished a meal.

She still hadn’t realized that a few minutes after having drank that her hunger returned. Still, as she cleared her twelfth plate of food, she finally laid back, caressing her stomach soothingly feeling it under her fingers quite soft and squishy. After no more than fifteen minutes, as she felt her hunger returning to her, Felipe told her it was time for her second breakfast.

With a smile she began to dig in once more, uncaring toward the fact that her over-sized shirt had become to feel a little bit tight on her.
1242223333323323223322211122121.title: Slow descent into the depths…

choices: Forward unto the late afternoon and evening feasts!
The ignored caller decides to take matters in her own hands
One of the maids stealing food from Angie. Felipe decide to have some fun
Angelina wake up alone and can’t manage to stand. Doubts began to seep into her
12422233333233232233222111221211.content:
For the actress the morning passed away in a constant deluge of treats, but then, with three breakfast meals safely stowed in her bloated gut, she laid back in her chair, feeling finally full. Still, she slowly rose from there and began the slow waddle, made even more slow due to all the food she had consumed, until she reached her next stop for the morning.

The Couch.

Once there she sat down, feeling her bloated idle slap heavily against her thighs and began to watch the soaps to which she had grown addicted to. Felipe had sai that they were a good way to defuse stress but she had never imagined she could actually end loving them to that point. As she sat there, legs spread widely to give her belly room to breathe, she once more felt herself growing peckish. Not for a moment she thought that her third breakfast had ended less than twenty minutes before.

She simply was getting hungry again. Luckily for her Felipe ha arranged the schedule by himself and knew when the Actress would start feeling hungry and when she was going to be full, so, just as Angelina was thinking of calling for a snack, here arrived Felipe carrying a couple of trolley with himself. At first he simply began to stuff Angelina’s mouth with food, almost forcing her to swallow hot dogs and chicken nuggets, but then, as she appeared temporarily satisfied he simply began to surround her figure with more and more plates of junk food. Huge, greasy hamburgers, oversized hot dogs, Deep fried chicken in carton buckets.

Felipe moved back since he loved seeing this scene, it was something that everyday repeated. One of the few constants of his life.

Slowly he saw Angelina’s hand move along the goods surrounding her, stopping near one of the nearest plate and grabbing one of the huge triple hamburger he had left at her side. Then, the hand grabbed it and lifted it, bringing it to her mouth where she passed the next few minutes biting, chewing it and swallow it, until the hand was empty and moved back to search for more.

Still, as he enjoyed watching he wanted to try something. True, she was capable of feeding herself, when in this state but, what would have happened if it was him providing her with food, letting her hands rest down, so she wouldn’t move a single muscle in her body?

Also, he wanted to enjoy the view of the fattened Angelina from the front.

Gathering his courage, he approached her just as her hand was moving again toward a new bowl, stopping her from finishing the move. Then, as he felt her pitiful attempt to get free from his hold he whispered in her ear.

“Please, Miss, let me help you with that…”

Angelina didn’t reply but, her hand fell softly within his hold and she nodded slowly so Felipe moved swiftly beside the growing behemoth and brought to her lips, making sure to not obscure her vision, another of those large hamburgers. He kept it there, against her lips, letting her have half of it in her mouth, before biting on it and starting to chew it. He then kept it close there, waiting for her to swallow, and in the meantime, he used his free hand to feel her growing belly. As he heard her gulping down her mouthful, he quickly directed the rest of the burger toward her lips, as he stood there mesmerized by her mouth as she took the other half of the bread within her lips. Still, his free had didn’t stop, it kept rubbing and grabbing, playing with her luscious, and growing, belly, as it hang over her undies.

This process repeated itself for the entire two hours of the show, and Felipe was relentless in providing more and more food to Angelina, even when she tried to show some restraint, as if feeling herself reaching again her fullness point, and yet with delicious food placed right under her nose and in front of her lips she couldn’t resist but start once more eating. Still, as the show ended, Felipe quickly moved away, letting the actress to return in herself finding, as it had now become the norm, herself stuffed once more.

“MMm…Oh hey Felipe…Guess I got distracted by the show…everything is alright?”

“Sure is, Miss Angelina. We still have half an hour before first lunch, if you want to refresh yourself or have a quick nap…”

The actress, loudly yawning, brought her jiggly arms in the air, until she just placed herself back on the couch, feeling that a quick nap was going to be just the perfect choice.

“Yeah..I think a nap does sounds good. Please, wake me up when Lunch is ready…I don’t want to fall behind the schedule.”

Felipe bowed and left her sleeping, as he confirmed that he was going to wake her up in time. As he returned to the kitchen, to verify how the food was coming along, he couldn’t yet stop remembering the feeling of all that soft, squishy, fat under his fingers as he had played with her belly.

As he checked the various pan and called one more to the various food delivery he had contacted for lunch, he also took out a phone he hadn’t touch since arriving in the US and began to make a call.

“Hello? Felipe Mbutu on the line.”

On the other side of the phone he heard the voice of his Tribe Chief asking him for an update.

“Yeah, she’s coming along nicely. Soon we will hit the big three. By year’s end I count she could be ready to be transported home. There we’ll just have to let her grow some more and then she would be ready.”

After hearing some minor comments and his praises, the Tribe chief hung up the call and Felipe returned to his pans. Soon, though, he heard the doorbell ring and sent one of the aids in the house to go and collect the food. And few minutes later a whole lot of junk food lay on the kitchen table, ready to be consumed. As he applied his finishing touches to the lunch of Angelina, mainly adding spices that were going to boost her consumption and the caloric absorption, he checked the time and went to collect Angelina, waking her up and helping her waddle to the kitchen.

Once there he stood his ground watching as the woman that had hired him almost a month before, began once more to eat an ungodly amount of food, clearing out pans of lasagna, rows of greasy hamburgers, buckets of fried chicken, all by herself, before stopping feeling her hugely bloated belly weighing her down

“Oh God, Felipe…Everything you make is so good. I swear, I could grow so Fat if it wasn’t you who prepared these dishes.”

Angelina, still seating on her two chairs, kept caressing her bloated middle as she spoke to her trusty aide who swiftly offered her the herbal tea, she was so fond of. Felipe, sensing an opportunity, proceeded in giving her directly the jug of tea, instead of offering her the cup filled with it. The actress didn’t seem to mind as she simply grabbed the jug and emptied it in one, long, sitting. Few minutes later as she was still enjoying the sensation of her full stomach, she felt herself growing hungry once more. Used now to this effect, she simply reasoned that the diet on which Felipe had placed her was working normally.

“So…*urp*…Felipe, it time for second lunch, already?”

“Sure is, Miss. Please, enjoy.”

The woman didn’t wait more than few moments before she was digging again through the mountain of junk food he had brought under her eyes. She felt her hunger as it seemed to be much more demanding than usual but, she didn’t put too much thought into that, until she heard her bra snapping out from under her oversized shirt. Only then she stopped for a moment and turned an enquiring glance toward Felipe.

“Felipe…Have you noticed, perhaps, about a shortage of my clothes lately? I mean they seems to be shrinking every week lately…”

The assistant had already thought about that and was prepared for such an eventuality.

“Actually, I didn’t want to disturb you unnecessarily but, yes. It had caught my attention. The person in charge of your laundry has been already punished severely for her mistakes. I’m confident it won’t repeat again.”

The actress nodded, making her double chin jiggle for a moment, as she grabbed an entire apple pie from the table, biting through it with a ravenousness she didn’t know to possess. As she munched on it she still turned toward her aide.

“Still…I was…thinking…that…*munch*…as long as… I don’t go out…I can still…*gulp*… just stay in my pj’s. I think it would be much more comfortable for now.”

“As you wish, Miss Angelina. I will be glad to inform the maid about this decision.”

“Good…” From the on, for the following two hours, Angelina kept on stuffing food down her throat, if she had been more in herself she would have asked herself how cold she possibly keep on eating after a full morning of nothing but that. Unfortunately, the constant gorging had left her blind to almost anything, excluding food.

Felipe stood there smiling and, occasionally, helping her out when a baked treat she wanted was out of her reach. Her shirt, soon, began to rip at the seams as her belly kept growing more and more stuffed but, it was only in the early afternoon when she stopped eating and moved back to her couch to enjoy a post-meal nap. Felipe, once more followed her, enjoying the view of his, soon to be, titanic mistress, sleeping so deeply she didn’t wake up when he jostled her body fat.

Felipe quickly glanced at the clock, it was almost the 3 PM, and in two hours or less, she was going to have her first mid afternoon snack. He just had to keep adding the spices needed to boost her appetite and her body calorie absorption ratio and in a few months she could become an unstoppable eating machine.

Unfortunately, as he stood there admiring her ample, jiggling forms, he didn’t notice that the phone was ringing and by that distraction something could potentially disrupt his plan…
12422233333233232233222111221211.title: Deeper and deeper into the darkness…

124222333332332322332221112212113.content:
A few weeks passed and, as it was now becoming the common routine, Angelina gorged constantly throughout the day. As evening came, Felipe went to check the stock in the larder, to make sure that he had everything needed to prepare the scrumptious meals for Angelina, when he noticed that the door for the larder was slightly ajar. Silently, he moved closer to the door and peered inside. As he did so he saw Carmencita, one of the maids in the household, peering inside several boxes in the storeroom.

As he looked at her, he saw that she was quite the young woman, barely 26, with a nice toned body, with all the curves in the right place. Sporting a pair if nice big breast, D’s or DD’s cup, from where he was standing, with a nice booty, JLO style. Her skin was the of a light-ish brown, with dark, long hair, styled in a long ponytail. All in all, a nice example of a Mexican beauty. As far as he recalled, from earlier interview with the mansion servants, she had appeared to him as a nice-looking girl, maybe not very bright, but not hateful or spiteful of her Mistress shows of hedonism.

Felipe was going to open the door loudly when he noticed that the girl, in fact, was opening the boxes of pre-packaged sweets and began to polish a few items from each, making sure that as soon as she had finished everything seemed untouched.

‘So, we’ve got a burglar in the house, eh? No worries…I shall help you satisfy your need then.’


Retreating quickly from there, he went back to the kitchen, to start a little punishment of his own. As he entered the kitchen though he found on the floor the opulent form of Angelina, still licking her lips and caressing her humongous belly, as she lay on the remains of what had been a chair.

Helping her up he soon found out that she had wanted some sort of midnight snack and had wandered into the kitchen, since she didn’t want to disturb him for something so trivial.

“Miss, there is no need to encumber yourself. Whenever you need me, you may call me. Now, was everything up to your satisfaction?”

“Oh yes, the cake was…*urp!*…delicious! I don’t know how you do it, Felipe, but…Your cheesecakes are just so good…”

“Oh Miss, thank you. Your enjoyment of my cooking is the biggest reward for me. Now, let me help you go to bed. Just give me one moment so that I can have one of the maids to clean up here.”

As he said so, Felipe grabbed a few pans of brownies from under a cupboard, where he had left them to rest to be ready the following morning, leaving a few of them on the table, along with a few more snacks, while placing some of the rest in a bowl; which he then gave to Angelina, as a post-snack.

As he helped the growing behemoth at his side he called for Carmencita, while leaving her a note on a table, near the treats left on there. While helping the, still gorging, actress to her bed, he couldn’t wait to see the following morning how said maid would have reacted to his note in the kitchen.

He could hardly wait.

Carmen, meanwhile, hearing herself being called closed hastily the last package of glazed donuts in the storeroom, and quickly chewed down any evidence in her hands, as she moved toward the kitchen, making sure to enter the room with no evidence of her late night binge. As she entered the room she noticed the absence of her Mistress underling, Mister Mbutu. The guy was good looking and, had quite the gentle smile on him and yet, she found strange that since his arrival Miss Jolie had steadily ballooned in the lardass zeppelin she now was.

Still, he didn’t seem to have done anything but his jobs regarding her, so maybe it was Miss Angelina who had left herself go. In any case, Carmencita, or Carmen as she preferred to be called, began to check the kitchen to see if there was any note left for her. As she did so she began to think back to the goodies she had snuck out of the storeroom in the last few days.
She didn’t call it stealing, even in her minds, she justified it on herself as if she was taking some tips, some advances on her salary. Sure, her Mistress didn’t know about it, and yet it didn’t harm anyone. Plus, lately the food in the servant’s pantry had always been either fast food junk or tasteless salads.

She just wanted something with taste. Moreover, with her high metabolism, she wasn’t going to gain an ounce so why not taking advantage?

Finally, as she reached the counter, and saw the various treats left on it, she saw the note for her Mistress Assistant. Picking it up she quickly read it to herself.

“Carmencita, Miss Jolie had just had a quick midnight snack. Please to clean up the kitchen and bring anything left over to the Servants breakroom.

Thanks, Felipe Mbutu.”

As she placed the note back on the table, she quickly looked at all the food still on the counter, a couple pans of Chocolate muffins, still quite hot, a vanilla short cake, a baker’s dozen of donuts and a small pile of gooey chocolate brownies. Absentmindedly, she grabbed a muffin and began nibbling on it, unaware of the fact that everything on that counter had mixed in it the special herbs of Felipe, so to make it quite addictive and less filling than it should have been.

The maid then, began to slowly clean up the counters and the floor, without realizing that every few minutes she was going back to the oven pan to grab a new treat.

‘Dios mio, these things are good…Better than the ones in the larder…’

In less than half an hour everything had been scrubbed clean, including the two pans of muffins, which had been transferred from the pans to the quite bloated stomach of the maid. Still, feeling quite peckish, she took a seat at the counter and grabbed one of the donuts from there, munching on it as she thought of what to do.

‘I can’t bring everything to the breakroom…It would take me several trips and I would like to get some sleep tonight…Mmm…Strange. I thought there were some ore muffins. Must have been less than I thought.

Yeah, probably the Mistress had cleaned them up before I came.’

As she kept thinking, she didn’t seem to realize that, as she was sitting there, she was taking donut after donut, munching on them as she felt her hunger grow steadily more powerful with each bite. And yet, she didn’t felt satisfied. Quickly polishing off the dozen donuts, she burped softly, caressing her bloated stomach and moved closer to her the short cake, taking quite a large slice for herself.

‘Well, since there are only the brownies and this, I think I shall take, for sure, the brownies to the breakroom. I’ll just have one or two slices of this cake and will see how much will remain for the breakroom.’

Using a fork she took a piece of the short cake and brought within her lips, the taste and the flavor of it assaulted her taste-buds, leaving her stupefied for a moment. Soon, though, she recovered and began taking bites faster and faster out of the cake, finding her plate soon void of everything but a few crumbs.

‘Woah…Mmh…Must have taken a smaller slice than I thought…So good though…’ as she thought that she unconsciously caressed her over bloated middle, which had begun to hurt against the waistband she was wearing to keep the small white apron on. As she cut herself another slice, easily a quart of the small cake, she unfastened a little the waistband, letting her belly have some more room to breathe.

‘I’ll just have this little more and will bring the rest for the others…Just this last…well…Maybe another small piece after this…So good…’
