It was almost Two in the morning when she finally left the counter, she had cleaned the dishes she had used, and was leaving the kitchen while bringing with her the brownies. Of the cake there was no visible trace.

As she moved though the mansion, she quickly went into the servant’s wing but, instead of stopping at the break room she went directly toward her private room. Unconsciously she had already begun inhaling the brownies, popping them one after the other in her mouth, enjoying the marvelous flavor of each.

When she finally reached her room, she seemed to wake up from her reverie, noticing that she wasn’t in the breakroom, and she hadn’t taken the brownies with her. Burping a bit, she simply shrugged it off, she didn’t seem to notice her overburdened belly, nor the brownie crumbs I her cleavage. She simply gave herself a quick wash and went directly to bed, feeling quite good with herself for having had just a few muffins and only a couple of donuts.


The following Morning, Felipe went into the kitchen and quickly checked the state of the place.

It was pristine, as if nobody had used it before. Quickly checking through the security camera’s feed was able to see the gorging spree of the maid on the previous night. As he watched, he realized that she didn’t seem to be really noticing how much she had eaten and thanked once more the spice he had used in the batter for the baked sweets he prepared.

Now, though, although he had still quite a few reserves, he had to re-stock.

It was early in the morning and, while Angelina wouldn’t wakeup before Ten in the morning, the household servants were supposed to be already up and about.

Including a certain maid of his direct knowledge.
124222333332332322332221112212113.title: Taking from the rich…Fatten Hood Style! (part 1)

choices: Had increased a bit, nothing to be worried about though.
Declining quite fast! Need to gain more to be safe! Keep gorging, girl!
No changes, for Angelina…How’s Carmen doing, though?
1242223333323323223322211122121131.content:
As he prepared a quick breakfast for the other servants in the mansion, he requested Carmencita to come into the kitchen swiftly. While nobody in the household said anything, this request was quite suspicious and, since some of the other servants knew of Carmen ways of taking tips for herself, they thought that she was going to get what she deserved.

Carmen was walking briskly through the corridors. She had woken up late and son had quickly put on her suit, even though it seemed tighter than before. Still, with no time to lose, she didn’t put too much thought on it and went to the kitchen where Mr. Mbutu had apparently called for her specifically.

‘Porque does he want to meet me there? Por favor, I hope is not about the tips I’ve taken from the larder.
Dios mio…I cannot lose this job…’

Almost out of breath she reached the kitchen and saw the guy sitting near the stove, as he cooked something there, as she neared him, she could hear the oil frying and smell the melting of butter.

“G-Good Morning, Mr. Mbutu…I-I heard you w-wanted to see me?”

As Felipe turned, he greeted the maid with a smile, noticing the slight tremble in her voice.

‘She must be afraid of having been found out. Well, it’s true that I have but I couldn’t ever fire her…Can’t have her spreading news of the New Angelina, around.’

“Good Morning, Carmencita. Please have a seat. I just wanted to thank you for taking care of that small favor I’ve asked you last night. When I arrived this morning, the Kitchen was crystal clean.

It’s obvious to me that you take great care in doing your work. I know that our Mistress has been a little too…Relaxed, lately. And I know that she doesn’t seem to care about you all, but I can tell you she always speaks greatly of all of you.”

As Felipe kept cooking, so the smell began to be intoxicating for Carmen, she felt herself drooling simply by staying so near to whatever the guy was preparing.

“For this reason, I wanted to show you my gratitude. From today, I want to prepare something special for you and your colleagues. So, from today, I would like you to enjoy some of my cuisine here in the kitchen.
What do you say? Here, you can start with this…”

As Felipe finished his spiel, he placed a large plate of fried eggs and bacon directly under Carmen nose.
As she looked down, she could see the large omelet, covered in cheese, while on the side there were thick slices of fried tomatoes and a small mountain of crunchy, perfectly fried, pork bacon stripes.

Carmen was speechless.

She had expected many things but not to be receiving compliments and, most importantly, not to be invited to have her meals prepared directly from him. All the maids knew that he was a talented Chef and many of them hoped to taste his creation. And yet, here she was, being offered just that.

“I…I don’t know what to say…”

“Then it’s easy, isn’t it? Just say yes.”

As Felipe smiled at the maid he quickly placed a few more plates near her, some loaded with sweets, other with some ham and cheese toast’s.

“Enjoy your breakfast. Oh, one more thing. I’ve been noticing that you’ve gone quite a few times in the larder recently…”

Here Carmen woke up suddenly from her reverie, forcing herself not to visible tremble as he spoke.

“…And I appreciate greatly your effort in helping me sorting out what do we have in stock. For that reason, I’ve decided to change your scheduled work. Instead of passing your day cleaning in and out of the mansion, I want you to keep a strict record of what do we have and what we don’t.

Also, if you notice we have something in shortage, feel free to apply an order for it.

Knowing it will come from you, I’ll pass it on with no fear.”

Carmencita, once more stood there speechless. He not only had offered her the prize of eating his food every day at every meals, but he also assigned her to have free unlimited access to the storeroom, and to be able to order for it without any additional check! Now, if Carmen hadn’t been the ditzy girl she was, she would have been suspicious of this turn of events, unfortunately she didn’t see it as a warning sign, she saw it as if the Guy wasn’t himself very bright in the head.

“I…I thank you very much, Sir. I shall do you proud.”

“I know you wil. Now enjoy your breakfast while I go and see to our Mistress needs. Then you can go and start your job at the storeroom. Remember, be thorough, if we are in shortage of something, do not be afraid to order it.”

As Felipe left the kitchen he could only grin widely. Between the hunger stimulants he had added to her food and her new assignment to the larder, he was sure Carmencita wasn’t going to remain lithe for long.

Walking out of the kitchen he saw Carmen as she began attacking the food with a ravenousness he hadn’t seen in a long time. Still, he couldn’t stay there and watch all day long. He had another lady to attend and make grow as big as possible. Swiftly going to Angelina’s bedroom, trailing beside him a trolley loaded with goodies, he knocked lightly and entered, marveling, as he did every single day, at the figure which lay on the king sized bed.

Angelina Jolie had been once a lithe actress, a joyful person and a smart woman.

Since his arrival though, two of those things had been lost thanks to his intervention. Sure, she had kept her joyful and bubbly personality but, her mind had been dulled a bit by the constant influx of food in her throat and her figure, well, that had stopped being lithe and skinny for quite some time already.

As he opened the curtains in the room, he stood watching the woman of whom he was in charge, as she kept snoring on her bed.

Her face had grown kinda chubby and round, with her cheeks beginning to soften more and more. Her neck was now presenting to the world a second chin, and a third one seemed to be starting slowly beneath the last one. Her shoulder had inflated, growing softer and squishier to the touch, along with her arms, which had now started to have some decent sized bingo wings. Her breast had grown yet of another couple of cup sizes, losing all their perkiness they had become large meat sack which were good only to store more and more fat. When laying down, on her back, those would slide to either side of her, forced to stay that way by the next obstacle right below them.

Her glorious, almost constantly, engorged middle.

Even now, as she slept soundly, it was like a rather large mountain in the middle of some small-ish hills. In her current position it was divided in three belly rolls, with the last one hanging out, completely covering her undies and most of her thighs. Her hips and ass had grown too, jutting out behind her, he badonkadonk ass created a jiggly shelf on itself, often he had left some plates on her rear as he navigated her toward the next meal, and no plate had ever fallen from it. It was mesmerizing to watch, as it jiggled and quaked at her any movement, no matter how minimal. Her hips though had also grown wider, forcing her to move sideways through most of the doors in the mansion, except of course, of the double sized ones. And yet Felipe hoped to manage to reach the point where those as well were to become an issue, too.

As much as he admired watching her, it was time for her first pre-breakfast. And so, slowly he began to wake her up in the easiest way possible. Simply, by sliding a plate with a dozen eggs omelet and almost a pound of fried bacon strip under her nose.

“Hmm? Oh…It’s you…Felipe…Good Morning.”

“Good Morning, Miss. I’m sorry to wake you up but, it’s time for your first pre breakfast.”

Angelina, slowly pushing herself in a sitting position, noticing that it was becoming harder and harder as weeks passed, smelled heartily the delicious aroma’s coming from the platter in front of her and all of her doubts simply vanished, as her belly grumbled in anticipation. Making quick work of the platter, she quickly cleaned out also the following five, and with that began the arduous task in her daily life.

Getting out of the bed.

Still, with Felipe assistance, she managed to stand on her own, although she still needed his presence for support in order to perform the daily weight in.

With a very slow waddle, Felipe directed her toward the large scale he had brought online, used mostly to weigh livestock and farm animals, it was the safest bet to be used with the growing Angelina. The woman slowly managed to step onto the heavy-duty scale and, as she waited a response, she munched on a large short cake he had provided her.

Felipe kneeled, entering the shadow of the belly goddess behind him and carefully read the numbers provided by the scale.

Smiling he saw that Miss Jolie had grown more and more since the day before. It was amazing, really, by having her gorge constantly he was managing to let her gain pounds upon pounds, in an always increasing curve. With that day, for example, in a couple of weeks she had grown in average of nearly eight pounds per day, bringing her to a massive three hundred ninety-eight!

Two pounds short of the big four hundred!

He only had to push her some more…but could he lie shamelessly or was best to keep it low as he was already doing?

With a wicked smile on his face he replayed to her that her weight was…
1242223333323323223322211122121131.title: Taking from the rich…Fatten Hood Style! (part 2)

choices: A liquid diet guarantees a bigger Angelina in the shortest time
Solid food’s better. Watch as she power through any difficulty for her food
Liquid ? Solid? Simple. Use both. Overload her with them!
Move to Carmen, she needs attention too, you know?
12422233333233232233222111221211313.content:
Felipe smiled shamelessly as he realized that the once actress was completely under his thumb. He truly could do with her whatever he wished and to prove it to himself he decided to lie shamelessly to her.

“Miss…I’ve got a bad news. Your weight is..”

Angelina, in the middle of cleaning out the last bowl of muffins her assistant had given her, tried to look down in shock, only to see her bountiful breasts, and under them her large gut, obscuring everything below them. Still, as they were doing the daily weigh-ins she knew in the back of her mind that her shape was of no consequence…especially since her weight was so low.
Still, the trembling voice of Felipe put her in quite the alarm.

“What is it, Felipe? Tell me the truth.”

“You see, Miss, your weight is declining…”

Angelina, hearing those words began to tranquilize herself.

“Well, you have me on this diet for a reason, right? It’s normal to lose weight as we…”

“Miss! That is not the issue here. The problem is that you seem to be losing weight fast.
Too fast to be healthy.”

The smile on the actress face vanished. With their weigh-ins she knew to be still in her normal shape but, if Felipe was saying the truth she was starting to lose too much, too fast. She didn’t want to become one of those anorexic skeletons, no matter how rich they could become thanks to their minimal bodies.

But why would Felipe lie to her? Angelina thought long and hard on that, as she kept munching through the sweets she had in her arms and reached the conclusion that he couldn’t be lying to her. It meant that she was actually losing too much weight!

“Oh Felipe…*munch*…then what should we…*gulp*…do? What can I do to prevent…*urp!*…it?”

This was what Felipe was waiting for. As soon as she had asked him that he knew he had her hook, line and sinker. Standing up he moved closer to her wide and overfed body, admiring her quickly, before returning to the task at hand.

“I’ll modify the schedule again, Miss. We will tweak a bit the schedule, adding some more resting time and maybe increasing the quantities of your meals of a little bit. And we will also take out any exercises session you’re currently following.

You’ll see, Miss, soon you will recover from this situation.

You can trust in me to have what’s best for you.”


Angelina, hearing the words from her assistant smiled at him happily, she was glad of having chosen him to help her out. With him at her side she felt like she could face the entire world. Still, she began soon huffing and panting, feeling tired and drained of all her energies, not realizing that only by standing there on the scale she had already consumed all of her energies. Waddling slowly, helped by her assistant, she moved toward her bed and slowly lowered herself on it.

As she was now laid down on the bed, her back against the wall so keeping a somewhat seating position, she felt Felipe pushing something in her hand. With a smile she saw that it was the remote for the TV.

“Here, Miss, just rest and relax a bit. Watch some television as I’ll have the maids bring you your three breakfasts. Don’t worry Miss, all of this will pass. You’ll see, with my help you’ll never feel so tired again.”

Despite his ominous words Angelina simply laid back and began watching her soaps, just as the maids began entering her room bringing her trays upon trays of breakfast food. Soon, surrounding her bloated, and ever-growing, body there were mounds and mounds of food. With a glance she quickly spied a few towers of pancakes drenched in syrupy goodness and butter, mounds of fried bacon strips with similarly sized mounds of sausages, piles of chocolate covered waffles and then countless cakes, pies and more sweets she could count. Without a fuss she began inhaling them, although with some difficulty.

Lately she had noticed that her arms didn’t seem to be working just as she wanted, it was as if they couldn’t bend as they used to. Still, this little inconvenience didn’t ring any bell in the ex-actress mind, since the maids were all around her, ready to act at a quick nod from her. And so they began, pushing morsels of food within her lips, pushing more and more food into her. And, as time passed, she found herself in a vicious cycle. The maids pushed fod on her faster and faster, since she ate it as fast as she could. And yet, she ate it as fast as she could, since the maids were pushing it into her just as quick paced.

The actress, lost in her hedonism, couldn’t see her figure bloating up, her breast swelling larger and heavier, pushing to her sides losing every ounce of perkiness they once had. Her gut rising up in the air, filling up with pounds upon pounds of food, her intestines working overtime to digest, and store as fat, all that was being ingested by the woman. Her hips and ass, slowly outgrowing her bed, as they had beginning to spill out of the sides, as they grew larger and jigglier.

All morning was spent I this eating frenzy, with Angelina stuffed so full of things to eat and yet, still hungry for more. Always full, but never satisfied.

Felipe, as he watched from the sidelines, could only smile in happiness, here she was, growing larger and bigger than a whale, and yet, she still wasn’t big enough for his tribe. She had to grow much, much bigger before he could even think of moving her to his country. Maybe, he thought as he kept watching as she moved from breakfast directly to lunch, he ought to push her on a liquid diet made of shakes and batter. Filling the empty spots with his herbal tea, of course.

But there was something so beautiful in watching her gorge on solid food, watching as she ate through her own tiredness, forced by her gluttony to power through her own exhaustion. Or maybe, he could do a bit of both, get the best of the two worlds as they say…

And still, he had also Carmen to take care of, in fact, as Angelina was currently busy he could go and check how the maid was working in her new position…

What to do, what to do?
12422233333233232233222111221211313.title: Adding layers of lies to layers of fat

choices: Angelina began to worry about her mobility issues…
Carmen begins to notice the shrinkage of the uniforms
As Angelina grow, so do the maid serving her
Feeling envious of Carmen, the servants begin to be more active in feeding her.
124222333332332322332221112212113132.content:
Felipe knew that by going with a liquid diet, she would have grown bigger faster but, as a cook he also knew that preparations had to be followed to the book to have a scrumptious meal. True she could have grown huge in a few months but, the meal in itself would have been of a low grade, despite the main ingredient that Angelina was. No, he had to pamper her, to let her grow steadily, to fatten her up the old way in order to bring her as a meal fit for his Tribe. So, he went back to the kitchen where he began to modify her schedule, changing her meal times, the quantities to be brought to her and the times when she had to be left to rest and recover.

Once done that, he issued the new schedule to all the servants in the house, letting them know that a new schedule had to be implemented. The maids and the servants didn’t oppose to this new regime. Some of them tried to inquire a bit about it but, were rapidly shushed up by either the other servants, or by Felipe himself.
If their mistress ordered it to be done, the servants had only to obey. The only maid who was not included in the new schedule delivery was Carmen. For her, Felipe had a different plan. One the he was going to carry out personally, as soon as he finished to show to the once actress, what her future was going to be.

It was already lunch time when Felipe went to Angelina’s room, finding the woman still laying on her bed, watching the soaps she had grown addicted too. Surrounding her there were countless empty plates, while many others were being brought unto her by the maids helping her. As he looked at the behemoth of a woman, sitting on her bed, Felipe couldn’t help but smile. He still couldn’t believe that the actress had fallen prey of her gluttony after only a couple of months. And yet, she was there right in front of his eyes, living proof that he had managed.

In that moment, with her cherubic face covered in sauce and grease, she was being served a large spoon full of the richest stew she had ever had, it was so tasty, and the aroma so intense, that she couldn't stop herself from cleaning out plate after plate of it. With her arms resting beside her growing boulder belly and with each sppon brought directly to her lips, alla she had to to was to open her mouth and feel the divine taste on her tongue, before swallowing down each spoonful.

“Miss? Miss Angelina?”

“Ye-e-s…*gulp*…Felipe…what is…it?”

“I’ve come to enquire on how are you doing today? Is everything of your liking?”

“Mmmph…mmm….yesh…everything is…so good…so tasty…I can’t…seem to…have enough…”

“Do not worry, Miss. I’ve already informed everyone in the house about your new schedule. Meal times have been doubled and exercises removed. Soon, I’m sure you’ll be able to recover all of your lost weight.”

Angelina, with her food addled mind turned fully on her gluttony, could only approve silently within herself. As she opened her mouth to accept the next spoonful of food, she could only approve of Felipe’s quick response to her issue. He had been the best assistant she had ever had, she truly had been amazed at how quickly he adapted to taking care of her needs.

Her thoughts though, were interrupted suddenly as the taste spreading within her mouth forced her to moan in ecstasy, feeling the sweet and sour taste in her mouth as a new dish was brought to her to be consumed. She barely knew since when she was eating but, addicted as she was she could care less about it.

She just wanted more and more.

Felipe stood there silently, enjoying the view of the ever growing actress, as she kept stuffing herself to bursting point and then, forcing herself to continue just so she could enjoy the taste within her lips. The assistant, judging by the sheer quantity of emptied plates filling the room could easily deduce that she had to be around at her fourth lunch, knowing full well that the meals he had ordered fo her were named only by a matter of comfort. For, with the new schedule, she was going to be force fed at any time of her day, with only a few short breaks of no more than half an hour each between each meal.

As he saw that she fell back into her eating trance her quickly began massaging her growing belly, feeling good touching it, enjoying the feeling of softness and the plush texture to it. After a bit of relaxation, feeling her growing body expanding under his touch, Felipe decided to leave he to her feeding, as he had another target in mind to occupy himself with.

At the same time, sitting at her new position near the larder, Carmencita was enjoying the advantages of her new job posting. She was currently sitting at the desk that Felipe had prepared for her, right beside the larder, with ease of access there, as she was just finishing up the last meal one of the other maids had brought to her not too long ago.

“That was really good…I don’t Know where Mr. Mbutu has learned to cook but all of his meals are the best…”

And yet, even though she caressed her bloated belly, which had seemed to grow puffier since she started eating Felipe’s meals, she still felt some hunger deep within her. Pushing aside the rather large meal she had just finished, she slowly rose from her chain and began to move herself into the larder. Since taking that position she had grown accustomed to go in there, enjoy a few helpings of whatever she wished for and then, simply order more as if there had never been as much as it seemed to be. The maid thought to be sneaky about it but, anyone could easily tell she just was growing greedier and greedier as time passed.

As she entered the larder, she quickly snatched the inventory list and scanned it in search of something that would catch her interest. Quickly she noticed some items that made her mouth watery.

‘I just had lunch but…I can surely have something more. Nothing too heavy, and yet…’ she thought as her eyes went on through the inventory list. ‘A dozen donuts? Mmm, chocolate and cream filled? That’s a yes. What else we have here…Oh? A few éclair’s sound quite nice as of now…and then…Oh, this I will take it for sure. I can never say no to a slice of good ol’ sheetcake.’

As she marked the items she wanted, she exited the room and used the phone on her desk to ask one of the maid to bring her the requested delicacies. As it was becoming usual, she simply said that she needed to perform a taste test and that those items had popped in randomly from her search.

The other servants, even though Carmencita had been on that position for less than two days, were growing envious of her and, pretty soon, started “making mistakes” when delivering the requested items.

That time, for example, a maid came out of the larder, carrying out the request placed by Carmen, leaving in front of her the requested items, except she seemingly appeared to have made an honest mistake.

“Carmen, I’ve got the items you requested. Two dozen’s donuts, one chocolate and one cream filled… a dozen, white chocolate glazed éclair’s and the sheetcake.”
Carmen stood dumbfounded in seeing way more than she requested appear on her desk, at first she was going to reprimand the maid for bringing too much but, as she drank some of the herbal tea that Mr. Mbutu had prepared specifically for her, she felt her own hunger grow tenfold.

“T-Thanks, Marie. I shall…erm…proceed with the tasting then…you…you can go, now.”

Without even waiting of the other maid to leave she simply dived into the goodies that she had received, biting and munching through them as she felt herself hungrier than ever. She had noticed that lately she had seemed to be this hungry every time she finished to consume a meal but, instead of worrying herself about it, she decided to dive into it.

‘Some splurge, once in a while, never hurt anyone, right?’ she thought as her mind soon began to lose focus on her surroundings, placing food as her main focus.
‘Plus, my high metabolism will take care of anything…need more…much more food…’

Unknown to Carmen, another person was intently watching her. Felipe had just left Angelina, and was now enjoying the view of the lithe, for now, maid as she binged without any worry. Already he could see her uniform beginning to strain and rips at her middle as she stuffed her already full belly with even more food.

He had really to compliment himself. By giving her the spiked food, laced with his hunger enhancer, and the same tea he had given to Angelina, the poor Carmen was going to grow a mindless glutton in no time at all.

Although with Angelina he had to take it slow, at first, with the maid he could simply let himself go. In fact, as soon as she reached a certain point, he could easily switch her to a liquid diet and watch her balloon faster than the once actress. It was true that he had a duty as a cook but, he also knew that there was a vast difference in quality between the actress and the maid.

He simply had to stand back and watch them grow….
124222333332332322332221112212113132.title: A proper meal has to be chewed…

choices: No help coming. Angelina start realizing something is wrong.
No one there to help her. She begins wailing as a little child asking for attent
The door open and a maid enters, seeing her mistress desperation
The door open, Felipe has come to check on her.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321.content:
Months had passed in a blur of eating and the flowing of time had seemingly vanished for the huge actress.
Angelina Jolie was lying in her bed, she had just finished eating what she supposed it had been the third, or maybe it was fourth, lunch. The maids at her side were now milling around, cleaning her and taking out the empty dishes, leaving the room and then, leaving her alone to rest and digest her meal.

The actress looked around, noticing that she still was in her room and began wondering about the relaxation program that Felipe had put her on. It was true she had desired relax from her stressful life, but she didn’t seem to remember the last time she had left that room for a walk or simply to go into the kitchen. Her stare began wandering over her own figure, as she was lying down on her bed, with her back on a pile of pillows.

She could see the hugely shaped dome that her gut had become, right under her glorious breast, which had grown immensely. At first, she had begun to worry about the size of those but, as she thought about it, she realized that thanks to the daily weigh-ins she couldn’t have been putting on weight.

Still, the thought of going out of the room enticed her. It was true that the schedule of her assistant wanted her to be ready for her next snack but, she still wanted to leave the room and go for a walk, maybe to the library to read a little bit. Feeling strangely excited at the prospect, she tried to get out of her bed, but found herself strangely constricted. It took her a long time just to reach the far side of her bed and have herself in a sitting position.

Then she noticed how though it was to stand from there, especially since she had to gain enough momentum in order to stand.

When she finally was able to stand on her own, she hurriedly had to grab something to hold on since she realized pretty fast that her balance was completely out of control. IF only the actress could have truly seen her figure she would have freaked out.
Standing as she was, her body cascaded down toward the ground in a waterfall of fattened belly rolls. Her middle was reaching past her knees, which would have her forcing to walk with a strange gait, her legs slapping against her belly apron. Her overripe breast, losing all their perkiness, fell on her torso as bloated fleshy sacks.

Her butt, also, had grown tremendously.

It had become a huge shelf, wobbly like jelly it trembled and jiggled at her every movement and even to her breathing. It drooped a little behind her but, still it kept its round shape. Overall, everything in her had fattened up, even her arms and ankles had grown with fat.

Huge, fleshy, bingo wings cascaded down from her shoulder to her arms, her legs were now so round and large that she was constantly forced to move with a very slow waddle. Even her neck had changed since she started that fattening process. Long gone was the slender slim neck she once had, replaced by three, quite large, chins which wiggled and trembled every time she moved her head or opened her mouth.

All in all it was only thanks to the herbal knowledge of Felipe that the actress was able to stay so healthy while weighing more than 700 pounds.

With her body in that situation, it was easy to understand why Angelina was having all those troubles in moving around and, yet, the actress couldn’t see all those troubles or how those affected her mobility. Keeping her hold on the bedstand, she tried to look around to understand why she was having all those issues but, even by looking down, she couldn’t see anything that would cause her to have troubles moving around.

Perplexed by this event she tried to move one step forward, but she quickly realized that she wasn’t able to even lift her leg by her own power. This was very disturbing for her mind, especially since with all the focus on eating, it had atrophied a bit, rendering her a mite slow in certain aspects of her life.

Once more she tried to move her body, causing only to have herself jiggling in place. With her free hand she began massaging her apron like gut, feeling it grumbling slowly as she felt her hunger rising once more.

‘Why can’t I move? Is that normal?
It’s true that Felipe told me that I’m losing too much weight but, is it possible to have lost all my strength, too?
Still, I need to move but, how can I do that on my own?

…And I’m also getting hungry. Mmm…Wonder what Felipe has in store for my next snack.’

It took her only the thought of having something to eat to let her forget about her current predicament, in a span of minutes she had completely forgotten about the issue of moving around. In fact, so focused she was on what she was going to eat next, that she never realized she had actually managed to move on her own for the few steps separating her from the bed, as she sat on its side awaiting for her maids to show up.

As she sat there, huffing from the tiredness she felt from moving herself for those few steps, she still couldn’t see the main issue in the situation. At first she had noticed that she had seemed to grow bigger but, as Felipe showed her through her daily weigh-ins, she hadn’t gained much, so her mind couldn’t accept the idea of being fat, or way more than obese, as it was in truth.

She had simply grown accustomed to her size and found soon that it was easier to justify those little problems she was having with lies, than facing the truth. Furthermore, between her maids complimenting her and Felipe pushing her more, she simply laid back and pretended that nothing strange was happening.

Still, her gut began to grumble louder and louder, hungrily requesting food, and Angelina was finding herself in the uncomfortable position of having to admit that she had a problem, instead of ignoring it.

With a final effort, panting in her tiredness, she managed once more to stand up straight, even though the weight of her own body kept her down, forcing her to pant quite loudly at that effort. As she stood there, keeping herself upright by holding on the bedstand, she began to worry if truly she had a problem.

‘Was it so hard to stand up, in the past?’

So accustomed she was to being helped around even at the most trivial things, that now that she was alone she couldn’t help herself but wonder if she truly was in need to relax even more or if it was time to get back and exercise.

Was she really so healthy, except for losing her weight, as Felipe said or, maybe, she was seriously in danger?
1242223333323323223322211122121131321.title: Troubles in moving around

choices: Angelina’s BF, Gwen Stefani, is worried about the actress disappearance.
Angelina’s Contract Manager is in town and comes to visit her
A journalist manages to get a few pictures of the fattened actress
Her brother, James Haven, wants to meet her
12422233333233232233222111221211313213.content:
Right at that moment, the door of her room opened and one of the maids entered.

Seeing her mistress standing, she rushed at her side helping her up and assisting her leaving the room. With the assistance of the maid Angelina was finally able to move around, albeit slowly, and at that cruise speed she managed finally to reach the kitchen. True, initially she wanted to go to the library but, with all the exercise she had done in standing up and leaving the room she felt herself growing quite hungry.

As she entered the kitchen, she saw something she hadn’t expected to see.

Sitting at the table there was one of the maids she had in service eating quite an abundant meal with Felipe stationed nearby preparing more and more food, directing the cooked food to both the maid and to some trays, prepared probably for her.

“Good Morning Felipe.”

The assistant initially turned around in surprise but, in a moment, he managed to regain his composure, while the maid seemed to act as if caught doing something naughty.

“Good Morning Miss didn’t expect you to be out of your room. Still, would you like to join us at the table? I was just finishing preparing your first post lunch snack.”

Angelina, her belly rumbling in hunger, didn’t need to be asked twice and, as quickly as she could, sat in at the table, taking position on a couple of reinforced chairs prepared for such an occasion.

“Miss, I would like to present you one of your maids, Miss Carmen here, since she’s helping me out quite a lot in these last few days.”

The actress turned toward the maid and greeted her with a smile, although she gave her quite a good look. She hazily remembered her, a waifish thing, always out of the scenes, and yet here she was now, with a healthy glow on her and, if she had to say the truth, looking quite healthier than before. Looking more closely at her, Angelina, saw that the maid seemed to have some issues with her clothes and idly wondered if there were still issues with the washing machines, but all thoughts vanished when Felipe placed in front of her a plate chocked full of hotdogs covered in both mayo and ketchup.

Carmen, seeing the Mistress so close felt as if she had been found stealing and yet, when she saw that her mistress was only concerned with her food, she started to relax a bit. The maid had been there at the table from quite some time already, eating away at Felipe’s concoction, helping him in taste testing them and, yet, after drinking some of his tea to settle down her full stomach, she felt her hunger coming back.

Uncaring of the tightness of her outfit, or the fact that the stitches in the front of it were strained to the limit, she almost pleaded with Mr. Mbutu only to smile in joy when a new plate full of delicacies was placed in front of her.

Felipe quickly breathed with relief, watching the two women gorging themselves on his food, laced as it was with his appetite stimulant spices. He’d been really surprised in seeing the Actress coming to the kitchen, even though aided by one of the maids, but he soon managed to turn her thoughts over to his food instead of inquiring on the reason for feeding the maid in such a personal way.

Still, even though he was enjoying watching them gorge, he turned his back on them and started once more to cook, with both girls there he had to make sure that there would be enough to leave them stupefied.

Angelina felt herself in paradise, she still had some doubts about her mobility, but with delicious food in front of her those thoughts came second. Now she had to fill her belly.
Inhaling the hot dogs, she quickly found a new plate in front of her, this time there were a couple chains of sausages, all covered in a weird BBQ like sauce. Quickly she began clearing them out, swallowing them as if she was sucking noodles out of a cup. With a glance she realized that after these there were available many other dishes, including huge slabs of steaks, mountains of fries and even platter upon platters of fried chicken. The once lithe actress started eating as fast as she could, needing to have all those delicacies within herself at the soonest.

Carmen, from her side, was feeling stuffed and yet, also hungry. With those feeling she couldn’t resist from diving down on each new plate that Mr. Mbutu offered her, cleaning out heavy dishes of pasta and massive portions of lasagna, taking mouthfuls of meat pies and even heavily topped pizza pies. With this additional influx of food into her, the maid quickly outgrew her clothes, which ripped loudly, although none of the women present took notice of it, focused as they were on the food. Felipe took notice, and smiled within himself, staring happily at the caramel colored belly that ripped and sprouted out of the front of the maid outfit of Carmen. With a quick glance he knew that Angelina wasn’t going to have this issue.

Since a long time already he had got her used to wear only tanga and bikini around the house, just to prevent this issue from happening. Still, the two of them had been at this snack for only two hours now and Felipe knew they both could handle much more and so focused himself to stuff them up to the gills.

It was late in the afternoon when they stopped eating.

Carmen laid on the table, fast asleep already. She had crashed on the table, her face missing the plate she had been on, only by inches. What was really astonishing though, was her middle. Her belly was so bloated that it pushed against the table, distancing Carmen from it by a fair bit. Angelina, instead, was still going at it. Although, at the slow speed she was, it was barely recognizable.
The actress was full, completely stuffed and yet, she kept pushing her maids to keep going. Even though she herself felt like there were morsels stuck in her throat, unable to reach her stomach, she still motioned her servants to give her more.
Felipe was enjoying the situation but, he couldn’t afford to have an injured Angelina. For that reason, he swiftly intervened before the woman could actually hurt herself.

“Miss? It’s time for your nap. Here, let me help you up.”

Before he could act, Angelina began to rise on her own, or at least, she attempted to. The only result was to see the 700+ pounds behemoth leaving the chairs and fall down toward the floor, while the maid that had helped her reach the kitchen tried to stop her falling. Unfortunately, the lithe maid couldn’t do nothing to prevent Angelina to fall, ending only to be completely squished down by the huge actress.

It took the effort of Felipe and other three maid to lift Angelina, which was already fast and deeply asleep, from the floor, releasing the poor maid which in turn had thought to be going to suffocate under her mistress. Realizing the impossible task of having the actress brought back into her room, Felipe decided to let her rest on one of the couches in the main room, while preparing himself to have his mistress room relocated from the first floor to the ground floor. Now that she had grown to such size it was unthinkable that she was going to climb the steps toward the first floor of the mansion.

Still, as he watched her sleep away at the ungodly amount of food she had consumed he couldn’t help but smile that soon, she was going to be ready to be moved to his tribe, for a feast that she wasn’t going to forget. As he returned to the kitchen, to prepare the dishes for Angelina’s next afternoon snack he realized that Carmen was slowly waking up.

“Enjoyed your nap, Carmencita?”

The cheating maid, having just woke up, didn’t seem to realize where she was exactly, nor what she had done barely an hour ago. She tiredly caressed her still quite bloated stomach, not really realizing how big she was, since her focus was now forced onto something that Felipe had placed in front of her.

Felipe, realizing that Carmen still had a lot to grow, decided to start anew the process of stuffing her up. She had done quite the amazing job by herself, with all those months under her belt of having her new job, and yet he wanted her to grow more and faster.

“Here, Carmen, why don’t you enjoy this little pick-me-up? Don’t you forget your promised to help me taste testing some of my new recipes. . .”

The maid, drinking some of her residual tea, even though she was feeling quite bloated, couldn’t refrain herself from lean down on the plate, enjoying the succulent aroma coming from it. As she prepared herself, grabbing fork and knife, she looked more closely at it, as Felipe explained her what it was.

“Carmen, I’m going to call it ‘Buried treasure’. It’s basically a baked mincemeat pie, with a hidden heart of baked bread stuffed with a delicious roast of pork, prepared with a delicate touch of white wine and a special cream sauce.”

‘Mostly prepared with butter and whole milk to make it as fattening as possible but I’m not going to tell you that.’

The maid, quickly went to town on the dish, enjoying it immensely, finding it quite easy to go down even though it had to be quite the heavy plate. With a fueled hunger, the poor maid found herself again forced to keep going, eating faster and faster, as more and more plates began surrounding her.

Finally, as evening was creeping on, Carmencita had to bring down her fork, leaving it there resting on the table. Again stuffed to bursting, she couldn’t do much more than stay seated there, caressing her stuffed, bloated, belly, waiting for digestion to work down all she had eaten.

Felipe was in heaven and yet, he didn’t know that a possible storm was brewing and was coming right to him.
12422233333233232233222111221211313213.title: Maid to the reascue...That and Lunch, of course!

choices: Call the cops, then try to help Angelina lose the weight
Call the cops but, replace Felipe as Angie’s feeder
Accept Felipe’s plan, while thinking of someone to be fattened up next
Accept Felipe’s plan but, request a more physical approach in dealing with Angie
124222333332332322332221112212113132132.content:
Frank Smith had been Angelina’s manager for years.
He enjoyed working with her, she was a true gem. Not too picky on the contract and neither too greedy on the salaries.

The best employer he could have dreamed of. And yet, to say the truth, he had been, for a short period, something of a stalker in relation to Angelina. He dreamt of her, he wanted her all for himself. It had become almost an obsession. Fortunately, he managed to repress his urges when with her and kept a lid on all the fantasies he kept having each night about her. In a few months, he had managed to stop stalking her around, and contented himself with having the chance to be near her. But he kept fantasizing about her, sating somewhat his lust.

Yet, lately, he had noticed that she had left the scene for quite some time and the gap from her leaving was quickly filling up. Wondering on her reasons he decided to go to her mansion, since it wasn’t the first time he had done so, and investigate with her personally.

When he arrived at her mansion, he noticed immediately that something was out of place. The gardens surrounding it were maintained as usual, but all her outdoor gym equipment seemed rather unused. Still, he moved on toward the door and knocked. When the door opened, he was surprised when a giant of a man opened. As he looked at the man, he realized that he had heard about Angelina hiring a personal assistant from central Africa and so he presented himself to the guy.

“Hi, I’m Frank Smith. Contract Manager, and advisor, of Miss Angelina Jolie. May I enter? I would need to check a few things with Angelina in person.”


When Felipe went at the door, he thought he had to manage, once more, one of those pesky journalists who kept trying to intrude on Angelina’s life. When instead he was faced with Frank, he realized that his plan, all of his scheming, was going to be ruined by the guy.

He thought about keeping him out but, if he really was who he said, he would just return with the police in tow. So, he could only let him in and try to ease all the difficult situations that were going to arise as soon as the guy saw Angelina’s new lifestyle.

“Please, come inside. I’m Felipe Mbutu, personal assistant and secretary of Miss Jolie.”


Frank soon found himself sitting in a large ante chamber, waiting on a couch for Miss Angelina, while Mr. Mbutu sat opposite to him looking rather uncomfortably. For a moment he wanted to ask the guy if something was wrong but, as the wide set of double doors opened, Frank found himself speechless as Angelina entered the room assisted by two maids, each on her either side.

Smith sat there, open mouthed and speechless, as he watched her Employer waddling in just as if he was dreaming about her. He had never told anyone but he had always been a Closet FA, a hidden fat admirer and, seeing the object of most of his wet dreams coming through, just as he had always envisioned it, left quite the impression on him. The fact that she was wearing only a small thong-bikini and was having issue with moving by herself only fueled his own lust toward the actress.

Felipe noticed the impact the arrival of Angelina left on the Contract manager and grinned within himself.

‘Maybe his coming will not be such a bad thing, after all…’


As Angelina sat on the couch, she breathed quite laboriously, as if she had just performed a marathon and yet, she was all smile at her friend visit.

“Frank! So nice… to see you.
Sorry if… I haven’t… warned you… about my… leave of… absence but, I was… getting too… stressed out… so I… asked… my personal… assistant, Felipe, to… have me… under a regimen… that could… help me… relax.”

As she said that the actress had to often interrupt herself to catch her breath. Although she was healthy, it still took her toll to lug around a 700+ pounds body. To Frank it took a while to manage to speak again, and still he was uncertain as he addressed her, still thinking at what he was seeing.

‘My God! She’s Huge!

She won’t be able to find a single commercial like this…I should report this to the authorities…but…

But her health doesn’t seem in danger, and she’s acting as if she doesn’t care about her size. Could it be that she does not realize how big she is? Yet, she still seems happy at how her life is going.

And I cannot deny that I find her way more attractive like this.

Should I really call the cops? And who is this Felipe Mbutu? How did he managed to get her to such a size?’

As the chat between them was slowing down, the double doors opened again and a whole fleet of maids, each with her own trolley full of food moved beside the huge actress, surrounding her.

“Miss, it’s time for your fifth late afternoon snack.”

Frank could see that the actress was already focusing only on the incoming food, as she bounced excitedly on the spot, having her entire form jiggle and wobble madly.

“Yum yum…Can’t wait…was getting hungry…Gimme more!”

The contract manager watched dumbfounded as the maids began feeding the actress, pushing all kinds of food down her throat as the woman herself soon lost herself to the bliss. He couldn’t move his stare from her as he saw that gallons of ice cream were being pushed inside the huge actress, and more importantly, she seemed to be moaning in pleasure by the rough feeding she was subjected to.

It was then that Felipe moved and sat beside Frank, starting a conversation that, potentially, could change their entire lives.

“She’s a beauty, isn’t she?”

Frank could only nod silently, as his own body betrayed him by showing hard how pleasing the scene was for him.

“Still, she could aspire to much, much more…”

“Wha…What do you mean? And who are you? What have you done with her?”

Felipe smiled lightly, as he kept staring at Angelina, as she was in the process of scarfing down and entire devil’s food cake.

“Name’s Felipe Mbutu, personal assistant and secretary of Angelina Jolie. I’ve done nothing to her…I’ve just provided her with food and a way to relax. The rest came on its own, in its own time.

Now, instead, it could be you who might be able to do something to assist her.”

“What? What could I…do?”

Soon enough he understood the plan of Mr. Mbutu.

With his contacts he could provide a legal offering for Angelina, turning her from the movie star she was into the most famous SSBBW the world had ever seen. And yet, Frank was conflicted.

This Felipe was a serious Feeder, one who had been able to turn an actress of the caliber of Angelina Jolie to a humongous whale, getting her hooked on eating while keeping her relatively out of any issues regarding her size. So, from one side Frank wanted to call the cops, have this Felipe guy under arrest and, maybe as the man was in jail, he could fill in the spot with Angelina? That would have been good but, he wasn’t sure he could act as the guy did toward her.

The other option was to accept the guy offer and try to look around for a job that Angie could perform while in her current state. It would be legal but, would he feel alright knowing that his Employer, and friend, could be used in such a way?

As Frank mulled it over, Felipe decided to use his trump card on the guy, trying to rope him in as much as possible.

“You know, Angelina is not my only target. There is also one of the maids that is coming along nicely. What’s more, if you agree to help me, I could even apply my skill on whichever target of your choosing.

You’ll have only to have her move in here, then I would take care of everything..."
124222333332332322332221112212113132132.title: Frank Smith, Contract Manager. Friend or Foe?

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
In the end Frank couldn’t refuse the plan.

He wanted so bad to see Angelina grow more and more beautiful, while also having the possibility of turning one of his many contacts into an oversized parade balloon.

Felipe grinned impishly when the Manager accepted his plan, soon Angelina was going to be ready for his next phase and, with Mr. Smith assistance, her travel to his tribe was going to be easier than he could think of. As Soon as Miss Jolie would have reached the milestone of the 1000 pounds, He would have nothing else to do but contact his Tribe chief and let him know to make contact with Frank.

Then, under the pretense of hiring her for a long movie to be directed in Africa, Angelina could be transported there, and his tribe would have feasted for months on her bounties. Meanwhile, also thanks to Frank, he could find someone else to replace the actress…and the cycle would continue.

It wasn’t going to be easy, but it was feasible and, most importantly, would appear as totally legal.

Still, there was a long way yet for Angelina to go to reach the big thousand, who was to say that in the meantime a new avenue would show itself?

With the pact accepted Frank could only stay there, enjoying the view as the actress kept going for hours with her feeding. The manager sat there open mouthed, watching as, inch by inch, her middle began to bloat up and out, filling up with food until it seemed that her humongous belly, stuffed to the maximum, almost seemed to be dwarfing the woman in its size. Without Frank notice, four hours had passed. He had been sitting there for four hours watching the actress filling herself up with food, stuffing herself to the point where she literally couldn’t eat a single crumb more.

And yet, he couldn’t resist.

As she lay there, already asleep out of the exhausting experience of stuffing herself, Frank’s hand moved of its own accord, until it reached the gravid belly, feeling it as tight as a drum. Felipe was quickly at his side, smiling as he placed one of his hands, on Frank shoulder.

“Are we agreed then?”

“Yeah. I’ll do my best…you…could you keep me posted on her…erm…progress?”

Felipe nodded and then accompanied him out of the mansion.

Returning to the antechamber he stood silent for a few minutes, enjoying the sight of the fattened-up Angelina on the couch, filling it all by herself as she slept and digested, without any other care in the world but eating and reaching fullness. As he motioned to the maids to assist their mistress to her new room on the ground floor, he went toward the larder.

He had still someone else to take care before he could start preparing the next dishes to be served to his Mistress. As he arrived, he smiled in seeing Carmencita asleep at her post, several plates emptied at her side as she soundly slept away another fulfilling snack.

The maid was proving to be quite the nice fatty. Already he had ordered for her several custom sized outfits, each time keeping the same label as the original clothes she had. It was a shame he couldn’t weight her but, at eye estimation, after all those months she had to be already in her 300 pounds of weight.

Between the influx of his own cuisine at main mealtimes and all the snacking she did throughout the day, she was getting quite big. Already it was getting harder and harder for her to rise from her desk, reason for him to bring her the meals directly there.

Things in the mansion seemed to return to normalcy. Angelina was kept now, almost constantly, stuffed full as mealtimes and snack times grew ever longer and more numerous than ever. Sometimes Felipe was letting her rest for no more that fifteen minutes between one meal and another, and yet the actress didn’t complain. Until, after a quite long month when things seemed to finally have reached stability, Angelina asked for Felipe in her room.

“Felipe…I...was wondering…is it…normal…that I…can’t seem…to be…able…to move…at all? I seem…to be…always…out of…energies.
Even…talking...has become…strenuous…for me…”


Felipe, moving closer toward the supersized woman forced in bed by her own size, brought her a straw to suck on, as lifting an entire keg of weight gain shake was hardly the easiest thing to do, even for him.

“Here miss, have some of this. It will boost your energy up.

I understand how hard it may seem to be. But it is perfectly normal. Your body is simply adapting to the new schedule we are implementing on you. You’ll see, as soon as your body normalized all of these issues will seem a thing of the past.

Now, finish that drink so that the maids can continue with your meal. Remember, Miss, all of us are working hard for you…it would be a shame to let all our efforts to waste…”

The actress, now completely bedbound, unable to move a single finger of her fattened body, laid there drinking up the shake that her assistant had brought to her, until she was ready for her meal to continue. As the feedings had grown in intensity, her own mind had dulled even more, as she wasn’t using it for nothing but to think of her next meal. True, she was having troubles in moving, even in lifting her hands but, if Felipe said it was ok…it had to be ok.

The poor actress, spoiled and constantly fed as she had been, couldn’t do anything by herself anymore. Whatever Felipe said, she knew it was the truth. And she had to force herself to do as he said. For a fleeting minute she thought of remembering a time when she was the Mistress of the mansion, when she did exercises and walks around the place but, constantly gorged as she was, those memories quickly vanished.

Leaving her remembering that in a few short minutes, her next meal was going to be served.

And she had to be hungry for it.

The actress had truly grown under the influx of the huge feasts that had become her normal staples, her whole body, even though kept majorly healthy, couldn’t resist the effect that having an almost 850 pounds body, was having on her. Her entire form had swelled up, accumulating so much fat that she was actually immobile, still able to move only her mouth and, for a bit, also her head. Everything else from below her neck was out of her control.

She didn’t mind though. There were her maids helping her, some of them cleaned her, other massaged her and a great deal of them simply passed their time filling her with all kinds of fattening junk food and dishes prepared to her directly by Felipe.

The guy, was now dividing his time with Miss Jolie and, also, with Carmencita. The poor aid had finally succumbed to her gluttonous side. She knew to be gaining weight and it didn’t matter to her.

She just wanted more of everything and Felipe was ready to deliver.

All had changed the month before, just as Carmen had broke through the big 400 pounds. At the time she was eating away at one of the decadent meals hand prepared by Felipe. As she was gorging, stuffing her mouth with food, she saw how the other maid looked at her and, feeling their sense of superiority regarding her she realized that she had been fattened up.

Her mindless gorging stopped, and she gave herself a good look. She saw her huge fattened body, her breast so big and fat, without any perkiness, kept up only by the massive bra she had on. Then she felt her buttery belly, so juicy and soft to her touch. Finally, her hands moved toward her rear, feeling it plush and comfy to the touch. It was then that she realized how big she had gotten.

It was as if a dam had burst open in her mind, washing away all of her sense of superiority, all her thoughts about being thin were swept away and what remained was something else. Something she began to cherish. The other maids often, behind her back, called her ‘Cow’.

Carmencita, realizing that eating was now one of the major things she cherished in her life, decided that if she was a cow, then she was going to be the biggest Cow her colleagues had ever seen.

Felipe knew that it was going to be soon the time of separation, already he had issued all needed papers in order to be considered as the sole keeper of Angelina’s funds, if she was to move away from the mansion. This way, he was going to keep himself busy when the actress had to leave for her new, incoming, movie.

Still, with the main dish almost ready and the secondary willing to fatten herself up, he took the steps needed to have them both transferred to their new place. Naturally, even though his Tribe chief had taken contacts with Frank Smith and, between them, had organized the booking of Angelina (and a plus one) for a supposed new block buster movie directed there in central Africa, Felipe knew that the actress wasn’t yet ready to be invited to the Main Festivities.

His cellphone began ringing. It was Frank, now it was Felipe’s turn to act surprised toward the contract manager.

“Felipe? It’s me, Frank. I’ve managed to land a contract of three years for a new movie in central Africa, for Miss Jolie. It’s going to be BIG, you get me? Do you think she’ll be able to fly there within the next two months, as soon as passports and the other documents have been cleared?”

“Already? Mr. Smith, you’re amazing. I will inform her personally…and will remain available if there any of your contacts that may need my…services.”

“Felipe…about that…I may have someone in mind already for you. Will send you all the details as soon as Miss Jolie is on the plane for her movie.

Anyway, I can anticipate this to you, the name I was thinking of is…”
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A plan underway…and the future.

choices: Followed the maids to her room and explored the house on her own.
Asked Felipe for a tour of the house
Asked a few more details about the training
Tried to sneak out and call her Fiancée
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Two months had come and gone I a jiffy. Miss Jolie was already moved to a special transport plane that was going to move her directly in the welcoming arms of Felipe’s Tribe chief. It was going to be his duty then to fatten her up over the thousand pounds she already was, in order to have her as fat as possible under the pretense of having her starring a new blockbuster movie.
But Felipe wasn’t going to return soon to his home country. Now that he had an outpost in the land of possibilities, in the US, he was going to try and gain as much as he could from the opportunity. Using the Mansion of Miss Jolie as his base of operations and through contacts provided by Frank Smith, he was going to try and get more and more celebrities to succumb to his cooking and to his Tribe needs.

And already, a new guest was expected to arrive shortly.

In Felipe’s mind, Frank had done an amazing job. Not only he had managed to have it ‘leaked’ on the web that Angelina was going for the next three years to an unidentified location in Central Africa for a new movie, but he also had processed the entire contract agreement legally, raising no suspicion at all to the authorities in relation to Angelina’s situation. As much as they knew of, at least.

Now though, expecting a new guest, Felipe wanted to have everything under control, up to the minimum detail, before his next target entered the mansion. Frank had requested for her and Felipe was going to do his best, although he knew it was going to be harder than how it had been for Angelina. While the actress had wanted to relax and so hired him, in this scenario he was going to be the advisor to the target, with almost no possibility of forcing her to comply to his desires.

Still, it was a challenge and Felipe couldn’t resist it.


Meanwhile, in Frank smith office, Gwen Stefani sat on a plush chair trying to make a sense of what her manager was saying to her.
“What do you mean that I’m overworked? I’ve always work like this and now, suddenly, I’m in danger for being too stressed?”

“Miss Stefani, please, let me explain.”

“Go on, then, Frank.”

“I don’t know if you were aware of the ‘sudden disappearance’ of the actress Angelina Jolie in the last few months.”

“Yeah, I heard about that. For some time I kept contact with her through some mobile apps but, then my tour started and I hadn’t had time for anything else.”

Frank, sitting comfortably on his chair, moved both elbows on the desk in front of him, keeping his hands linked together as he kept on pouring what he devised as the best action plan he had thought of to ensnare the singer in his and Mr. Mbutu trap.

“Miss Jolie seemingly vanished in the span of nine months from the scene, nobody heard of her, nobody knew what she was doing. Last news it was available was that she had closed an agreement for some Fast food corporation, issuing one of those fundraising she was so proud of. In those months of absence, the gap from her vanishing filled quickly and many upstarts have tried to replace her on the scene.

But, just a few weeks ago, after what had been a training and inspiration regimen, she landed a multi-million contract for a new block buster movie. I, naturally, cannot tell you the details of her contract but, I can guarantee to you that it is worth a mind-boggling amount.”

“So? What is your point? I’m happy for her but, I don’t see the connection with my current situation.”

“Miss Stefani, it is my job to secure a good contract for those who wish to employ me, through my association. You and miss Jolie are some of our best customers and so, I wish only the best for the both of you. Now, I’ve been informed that, behind the sudden increase in expertise for Miss Jolie there is one person responsible. This person is currently still in employment, officially, under her but, with her away for her movie, he is available to lend a hand.

Your career is going in an amazing way but, we can’t deny that you’ve managed to do better in the past. Now, I don’t want to be threatening, it is your life and your choices but, your relationship with Mr. Blake Shelton hasn’t earn much favor with your fans, resulting in a loss of revenues from your side.”

Now, Gwen, began to grow angry.
“What I do with my life and the persons whom I meet is only under My responsibility, Frank. I will not…”

“Please, Miss Stefani, let me finish. I totally understand you and, as I was saying, I don’t want to issue any threats or force you to change anything in your life. I was only pointing out that your revenues are diminishing, and what we would need would be a new album or, better yet, the main role in a new movie.
And since, with only a small training course Miss Jolie was able to land a huge contract as main actor, I was thinking…”

It was then that the singer understood where her manager was going with that discussion.
“You want me to follow the same regimen she followed, under the disguise of a long vacation? But, have you already any lead for a possible new movie that could bring me under the highlights?”

“Well, yes and no.
I’ve heard on the line that in south Africa, one of the richest men of their country is trying to hire Hans Zimmerman to direct a movie with a cast of his countrymen. Which unfortunately doesn’t help our plan but, by grapevine, I’m currently investigating about a rumor regarding this new incoming movie. Apparently, the entire cast should be of people from that nation…except for one single role. As far as I’ve gotten, they were thinking of hiring Miss Angelina Jolie for that role but, as she will be busy with her current movie…”

“You think that if I manage to pass the regimen she did, I could propose myself for that role. Hmm…It wouldn’t be bad to be the leading character in a new colossal, but how will it be considered by US standards?”

“Well, under the directing of Mr. Zimmerman, I suppose it will be regarded just as any other colossal directed here in the States. The problem here, Miss Stefani, is time.
I will keep tracking and following the leads I have but I’ve got to have an answer from you. Will you follow this regimen to enhance your acting abilities, or will you refuse this chance? If that is your decision, I will start anew searching for job possibilities for a singer and actress of your caliber.”

Gwen Stefani was in doubt. She wanted so badly to enter the movie scene, to show everyone around she could do it. But this, this seemed too hard to get. And yet, Angelina managed on her own. She took the risk of leaving the scene for most of a year…and managed to get out of it as a winner. Could she do the same?

“Frank. What will entail IF I accept to follow this ‘regimen’?”

“I managed to extract some info’s from the responsible. As far as I understood, you’ll have to follow a customized diet regimen based on your characteristics, along with a special training, of which he didn’t describe in detail. For security reasons You’ll have to stay for the duration in the mansion of Miss Jolie, as the place is secluded, reserved and protected from any gossip spreading journalists.
This person will follow you day in and day out, for the entire period and will teach you just as he has done with Miss Jolie. Alas, unless you can get him to agree, there will be no contacts from your family and/or friends. That, as he told me, is the one rule he will not bend.”

“Very well, Frank. If that is the case…Take contact with this guy. I’ll do it. If Angie managed, I will do better.”

As the singer left the office, requesting for the contacts and the instructions to be sent to her, along with the legal papers, Frank grinned deeply within himself.
‘Yes, Gwen, you shall do excellently. I’m sure that Felipe will change you just as he has done with Angelina.’


In the span of a couple of days, all legal documents were signed between Frank association and Gwen Stefani, and the singer was finally able to go and train herself under the care of her new, soon to be, personal assistant.

Mr. Felipe Mbutu.

When the two of them were finally one n front of the other, they sat in one of the antechambers in Jolie’s mansion. Stefani, richly dressed as usual, stared with a hint of lust and some perplexity at the giant of a man that was sitting in front of her.

“So, you’re the one behind Angie rise to the glory, uh?”

“That is correct, Miss Stefani. My name is Felipe Mbutu, pleased to meet you. If from your side is agreeable, I would like to keep things informally, for the duration of the regimen.”

“Mph…yeah. Alright. So, what should I do? How exactly do you want to proceed? Are there presentations that I’ve got to be following? Books to read?”

Felipe smiled at the singer question as he, slowly moved his head side by side.
“Not at all.
We will first start with a relaxation program, mainly diet and a few activities to be carried on, within the span of four to six weeks, depending on how good you perform at it. Afterwards, for no less than six months, in case you’ve managed to perform to satisfaction, we will start with intense training sessions to help you reach the objective of the entire course. In the last, ideally, eight weeks, you’ll be tasked to perform with an audience of carefully selected participants to show what have you learned in the previous training sessions.

This will be the regime you shall follow. Now, have today as a day off and, if you have any need, do not hesitate to let me know. I will gladly help.

Any friends of Miss Jolie, is also a friend of mine.”

As Felipe made to leave the room, letting the singer to rest a bit, she…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A singer into the mix

choices: Focused on two things, eating and Frank himself
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Just as Felipe was leaving the room, the singer rose from her seat to stop him

“P-Please, wait. I…I wanted to ask you if you could give me a tour of the place?”

“But of course. It will be my pleasure. Here, please to follow me…”

As they were moving through the house, Gwen could see that the mansion wasn’t as big as her own in Beverly Hills, still it was altogether quite impressive. Her coach, Felipe, showed her around the bedrooms, the bathrooms, the library and then into the lush garden surrounding the building.

She especially loved the pool house with the included Gym and how everything seemed brand new.

“So, Felipe, are you sure Angelina would agree in having me living here? I mean, I don’t want to…”

“Please, Miss Stefani. I already discussed the matter with Miss Jolie, there is no issue in having you around, especially if at the same time we both can help you to rise in the movie scene. Now, let me show you your room and then, at your leisure, we will meet again in the dining room so that as we have dinner, I will explain to you how the regimen will be placed.”

The singer was soon left with her luggage in a very wide and opulent room, everything was so richly detailed that Stefani couldn’t stop herself from giggling time to time. Still, as she took in the size of the bed she almost choked on her laughs.

“Woah…this thing is huge! It could contain easily six or seven of me in there!”

What she wasn’t aware of was that in that same room Angelina had spent most of her time in the past, as Felipe worked his magic on her. Still, albeit not aware of that fact, she still enjoyed the soft mattress and, little by little, began to unpack her things.

At the same time, deep in the kitchen, Felipe was hard at work. He had at least nine months to work on Gwen Stefani, but he knew already that probably he had to extend that time. The singer was an accomplished woman, one who had renounced to a profitable band to try her career on her own, for a time. He had to break her if he wanted her to bend under his control. And that wasn0t going to be easy.

For a moment he paused, thinking fondly of that first dinner he had with Angelina Jolie, how she almost melted in his arms as she fell for his delicious and addictive dishes. The actress had actually wanted to relax and find peace and all he had to do was to give her exactly that. The singer, instead, wanted to prove herself to the world once more. HE would have to work hard, he was sure of it, to break her will.

Still, before taking any actions he had to verify her adversary effective willpower.

And to do that he was going to prepare a dinner that would have placed in shame a five-star restaurant chef. His objective for that evening was to test her and see where her limits were.

Felipe felt full of energy. He could hardly wait.

That evening, Gwen Stefani, after being informed by one of the maids that dinner was ready, decided to show up fashionably late, almost fifteen minutes past the call. She wanted to see too what kind of person this African guy was but, as she entered the dining room, she stood speechless. The room was organized as if a grand banquet was going to be hosted there, everything seemed so formal and classy that she herself, dressed in her jeans and a t-shirt, felt almost out of place. Still, Felipe was standing proud at the head of the table, motioning her to sit beside him as dinner was about to start.

“So, Felipe, it’s every day that this room is decorated as if a grand gala is taking place?”

“Well, generally Miss Jolie preferred a more informal approach but, since I wasn’t aware of your own preferences I preferred to prepare as I saw better, hoping to have you pleased.”

“Nah, keep it informal also for me, alright? Now, what’s on the menu for tonight?”

Felipe, at that, moved from her side and brought forward a small pan, from which he began to pour some soup into a plate, serving it then to Gwen.

“Here, Miss, we have as an Amuse-bouche a Vichyssoise soup, served warm for your enjoyment. It is a soup composed of leek, potatoes and onion, with a hint of thyme and marjoram.”

As Felipe kept talking about the soup, Gwen grabbed a spoon and tasted it, cautiously. But the taste invaded her taste buds so delicately that she found herself intrigued by the plate. As she kept taking spoonful after spoonful, seeing as the guy kept talking confidently about the origin of the dish she realized pretty quick that at the very least, he was truly a wonderful chef and not only one who blabbered about it but unable to perform. Still, in few minutes the plate was empty and before she could ask for some more, a maid appeared at her side and swiftly took the plate away, as another on gave her a new plate.

Felipe then moved closer ad brought forward the next dish. This time he poured into the plate what seemed to be some sort of squishy looking slice of pie.

“Here Miss, as appetizer, we have a Quiche a la Benedict. It contains mainly asparagus prepared in a soft roll of baked bread, with small dices of Canadian bacon to give it a somewhat strong aftertaste…”

Gwen looked at the new dish with trepidation, she had found the soup so good that she was wondering how good this cakey-thingy could be. Still, as she took a piece and brought it within her lips she found herself unable to release the fork from her mouth as a smile appeared on her face. Quickl enough she polished off also the quiche, feeling it going down her throat and into her stomach without an hint of heaviness. Within only fifteen minutes, the entire slice of quiche vanished and, same as before, the used plate was moved away and quickly replaced with a new one.

“Good god…Felipe…you must be something else.
Wait…how many more plates you’ve prepared?”

“Miss, We have still to deliver to you, your full course meal. May I?”

Before she could reply, a new delicious looking dish was place before her. This time it was what appeared as a simple Caesar salad, but as she tried it and Felipe described it , Gwen began to wonder how such a simple plate could be prepared to be as tasteful as that. As she rapidly cleaned the small bowl out, she marveled if the guy was really behind this dished by himself or if he had received any help.

If he had prepared them by himself she was surely going to enjoy living there with him.

After the salad, Felipe delivered onto the singer a delicate and, quite refreshing dish of fresh fish, cooked in a sweet white sauce, which he described but, as she was far too lost in pleasure, she couldn’t listen. Then in what seemed a long series she found herself submerged by the two main courses, interrupted by a small portion of that soup she had loved so much at the beginning of the meal, and then he brought to her a mix of various kind of cheeses and other dairies products, to which she enjoyed with large amount of bread and wine.

‘Finally...’ she thought ‘It’s over…I couldn’t eat another bite.’

Gwen Stefani was slumped on the chair, her bloated pot belly, pushing again the waist of her jeans as she tried to keep inside of her all the food that it had been given to her.

“Was everything of your satisfaction Miss Stefani?”

“Staisf...*urp*…Satifaction? Yes…but…too much. I’m not used to eat…so much… so good though…”

“But, Miss, we haven’t finished yet.”

At this the singer grew pale in the face, as she slowly turned her head toward the man standing beside her.

“N-Not finished?”

“No, Miss. There is still fruits to have, followed by Dessert and after Dessert.”

Gwen felt like she was going to explode, but before Felipe could bring more, she raised her hand, while gasping for breath.

“Felipe, tha…Thank you very much but..I can’t. I’m full.”

“Not even a slice of pie?”

“No, sorry. Don’t get me wrong, everything tasted delicious, but I can’t eat a single bite more. If I was still hungry, I would gladly accept but, as I’m feeling now? No can’t do.”

A couple of hours later, as Gwen Stefani had been helped to her bedroom to sleep off her food baby, Felipe was back into the kitchen, preparing the schedule to be discussed with her guest in the following morning. He had now an idea of her character, she had some willpower for she had actually resisted the temptation of having even a hint of his desserts, but still she admitted having a weakness with her hunger.

He had only to force it to grow a bit more and then she too would fall.
