It was only a matter of deciding how, after all Frank had been specific about her. He wanted her fat but also…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A tour of the place

choices: Gwen and the attack of the munchies at the pool
A neighbor sees Stefani in Jolie’s mansion and come around to investigate
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Felipe smiled as he wrote down the plan as he envisioned it.

Frank requests about Stefani were very precise. He wanted her to be focused on him, as in love with him. And addicted to eating.

The second one was the simplest of the two. Felipe wouldn’t have no troubles at all in change that aspect of her but, the challenge was to make her fall in love with the contract Manager. There was the issue.

Still, if he could break her on her eating habits, he could also find a way to force her to believe to love Frank. After all, even though he was doing this to seal the deal with the manager, for his assistance with Angelina and all future endeavors, Stefani wasn’t going to be sent to his Tribe (unless Frank didn’t change his mind, of course) and so even if she returned to her senses sometime later, while in company of Frank, Felipe wouldn’t have lost any moment of sleep.

Now, it was time for him to concentrate. He had nine months to change Gwen Stefani from being an A+ Singer to an A+ Eater. Cackling a bit within himself he started baking for the following morning. Breakfast was an important meal after all.

Gwen woke up slowly the following morning, she still felt kind of sluggish and bloated as she rose from the king-sized bed. More asleep than awake she first went into the bathroom, to wake herself up with a quick shower but, as soon as she was under the water she realized that her once flat toned belly, was now retaining a bit of flab on top of it.

‘Man! That dinner was good but, I can’t get myself to enjoy that too much…I need to lose this somehow.
I’ll just ask Mbutu to help me accordingly.’

As she finished cleaning up, she returned into her room only to find a maid in there waiting for her to show up.

“Good Morning, Miss Stefani. I’m Helen, I’ll be your personal maid as per Mr. Mbutu’s orders. Please, have a seat and relax, let me handle your preparations for the day.”

Gwen Stefani was too surprised to present any kind of opposition, and soon found herself seating on the bed as the maid dressed her up with a common looking pair of sweatpants and a sweat shirt. As soon as Gwen was dressed up, she accompanied her toward the kitchen, chatting a bit with the famous singer.
A few minutes later, Gwen was seating at the table in the kitchen, staring astonished as the huge guy, Felipe, kept preparing her breakfast, while telling her more of the Regimen she was going to be following.

“So, Miss Stefani…”

“Please, call me Gwen, alright?”

“As you desire, Miss Gwen. As I was saying yesterday, the regimen you’re going to follow is one made with the exact objective of making you capable of being the biggest star around. In Miss Jolie’s case, it had the need to extend her acting capabilities…and, as much as you Manager told me, you wish to reach her same level of ability.”

“That is right, Felipe. I want to show everyone that I can be an actress as good as Angelina, if not better than her.”

“Well, much will depend on your own attitude toward the regimen but, with this course, you’ll have a large increase in your capabilities. No doubt about that. Now, for the hard part. Yesterday I gave you a quick example of the training course, today I’ll try to give you the final version. The course will be separated into three distinct phases:

Phase One: R&R. What I like to define as Rest & Relaxation. During the first three months you’ll have to reach a total relaxation into your life. Not only on your body level but also inside your mind.
For this reason, in this phase, you shall do no exercises nor having any stressful activity during your day. You’ll just rest and recover.”

Seeing as the singer was about to interrupt, he motioned toward her with a finger.

“Please, let me finish. Then you can ask me anything about the course.

Then, as I was saying, we have Phase Two: Fitting in. Once the ‘Total Relaxation’ has been reached we will gradually implement specific exercises to both keep you trained while keeping you under the less stress possible, so to train your body to overcome any obstacle you may encounter in a period of, ideally, three months.

Phase Three: Powering-up. In this last phase, as your body and mind are trained to manage stressful situations, we will push through a long series of hard and strenuous exercises and activities so to give you the boost you need to be able to perform in front of a live audience. Also this period will take around three months to be completed.

As you can see, ideally, in the span of nine months, you’ll be ready to arrive on the scene and becoming the biggest star around.”

As Felipe kept talking about the regimen that Gwen Stefan had to follow, the girl didn’t take any notice of the plates that the guy was giving to her or about their contents. As she was focused on him and his explanation, she blindly kept eating anything he placed under her nose. In this way, and with the aid of the maid stationed at her side, every time she cleaned a plate, the empty one was swiftly taken away and replaced with a new one. With this simple trick, Gwen had polished unconsciously three plates already, which had been once filled with pancakes smothered in syrup.

As soon as Felipe finished, the singer burped a little but didn’t let that unfazed her toward asking her doubts at what was going to be her trainer.

“So…*urp*…let me understand. During phase one I’ll do nothing. In phase two, I’ll do little…and in phase three…I’ll do everything else? Why not having everything equally divided?”

“That’s the regimen I put Miss Jolie under. And you have seen already the results she obtained.
Please to understand this, Miss Gwen, I’m not doing this to help you or to obtain anything out of you.

This is a favor that I’m doing for your Manager, Frank. Due to this, if you are not interested in following the training as I have envisioned, then there is nothing else to say between us.

I don’t want to sound rude but, I’m tired of people ready to dismantle any achievement of mine, by going through what They think is best.”

The singer stood silent for a minute, slowly taking in the firm tone of voice of Felipe.

She realized with a start that it was the first time she heard him with a hint of anger in his voice, since she had arrived. She also realized that she had to be thanking her manager for giving her such an opportunity. At first, she thought that Frank had simply used ‘her’ money to hire this guy but, if what he said was true, it meant that Frank had managed to grant her this opportunity all by himself.

‘Got to have to thank him properly when I see him…’

With those thoughts in mind she breathed deeply and calmed herself, before answering to the Felipe.

“I…I’m sorry. I didn’t want to sound as if I could do your job better than you. I was just curious on the time frame for each phase. In any case, I do want to gain the same level of ability that Angie managed to reach so, I’ll follow your instruction…Coach.”

Felipe grinned inside. Most people who wanted something from someone else would simply surrender at the first sign of losing the possibility of reaching their wishes. Gwen Stefani was no exception.

Still, he now had to continue with the act, in order to make everything believable.

“Again, Miss Gwen, I apologize if I sounded rude to you. I haven’t anything personal against you, instead, I must confess that you seem quite the good-natured person, so I’m doubly ashamed of letting my anger to pass through.

Anyway, let bygone be bygones, as some would say, and start anew from a fresh slate.
After years of testing and trials I found out that, due to the stress levels that can be reached during the regimen, the quarterly division was the better suited plan to efficiently organize the course. That being said, certain changes can be brought forward, although I will need time to ensure that the regime won’t be affected by them. Anyway, in order to start properly, Miss Gwen, you need to have some breakfast.”

Gwen was going to point out that she already was eating something but, as she looked down, she realized that the table was crystal clear, and no utensils were around.

‘But…But I thought…Maybe I’m still a bit sleepy…’

Before she could reply, Felipe brought to her a normal sized plate, containing some fried bacon strips and a couple of brownies, and a rather large cup of coffee.

“Here you go, Miss. After breakfast, may I suggest that you could go and have a little sun bath at the pool? The weather is marvelous today. Just remember…”

“No exercises…yeah, I got that, Felipe.
Oh and, thanks.”

Gwen smiled at her coach, as she began gingerly eating the bacon strips, while having a few sips of her coffee, marveling at the taste of it. Strong and, yet, sweet.

‘Man, this guy sure knows his way around a stove, that’s for sure…’

As she cleaned her plate, she saw how her belly had bloated up but, simply thought that it was still a residual from the previous day dinner. She never seemed to realize that she had already eaten way more than her usual share. As the singer personal maid accompanied her toward the pool, Felipe showed a toothy grin. It wasn’t time yet to bring in his herbal knowledge but, soon she would be ready for it.

He had just to wait the right moment to strike…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Trying to steer the singer's will and fate

choices: Break her will. Make her submissive toward Felipe himself.
2 Focus her on her guilt, force her to be grateful toward Frank
Point her toward food. Increase massively the dosage she would normally have
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Gwen had to admit that Felipe had been right. As she lay on the deck chair at the pool, dressed up in her bikini, she was thoroughly enjoying the weather as she sunbathed. Still, as she lay there, she soon grew bored and began to wonder if her Coach instructions had to be followed to the letter.

‘Well, he said no exercise at all but, exercising makes me feel relaxed. How can I grow more relaxed and stress-free if I can’t do what I enjoy?’

With a swift movement, quickly looking around, she saw that her personal maid was nowhere in sight. With a sigh of relief and, with the guilty pleasure of doing something naughty, she rapidly rose from her chair and began to do a quick series of relaxing exercises, to prepare her muscles for the incoming strain.
Right after that, she took off her shoes and began to have a small jog all around the garden, enjoying the feel of the soft grass under her feet or the pleasurable breeze passing on her running form. As she kept doing lap after lap, she began to feel more relaxed, although her small potbelly jiggled to and from at her every step.

Watching through the security surveillance feed, Felipe saw that the singer was already disobeying his orders and began to think about the best way to get back at her.

“Not even one day and, already, she goes against what was promised not even half an hour before. This one surely is strong willed. Yet, I can’t let her do as she please. She needs to learn a lesson.
But, what would be the best course of action?”

As the morning progressed, Gwen felt happier than ever. After a quick dip in the pool to refresh herself, she returned back to her chair, and acted sleepy when Felipe appeared out in the foyer, as her personal maid trailed behind him with a tray of goodies.

“Hey…*Yawn*…Felipe. Your idea was so good. Thanks for suggesting it.”

“Not a problem, Ma’am. I’ve asked Helen here to bring you your mid-morning snack. Please to enjoy it. Thanks Helen, you may return to your duties.”

Gwen looked askance at her Coach demeanor and was even more impressed by how subdued the young maid appeared to be. But before she could ask a question to either of them, they both left the tray at her side and swiftly returned inside the house. Still surprised by this she stood dumbfounded for a minute. Felipe hadn’t seemed the guy to keep out such a cold and distanced stance. From the little time she had known him, he had seemed to be quite the warm guy, so this cold shoulder they both had given her left her wordless.

Still, as she looked at the goodies they had brought her, she hid a frown from showing up. She was both relieved and sad as she saw the content of the tray. Just a couple of protein bar and a bottle of water. While those were the snacks, she knew were good for her, she still had expected from someone as good at the stoves as Felipe, something more personalized and…yes, somewhat tastier.

As she lay at the pool side, she quickly polished off the bars, and yet she wasn’t feeling satisfied. For a moment she thought about going inside the house and ask for more but, again, the cold demeanor shown by Felipe left her with the feeling that she wouldn’t like to face him so soon.

As midday approached, Gwen finally saw Helen coming out of the mansion, walking toward her. Barely she had been able to greet her that the maid informed her that Lunch was going to be called soon and, right after that she scampered away, leaving the singer quite surprised.

‘What’s going on, here?’

As Gwen rose from her chair she swiftly followed the maid inside, arriving into the kitchen with expectancy of a deliciously cooked meal. For sure Felipe had prepared something tasty for her. In her mind, the singer, thought back to the dinner she had had the night before. True, the portions were a bit too big, but the taste. She still fondly remembered the taste of each delicious plate. With her expectation set that high she looked dumbfounded as she entered the kitchen and saw that a small bowl of tasteless salad was waiting her at the small table near the kitchen stoves. As she looked around, she couldn’t see Felipe anywhere. Due to this she turned toward the maid which, stoically, was standing perfectly still near the entrance.

“Helen? What’s the meaning of this? Where’s Felipe?”

“Miss Stefani, I have to inform you that Mr.Mbutu is deeply sorry but he’s unable to join you at this time. You may start your lunch without him.”

Gwen stared at the maid with a dubious glance as she notices that even Helen, with which she had laughed and joked that same morning, seemed to have turned as hard and cold as a stone.

“Helen, what is going on? Why all of you are so…cold, toward me?”

“Miss Stefani, I’m sorry to say that I don’t know what you mean. If you have any complaint about me, you just need to let Mr. Mbutu about it, as soon as he’ll be available.”

Now the singer was getting angry. This was right down offensive in her eyes, she didn0t know what their problems were but she was soon going to find it out. Quickly she grabbed the bowl of salad and tossed it away, as she angrily stared down at the maid.

“Now, listen me closely. I’m losing my patience. I demand to speak to Felipe. NOW! I don’t know what’s going on but, I will find out.”

As the singer continued to trash the kitchen, suddenly the double doors leading into the hallway opened and there Felipe appeared, sharply dressed as a butler, instead of his previous chef attire.

“I heard you wanted to talk with me, Madam?”

“’Course I want to talk with you. And cut the crap with these ‘madams’ of yours. Told you already, Felipe, call me Gwen.”

“I’m deeply sorry, Madam. Can’t do that.”

Now Gwen was puzzled. Again the guy was giving her the cold shoulder, showing off as much emotion as a rock.

“And why, do tell, you can’t call me by name? If it isn’t much to ask?”

“Simply put, Madam. If by acting informally around you, you feel you can cheat on the same rules issued this very morning, then there is no reason for me to keep doing that. As per what we said this morning, I’m sorry to see that your words have no grain of truth behind.

So, instead of letting you cheat on the training I so hardly worked on, it’s better to have you yourself decide how to train yourself. For this reason, I shall await your commands.”

“What? What are you talking about? I…I haven’t…”

“Please, Madam. Do not embarrass yourself with foolish lies. I’ve seen you performing exercises not even half an hour past our mutual agreement of you following my regimen. Still, it is up to you to decide and so, give me my orders, and I shall execute them.”

Gwen, speechless, sat on a nearby chair. Realizing now that she had been seen. At the time she thought othing of it but, as she thought about it now, she knew she had broken her word barely a few minutes after talking with Felipe. As that realization arrived, she began to feel ashamed of herself. Red faced she turned back on Felipe, and saw that the guy, although tried to hid it, was deeply wounded by her demeanor.

“I…I’m sorry. I shouldn’t have…”

“Madam, do not concern yourself over this. I know that I can’t be as smart and resourceful a you are. I’m only a servant, after all.”

As those words were expressed, Gwen felt even more shameful. She wanted to take those words and pushed them back to the guy, but how could she do that? It was the truth. She had really thought of being better than Felipe, even though she had promised him to follow his instructions.

“Felipe…Please. I…I know I made a mistake. Please, let me…I don’t know. What can I do to show you I’ll follow your training?”

Felipe hid well the smile that wanted to come out on his face. Now, now was the perfect time to strike at Gwen Stefani and train her to be what He needed her to be. With a bit of shame on her part, his herbal knowledge and firm hand he was in the perfect position to start break her down.

Softening his features, he turned toward the singer.

“Miss Gwen, I think you now realize how deeply you’ve hurt me? Right this morning you seemed to have understood how dearly I care for this training of my creation, how prideful I am of it, seeing the results with Miss Jolie. And yet, right after you promised me to follow it, you simply went and broke that promise.

Why should I trust you? How can I trust you?

I could’ve understood if you’d have gone back after a few weeks…but not even half a day?

Not even one hour?”

“I…I know. And I’m sorry. I will not let you down anymore.”

As she said that, Gwen realized that she had been, no, she was still on the brink of losing everything she wished for, everything Frank had managed to get for her. She wanted to have her big spot on the Movies, to show everyone she could be a great actress…and she almost blew it on a whim.

“I swear, Felipe, I’ll follow your lead to the letter. I won’t risk this chance you’re giving me again.”

Felipe grinned once more. She was now vulnerable. He needed only to decide how to strike at her…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Cheating the regimen for personal satisfaction

choices: Let her feel in debt toward Frank, she needs to start having feeling for him
Helen, the Maid, seems to have some interest in Gwen’s growth
Gwen start to see some pudge on her and doesn’t know what to think…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Felipe looked at the singer, as she stood in front of him, still in her bikini. He could see that she had still a bit of a pot belly from the large breakfast she’s had unconsciously consumed. Still, he wished for her much more and to obtain that he decided that he couldn’t give her a straight answer.

“Miss Gwen, I’m willing to give you a second chance, but… If before I could have trusted you, I won’t do so anymore, until I’m sure you’ve learned. For this reason, from now on, I expect you to follow the indication provided to you as if your life depends on it. Can you do that?”

Gwen, still feeling ashamed of having ruined the trust that her Coach had in her, nodded slowly. In that moment, she promised herself that she was going to do whatever needed, no matter what was required.

Felipe seemed accepting the response and, with a gesture of his hand, invited the singer to sit near the kitchen, as he started up preparing her lunch.

“As we said this morning, Miss Gwen, during this first phase you’ve got to learn how to relax by doing non stressful activities.
Which mean, no exercises, no work, no social gatherings. For this period you’ll pass your time watching TV, doing yoga, if so you wish, or playing videogames. Not much more.

Any activity which requires you to move around and/or be subjected to stress will be ruled out. Now, to relax your mind I already stated the activities you’ll have to perform. To relax your body is quite similar.

The only way to speed up the process is to store energy within yourself.”

“Store energies?”

“In these three months, I’ll personally prepare all your meals and you’ll eat them. Was I clear?”

“Yes. Crystalline.”

Felipe smiled a bit at that. Although, his eyes told her a different story. From the glare he gave her she trembled a bit, knowing full well that if those eyes could talk they would have said “We shall see…”, but she wasn’t going to be deterred by something so small. Even though the eating part scared a bit, she quickly realized she hadn’t any choice. She had to follow the regimen, if she was going to gain a few pounds, she would just lose them soon as she was out of there with the same abilities Angie had matured under Felipe.

A few minutes later, Gwen saw that her Coach had seemingly finished preparing something on the stove and still she stood shocked in seeing a large plate filled with some kind of Mac & Cheese directly under her nose. For a moment she looked at in confused but, as she realized that it had to be some kind of test, she simply took her fork and shoveled a first bite in. Immediately she moaned in delight. She could taste several different types of cheese in the sauce, and yet all of them amalgamated perfectly with each other. As she began taking forkful off the plate, Felipe began to describe the plate to her, to which she found herself almost enthralled by both his voice droning on about taste and sauces and ingredients, and the actuale heavenly taste of the dish itself.

Soon, she cleared the plate, and had to force herself not to lick it clean. Yet, just as she cleaned the first course, Felipe brough forward a second course, this time there was a large steak of beef, grilled to perfection and yet, still a bit raw, on the side of the plate a small mountain of fries. As she cut herself a piece, she couldn’t refrain from squirming in her seat a bit.

Once more the taste was incredible.

And, although there was a spice in there she didn’t recognize, overall the plate was perfection. As she swallowed the morsel, she took some fries and the salty counterpart made her head spin, this were heavily fried fries, and yet the overwhelming taste of the oil was almost absent. Under the watchful eyes of Felipe, Gwen quickly cleared also this second plate. She was beginning to feel full and yet, she wasn’t. Looking down she could see her belly growing puffier with each plate consumed, but everything was so good she couldn’t stop. Next came a small dish with some caramelized apple slices. Even though she thought to be full, as soon as the aroma coming from the dish hit her nostrils she began to salivate, feeling deep within herself the need to have, at the very least, some of those delicacies. So she began, at first with small gingerly bites, to get at those slices of fruit-dessert, but as she took a bite out of those, she couldn’t stop from loudly moaning a she chewed, feeling both the crunchy from the caramelized cover and the soft, sweet, heart of the apple. Slowly she savored them, licking her fingers happily as she cleaned the plate.

Burping softly, Gwen realized that as though she was feeling her belly weighing her down quite a bit, due to the huge amount of food she had consumed, she still felt a bit hungry, especially as she saw Felipe move closer to her, placing a last plate under her eyes. Caressing her bloated middle, she looked enraptured to this last dish she had been served as she cleaned her lips with a napkin.
This time, he carried to her a small, richly decorated, soft pastry, that it smelled vaguely of roses. Yet, even though she was getting to be quite full already, she smiled at him and simply munched the little tart with ease, feeling it as it went down her throat nice and smooth.

Panting lightly, not used to eat this much, Gwen turned her look again on her coach, but he still was watching her quite coldly.

‘True, can’t expect him to change his mind in just one day…Still, he’s a great chef, no doubt about that.’

As the meal was over, Helen came at her side, helping her standing and bringing her back toward the pool, to lay a bit and have a nap in the wonderful weather that there was outside. The singer burped a bit as she moved with her new food baby, and yet, as soon as she was laying on her deck chair, she fell asleep. Her belly gurgling as it digested the large meal. When Gwen woke up the sun was still high in the sky, checking her phone she saw that she had slept almost three hours on the deck chair, and already she began to stand from there when she stopped herself suddenly.

She looked down and saw that, although her bloated belly had deflated somewhat, it still retained a bit of pudge. But it didn’t seem as bad as it was right after lunch. As she mulled it over, she heard footsteps coming toward her. Craning her neck she saw Helen coming her way, holding a quite large tray in her hands.

“Miss Gwen? You’re awake, good. I’ve got here your mid-afternoon snack. All part of the regimen you’re following.”

As the singer still laying on the deck chair stared at the maid, this one placed the tray right on Gwen’s thighs, just as the singer looked in shock at what had been brought to her.

‘Holy crap…’

Right in front of her lay the tray that Helen had brought to her, filled with a mix of various baked sweets.

In the tray, in fact, there seemed to be a couple of any baked sweet she has ever known, and even she hadn’t ever seen before. There were donuts, at least three pair of them, a couple of eclairs, some bear claws and then she saw a few small round sweets made of apparently sponge cake layered with ricotta cheese and candied fruit. Curious about these strange sweets she grabbed one and gave it a bite feeling its soft texture almost melting in her mouth, with a touch of liqueur burning a bit in her throat. AS she moaned in pleasure, Helen moved forward, offering her some suggestions.

“Miss Stefani, if I may…The one you’re tasting now is an Italian recipe called ‘Cassata’. It is said that although it may seem to be quite a feat to consume, it truly isn’t. I also suggest you to try these as they are…”

Pretty soon, with the suggestion coming from the maid, Gwen found herself practically shoveling those sweets in her mouth, enjoying the rich taste of them, as she lost herself in the deliciousness of the various pastries. Soon, too soon in her mind, she found her hand searching n the tray for more, only to find crumbs and some residual powdered sugar.

‘What? I’ve really cleaned the full tray?’

Yet, she couldn’t deny to herself that everything tasted delicious and that she didn’t feel as bloated and weighted down as she expected herself to feel. It was with a somewhat deluded expression that she gave the, now empty, tray back to the maid and she returned to lay down on the deck chair.

The singer looked sheepishly at her, once more, bloated middle but it was only for a few fleeting moments, right before sleep caught to her once more and she let herself go in a calm nap, as her body began digesting the new income of calories. This process kept going for several days, with Felipe using the singer shame to force her to stand down and willingly accept anything he prepared for her. And as days passed, each meal started to slowly become heavier than the previous.

Still, Gwen rebelled less and less to this treatment, her willpower reducing as the weight of her shame was returned to her again and again. Soon enough she stopped entirely to try and fight back, instead accepting each meal brought to her as she tried to please Felipe with her eagerness in following his rules.

Felipe smiled at this turn of events.

With Gwen willpower reduced to dust, he had now free hand to shape her as he wanted.

He could force on her the idea that she had to do even more to please him or, now that she was somewhat subjugated to him, he could try and persuade her to grow some like of emotions, some feelings for Frank.

In any case, he had to start using the herbal tea on her, as he needed her to grow faster in order to break her down once and for all.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Breaking Stefani willpower

choices: Double the doses, make her blow out with fat!
Keep thing as they’re going. Felipe’s getting suspicious
Gwen start loving this kind of life, she really needs to thank Frank
Stefani wonder about her suspicious size
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Gwen Stefani kept following the schedule from her Coach, someone watched her inflating figure from the shadows.

Helen, the personal maid assigned to Miss Stefani, had always worked diligently, being mostly invisible to the eyes of any guest of her employer, as any maid should have done. But, since the change in management, with the departure of Miss Jolie and the installment of that strange man, Mr. Mbutu, Helen was finding difficult to remain focused on her job.

Helen had, in fact, always hidden deep below in her personality, a secret from the eyes of all around her.

Since her time in high school she had always been a secretive obesiphile. She had always enjoyed seeing other people grow fat or to help them get fat while never being under the spotlight. When she was working for Miss Jolie, it hadn’t been so bad. She had always managed to keep her desire only to a fantasy level.

Under Felipe guidance instead, with the parade of fatties that was starting to pass through the mansion she was finding harder and harder to resist. Especially since she had seen from the shadows how Miss Jolie had ballooned, along with Carmencita. Still, at the time she had managed to resist. Now, though, with the famous singer Gwen Stefani following the same treatment she knew she couldn’t stand it anymore. She had to have an active hand in the process started by Mr.Mbutu.

With this new goal set in her mind, as she brought the first breakfast to the singer room, under Felipe’s instruction, she added of her own decision a few selected items to the portions she had to bring. Entering the room, she saw that Miss Stefani had just woken up and was, now, sitting in her bed, curiously inspecting the small layer of pudge that had started to show on her middle.

“Good Morning, Gwen.”

“Ah! Helen, hi.”

“I’ve here your breakfast, as per Mr. Mbutu request.”

As she said that, she brought the tray toward the singer,pacing it on her quilt covered thighs, as Gwen looked in surprise to the ‘hearty’ meals awaiting her. Under her eyes, in fact, there were a four eggs omelette, four large sausages, a rather large mound of fried bacon strips, a few fried slices of tomatoes and two vanilla milkshakes. To this, Helen, had added also a couple muffins which she had baked the night before while adding into the batter some appetite stimulants.
As Gwen began eating the massive meal, still trying to follow up the instructions of Felipe, she decided to ask a few questions to the maid that was milling around in the room.

“Uhm…Helen? May I…*munch*…ask you a question?”

“Sure, Miss. If I can assist in any way…”

“Do you think I’ve put on weight?”

Helen, a bit embarrassed but, also, turned on, at first seemed to take time to answer, then she turned toward Gwen and, while smiling as sincerely as possible, she answered back.

“Mmh. If I can be sincere, I don’t see anything really. So, it may be that you’re feeling like you’ve gained weight due to the stress of living in a new environment.”

Stefani, as she cleared the eggs and the sausages, drinking them down with the first milkshake, cleaned her lis with a napkin, before turning her stare on the garden visible through the window in the room.

“Hum…Maybe you’re right.”

With that she took one of Helen’s muffin and began, distractedly to nibbling it. Helen, instead, began to observe as much as she could without being detected. In a few minutes she noticed that Stefani started to eat more fiercely at the muffin, cleaning it out in a few bites, turning then on the second one, unaware that her hunger was only going t grow stronger.

Stefani had eaten most of her meal, feeling content already but, as she nibbled on the muffin she began to feel her hunger returning. In few moments she found herself as if starving and, quickly, she began to devour also the second muffin and even whatever was still on her plate. With the tray cleaned out she let out a wistful sigh in seeing Helen carry it out, leaving her alone for the morning, with no more food available.

Gwen, knowing full well how Felipe wanted her to follow his treatment, didn’t raise any fuss, although she was still feeling a bit hungry.

Helen, as she carried the empty tray back to the kitchen was almost giggling in joy. The experiment had been a success, but, since she didn’t want to intrude too much on Felipe’s plans, she decided to keep on giving, once or twice per day, the stimulants to the singer, but without upping the portions dedicated to her too much. This way, it was going to be Stefani the one requesting to up the portion and she, Helen, could remain in the shadows.

As days passed, Felipe noticed that Gwen Stefani was managing to clean out anything he sent to her. As he had done with Angelina, he wanted to keep things slow at first but, the singer seemed to have other ideas in mind. As Felipe was cleaning the kitchen, preparing it for lunch time, he was suddenly interrupted by the presence of Gwen Stefani. Turning to look at her he saw immediately she was well on her way to acquiring some definite pudge on her middle but, what surprised him the most was the request she had come to ask to him.

“Felipe? Sorry, can I disturb you for a moment?”

“Sure, Gwen. Tell me, what can I do for you?”

“I…I don’t want to sound like I’m objecting to your treatment and your plans but…lately I’m finding the portions that I’m receiving…way too small. Would it be possible to increase them a little? I mean…”

Felipe was intrigued by the request. He already was preparing her meals with quantity enough for two people and, yet, Gwen seemed to be wanting even more of it. At first, he thought of a secondary effect of his Tea but, he hadn’t started to give it to her yet. The only thing he could think of was that Gwen had started to reveal her gluttonous side and so, how could he ask her to curb it?

“I…Ok. No worries, Miss Gwen. Will increase your portions a bit, maybe add a few more snacks throughout the day?”

At that Gwen nodded contently, just as her little belly rumbled in appreciation. Felipe, smiling, invited her to take a set nearby as he kept preparing lunch, while giving her a plate with a few brownies he had asked Helen to prepare the night before.

“Here Miss, I think you can have some of these, if you want.”

As He watched Gwen attacking the plates of sweet he wondered if, considering the increased appetite of the singer, it was still a good idea to start giving her also his herbal tea. But, after pondering a while on it, he decided that it was probably just a temporary thing for the singer to feel this hungry and so decided to not to worry about it too much.

“Miss Gwen, here, you might want to have some of this tea, it’s made with some herbs from my country which have a soothingly effect on your stomach.”

As the first month in the mansion passed, two weeks since Helen had started to provide Gwen with the stimulants, the maid was truly enjoying the situation she was in. Between the appetite stimulants she managed to give to Miss Stefani and whatever Felipe did, the singer seemed to be facing a period of almost constant, never ending hunger. Which resulted in her asking, day after day, to up her portions more and more. This naturally was having quite the effect on her body, which was putting on pounds faster and faster, although the singer didn’t really seem aware of it.

That morning, for example, as Helen entered Gwen’s room, she could see that the singer was still asleep in her bed, the remains of her latest night binge still surrounding her. The nightstand near the bed was still covered in plates which had contained a few small cakes and pastries just the night before. But were now empty.

Taking the dirty plates, she brought forward Gwen’s first pre-breakfast, carefully prepping the boat load of plates that Felipe had prepared for her first, of three, pre-breakfast meals. As weeks passed, Gwen found herself growing hungrier and hungrier, always wanting for more food to be given to her. Helen knew that partially it was because the singer was growing heavier, and so her natural hunger was growing too, but mainly it had to be the stimulants she was still giving to the singer.

As she finished preparing the massive meal, which was fit for at least four people, she took her time to check out Gwen’s body. She started from her face, noticing that still it looked quite thin, although her neck was starting to get thicker. Her torso, too, was swelling up quite nicely, her breasts had grown past the E cup, and had already started to lose some of their perkiness. Then there was her belly, it was a growing mound which seemed to be growing wider every passing day. Already it was hanging down on her crotch and yet, it seemed to be hanging lower and lower.

Helen could barely contain herself, seeing how big the singer was getting, and it was only her first month with them. She could only dream how big she could make her. She only had to decide if she wanted to continue as she was doing or maybe, if she had to increase the dosage…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: The maid who loved parade floats…

choices: Felipe agrees, Frank comes to the mansion
Felipe refuses. Gwen has to be properly focused on Frank before the meeting
Helen Ignore the request and stuff Stefani even more
Blake Shelton contacts Gwen with apologies
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Gwen Stefani, after finishing her last lunch for the day, took her time to think on how her life was going in the Mansion, following Felipe’s treatment. Lately, all she seemed to be doing was to sit down in the dining room, on a comfortable couch, and eat at whatever Felipe prepared for her. At first, she had been worrying about her size, for she thought she was getting worriedly bigger.

After a check in with Felipe and after seeing her weight on a scale she understood that it was all in her head. True, she hadn’t believed it herself at first but, after seeing with her own eyes the numbers on the scale, she realized that it really had to be all in her head. So, she simply stopped worrying and, after some time, she even stopped checking her weight.

It was really too much of a hassle to rise and stand, walk up to the scale and then stand there…it was all too much of an issue, so she simply let herself go, trusting completely Felipe and his treatments.

As she sat there, massaging her overfilled belly, which pushed out in front of her of at least a couple of feet, she thought about her situation. Stifling a burp, barely, she realized that she truly was enjoying living there. It was just so carefree to pass her time doing basically nothing and she had realized that she also had to be growing healthier already, since her appetite was growing almost every other day.

And for this there was only a person she had to thank, really.

It was her manager, Frank.

As she thought about him, with Helen at her side pushing within her lips a large éclair, since it was time for her post-lunch snack, she felt something hot growing within her. Gwen already knew what it was. It had been only a month and something since she had been in the mansion but, even in such a short time she missed the company of her fiancée. But, alas, he didn’t seem to be reachable, even when she called him through text messages.

But the more food Helen pushed within her lips, the more she found herself thinking about Frank and not of her boyfriend. This realization jolted her awake. As she gulped down the last pastry that the maid had pushed within her lips, she grabbed her phone and started to type. Only to stop after a few minutes finding the activity way too tiring.

“Helen…Could you…please…write a …*urp*…text…for me?”

As the maid passed to her a massive tray still loaded full of donuts and other sweets, she took the phone and waited for Gwen’s input. The singer began cramming food into her mouth, not feeling truly hungry but more as she had gotten used to chew and swallow.

“Alright…type this…Dear Frank…wanted to… apologize…for contacting…you so…late. Its nice…in here…and am glad…you managed…to reserve…this spot…for me.

I will…see with…Felipe… if is possible…to meet you…one of these…days. Gotta…thank you…for all you’ve…done for me. Will…let you…know. xoxo Gwen”

As the singer kept dictating the text, she also kept her mouth stuffed with food, pushing donut after donut within her lips. As soon as Helen had written the text and sent it, the roles reversed one more. Gwen returned to laid back on the couch, massaging her increasingly more stuffed gut, as the maid began anew to feed more and more sweets into the fattened singer.

Helen, for one, was truly getting excited in seeing how the singer grew. As per last weigh-in, almost a week ago, Gwen had already surpassed the 250 pounds of beautiful fat. And since she had grown accepting the lifestyle, she didn’t problem herself anymore with how much food, both Helen and Felipe, pushed onto her.

Already she was on such a massive calorie laden feast that it was astonishing how bigger she was getting and, most importantly, how accepting of it all she was. Helen couldn’t wait to see how long it would take for Gwen to outgrow the couch she was currently sitting on.

Felipe was amazed at the change in Gwen’s demeanor in respect to her start. Since he managed to break her will, the singer had grown on a, almost, daily basis both in her appetite and in her mass. At first he had worried that she could realize how big she was getting but, thanks to appropriate countermeasures, the scale set to show a specific weight, and the help from Miss Gwen dedicated maid, Helen, the singer/actress had swelled up beautifully and out of any of his plans.

To say the truth he suspected that Helen had done something to her. Since her increased appetite didn’t seemed to stop, but only increased as time passed. Still, he couldn’t say it was a bad thing. As he checked the clock, noticing that she had to be almost finished with her first post-lunch snack, Felipe turned on the stove again as he had to prepare the second post lunch meal for Stefani.

This time, he thought with glee, he decided to outdo himself and prepare for her a massive meal. After all, she needed to be at her fullest if he wanted to impress into her the idea that she loved Frank.

Gwen Stefani, meanwhile, had just finished her snack and was currently resting on her couch, with her huge globular belly pushing harder and harder on the extra sized shorts she was wearing. As she breathed, to recover energies, she saw Helen approaching her with another tray of goodies. Instinctually she licked her lips, already tasting the sweets that her maid was bringing to her.

“Hey…Helen…back again…uh?”

“Hey Miss Gwen. Just thought you could be still, somewhat, hungry. Didn’t want to see you starving. Don’t tell Felipe, though…”

Gwen smiled as she opened her mouth, accepting the first large slice of cake that Helen gave to her.

This had been going on for a while now, from the time when Felipe’s portions seemed to be less filling than usual. Helen brought her once a few pastries to help sate her hunger and, soon, it became the norm. Between the scheduled mealtimes and the additional snacks brought from the maid, Gwen soon got addicted to eat constantly, feeling strangely depressed if she wasn’t having something to eat all the time.

Still, the singer ate and ate some more. Everything was so good, so tasty. And she wasn’t gaining a single pound from it. As the first cake was quickly polished, the maid brough out of the tray a second one, starting aew to feed slice after slice into the fattening whale of a woman sitting on the couch.

As the feeding proceeded, the camisole that Gwen was wearing suddenly ripped in half, the buttons flying everywhere as her belly surged out even bigger than before.

“Woah! You guys…sure know your…way in a…kitchen but…laundry…isn’t your…strength…uh?”

“Sorry about that, Miss Gwen. Here, have some more cake, it will help ease your mind.”

As Stefani kept indulging, unaware of how her body was changing, her phone thrilled signaling that a new message had arrived. As Helen kept feeding her, Gwen rapidly scrolled through the messages and saw that Frank had answered back, thanking her and that he would have loved to meet with her. Startling, for she hadn’t expected that, Gwen felt her heart flutter a bit.

Maybe it was due to Blaken absence, maybe since she had grown wiser living in the mansion, but she felt truly happy knowing that Frank wanted to meet with her.

“He…Helen…Can you…ask Felipe…If it would…be ok…for me…to meet…Frank…here…one of… these days?”
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Loving the life & thanking Frank

choices: Keep watching as Angelina’s trains to fit her role
Keep watching as Carmen’s 'diets' for her character
Go back to Gwen and watch an episode in the evening
Stop watching and focus back to Stefani, the video can wait the weekend
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Felipe Mbutu was in the kitchen; he had just finished preparing the next snack soon to be brought to the constantly hungry singer. He knew that Helen, the personal maid assigned to Gwen Stefani was doing something to cause that but, as long as it didn’t impact his plans, he could let her have her fun.

Just as he was cleaning out the table, his phone buzzed letting him know that a ew mail had arrived. Curious he checked the preview and stopped suddenly. The sender was anonymous, untraceable, and the subject of the mail was ‘Jolly’. He stood perplexed for half a minute, before realizing what it really was. Hastily, he cleaned out the place and left for his private room, leaving the orders to follow the current schedule for the singer, as he had to absent himself for a few due to something urgent.

As he reached his room he quickly locked the door and closed all windows, then he opened up his computer and, before going online he also started an application that could hide all information’s related to that machine and the IP address he was using.

Once sure that everything was working, he opened his mail and saw that the message was a few words and a link.

‘ Enjoy the show.

-TheGnasher’

Felipe knew immediately who the sender was. It was a message from his Tribe, but he wondered why did they contacted him after all this time. With nothing else to do he clicked on the link and immediately was connected through a series of servers and satellites until it appeared on his screen a video player. On top of the screen, in bold capital letters, there seemed to be the title.

“JOLLY – USE HEADPHONES”

Felipe, plugging in, started the video and smiled as he began to see what the video was about. As he kept watching he realized it was made just as if it was a spin off from one of the worldwide known shows like ‘Big Brother’. It recounted images recorded live from the scene and even a few shots of the characters describing what they had felt or how they were living the situation.

He couldn’t refrain himself to be curious about what was going to be shown to him…

The video started with a few camera’s shoot of an airplane landing down in, Felipe recognized it immediately, was the small private airport of his Company/Tribe. Then a figure appeared in front of the camera, it was his Tribe Leader, Joao Cumbu. A forty something year old, with a bit of a bristle on his bearded face.

“It is on? Good. Hey man, we’ve making this to show you that your efforts are not in vain! All of us appreciate what you’re doing for us and we cannot start to thank you for the gift you’ve managed to send to us. I’ll try to show you the good use we will make of the gift. Hope you enjoy, Brother. We sure will!”

With that the guy smiled, revealing a set of razor-sharp teeth that would have made a shark, jealous.

The feed stopped for a moment and returned, showing now the cameraman walking on the landing field of the airport. A massive airplane had landed just before them and was now opening up on the rear to download its precious cargo. The video kept recording as a massively large pad was slowly being unloaded from the ramp while, sitting atop of it, there was a hugely massive, almost shapeless, blob of a girl with caramel-like skin.

As the pad was left out of the plane, several persons moved beside the huge woman, some were cheering, others were prodding her gently, and yet the girl was still completely absorbed by the tube tightly pushed within her lips, as she kept gulping down whatever concoction it was bringing her.

As Joao entered again the field of view of the camera, he approached the massive woman.

“Welcome! Welcome to Africa, Miss Jolie! My name is Joao Cumbu, I’m the producer of the movie you’ve accepted to participate in the role of our main protagonist. I’ll accompany you to our set, which include also your accommodations and will be at your service for anything you shall require.”

The massive blob of a woman, none other than Angelina Jolie, pulled out the tube from her lips, burped loudly and turned slowly her head as much as she could toward the man, giving him a small smile.

“Tha…*Belch*…Thanks…happy…to…be…here. Need…some…rest…though.”

“Of course, of course! We’re just so happy to have you here, Miss. We will immediately begin transportation toward the Studios, for you and your guest, and we will let you rest from your exhausting trip.”

As Joao kept talking, a huge figure began to slowly waddle out of the plane, soon helped by a couple of guys that were milling around. As the cameraman zoomed in, the figure revealed to be none other than Carmencita. The maid had left Angelina’s mansion weighing roughly 450 lbs, but the woman that was now waddling down the ramp had to be easily 500, if not more. And yet, even as she was waddling, she kept pouring chips from an oversized bag she had under her arm. The video stopped suddenly but, as it returned online it showed the actress, comfortably seated on a sea of cushions in a veritable lavish room, while out of a window a rich jungle landscape could be seen.

“Miss Jolie?” Joao Cumbu moved forward, offering a tray with a massive cake on it to a girl standing beside him. “…This girl is Felicia Macunda, she will be your personal attendant, along with her senior, Mr. Juan Kingstone, who’s currently going at the studio to prepare the papers you will need to learn about your role in the movie. Felicia will take care of you and provide all you may wish for. Felicia?”

The girl curtsied gracefully before taking the tray and moving toward the massive ex-actress, bringing to her lips a massive slice of cake, thanks to a stair-like ramp which she used to be at level with the face of the ultra-obese actress.

“Here Miss, have a small snack, just to tide you over until your first meals arrives.”
Angelina opened her mouth, accepting the slice of cake offered but, as she munched on it, a thought came to her mind.

“Thankchs…*munch*…but…I’ve…been…*gulp*…following…a…dietâ €¦*munch*…with…my…assist…ant…”

“Mr. Felipe Mbutu, right? Yes, Miss we’ve been informed already. That is why I’ve been in contact with him, so to let you follow his schedule even during the Movie.”

The ex-actress burped quite loudly, before accepting the next slice of cake, feeling happy knowing that Felipe’s care was following her even though an ocean separated them. So she kept eating all that Felicia would bring to her, it never crossed her mind the strangeness of consuming cake after cake, when they had mentioned to give her only one. But it was ok, if Felipe had agreed to it, then she only had to follow.

As Felipe kept watching the video, he could see all the efforts of his fellow shamans in the tribe, as they poured their herbal knowledge to good use, fattening even more the already massive ex-actress. With the helpful assistance of Felicia, such a good girl in captivating her preys, Angelina already seemed to be growing bigger and wider, and yet they didn’t stop. The video kept recording the first hour of constant gorging of the actress, as more and more food was given to her to consume. Still, the video stopped for a few seconds and, when it returned online, the focus now was Carmencita in her own luxurious apartment.

The massive maid was laying on a king-sized bed, waited hand and foot by a couple of young men, which fed her and complimented her for her beautiful figure. The maid ate it all up, both the food and the compliments, seemingly swelling every minute as the process kept going.

One of these butler then, moved closer to the maid, starting to massage her, as he explained to her what her role there was.

“Miss Carmen, I’m Dominic Nkele, you may call me Dom. I’ll be here to be your personal assistant. With my colleague Felicia taking care of your Master, I bet you wonder what you should do here…”

Carmencita hadt really thought about that, all she was thinking about was getting more food to get fatter and be the biggest Cow her colleagues at home had ever seen…but now that he mentioned it she wondered, briefly, what he was getting at.

“You see, the Producer decided that you could fill a secondary role into the movie, nothing too complex or exciting, to say the truth but, he was impressed by your stunning figure and found you perfect for the role of member of the protagonist crew. Miss Jolie shall be the main character of the movie, but you will have also to do a few scenes with her. Although, you may need to adapt yourself to do said scenes.”

“What do you…mean, Dom?”

“As you are, you’re too thin. We need to put some meat on your bones…that’s what I mean.”

“Thin?” Carmencita laughed a bit at that, she knew to be a fat girl already, so she wondered on the why’s the guy was trying to sweeten the news to her.

“Dom…I know I’m…Fat. No need to…lie.”

Dominic, smiling to the obese maid, as he brought forward a tray piled high with slabs upon slabs of greasy steaks, replied with a total sureness in his voice.

“Fat? Miss Carmen…for our standards, you’re not even close to being thin.”

As the guy say that, the maid felt herself growing excited.

‘If he says the truth…then coming here to them has been my luckiest decision. With their help I’ll be the biggest and will show to those skinnies back home how a real woman is.’

As Felipe kept watching, he couldn’t have been happier. The Tribe had really created such a show only for him, to let him see the progress that Miss Angie was doing during her time in Africa. He only wondered if he should keep watching or return to his duties and continue on the evening. …Could he have the time to watch another episode ?
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A blast from the past

choices: Back to Stefani, Frank needs to see her
Angelina’s scenes are starting to be filmed
How Carmen‘s doing? Is Dom taking good care of her?
As Gwen keep growing, Frank propose a new person to join the mansion
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
In the end, Felipe, had decided to watch another episode before returning to his duties. He knew that the maids and the butlers were already informed with the schedule and there were plenty of meals already prepared, needing only to be warmed up, so he could enjoy watching what his Tribe had prepared just for him.

As he resumed watching he saw that the video started a few days later Angelina’s arrival in Africa. As the screen went on, he saw that the ex-actress was still laying on her pile of pillows, as Felicia kept providing her, and feeding her, food from a nearby massive trolley, often brought back refilled once it was emptied of its contents. Angie was enjoying immensely this job, not only she was still following Felipe’s regimen, but she also was actually working for the movie, although the story of the same was still a bit obscure in her eyes.

“Sho…*munch*…Felicia. The story…of the…movie…is…?”

“Here Miss, have some of this…” the curvy girl pushed within the lips of the human blob a new large hamburger, as she told her again what the script was saying.

“You’re impersonating ‘Miss Lara Jolly, a rich archaeologist, sole heir of a massively wealthy empire, which travels usually around the world to discover ancient secrets and legends. In the movie, you have just embarked on a trip in Africa where you’ve heard of a mysterious tribe that has been recently discovered, right I the middle of the deepest jungle.

But, as your character want to discover them, bad people wants them dead since their village is standing on the biggest diamond mine of the entire world. So, Amanda Jolly will embark on the mission of saving these poor souls, with a few companions, and to defeat the bad people who want only to dig for the riches in the earth.

The Tribe will be so grateful that Miss Jolly will become their deity, cherished and loved until the end of times. The Movie will end on a cut scene with Miss Jolly, having spent some years in the village, as she has grown under their care as she accept to join them for the rest of her days, falling in love with the Tribe’s chief.’”

As Felicia kept talking, she still kept feeding the massive American girl, which accepted and munched and swallowed all the food that was being given to her. Angelina, while enjoying the feeding, still vaguely remembered something similar to what Felicia was saying, she thought of remembering some kind of movie she did, some years before, about an archaeologist but, with her food addled mind she truly couldn’t remember what it was.

‘If I can’t remember it, it mustn’t have been that big of a movie anyway…mmm…this boar…so good…’

As the ex-actress was being fed, the local girl eyes lit up when she finally saw two of her tribesmen finally carrying over the main dishes toward their guest, and future meal. A long queue of guys had in fact appeared and was carrying, upon their shoulders, massive trays with entire animals already cooked and prepared to be eaten. Felicia hurried them to come closer as she saw that spitted boar and pigs, as well as roasted cows were being slowly moved toward the blob like mountain of a girl in the middle of the room.

“Here, Miss. Snacking time is over. Now, it’s time for your main meals…”

Angie couldn’t actually see anything from her point of view, all she could see where her massively inflated breasts obscuring the world around her but, hearing that her main lunch was coming made her immensely stuffed gut grumble in hunger. No matter how stuffed she was feeling, she was so constantly hungry that if food was available, she had to have it. As usual she tried moving her arms and fingers but, was constantly reminded that she wasn’t able anymore to move them, even by an inch. In a normal circumstance she would have wondered why that was, she remembered that Felipe said something about being so weak to won’t be able to move herself but, with the delicious aroma’s surrounding her all her worries were placed away, as she wanted nothing more than gobble more food.

“Yes…come…to…mama…”

As the platter was brought forward, so the guys and Felicia began pushing the massive roasted boar directly toward Angelina’s mouth, keeping it from falling against her head and yet, pushing it toward her. The ex-actress didn’t need any motivation though. As soon as the boar was near her mouth, she began to take chunks of meat out of the massive beast, chewing them as quick as she could, fearing that her meal might be taken away from her. With her vision completely obscured by the mountain of roasted animal she had been provided with, all she could think was to have as much as she could of it, within herself.

As she took her first bite, she moaned in happiness as a throaty gurgle resonated from her. She wasn’t entirely aware of what hey were giving her but, it was so delicious she couldn’t stop herself from having more and more of it. But, when she had managed to clean the entire beast up, feeling it settles quite heavily in her massive gut, she smiled in joyful surprise seeing as another similar meal was being pushed toward her. With a frenzied look in her eyes, Angelina didn’t worry about anything else than filling herself up to the brim, eating as much as she could of any thing Felicia brought to her.

As time passed, and more food was given to her, so the ex-actress body began to bloat, in height and in width, as her massive gut started to lose its resemblance to a soft, jiggly, blanket, becoming more and more stuffed with food, with her skin growing tighter and tighter as her stomach began to fill up. As the entire day passed in a near constant feeding session, Angelina’s gut was starting to be over stuffed with food, her stomach skin tight as a drum, with barely no more room for more.

“There we go…Miss…A last snack to close the final meal of the day…”

As Felicia said that, pushing one of the last fried herons toward the greasy lips of the fattened up woman, she could see that Miss Jolie had enjoyed her meal immensely and yet, at the notion that no more food was coming, a few tears fell from her eyes.

“Miss? Are you in pain?”

“I…*Buuurp!*…I…just…want…some…*beelch!*…more.
Truly…no... more…for…little…’ol…me?”

Felicia Macunda stared in shock at what the ultra-obese woman had just said. Just by looking at her Felicia could say that the woman was truly and completely over engorged with food. There wasn’t simply no more room in her body to accept even the itty bitty little morsel. And yet, Miss Jolie wanted some more.

How could Felicia say no to such a request?

“Well, Miss. We’ll just have a little breather…just the time to rest a bit. Then, an hour from now, I’ll bring you something to tide you over before your midnight dessert snack. Would you like that?”

Angelina, completely glutted, drunk on food, simply exhaled a last, affirmative, burp, before finally falling asleep for a quick, restorative nap. Feeling happy of having finally managed to stuff herself so completely and knowing that more food was soon to be coming her way. With these happy thoughts, any worryingly thought about her size or her lack of movement capabilities simply vanished, as they always did lately, letting her sleep and dream of her next meals and of how healthy she was going to be thanks to Felicia and Felipe.

As Felicia sat, watching the servants carry out the huge, now empty, and dirty platters off the room where their gluttonous future meal was finally resting, she couldn’t stop herself from being amazed at how big, and addicted to food, Felipe Mbutu, their shaman leader, had managed to get this woman.

And big she was indeed.

Her face was massively covered in fat, forcing the woman to squint, as her many chins rolled down from her neck, mixing themselves with her upper torso belly rolls, starting to form a funnel like shape around her head. Her breast, then, had grown immense. Pooling out in front and off her side, these were massive sacks of jelly like flesh, forced by the gravity to be laying on the ground. Then came her massive globular bell, a huge apron like gut that covered all of her front, up to her feet, actually cutting off from view her body portion below from her torso.

Felicia, on an occasion when Angelina had fallen asleep, had tried to do some ‘spelunking’, having some guys lifting up her gut and exploring what was beneath it. It had been a rather short and humid trip, but Felicia had been ecstatic in seeing that also her thighs and legs were completely engulfed in fat.

Then there was her ass, a magnificent, wobbly, mounds of jiggly fat, rising high up to the middle of her back, so soft and squishy to the touch that Felicia had already risked being swallowed by the soft ass cheecks. And yet, slapping it briefly she remained delighted in seeing it wobble for a full two minutes before coming to a stop.

All in all, Angelina Jolie was an immobile mass of lard, a huge monument to gluttony and greed, with which the Teeth Gnasher Tribe was going to be feasting for months to come.

At least, that was what Felicia had dreamed about before seeing the massive ex-actress. But now that she was in front of her, she wasn’t so sure about that. In truth, Felicia, and she knew that many in the tribe thought the same, was growing rather attached to the blob like girl.

First, she was the literal embodiment of gluttony and, most importantly, as a person she had always helped Africa as much as she could. Felicia, and many others, were starting to feel ashamed about thinking of consuming her.

Finally, there was also the maid given to them…if only she could direct her Chief focus toward the maid, they could keep Miss Jolie as the monument to hunger and gluttony she was becoming…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Angelina’s African Growth

choices: Felipe decide to spill the beans about his and Frank pact
How's the meeting between the two lovebirds going?
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Time had passed since Gwen Stefani had asked Felipe to meet with Frank, but her diet coach had refused categorically. He objected to the meeting using the excuses of needing to have passed the first portion of her training first. Gwen, after having pouted for a bit, had finally accepted her coach decision and then began to intently follow her coach instructions.

Felipe, along with Helen, couldn’t have been happier with the outcome. Gwen Stefani was now so single minded about her training that she barely stopped eating and getting fatter from it. Still, even though she was so one minded about the training, there was also the high risk of finally noticing what was happening to herself. Luckily, and this Felipe was grateful for, thanks to Helen additional assistance, Gwen was kept rather happy and stuffed that she barely had the energies to fight back or complain.

Gwen herself was actually almost counting the days left, wishing more and more in her heart to meet Frank. And yet, with that objective in mind, she barely noticed how each day passed. Under an almost constant deluge of treats, the singer was seemingly blowing out daily. Between the hunger inducing treats from Helen and Felipe’s delicious massive feast, Stefani barely had time to breath and yet, all her thoughts were focused on meeting Frank.

As morning rolled on, Gwen woke up slowly, as she lately had started to do. Looking around in the dark room, she lazily scratched her topmost belly roll, although unaware of it, as she started the long and arduous process of sitting in her bed, with her back against the pillowed wall behind her. Pushing slowly, and cursing a bit, she managed in less than ten minutes and yet she felt breathless and tired only from that simple action.

Still, as Felipe’s words rang in her head, she reminded herself that it seemed so hard only because she was aiming for a total relaxation, so also her muscles were going to be less ready to sudden action. As she looked at the digital clock on her bed stand, she saw that it was almost time for her first pre breakfast and, sure enough, a moment later entered Helen carrying with her a couple trolley’s worth of food.

“Good Morning Gwen, I’ve got your pre breakfast right here…you ready for it?”

“Good morning…Helen. Yeah… feeling rather…famished.”

It was true, between the hunger inducing drugs she took unknowingly and the constant gorging to which she had been subjected, it was a rare occasion indeed that Gwen Stefan wasn’t hungry for more. And yet, the singer still couldn’t see how her own body had changed. In truth she could see it billowing out on every side, surrounding her completely but, between the encouragement words from Felipe, the compliments received by her friend Helen and her own white lies, she wasn’t going to assume being fat anytime soon.

Still, as she sat on her bed with her lips smacking hungrily, as her hands kneaded pleasantly her fattened frame, she greedily accepted the first oversized tray that the maid was giving her. On it, as Gwen smiled seeing the spread, there were three chocolate milkshakes, a large plate filled with fried bacon strips, a bowl chocked full of cheeseburgers and a, quite large, mound of a new kind of chocolate bars.

As she grabbed one to inspect it closer, Helen piped up toward her.

“Those are actually new. Felipe told me he was going to skip a bit ahead and get you used to have them, as they should be related to the second phase of your regimen.”

As Helen explained, Gwen had already peeled one of those bars from its casing and had given in to the most reliable test she had learned to trust.

She took a mouthful.

Almost immediately she moaned in pleasure. As she munched on her mouthful she felt a heavenly taste spread in her mouth, it was so delicious that she couldn’t refrain herself from quickly stuffing the rest of the bar into her mouth, while preparing the next one to be consumed. Moreover, as she kept wolfing them down, she felt her lethargy fading, feeling for the first time in a long while, bursting with energy.

Naturally, this extra energy she felt within herself was spent on devouring her meal, but still, in her eating addicted mind, it was a wonderful knowledge to have.

‘So, with these bars I can do whatever I want…I feel like I could go with the training all day without stopping.
That’s so…cool!’

With this newfound source of energy, she then, doubled down on her meal, quickly polishing tray after tray, almost making Helen feeling tired as she brought and took each tray from the growing singer. And yet, as Helen took the last tray from Stefani, she noticed that her charge, and friend, was still looking expectant for more.

“Gwen?”

“What? I... I’ve already finished? Really?”

The maid, looking at the pouting fattened singer, smiled a bit and gestured to her friend to wait a moment, as she exited the room and went directly to Felipe to relay the news. Felipe Looked surprised as he heard that Gwen Stefani, while consuming all those bulk up bars had managed to clear the massive pre-breakfast in a record time, still it was good news.

“Alright Helen. From now on, bring her immediately her next meal and we will see how it goes. If she cleans it as fast as she did before…Well, in that case I’ll rewrite the schedule to match her results, as it will fall to you the job of preparing her meals today.”

The maid, excited by the prospect took the next meal, that was supposed to be brought to Gwen only an hour later, and she delivered it almost immediately. Once again, with a new influx of those bulk up bars, Gwen cleared also the next meal in a record time, forcing her to improvise. As days turned into weeks, Gwen Stefani finally reached the grand day she had been expecting.
The day when she could finally meet Frank.

Over the course of those weeks, though, due to how longer it took her to tire herself out by eating, she had grown even more massive than before. As she was now barely able to stand on her own for a few seconds, she was constantly helped around by Helen. Still, as Frank was coming to meet her, she began to feel rather anxious, just a if she was in love.

“Gwen? Everything alright?”

“No. I’m not fine…I…feel on edge.

What’s wrong with me?!”

As the maid moved closer, taking seat near the massively flabby girl, she soothingly caressed her back, as she inquired a bit about the situation, although knowing the ’behind the scenes’ already.

“…So, Frank is finally coming and you’re anxious about it, right?”

“Yeah. But I don’t know why…he’s a …friend.”

“Well, if I may, Gwen…with all the time spent chatting and messaging with him I would say that we’re over the friendship part… Look, you may haven’t realized it yet but, every time you speak of him…you actually have a brilliant smile on your face.

Face it, girl…You’ve developed a crush on him.”

“Do you…really think so?”

“Yup. And, judging by the amounts of messages between you…either he’s gay…or he’s into you too.”

“Helen!”

“Look…Let’s go meeting him and we will see how it goes from there…”

When Frank entered the mansion he chatted a bit with Felipe, sharing pleasantries and discussing about the future, of any actors and actresses that could be brought there to him to let him work his ‘magic’ on them. But when, finally, it was time for him to meet Gwen Stefani, Felipe just smiled and let him go to her on his own.

As Frank entered the room where Gwen was waiting for him, he remained o the opened door for a full minute, barely able to think anything to say.

Right in front of him he had the actual figure of the singer he had last seen several months before. Last time he had seen her, she had been a lithe figure, weighing no more than 140lbs, and although with some soft curves on her, she still had an almost stern aura about her. The person now in front of him was something else.

Sitting in a couch wide enough to hold three people, while occupying it almost all by herself, with no less than three chins obscuring her neck from view and with her overall body fattened by hundreds of soft, squishy, pounds, Gwen Stefani was an SSBBW that he was actually afraid of meeting. He had had countless dreams about her, about her size when he could finally meet her, but he had never dreamed of being rewarded with such a treasure.

She was, in his eyes, the beautiful thing ever. Even more marvelous and attractive than Angelina Jolie had been when he had met her after Felipe’s intervention.

With slow, fearful steps he moved closer to her, shaking slightly from both excitement and anxiety.

“H-Hi Gwen…How... How’s…going?”

------------------------

Felipe and Helen sat in the kitchen, the first sipping some coffee, while the latter didn’t seem able to sit still.

“Helen, would you calm down, please?”

“How can you feel so calm!? What if he rejects her? Or maybe that is your plan? Do you want to have her Comfort-eating to her death?”

“First, calm down. Second, here goes the pot calling the kettle black. I know you’re giving her hunger induced drugs. So, don’t come here acting righteous. You’re not.Third, He won’t reject her…Trust me on this one.”

“How can you be so sure?”

“Well, Helen…”
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A meeting long overdue…

choices: Keep going as is. Frank to enjoys his Stefani but fatten up Helen a bit
Rope the guy in, fatten Helen up, keep Stefani around.
Fatten Helen up and rope the guy in the business. Stefani sent to Tribe
Why not fatten up both Frank and Helen? Then use Frank contacts for more
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Gwen Stefani could barely rest that day.

It was the same day on which she had met Frank and her hearth was still beating faster and faster. At first they had both been quite timid but, as the conversation went on and on, she had managed to keep the discussion alive and joyful. In truth she had been worried a bit when he had accepted to wait for her as she went through her five lunch meals but, she realized later on, that she had felt almost compelled and excited to be seen following her training under his eyes. And by the way he had watched her, she knew he was proud of her.

As the meeting came to an end, as Frank had still to get back to the office, she surprised herself by blurting out the question she had dreaded to even think on her own.

“Would you like to come back and see more of me?”

And his answer, his definite yes, with that romantic undertone…She had seen how longingly he had looked at her and, after hearing that answer she lost any control, moving closer to him and kissing him full on the lips!
But what left her even more speechless was that he returned the kiss with just as much fervor as she had.

‘He loves me! He loves me! Oh, I don’t know why I’m feeling so happy but, Lord, I am!’

As Felipe showed to Helen the camera feed recording of the meeting, the maid smiled widely for her friend. True, she wanted still to fatten her up but, as time went on she couldn’t be but happy for her.

“So that’s why you were sure this was going to be alright?”

“I told you Helen. I’ve noticed how Frank stared at Gwen the first time he brought her here. I knew there was something more than just attraction between those two.”

Helen huffed a little as she lit up a cigarette, taking a quick puff from it.

“So, now what? I know you’re getting her to be bigger than a house…and you know I’m also responsible for that. What’s your endgame, Mr. Mbutu?”

Here Felipe let a smile shows o his face as he hid his true intentions deep within himself.

“You can guess it. What happened to Miss Jolie wasn’t an accident, I’m sure you know it already.”

Helen took another go at her cigarette, while thinking, until she turned her stare locked on the African guy, she stared at him in silence for a few, before exhale the smoke she had inhaled.

“Someone hired you to sabotage them, isn’t that right? But, sincerely? I don’t want to know…probably better this way. So, now, what’s the plan?”

Felipe grinned to the maid. “I knew you were a smart girl. The plan, in itself, doesn’t change too much.

We’ll keep her eating as much as we can, for as long as we can. She needs to be way fatter. Ill just add a few therapy sessions with her, to let her grow more…accustomed to her size. She’s bound to notice any day now and no matter how addicted she is she’s gonna be worried.”

After the meeting, Stefani was brought one more under a whirlwind of meals and snacks, filling every moment of rest with those energy bars she was loving so much. Yet, as she was now aware of being under the second phase of her training, she had started growing more conscious about her size. And even with Helen support, telling her she was still in great shape, the singer was noticing that everything around her seemed way smaller than herself. It was at that moment that Felipe brought forward his ‘Therapy sessions’.

It was midafternoon, Gwen had just cleaned out a ‘mid-day pre-afternoon snack’ snack, when her coach called her in a simple, spartan room. There wasn’t much in it, just a couch for her to sit, and a table with chair for Felipe Mbutu.

As she entered the room, and sat comfortably, Felipe took a minute to observe her.

Gwen had grown majestically since she had entered the mansion. Barely six months had already passed and yet the woman sitting in front of him was almost at 600 lbs already. He idly wondered how big she would get when all was over but, that was going to be Frank problem. Still, to see the one lithe singer, having now a definite triple chin obscuring her neck, a fattened middle divided in three belly rolls when seated, and an apron like gut that covered up to her knees when standing.
