Without considering her massive jelly like ass, wobbling to and fro at her every movement, as well as her huge breast, now so big and filled with fat that they could be kept up only by the strongest bra’s.

To see all of this was a huge reward for the Tribe shaman. Still, he was here to help her grow accustomed to her size and not just to admire her marvelous jiggling form.

“Gwen…” he started “I’ve called you in here because it’s time to start your therapy sessions, which are a fundamental of the second phase of your training. From this day onward, you’ll come here every day and we will have a two hours therapy session. Do you understand?”

“Yes, Felipe. Thank you for sticking up with me for so long. I won’t disappoint you never again.”

“Good. Now, let me tell you how it’s going to go. I’ll give you a VR headset on which there is already loaded a tape. This tape will show you how to boost your confidence in yourself and how to perfect your acting skills. Every day, you will use the VR and after that we will have a little chat together.”

‘That’s partially true…However, the tape will also give you subliminal messages about how you should act whenever you feel fat or afraid of gaining weight. In particular, you’ll grow less conscious about your exterior, growing more and more confident that you cannot gain any weight.
If only I had thought of this with Miss Jolie…’

Felipe then brought forward the VR and gave it to the singer which, after having it on, she relaxed against the couch and listened to the tape inserted there. Visually it seemed to her to be just a recollection of motivational discussions and acting rehearsal but, mixed within those scenes, there were also brief flashes, too fast to be seen with eyes, but that were still pouring messages into her mind.

Soon enough it was as if someone was continually whispering to her unconscious.

“You can’t be fat. Fat isn’t something you are related to. Things shrink all the time around you, that is normal. Diet food is bad for you. You can’t eat diet food. Tight clothes have just shrunk, that is something that happens every time. You will trust Felipe completely. You will trust Helen as a best friend. You can’t be fat. Fat isn’t something you are related to…”

As the tape rolled, Felipe then moved from his chair toward the singer and, as she was deep in a trance, focused only on the tape she was watching and what she was hearing, he began hand feeding her with those energy bars she had grown addicted to. One by one he fed them to her, letting her full stomach grow more and more full, until it expanded a bit more than before.

Then, as he saw that she was waking up he returned to his chair and waited.
As the two hours passed, Felipe chatted a bit with the Singer, often reinforcing that the therapy sessions were soon going to give the expected results.

As the therapies kept going, Gwen seemed to stop her concerns about her figure and what was surrounding her, which brought, thanks also to Helen who kept her fully stocked of both food and compliments, to the Singer increasing more and more the food she consumed on a daily basis. Within the span of two months, Gwen was barely stopping between a meal and the next, soon growing accustomed to have constantly somethings to munch on.

As time passed, portions kept only increasing, with her mealtimes lengthening, resulting in an almost constant deluge of treats toward the singer which began soon to outgrow anything around her. Yet, thanks to the therapy she didn’t mind, being absolutely confident that she couldn’t be fat and that it was perfectly normal to having outgrown a three-seater couch which she had used just the day before without an issue.

Between the two feeders, Gwen Stefani was growing to an astounding size. So much so she even decided to stop wearing clothes, preferring to use simple massive bikini’s that were easier to manage and wear.

As the things were going, Helen rapidly stopped giving to the singer the appetite enhancers but, that didn’t actually change very much. Gwen had grown so accustomed to eating that even if she wasn't feeling all that hunger pushing her forth, she still devoured everything in sight. Felipe knew it was almost time to deliver her to Frank, but he wondered if he could change the pact a little with the guy.

Gwen Stefani was almost as obsessed with food as she was with Frank but, Felipe was wondering if he could do something else instead. What if he could convince Frank to bring him something new, while giving him a shot at the growing process, attracting Frank deeper and deeper within the process?

In this case, even if the guy was to one day try to revolt, he would be just in deep as himself. But there were two issues with this plan.

First, Gwen Stefani would have to be moved somewhere else. Sure, she could be sent to his Tribe but under which pretext? There couldn’t be that many movies directed in Africa at the same time.

Second, What to do with Helen? She had grown too friendly with the singer and could try to make problems if the Singer was simply shipped away…

With all these thoughts, Felipe had to take a decision on how to proceed…

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
In the end Felipe decide to leave things as they were. Frank was going to collect his Prize as soon as Stefani was ready, and then he would give him someone new to fatten up. In the meantime, Felipe still had to broach the subject with Helen. The maid had grown rather attached to Stefani and he didn’t want to cause any unnecessary ruckus in the house.

For this reason, he thought about fattening her up too. This way she could focus herself on something else than Gwen.

Leaving his studio, Felipe roamed around the house aimlessly, until he found himself walking near Gwen’s room. Now that Helen was taking care of the singer, he had almost no contact with the girl anymore, apart from their therapy sessions and yet, he planned to recover for that loss of contact. Knocking softly on the door, he entered the room.

As soon as he entered, he could see that Gwen Stefani was completely confident about her body, although having grown massive, she still smiled as if nothing had really changed about herself. He moved closer, getting a better view and almost let a smile to pass through his expression. Gwen Stefani was nothing more like the woman she had been when she had arrived at the mansion.

At the time he remembered her lying down in the courtyard sunbathing in the smallest bikini.

Now, instead she was seated in her room, upon her king-sized double mattress bed, and still she was barely contained within it. All of her body had exploded with fat, from her head to her toes. Her face held now two chunky chipmunk cheeks, which forced her to squint with her eyes, unable to properly see to her surroundings. Her neck had completely vanished under the avalanche of chins, currently counting three and one that was growing thicker by the day, that had sprouted after each massive meal she consumed.

Her breast, two humongous jelly like sacks of fat, pooling at her sides, had lost any of their perkiness and were slowly brought down by the force of gravity and weight. He didn’t dare to touch them, but he couldn’t imagine himself able to lift both of them at the same time. Her belly then, a massive apron like gut, which flowed from her torso down to her legs, almost reaching her calves. It was a huge mass of soft pink flesh which she was barely able to lift by herself, when empty, while immobilizing her in place when it was full of food.

The rest of her had fattened up quite enormously, from her may back rolls, to her humongous ass and hips, which actually pushed her up higher and higher, every time new inches were added there by her metabolism.All in all, Gwen could barely move on her own, needing help just to stand.

And yet, thanks to the therapy sessions, she was still blind to all of this, fervently believing that she was just tired, or that it was completely normal for everything to seem smaller than she was.

As he got closer still, Felipe noticed that, since she wasn’t anymore capable of lifting her own arms, someone had made a series of pulley and lifts that by her minimal effort of closing her hands, would bring to her mouth a bowl constantly full of the energy bars he had gotten her addicted to. Gwen’s focus was on her shows and yet, despite that, every few minutes she made so that a handful of those bars would fall in her mouth, where she would then noisily chew on them, before swallowing them.

“Miss Gwen?”

“Uh?...Oh…*urp*…Hi…Felipe. How’s…*gulp*….going?”

“I’m fine thanks. And you? How do you feel? Hope the regimen isn’t too harsh on you?”

Gwen Stefani, swallowing a new handful of extra caloric bars, burped quite loudly before turning slightly her head toward her Coach.

“Not…at…all… I’m following…the…schedule…as you…said. It’s good…so good… Wonder why…I’ve…always…worried…about…eating.”

“That, Gwen, is why the regimen is so harsh. You need to unlock the real potential in you…”

As he was speaking the door behind him opened and Helen came through, trailing behind her a long column of trolleys, from which a cacophony of tantalizing aromas was coming from.

“Hey Gwen… Ready for your Third breakfast? Oh, Hey Felipe.”

“Helen. Oh, this reminds me. Helen? Since I’m going to be working in the kitchen for a few, why don’t you keep company to Gwen, I’m sure she will enjoy it.”

The maid looked surprised but, couldn’t refuse and so, as Felipe left the room, she stood there, chatting a bit with the enormously obese singer. But, as Gwen ate her meals, she noticed that Helen wasn’t having any.

“Hey Helen…You’re…not…hungry? Have some…come on…It’s good.”

The maid smiled a bit unnerved by this turn of events, although she had stopped using her appetite enhancer I most of the meals given to Gwen, sometimes she still gave it to her, as in this case. So she wasn’t exactly happy about having some of the spiked food for herself. Still, as the singer kept eating, she rationalized that even if she was to eat somewhat more than usual she couldn’t refuse her friend offer.

Sitting down near Gwen’s bed, Helen then took a small-ish plate from one of the trolley’s, revealing it to be a bowl of perfectly fried chicken nuggets. As soon as the first one entered the mouth of the maid, she felt like a jolt of pain had erupted in her belly. Trying to fill the empty void she now felt to have in her stomach, Helen began to assault at her food with a voracity that Gwen had ever seen before. Yet, the singer was happy at this turn of events. She now had an eating buddy to keep her company as she followed her training regimen.

As Helen kept eating, picking up plates that were supposed to be consumed by Gwen, she never noticed how the Singer would often let a few of her bars in the maid lap, until one of said bar rolled out of there and onto Helen’s tray. Seeing the new treat, although knowing full well how fattening and addictive those were, the maid couldn’t refrain herself from polish them off rapidly, feeling herself bursting out with energies. Readily used to try and satisfy her hunger.

As hours passed, Gwen finally reached her point of fullness, while, beside her, Helen laid down, seated on her chair with her bloated to bursting stomach in plain view. Her poor Maid outfit hadn’t managed to survive the onslaught of fatty foods. Still, as she slowly tried to recover as much dignity as she could, she was surprised in hearing Gwen inviting her to join her at dinner.
And even more surprised in hearing herself accepting.


As days became weeks, it soon began to be a fix appointment for both Gwen and Helen to share their meals together. Felipe would simply bring some more trays for Helen and then leave the two girls to stuffing themselves up, returning only when both had eaten their fill. Helen was worried at first but, as the energy bars worked their magic on her, she soon began to not really take notice on how much she was eating. After all, staying side by side with a behemoth like Gwen Stefani, even if she cleaned out two lunches by herself, Helen still felt she had pretty much contained herself when at her side Gwen managed to polish five of them.

As weeks turned into months and Gwen Stefani growth seemed to reach her plateu, Helen already was a couple hundred pounds heavier than she had initially been. What had surprised her at first was that Felipe insisted on having also her during the therapy sessions. The maid had been worried at first but, as the sessions went on she believed to be there only to push Gwen to relax more.

Felipe smiled as he looked at the two girls in front of him, both with their own VR headset on. Gwen had barely any need for it, nowadays, but who really was in need was Helen. The maid had fallen line, hook and sinker for Felipe’s trap. After that first weeks of shared meals with her Friend, Helen had started to let herself go, enjoying more and more the company of the ex-singer, as she indulged with her at her every turn. What had once been a youthful girl, lean with muscles, was slowly becoming a young indulging fatty.

Felipe hadn’t initially planned to have Helen grow too big but, since she was already over the three hundred pounds, why don’t let her reach…

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As months passed, Felipe began to press less and less on the regimen, focusing instead in brainwashing both the singer and the maid. Gwen Stefani had finally accepted her new role in life. Thanks to the ‘therapy sessions’ she saw herself ow as what she was needed to be.

She wasn’t there to follow a regimen to have her gain new abilities to become even more famous, she was there to become a perfect eating machine devoted to the only love of her life.

Frank.

With this realization planted solidly into her brain, she became much more docile and subservient, something that Felipe appreciated much and was sure that Frank was also going to enjoy.

Yet, as Gwen’s weight was finally approaching the half a ton mark, Felipe knew it was soon going to be time to release her and let Frank take care of her. For sure the Contract manager was going to enjoy his new partner and, while he was going to be busy with her, Mbutu would have occupied his time with Helen, making sure that she too would grow at a healthy weight, as he was going to wait for a new celebrity to be changed into a ‘Bigger’ star.

As he was thinking those thoughts, Felipe finished preparing the lunch he had in preparation for Helen. The growing out maid, after months of endless gorging along with her friend had pretty much grown used to having these massive meals brought to her, even when her friend wasn’t there to keep her company.

In the latest weeks, for example, Felipe had started to keep them separated as much as he could so to better prepare the maid to manage on her own when Gwen’s time of departure was going to come.

As it was the case, Felipe, began to move the several trolleys of food out of the kitchen and toward the guest room where Helen had taken residence. The room was spacious and lavish, although not at the same level of the one occupied by the almost thousand pounder singer.

As he entered the room, he stood one moment admiring his handiwork. Helen sat on two chairs in front of her computer. He hadn’t taken long in having her grow addicted to gaming and surfing the net as those were now the only activities, she was doing day after day.

Due to this her growth had been astonishing.

The massively obese maid sat there, wearing only a tight bikini, letting all of her fat rolls to hang out in the open, as she constantly clicked here and there on the screen. She sat with her thighs open widely, letting her fattened up gut to flop downward toward the floor, as she sucked from an extra large milkshake safely secured in her buttery cleavage.

“Helen? Time for your first lunch.”

“Mmh? Oh…*Gulp*…right. Bring it on! I’ve got a game to finish here.”

As Felipe neared her and began delivering the twelve-course meal to the girl, he marveled once more at how she had fallen prey of her own hedonism. True, she had also fallen under the influence of both her appetite enhancers and the addicting taste of the health bars, but still, she never seemed to worry about her increasing girth size.

As he placed the last plate on her desk, he noticed immediately that Helen was already cleaning out pate after plate. Literally downing plate after plate, without taking the time to taste each but simply dumping their contents into her large stomach. Since she was so busy, Felipe began to replace the empty plates with new one, trying to see if Helen would notice but, as the girl gorged, she didn’t seem to notice that she was eating two or three times more than usual.

Only after the third refill, when he presented her a massive three-layered tower cake, Helen seemed to falter. She stared at the massive confectionery, precariously balanced on her bloated belly, as if trying to figure out what that thing was and what she had to do with it.

Felipe, leaning closer to the obese maid, tried to prompt her to continue without appearing too explicit about it.

“Something wrong, Helen?”

“I…I just don’t know…Felipe. Haven’t I…had already….one of these…?”

“Mmh? No…Don’t think so?”

The maid, as she massaged her stuffed gut with both hands, as much as could due to the mere size of it, burped a bit in response before continuing.

“It’s just…that I feel like…I’ve had…more than…enough…already. Feeling quite…filled up.”

Felipe knew this could happen, but he already had a contingency plan prepared. Swiftly he brought closer to the girl face a massive jug full of a mushy brown sludge, which aroma began to tantalize the girl.

“Well, maybe you just need something to cleanse the palette? Try with this milkshake, I know for sure that is probably just gas in need of a release. Afterall, Gwen has eaten six or seven times as that and she still it’s going…so you can’t be full already.”

As he mentioned her friend, Helen seemed to get a boost of confidence. If Gwen was so much ahead of her she surely could manage some more, couldn’t she? Taking the jug with both hands she began to chug its content down in her throat, feeling as the heavy milkshake sloshed down in her belly, she began to feel her hunger rising once more.

As she had grown accustomed to this situation, she didn’t seem to recall that she had used the same expedient with Gwen at the beginning, when she gave her the appetite enhancers. Instead, after burping out loudly, she simply looked hungrily at the cake still laying in front of her.

“Mmm..You know…what, Felipe?
You were right…feel like…I’ve never…eaten in…the first place.”

“Good that you mention that…since it’s almost time for your second lunch.”

Helen licked her lips as she began to stuff her mouth with the massive cake, as she motioned Felipe to brig it on.

“*Munch*….bhrings…it…on….*gulp*…I need my…fuel…to be…competitive.”

Four hours later, well into the afternoon, Helen finally had fallen asleep, loudly snoring due to how stuffed she was, she had fallen asleep just after finishing her third lunch. Felipe looked with pride at the engorged maid. Her body swollen with fat, her gut bloated beyond belief with enough food to fill a small army. She had been scheduled to eat only four meals that day and yet, thanks to hunger stimulants and the appetite enhancers, he had managed to let her stuff with three times as much.

Now all he had to do was to keep doing it. If he could maintain Helen at the same rate that Gwen was having, she would surely reach the five hundred lbs marker he had thought for her.

Leaving the engorged maid to rest for the hours or so before her first afternoon snack, he went to see how Gwen was doing. Upon entering her room, he marveled once more at how good the singer had been at fattening herself up.

She lay on her twin bed, almost a thousand pounds of blubbery beauty, unable to move her body except for her fingers, and even those were getting so sausage likes that it was growing harder and harder for her to do so.

Yet, thanks to the brainwashing sessions she was the happiest as she grew bigger and bigger.

Felipe, moving closer to the bed, leaned on the massive bed bound girl and enjoyed as he looked at the girl face, bloated with fat, with so many chins that completely obscured her neck from view. Gwen was awake, chugging from one of the barrels of shake Felipe had started leaving beside her, to drink from when she felt hungry.

The massively fattened up woman was aware of being bigger than most girls her age and et, she couldn’t be happier. The man she was in love with, loved her back with all of his heart and yet, all he wanted from her was to grow a bit fleshier.

“Hey…Felipe…good…to…see…you. Have…more…food…for…me? Need…to…grow…more…for…Frank.”

“Good afternoon, Miss Gwen.

As a matter of fact, I wanted to propose you something. I know how tiring it is to chew all the time, so I have a proposition for you.”

As Felipe said that he sat on a nearby chair, still basking in the gloriousness of all the flabby fat that was laying in front of him. Gwen Stefani had almost lost any resemblance with a human being since her body had swelled so much with fat. Seen in her entirety she would have resembled a humongous pink, jiggly, mattress like thing, with a swollen-up protuberance on top from which her hair came out, falling stylishly on what had once been her shoulder.

So vast she had become that her breast were swollen sacks of fleshy jello which wobbled at her every micromovement, pooling down at her sides, working as cushions for her fattened-up arms.

Her gut, though, was the biggest thing around. It covered the rest of her body like a bedsheet, hiding from view even the tip of her toes.

Felipe, as he drank from the beauty of this fattened Venus, could only imagine how big already Miss Angelina was already and how bigger Gwen could have grown under his Tribe care. But it was pointless to think about that.

Gwen was already promised to Frank and he couldn’t betray his word to the guy.

As he woke up from those thoughts, he relayed his plan to Gwen, showing her how he proposed her to keep on growing…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Quarter Ton Helen, Stefani’s new life…

choices: Feeding Angelina all night and day makes her only juicier…

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Felipe relayed his plan, the once singer attentively listened to his plan. At first, she wasn’t sure about the effectiveness of what Felipe was proposing. After all, she was already eating pretty much all the time but, as she thought of the happiness that Frank would get by having her growing steadily bigger, she quickly agreed to the guy’s plan.

From that day, Gwen Stefani was then placed under a continuous flow of food.

Literally, she hadn’t a minute throughout her day while she wasn’t chewing or guzzling down something.

Maids began to be a fixture around her, often replacing each other as they did everything for her, seeing as the ex-singer was busy guzzling downs something edible every moment, she was awake. Stefani, already as big as the king-sized bed she was on, began to outgrow it as her forms expanded under the deluge of tasty treats coming from Felipe’s kitchen. Even as she fell asleep, so used to eating she had become, her maids made sure to have her eating and chewing throughout mountains of junk foods and desserts.

Still, she didn’t seem to mind.

The control that Felipe had over her was such that the singer could not see any issue in growing to such a size, seeing her growth, instead, as a reason of pride for she was doing all this to please the only man that seemed to love her with a passion she had never seen before.

As the singer grew bigger and wider, it soon started to become an issue even the simple act of feeding her, although several maids were stationed around her at all times, she was simply growing too big to be catered by them. Felipe, knowing that time had finally arrived to release the cow from the cage, simply called Frank and let him know the good news.

“Frank? It’s me, Felipe. Yeah, just wanted to let you know that you can come and collect your prize. Be mindful though that I still need some additional contacts from you so that the Training can resume for someone else."

Frank seemed overjoyed at the news and quickly moved the following day, hiring a 20 foot trailer to move the over fattened singer back to his private villa. As the workers prepared the truck and Felipe began laying down the plans to move the massively obese girl from her room to the truck, Frank went to seat beside the hugely fattened up artist, enjoying every second of her beautiful fleshy forms.

“Oh, Gwen…you’re so beautiful…”

The girl wanted to reply but, still under the constant barrage of food could only sputter partially chewed food as the maids didn’t stop the treatment, pushing into her maw slice after slice of massive sheet cakes.

Still, although she could barely breathe an move herself, she managed to close her hand on the shaking one of Frank, letting him know that she was as much into him as he seemed to be into her.


As Gwen Stefani was moved out of the mansion, Felipe turned his attention to the ever growing maid, increasing her meal sizes and upping the dosages of the appetite enhancers forcing the maid to feel constantly hungry, growing completely addicted to the simple act of eating. Helen, although at first had been worried of gaining weight, thanks to the relaxing sessions with Felipe and the near constant hunger she felt in her belly, she soon focused only on eating.

Felipe, as he waited for Frank to provide him another target, could only force more and more Helen to grow just as big, if not bigger, that his previous employer.


Meanwhile, in Africa, Angelina Jolie was feeling like she was living a dream. The entire staff of the production, for the movie she was supposed to be doing, was constantly at her side, supporting and fulfilling any request she may have asked. In truth, she was mostly asking for food but, seeing everyone so excited about serving her, providing her and enabling her, left her feel completely satisfied.

The once actress, under the nurturing care of the African studio had kept growing, increasing her size and mass at an outstanding pace. Yet, she didn’t see it that way, all she seemed to be worried about was to keep on following Felipe’s diet, without acknowledging that through the omnipresence of Felicia, she had already surpassed the original amount two to three times over. And yet not one scene of the movie had been recorded yet.

When Angelina had reached Africa she already was barely mobile under her own power but, as meals and snacks filled her days there, she began to rapidly grow even larger.

Without her knowledge it was almost a year since Felipe had entered her life, changing it completely, and yet she couldn’t imagine that she was soon going to be brought in to the biggest event of her life.

And probably her last.


Felicia Macunda had tried again and again to convince the Tribe’s chief to spare Miss Angelina, trying to convince him that she could actually become the reincarnation of their Goddess but, the chief, couldn’t delay anymore what was coming.

“Joao, I’m telling you, let her be. Let me find some tourist to fatten up, we can have the feast with them…you know I can do it.”

“Felicia…Felicia, how many times I’ve got to tell you?

Miss Jolie represent a bounty that our tribe has never seen before. You should be proud of what you’ve accomplished with her. It’s true that she has grown way over our expectation, but that is just proof that we’ve got to distribute her bounty to all the Tribe.

When she arrived here few months ago, she could barely move on her own and ate like there was no tomorrow and yet, she was barely gaining few pounds per day.

Thanks to your efforts, instead, she has just yesterday outgrown her room!
Her entire room, Felicia!

Miss Jolie has grown so massive that if we wait any longer, we will have to relocate the village. In addition to that, all of our Tribe is waiting only for the Goddess Bounty Dinner to bless their lives.

I cannot take them this bounty only because you wish to have for you to play with.

You wish for another target? There is her maid…true, Dom is doing a terrific job with her and yet she has barely reached the 600 lbs under his tutelage.
You could go assisting him.”

The Chief stood silent for a moment, seeing the pained expression on one of his best hunter and charmer and quickly placed a hand on her shoulder.

“I will admit with you that she’s something else. She arrived her weighing almost a thousand pounds and with your assistance she almost doubled her weight.

You know how things go, as soon as they reach a certain weight they simply die and their bounties go to waste. We can’t afford to lose Angelina.”

That night, as Angelina was currently busy with another of her seemingly unending meals, Felicia came into her room and began the arduous task of climbing the massive blob like body of the ex-actress, until she lay distended on her belly in the valley created by Jolie’s massive breasts, almost face to face with the humongous woman.

“Hello Miss Jolie, wanted to let you know that tomorrow will be a big day, for you.”

“Mhrmpf…*gulp*…why…?”

“Tomorrow we will take one of the main scenes of the movie. You will be placed on a stage and will have to act the part…For this reason, only for this time before the scene has to be taken, we will stop with Mr. Felipe’s diet and provide you the needed calories to provide you with the energy you will need for tomorrow evening, alright Miss?”

Angelina, completely glutted by the insane amount of food that had been fed to her in the last months had barely any remembrance of who Felipe had been. Still if this Felipe had placed her on a diet, she could surely let herself go for one night, couldn’t she?

“…Shure…*munch*…will…do…*Burp!*…all…need…ed…to…*Gulp*â €¦follow…the…movie…”

Felicia then, smiled as from below of her a few of her assistants began passing her massive trays choked full of the greasiest meats and sweetened desserts.

“Here we go, Miss, a few more snacks before your next grand meal starts…”

‘Don’t worry, Miss…Will make you so big that Joao will not be able to move you from this very spot. Wanna see how he’s going to cook you if you’re too big to even be moved…’
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Stefani’s fate and other loose ends…

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Felicia was laying down, between the two mammoth sized boobs that Angelina was sporting. The actress was barely over the 2.000 lbs when Felicia had begun bringing more food for her to consume. Still, as gluttonous as she had become under Felipe’s tutelage, she didn’t care anymore about the pesky details like an adult girl laying between her boobs feeding her cartloads of food. All she needed, all she wanted was more to eat. Felicia, was aware of Angelina’s desires and quickly had organized her servants to bring up to her platters upon platters of food, having them reach her so that she could be the one to push them into the massive blob like woman.

“Here we go, Miss. Let’s start with your snack...you need to have energies for tomorrow.”

As Felicia said that, she grabbed the platter with an entire roasted boar and tipped it toward the woman mouth, watching in glee as Angie began to chew and swallow huge chunks from it in rapid succession. As the once actress ate, though, her body seemed to tremble slightly as it began to grow larger inch by inch.

Felicia, still laying atop of the mountainous woman, could feel how the enhanced food began to manifest its effects into the massive American. As she ley there, she could feel the woman body getting fatter and fatter as the food she was eating, the same that she had treated with special herbs to increase its calories content, began to enlarge her. Yet, as more an more food was pushed against the woman mouth, Felicia didn’t seem content and kept ordering more for her patient.

‘Don’t you worry, Miss. I’ll make sure that Joao won’t be able to cook you.’

Angelina was in ecstasy. She wasn’t entirely aware of how all that delicious food was being given to her, since she could no longer see in front of herself, forced instead to stare at a portion of the ceiling, but it didn’t matter. As soon as she felt something touching her lips, she would simply open her mouth wide and get a chunk out of it, moaning in pleasure as the taste overloaded her taste buds. Yet, as much as she liked it, after a while she began feeling tired by the simple act of chewing and so she began to slow down in her consumption. Felicia, noticing that the massive woman was slowing down, moved forward and began to enquire on what was going on.

“Miss? Is everything okay? There is still plenty to go and…and you’re slowing down a lot…”

“Too…tired…” Angie, tired as she was, spoke slowly and tiredly especially since she was breathing hard just from the simple act of talking. Still, she didn’t find anything to worry about. She was just tired.

“Chewing…is…hard.
Getting…too…tired…”

As Felicia heard, she reasoned that it was the truth. Considering how humongous the American was, the simple act of chewing had to be truly exhausting for her overtaxed body. Still, she was nowhere near the end of the massive nightly feeding she had thought of giving to her, to make sure that Angie was going to be so full and fat that her Chief wouldn’t be able to cook her. As she thought for a solution, one of her servants told her something that made her see the solution.

“Felicia? What’s the hold-up? The cakes and sweets are starting to melt…”

As the young African feeder heard those words she opened her eyes wide open, realizing that if Angie didn’t have to chew she could eat even faster than before! Motivated by this plan she quickly commanded her minions to start meliting all the cakes and sweets they had, as well as turning everything else they had prepared into a mush as liquid as possible, and then moved closer to the actress head.

“Miss? Are you hungry? Would you like to continue?”

“Ye…*belch!*…eees…”

“Good. I’ll bring you your food here in a minute then…no need to chew…You will just have to swallow.”


Angie, although she was starting to feel full, wasn’t yet stuffed to the brim, a feeling she was still dreaming of reaching once more. So she was more than happy when Felicia had found the perfect solution for her.

‘Good girl, that Felicia…have to remember to bring her with me in the US when finished here. She’s smart and quick on her thinking. She will take good care of me, especially paired with Felipe…’


Through all night, up to the beginning of the morning, Felicia poured large buckets of liquefied sweets and meats into Angelina’s bottomless stomach, greatly enjoying how bigger the woman grew after each bucketful.

The humongous American blob shaped woman also enjoyed immensely the feeding, swallowing down each portion she received with ease, as she felt herself growing closer and closer to the feeling of being stuffed to bursting point. What she wasn’t aware, was that for each load she gulped down, her body grew more and more massive.

As the feeding session creeped to its ending, her body had grown so fat and massive that already was threatening to burst out of the room she had been placed in. The room, which had been built around her specifically to contain her massive girth, had been made entirely of light wood and palms, so to avoid any accident if Angelina was to grow too big as she did before.

Felicia, creeping up with the last bucket of what was basically an hyper weight gain shake, couldn’t anymore stand on her knees, forced to crawl on Angelina’s massive chins, just to pour that last part of her meal. As she finally managed, and tipped the bucket against Angie’s lips, the once actress felt her mouth fill up with the same liquid she had grown accustomed to during that long night and, although she felt way too full, forced herself to swallow it.

Her body began to rumble angrily. Felicia, afraid of having gone overboard, quickly realize she didn’t have any meaning of move herself to safety, forcing herself to hunker down and hope for the best.

As she did so, Angie’s body began to rattle and quiver, as a groaning sound began to appear along with the rumbling, within the massive mountain of flesh that her body had become. Even Angie, at first started to get worried about the sound that surrounded her, until she felt herself expand once more, growing quickly bigger than before, feeling her own hands and feet being dragged down and under the mass of flesh that expanded around her skeletal structure. As the expansion ended, Angelina felt a strange sensation on her flesh. As she opened her eyes, she didn’t saw the ceiling anymore, finding herself watching at the sky instead.

Felicia could barely contain herself.

Having managed to have her feedee outgrow her room, again, was a spectacular results n her eyes. As she quickly scrambled off the massive woman body, she moved back quite a lot to observe how massive Angelina Jolie had become. And massive it was.

Right in front of her stood a literal mountain of woman flesh. As she moved around the actress, she saw how big each part of her had become. Her arms had grown massively, becoming huge rolls of fat which had grown so large that not even the point of her fingers was visible anymore.

Similar situation was for her legs, her feet vanished from view within a tunnel of sorts made entirely of fattened flesh. But even more impressive were her front and her rear. Felicia honestly couldn’t say where Angelina’s belly started. It was so large that it covered everything up t to her legs, engulfing them into a soft, adipose filled, hug. It divided itself in a series of belly rolls, each wider than the previous, with the last one with a width of at the very least six feet.

Similar situation was her back, massive jiggly belly rolls cascade behind of her resting on her car crushing ass. Her ass cheeks having grown so big that looked like a full adult could walk into that crack and simply vanish from view.

All in all, if she had to say a number, she would have gone for the 3.000 lbs, if not more. But she knew that it was pure hypothesis, since there wouldn’t be no scale big enough for Angie, nor the woman could move from her spot if there was one. Yet, Felicia was satisfied. With Angelina so big, Joao for sure wasn’t going to be able to use her, unless he declared her as the goddess reincarnation.

As she saw Joao move closer to her, already she steeled herself for the reprimand that was sure to come but, instead, she saw that the tribe chief looked way happier than he should have been.

“Felicia! Wonderful work there on our guest! I don’t know how you did it but you managed to have her outgrow her room, again! That is wonderful news!”

“I-It is?”

“But of course! It would have been a waste of time if we had to dismantle it. This way instead we can simply cook her right on the spot!”

“Wh-What do you mean? On…On the Spot!?”



- “Sure! I had already prepared an underground, metal layered, pool filled with water to be used as cauldron to cook her! Now we only have to remove the supports under her, and she will fall right into it, ready to be cooked!”

- “Sure! I had already prepared a hidden platform all around her room. That’s where we will perform the sacrifice. We only have to prepare the pyre and cover all of her in tin foil. She will be great!”

- “But of course! As big as she is how do yo think we can move her? Although, gotta admit she’s surpassed my own expectations. Maybe what you said about her being the goddess reincarnation isn’t far from the truth…Have to see this with the Elders.”

- Meanwhile in the States, Frank provides a new target to Felipe…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Extra feeding means…extra padding for the dinner t

choices: Target: Milla Jovovich. Vocal cords issue
Target: Shakira. Join the coming boom by growing curvier
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Felipe Mbutu was living in a perfect setting. Nothing was out of the ordinary and everything seemed to go smoothly. Day after day he kept taking care of Helen, the now massive maid who had grown used nowadays to the constant stream of food going her way.

Mbutu hadn’t even the need, anymore, to hide his plan on fattening her up, she was so single minded regarding her gluttony that she was blind and deaf to any warning bell she may had seen or felt. Still, it seemed to the African feeder that the maid was made of a different paste than the celebrities before her.

Where Angelina and Stefani had managed to grow humongously huge, Helen seemed to be unable to go over the 800+ lbs. It was a shame in the feeder’s eyes, for he could imagine how beautiful, and bountiful, Helen could have become if she was able to go over her plateau but, alas, there didn’t seem a way for her to grow more.

He currently stood in her room, admiring as Helen gulped down mouthful after mouthful of the weight gain shake Felipe had concocted for her, when he had thought that by pacing her on a liquid diet she would have managed to grow bigger. And yet, as much as she drank and swallowed, she didn’t seem to gain an ounce more.

At first he had tried to check every angle of the situation, monitoring how many calories she absorbed during the feeding and how many she actually used but, he wasn’t able to understand how it was possible for her not to gain anymore. It was then that he realized she must have reached her physiological limit.

Still, since there was nothing to do, he kept her eating as much as possible, still hoping she could overcome her limits, one day.

As he left Helen’s room, he was soon approached by one of the maids at his service, as she gave him the phone, letting him know that someone was on the line for him.

“Hello? Felipe Mbutu here…”

“Hi Felipe! It’s me, Frank!”

“Oh, Hey Frank. How’s going with your girl?”

“She’s adorable. I can’t thank you enough for what you did…She’s everything I’ve ever dreamed…and more!

But I’m calling you to know if you’re available for some more work with that training of yours. And don’t you worry, this line is secure.”

“Of course, I am. Is there any new application coming in?”

“Well, not completely. I’ve been contacted by a few colleagues who have heard on the grapevine that some of my clients have disappeared from the scene for quite a while, creating a vacuum of sorts.

Thanks to this some of their clients have managed to grow in their own market fields.

Now, what they’ve asked to me is if it is possible to have some more celebrities to leave the scene for a while, so that their clients can join the Big league. They already gave me a few names, along with the justifications for it.

As much as I was able to enquire without committing myself, some of these requests are coming from people who have some bias against the celebrities and who managed to ensnare said targets within false promises.

Some other instead, are their own contract managers who have heard about the Contract of Angelina and hope for a similar result.

So, what do you say? Are you interested?”

Felipe didn’t need to even think about, he quickly gave his confirmation and agreed with Frank that he would wait for the files to arrive before taking a decision on the next target. The following day, Mbutu was busy sitting at his desk, in his personal studio, studying the profiles that Frank had sent to him.

The first one was a request coming from a certain Adler R., he seemed to be one of the few who were interested in taking out the opposition to let his clients have a shot at the Big league. As Felipe scrolled through the folder, he saw a few names listed as Adler’s client, but he took no interest in those.

He instead focused on the target identity. Apparently, Mr. Adler, wanted to have Miss Jovovich, Milla to be taken out of the scenes or a while. As Felipe thought about the girl, he reasoned that such an actress could be a difficult one to take on. She was as big as Miss Jolie, for one, but most importantly, he wasn’t going to be requested by her… Still, as he kept reading, he saw that Adler had managed to have Miss Jovovich personal doctor, one of the few she trusted more than everyone else, to falsify her checkup results.

Making her appear as if she was at risk of contracting a dangerous issue at her vocal cords.

Something that only Felipe’s training could hope of alleviate, if not prevent completely.

The next file was from a certain Miss Smith J., she also seemed to be interested in having one of her clients opponents to be taken out of the scene for some time. In her case, though, the target wasn’t an actor but a singer. The girl know as Shakira, to be exact.

Felipe began imagining how the singer would have looked if she was way bigger than she currently as and, had to admit that the idea fascinated him, still, he kept checking the file and the request to be sure that no strange issue could arise.

As he kept checking the file he realized one big issue could be Shakira’s partner and their children. But, in truth, he could simply take them all and have them growing, up and out, under the same roof. As he thought about it, he got quite interested in trying that.

As he kept on reading he noticed that this Miss Smith was someone you didn’t want as your enemy, as she had been able to extort out of one of the trusty aides of Shakira to convince the singer that she was going to lose all her fans if she didn’t step up her game somehow, convincing her that the incoming boom in music fandom was going to be toward curvy girls. Shakira was then going to be informed that Felipe was one of the best around, as nutritionist goes.

Next file was from Mr. Schultzer A., who had invested a lot of money in the growth of his current client, an actor and musician which, already, was largely acclaimed by youngsters of both sexes.

The celebrity name was Zac Efron.

The folder Felipe was checking was one of those that Frank had told him had arrived because the Contract Manager truly thought about the ‘success’ of Miss Jolie after the regimen. Mbutu wasn’t really sure about this one, since these kinds of guys were usually problematic and with an iron will.

Still, since it was a man that they were talking about, he thought that the presence of a particularly good-looking maid could help greatly in having him grow out of his current size. The main issue, on this particular target, he realized, was that the manager was interested in his client, so there would be slim chances of him being able to be shipped to the Tribe.

Still, as Felipe passed to the next folder, if the situation would arise, he was sure that some solution could be found.

As he opened the next file, he saw that also this one was coming from someone interested in their own Client, although it was a situation quite different from the previous one.

The Contract Manager, a Miss Greer S., had taken contact with Frank in order to have her own client taken out from the scene. As far as it was reported within the folder, the client had done some kind of harassment on her and now she was out for revenge.

The guy name, Felipe saw, was Justin Bieber and although he wasn’t an expert, it still rang some bells in his mind. Still, for the same Manager t want her own client out, the guy had to be a true rogue and, if that was the case, he could become a prime candidate to be shipped out to the Tribe under whatever pretext.

The justification, as he kept on reading, was that Mr. Bieber could have the big shot in the Movies he so much wanted, if only he followed the course that Felipe was to provide.

With all of these choices, and seeing as many more folders were still on the table waiting to be examined, Felipe began thinking on what he was to do. If it was better to take one of those he had already reviewed or if maybe some other files could pick his interest…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: New targets, new opportunities…

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Felipe checked through the various files, the one that most intrigued him, and which was the most remunerative for his tribe, was certainly the one that targeted Mr. Bieber. Still, before taking care of the guy, the shaman needed to verify a few things and to do that he sent a quick text toward Frank, confirming his choice but, requesting a meeting with the client before starting.

With Frank’s assistance a meeting was soon organized within one of the few shadiest bars in downtown L.A., so that both Felipe and the Client could meet without attracting unwanted attention.

When the night of the meeting arrived, Felipe went to the location, finding it just as bad as he had expected. Maybe due to his herculean size, or maybe the light of his savage eyes or, even, the pearly white glint of his slightly sharpened teeth, still nobody tried anything funky with him, letting him in as if he was a usual customer.

Once inside he went to a small, shadowed corner, as he waited for the Client to arrive. Much to his surprise, the Client was right behind him, looking like a small, glassed, secretary. Yet, as she sat at the table, he could see a fiery burning rage within those little beady eyes.

“Let’s cut the chase, shall we? So, He’s going to take care of His Majesty?”

Felipe, already having been briefed by Frank, knew well enough the codes that were going to be used during the meeting. “His Majesty” was referred to Mr. Bieber, she was going to refer to herself as “Her” and Felipe himself was going to be “Him”.

“Maybe. It will all depends on how this meeting goes. He’s a bit short of trust toward others. Still, he needs a few information’s from Her, before taking any decisions.”

“Shoot.”

“First, will His Majesty absence be covered? His Majesty could leave the scene for a long, long vacation, if the request is brought forward. Second, more like a curiosity but still, why the request?”

“His absence will impact the scene for sure but, will be justified. His Majesty is known for vanishing for long periods of time due to his need to clean himself within specific clinics. Extended duration of his absence will also not be a problem.

About the second question, let us talk about a supposed event.

Suppose she was invited to a late-night party. Then, during this hypothetical event, let us suppose that His Majesty tried to flirt, badly, with Her. She would have refused, of course. Mixing work and private life will never be a good thing.

Supposedly unsatisfied with his failure, His Majesty would have tried next to get Her drunk. Which would have failed again, as she had to be able to see the pattern in these events, if they had ever happened. In the end His Majesty, would have tried again to get at Her, trying to slip a drug of sorts into her drink, and when she would have confronted him, he could have tried to force himself onto her.

She would have remained at his side due to her work ethics, but that wouldn’t mean that she couldn’t exact some revenge, if so she wished. But, naturally, these are only suppositions.”

Felipe, having heard everything sat deep in thought for a few minutes, evaluating the pros and the cons of taking under his care the figure of Mr. Bieber. Considering how he managed to get his own Contract Manager to want him out, he decided that Mr. Bieber was in dire need of a lesson.

“Please, inform Her that He will accept the contract. It will be His pleasure in helping His Majesty to… Relax.”

“She would like to know how He’s going to proceed, in order to prepare any papers if needed…”

“Alas, He doesn’t talk about his methods. Professional secret, She must know. If She’s so intrigued, She could always come too.

She could see the effects directly.”


As the two parties agreed, they kept discussing on how to convince the target to join Him and, as the night began to turn into early day, both Felipe and the Client bid themselves goodbyes.

“It has been a pleasure doing business with Him. She will send you confirmation within the week for the arrival date of His Majesty.”

“She’s welcome. And the offer is always open. Should She wish to feel the need of a vacation, She’ll be welcome.”


A few days later, as Felipe prepared the house and the servants, especially by moving Helen to a few friends who would be interested in keeping her well fed and to keep growing healthy, he received confirmation that the target was bound to arrive on the following day under the pretense of following a regimen that would have turned him into the Biggest Superstar around.

When morning came, Felipe was the first to greet the target in, as the young man looked around in surprise seeing where he was going to stay for the duration of this ‘training’, as his Manager had called it.

“Good Morning, Mr. Bieber. Welcome to Miss. Jolie Mansion.”

“Oh, Hey man. Wow, I thought of having seen this place somewhere…so, why are we crashing here?”

“Well, Miss Jolie was so ecstatic of the result obtained by the training that you’re going to follow that she offered me to use this mansion as a training center of sorts, for all those young stars that wish to grow bigger in their respective sectors.

But, please, let our maids bring your baggage’s to your room, as I will give you a tour of the place and some explanation on the training.”

A few moments later, Felipe was slowly moving through the mansion beside Justin Bieber, letting him see the place as he explained him how the training was going to go.

“Most simply, you will undergo a training which will push you over your limits. Rending you capable of feats that you would have never believed been possible. These feats will grant you limitless possibilities, especially in your actual field of work.

See, for example, Miss Angelina Jolie. She’s followed the training and, almost right after that, she found herself requested for a multi-million’s dollar contract into a massive new colossal. Or, closer to your own business, Miss Gwen Stefani, which after following the training has started working on a new album which, as far as rumors go, will be something never heard before.”

“So, you’re saying that by following this training of yours, I will make it Big into the industry? Hell yeah. What we are we waiting for, man…”

“Alas, before starting there are a few rules that have to be followed in order to reach the end of the training. There are several, and you will find them into a booklet right next to your bed but, in the meantime, I will mention to you the most significative.

First, no contact with the outside world. For the rest of the world you’re going to follow a long vacation, meanwhile you shall need all of your focus on the training.

Second, due to the particularly complex nature of the training, you shall follow a specific diet prepared to your exact needs. Some variation may be applied from time to time but, you’re requested to follow it to the letter.

Third, while you shall be focused only on the training, rest is an important factor. So, one day a week you’ll be free to do whatever you wish, as long as it complies with the two rules stated before.

Any question?”

“Er…actually, yeah. When’s lunch? Haven’t got breakfast this morning and I’m starving…Don’t worry man, will follow the rules. I need to be the biggest around.”

Smiling, Felipe accompanied the young singer to the dining room and swiftly went into the kitchen to take charge with the cook’s that were already hard at work, checking their preparation and to see what would be most fitting for Justin first lunch in the mansion…

- Lunch focused more on the taste. Got to get him hooked first.

- Light meal, keeping him hungry to snack more often

- Large meal to get him nice and full. Give him a taste of what’s coming

- Lunch prepared more like a buffet. See how long he lasts

- Something else…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Letting Bieber ‘grow out’

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Justin sat at the dining table, he immediately was shocked as he saw a plethora of waiters and maids bringing forward platters upon platters of delicious looking food. Ranging under his shocked, wide open, eyes there were several different types of pasta, with red or white sauce, Chinese food in all forms and shapes, massive slabs of meats in various cuts and cooked with different techniques, from grilled, to roasted or even in sauce.

Several different kinds of fish platters, each extremely tasty looking, and then fried food of any possible variation served, alongside, with plentiful platters of side dishes, from salads to finger food.

There was so much of it that, for a long moment, Justin was almost afraid of having been sent into the hands of a madman.

“Er…F-Felipe? I…I don’t have to…Eat all of this, right? Right?”

“But of course not, Sir. Since I need some personal information from you, in order to prepare your own diet, I’ve decided to prepare for today’s meals a sort of buffet, so that you may partake in whatever you may prefer. This way, basing on your preferences, the diet that will be issued will try to be at the utmost toward your own tastes.”

Feeling way better, now that things were clear, Justin rose from his chair and began scooping some first courses into his plate, just like he would have done at an all you can eat buffet. On the way back, before sitting down, he stopped a moment beside Felipe, thanking him for the opportunity.

“Thanks again for everything, Man. And call me Justin, alright? Sir makes me feel…old.”

“As you prefer, Justin. Take whatever you want, today is a cheat day. From tomorrow, we will start the diet.”

Hearing that, Justin began taking huge forkfuls out of the plates he had taken, finding the pasta and the noodles made to perfection. He had actually to stop himself from moaning, as good as the plates were. Still, he kept shoveling anything he could within his mouth, considering that since he was going to start the diet on the following day, he could overdo it on that day. As he cleaned out the two plates of pasta, he rose again and took a few cuts of meats from different platters, wishing to try anything that took his fancy.

As he returned to his table, he began to take a bit from every plate he had brought with him, tasting as much as he could but without ever finishing again his plates. As soon as he had his fills of the meats he rose again and moved toward the fish’s section. Acting as before he took a couple of plates and returned to his seat where he started to stuff his mouth as if he had no control.

As he felt himself fill up, Justin moved one of his hands slowly, unbuttoning his pants, so that he could continue. Having tasted a bit of everything, as he tried to cover his unbuttoned pants, he stood and went for the dessert section. As the other trips, he grabbed a bit of everything but, as much as he had wanted to taste only, he soon find out that those sweets were to die for, finding himself unable from stopping and clearing them all.

Everything around the table was tasting divine and he truly couldn’t stop himself from going for a fourth trip. This time, though, he brought back quite the large plate of BBQ ribs. As much as he liked everything in the buffet, for his last plate he wanted nothing else than a few of the delicious ribs he had tasted before.

Although his belly was feeling full, weighing him down as if full of lead, as soon as he sat in his chair with the plateful of ribs drenched in barbecue sauce, he couldn’t stop himself from attacking them with hungry determination. Uncaring for the grease on his hands or around his lips, Justin kept taking the ribs from his plate with both hands, chewing and then swallowing each load as he savored the taste of the meat and of the sauce.

It took him almost two hours, between coming and going to the buffet spread, before he threw in the towel, feeling like a beached whale as he collapsed against the chair. Cleaning his lips from the grease of his latest plate of ribs, he found himself burping out in satisfaction and felt a sudden tiredness fall cross his shoulders.

“*Urp!* Whew…sorry. Ugh. So good, man. You guys really know how to cook…everything was so tasty I couldn’t stop myself.”

“Glad you enjoyed, Justin. Why don’t you go have a bit of a rest? Miss Cerys, the head-maid, will be pleased to escort you…”

As Felipe saw the bloated singer leave the table, almost being dragged by one of the maids, he grinned. As far as he saw, Justin hadn’t much of a will power to fight off his hunger, if he confronted it. True, it could have been just the novelty from the day but, there was potential for improvement.

Meanwhile, as Justin was walking alongside the maid, he couldn’t refrain from noticing that she was a really cute girl, not too curvy, but neither flat. Just the right size. As he walked, got dragged, he faked a slip and grabbed on her breast, feeling it for softness. The girl didn’t once break her smile, even as she felt herself being touched, instead she brought her hand up to Justin’s and caressed it from the outside.

“Sir, if you wanted to feel them, you just had to ask. All of us have been already informed of your presence here and, although we are not to disturb you during the week, on your free day we can come and keep you company, if so you wish…”

“Wha’? Oh, I mean…yeah…er…sorry…I mean… Thanks.”

As he was escorted to his room, he saluted the girl and entered, feeling himself like the richest man in the world.

‘Wow! Can’t believe she was into it…that has to be what Felipe said about the free day…

So, I can have one of them each time? Man, this is awesome!
Have to remember to send my thanks to that frigid witch of my manager.

Seems she made me a huge favor by sending me here.’

Feeling rather tired he then moved onto the bed, planning to have a quick restorative nap, when instead he fell into a deep, digestive, sleep. As he was sleeping, the maid that had escorted him entered the room and stood a few minutes by his side, staring at him maliciously.

‘So, you think that you can do whatever you want, eh? You pig.

You deserve what’s going to come to you, better than anyone. Mr. Mbutu can play silent as much as he like but I’ve noticed that whoever enter this house gets huge.

I guess it’s your turn, now.

I will only find it fun to play along…’


She was one of the original maids that, long before, Angelina had personally hired, and that since then had been working within the mansion. She sometimes missed Miss. Jolie, for the actress had always been nice, gentle and caring but, had to admit that with Mr. Mbutu around there was so much fun to be had.

Leaving the guy to sleep, she returned to her duties, finding herself face to face with the African guy himself.

“Sir” she said, bowing her head as the old assistant of Miss. Jolie was entering the room just as the maid was leaving.

“Cerys? I was just coming to make sure that everything was in order. I know that our current guest may have had some…incidents around girls, so I wanted to make sure that…”

“Thank you, Sir. But there is no need. Mr. Bieber was just as gentlemanly as any other person in his position. I thank you though, for the concern.”

As she moved away, returning to her duties, Felipe turned around a bit watching her leave. He wasn’t sure but he had thought that she was looking at him rather excitedly.

He was aware of the fact that she had been in the mansion the longest, compared to any other maids but, if she had found him out why hadn’t she said anything about it to anyone?

Felipe had enjoyed having Helen around, she had been a great involuntarily ally, and test subject, in the fattening of Gwen Stefani, but as all good things had to end, she too had to be moved away to avoid issues. And as much as he would have loved to see the head maid to grow, he couldn’t afford it.

Without her directing the other maids and all the small jobs within the house, the mansion maintenance was going to be hell.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: A Buffet-like meal

choices: It’s dinner time! Justin dines by himself
Dinner time. Justin and Vicky dine together
Feeling rather hungry, Justin search for a quick snack
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Justin woke up in the middle of the afternoon, feeling refreshed although, still a bit bloated. It wasn’t often the he would let himself go that much at mealtimes but, as he recalled on how everything tasted, already he began drooling a little.

Shaking himself, though, he rose from the bed and, without glancing at the mirror he had in the room, he changed into some sweats since it was time for his Gym training. Just before getting out, though, he noticed the small booklet on his bedpost and gave it a quick read.

As he leafed through the few pages, he saw that most rules were just really common sense, although one in particular caught his eye.

‘Unless authorized, no physical activity shall be performed during the first phases of the training.’

As he thought about it, he left his room and wandered through the mansion in search of the private gym, blindly sure that one had to be somewhere. As he walked, he suddenly saw Felipe coming out of the steamy kitchen and decided to approach him.

“Hey, Felipe!”

“Oh, Hey Justin. Had a nice rest?”

“yeah… the bed is super comfy. Had a question…actually, two questions for you, though.
Where is the gym? And I’ve seen in the pamphlet that is forbidden to do physical activity. Is it true?”

“Well, the private gym is downstairs, in the basement. And it is not technically forbidden to exercise. You see, for most people, this training has to be a relaxing course, so usually exercising, running and similar activities, which put your mind and body under stress are not advisable. In your case, though, the training will be much harsher…”

“H-Harsher?”

“Why, yes. It is not personal but, Justin, you wish to become the biggest star around. To reach such a level, we will have to work on your character, on your body and on your mind, strengthening all three of those to their limits.

Similar to an ingot of stainless steel, we will need to hammer you down, metaphorically speaking, until you’ll change from the squared ingot bar, you’re now…to the magnificent sword you will become.

For this reason, as your training will take a lot out of you, not only your diet will give you plenty of energies but you shall have to use those energies down in the gym to train yourself. Of course, once we will have shaped your body, the hardest part will come with your mind, but we will manage.

You’ll see, in one-year time you’ll be ready to take the role of the Biggest Singing Star around.

Follow me, I’ll show you the gym. One thing, though. Never exercise on your own.
Due to the dangers related to it, there is a trainer always available in the gym. If she’s not around, don’t go on your own.

Understood, Justin?”

“Yeah, Felipe. I got you. Don’t worry, man…I don’t want to risk losing an arm or else just to be alone.”


Feeling motivated, Justin followed Felipe, his Coach so to say, and after a brief trip with an internal lift, they were in a massive room, chocked full of gym equipment’s.

“Wow…this place is massive, man.”

“Eh, that’s what Miss Jolie had wanted. Anyway, let me preset you the in-house Trainer.

Vic? Vic, are you here?”


As Justin was still looking around, he didn’t notice immediately the figure approaching but, as soon as he saw her his eyes went wide in shock. Coming toward him and Felipe was a massive hulking woman, not burly as some could think a body builder to be, but still she was massive. With the body of an amazon, she walked slowly and calmly toward them, still sweating a bit, with a towel around her neck.

Dressed in a two pieces sweater shorts and shirt, Justin saw immediately the defined abs on her middle, which seemed only to compliment the large rack she sported.

“Justin Bieber, she’s Victoria Savage, Vic or Vicky for short, our in-house Gym Trainer. Despite the name, she’s quite friendly don’t worry.

Vicky, this is our latest guest, Mr. Justin Bieber. He’s here for the Training.”

Victoria Savage was a 6,4 feet tall, amazon, with a fiery long red mane of hairs, with an imposing figure, without looking unproportioned. By herself she had often scared shitless those who had tried to work out around her. Still, as her Jade eyes turned toward Justin, he felt only admiration, and a hint of attraction, for the woman.

“H-Hi…”

“Hey there, Mr. Bieber…So I’ll see you often in here, uh? It will be nice to have a workout buddy. Felipe is ok but, he’s away way too much for my tastes.”


Felipe stayed at the joke and helped to relax the mood. As he did so he couldn’t stop thinking back when he had hired Vicky just a few days before. As the agreement was reached over the fate of Justin, he had been informed that the target had a preference for gym activities and so, he went and scoured the market for the right figure to have in his pocket.

As he searched, he found Vic, professional trainer, body builder and fat admirer.
It did not take him long to convince the amazon to come and work for him, although he had to let her know a bit about the plan regarding Justin. Still, as much as the woman knew, Bieber was there just to be fattened up enormously and then sent back where he came from.

He had made sure that was all she was going to know about.

And so, here they were, Felipe planning to fatten Justin up with massive meals, while Vicky was going to make sure he exercised the least possible, while also preclude him any way of doing exercise ever again.

Returning to the present, he saw that both Justin and Vic had already started to exercise, the first doing some stretches in front of a mirror, while the latter doing some curling, showing off her curves and muscles to the young singer. Leaving them to on their own, he saluted them and returned to the kitchen to supervise the preparation for the dinner of that evening.


Justin, form his side, was feeling rather edgy. Not only he felt ashamed of his current figure, in comparison to the amazon beside him, but also, he could barely take his eyes from her, so hot she made him feel. As he kept stretching in front of the mirror, he suddenly caught her checking him out!

‘Man! She’s checking me out?

Maybe is only the name? Nah, that can’t be…otherwise she would have started as soon as the name dropped. So, she has to find me interesting…isn’t she?’

“Hey, Justin?”

“Y-Yeah?”

“Was wondering…you’ve done gym before, right?”

“Sure…not as much as you, though...You're huge…Erm! I meant…”
‘Stupid! Why saying something like that…’

As he began tormenting himself over his choice of words, not wanting to offend her or anything, he almost missed her answer back. And her smile.

“Thanks. It is not so often that someone sees the hard work I do to keep myself fit.
Although, you’re not that bad yourself either. I can see that you like to exercise…who knows, maybe in the coming months you’ll managed to put on some pounds and get the body you wish for…”

As she said that, she flashed him a smile that left him shocked and confused. So much so that he had to stop his stretching’s, just to avoid hurting himself as he went down on a knee, fake checking his shoestrings.

‘Man…She’s something else alright…never before have I ever felt like this with a girl.
Who cares about the maids, when this beauty is around?’

For the rest of the afternoon both Justin and Victoria kept doing some exercise in the gym, although most of the heavy training was done practically only by her. Under the guise of letting him feel the place, before committing to serious training, she almost forced him to do only a few light exercises while she went full out to show off to him.

Vicky wasn’t really into him, but she knew he had potential.

He was way too skinny, but that was something that Felipe Mbutu was going to take care of pretty soon.

But if he managed to gain quite a bit of weight, she could see herself lusting at him, as he grew bigger and bigger for her. Vic had always been fascinated by fat people. She had grown up in a family of fitness nuts, forcing her to love the idea of having a fit, muscly body. But, whenever she dreamt, she always saw herself catering and teasing to massive lumps of fat, both women and men alike.

And now, thanks to Felipe’s offer, she might have a straight shot at her dream without having to worry about being put into jail.

As the two of them finished their exercises, she went to a near mini fridge and took out of it a couple of bottles, tossing one to Justin, who caught just barely.

“There you go, Justin. After a good workout nothing better than a cold energy drink. Heads up!”

As she drank from her bottle, seeing that Justin was doing the same, she barely managed to hide her smile, for she knew that while her bottle was a normal energy drink. The one she had passed to Justin was way richer in sugar and had a mildly addictive effect.

Letting him go to have a shower, she could barely wait as months had to pass away and he would become her ideal of a Real Man.

Big, fat and lazy…she could only wait and see…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Justin Bieber meet his Gym Trainer

choices: Vicky sitting at the table, right beside to his own seat.
Cerys standing near his seat, ready to serve and pamper him
Felipe, motioning him to seat at the table covered in food
The frigid witch of his Manager, seated at the table!?
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Justin stood under the shower way longer than he should have done, as much as he tried to stop himself, he couldn’t refrain from thinking about Victoria. Just staying there and watch as she flexed and curled, as her muscles moved under her skin, as her breasts bounced every time she pulled or pushed, he felt himself growing hot and excited. Yet, as much as there was a feeling within them, he could see in her eyes that she wasn’t that much into him.

As he closed the shower and stepped off, he briefly wondered if with the training he would have managed to impress her.

But as he changed himself in a new pair of pants and shirt, he suddenly felt mildly hungry.

‘Must have worked out more than I thought…I wonder if I could have a quick snack before dinner…just something to tide me over…’

Leaving his room in search of something, he found himself by the pool, where he decided to sit down for a bit feeling his legs strained after the gym session he had just had. As he sat by himself, with his belly rumbling lightly, he notices that the maid he had ‘erroneously’ touched after lunch seemed to be going toward him.

“Good Afternoon Mr. Bieber. I saw you sitting here on your own and wanted to ask you if there was anything you may need…”

“Well, to say the truth…yeah. I’m feeling a bit hungry…isn’t there something I could nibble on. Something light, just to tide me over before dinner.”

“Not to worry, Sir. I’ll gladly bring you something light to quench your hunger.”

Bowing lightly Cerys turned back and went to the kitchen to take something for the young singer to munch on. As she filled a platter with some cookies, a few doughnuts and a handful of pastries, she realized that while the platter she was preparing was rich in choices, wasn’t as light as the guest had asked.

She had guessed what Mbutu plans were for the guy, although she couldn’t fathom the reason behind them. In truth, she had been shocked when she had realized that Felipe was fattening the incoming guest up and, had wondered for quite a bit if he had done the same to Miss Jolie.

As she thought about her old boss, she thought back to how she had seen her balloons up, while she did nothing to stop her.

It hadn’t been her business, this she repeated herself like a mantra but, she couldn’t deny the growing fascination for Felipe’s methods in fattening people up. He seemed totally at ease, as if he wasn’t doing anything at all.

From then on, as she had witnessed the transformation of Miss Stefani, her fascination turned into admiration for the African guy. And now, now she wanted nothing more than ease along his work with their latest guest.

But how could she give to Mr. Bieber something light, while also trying to support Mr. Mbutu’s plans?

As she looked around the kitchen, she noticed a platter left on the counter, under a glass dome. As she saw the dessert kept within, she remembered haring Felipe talking within himself the night before.

“This...this has to be my best creation yet… this little cake, seemingly so light and innocent…it really is bursting with so many calories to put a wedding cake to shame.

Can’t wait to see the effects it will have on whoever eats it…will it be Justin? Or someone else, maybe?”

Waking up from her reverie, a devious smile appeared on Cerys’s lips.

Quickly she grabbed the glass dome and began cutting the small cake into slices, while also taking all the slices on the platter she was going to bring to the guest. If this cake was as light as it looked, Justin was going to commend her and then nothing could go wrong, neither to her job, neither on Felipe’s plan.

Swiftly carrying the dessert back, she found the singer still seated near the pool, although as soon as she reached him she noticed that he forced himself to stay still, as if he had the urge to take the platter from her hands, as she slowly passed him a small plate with a slice of the cake.

‘You’re that hungry, uh? Well, let’s see how you fare after this…’

“Here you go, Sir.”

“Thanks!”

As Justin thanked her he immediately gave a big bite to the slice of cake, enjoying the texture within it and the taste, as it began to spread within his mouth. In few bites, the slice of cake had vanished from sight and yet, he was still hungry for more. As he turned to ask for some more, he was pleasantly surprised that a new slice appeared into his vision, as the maid had given him another one without even asking.

Nodding with gratefulness, he started anew on the cake, wolfing it down just as quickly. As he swallowed down the last mouthful from the third slice, though, he stopped himself and stood from the bench on which he was, as he thanked the girl and moved on, deciding to go back into his room to unpack a bit of his baggage.

After all, if he had to stay one year in there, he had to have everything organized, at least within his room.

As he walked toward his room, though, he began to feel his hunger vanishing, replaced by a certain heaviness coming from within, just as if he had a repeat of the massive lunch, he had that day.

‘Sheesh…Gotta start get used to eating well.
Can’t be I’m already this full after such small slices of cake.

Nah, it must be just the fancy food in here…’

As he returned to his room, that feeling of fullness made itself more and more present until, as he stood near his bed, he couldn’t take it anymore and decided to lay down to nap a bit. As he closed his eyes, he thought to himself that he was going to sleep just for a bit, only to soothe his overworked stomach but, instead he rather quickly fell once more into a deep sleep.

When he woke up, looking out at the window he saw that the sun had already settled. Surprised, he stared at his watch and realized he had slept away all the afternoon. Groggily standing up, he noticed that his stomach was now feeling way better than before.

In truth, he felt a bit hungry, although he wasn't sure how it was possible.
