“Man, have to curb down my appetite…otherwise this diet will be hell for me…”

As he stood from the bed, he turned around and watched himself into the mirror. Already he could see the hint of a bit of softness on his middle, nothing to be scared over but, if he didn’t do anything it could only worsen his situation. Still, as he stared at his reflection, he smiled at himself. He had never said that to anybody but, he loved to stare at himself.

Apart from the beauty in the private gym, no one else had ever caught his eyes, than himself.

‘And to think that when this training will be over, I’ll be the best I can ever be! I’ll be the biggest star around…None shall reach my stature…even around the world! Ha!’

As he had those thoughts, he heard someone knocking at his door. Collecting himself, he answered back finding out that it was just one of the maids which had come to inform him that dinner was ready to be served in the dining room. Quickly, as he began to feel his stomach grumble a bit as if it could have understood the maid words, he re-dressed and left the room.

When he entered the dining room he was surprised in seeing…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Munchies attack after gym

choices: Day 1: Starting the Training like a Champ!
Day 1: Dinner’s aftereffects. Justin is worried
Skip a week, how are things at Day 7?
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Justin entered the dining room he stood silently in shock realizing that, seated neat his own place, was Vicky, her Amazon Gym buddy. Slack jawed he didn’t resist when Cerys helped him toward the table, aiding him to sit, retaking control only when the first platters of food were placed under his nose.

Looking down he saw a salad bowl being placed right under his eyes, filled to the brim with pasta made with a sauce of cheese, egg and bacon pieces. Questioningly he moved his stare toward Felipe who was standing at the end of the room, near the double doors of the kitchen.

“Felipe…?”

Before Justin could finish his question, he felt the socked foot of Vicky “caressing” his own leg, as she invited him to enjoy dinner. Looking at her plate he could say that she too had received a larger portion than normal, although it still seemed small in comparison with his own.

Still, between his own hunger, and the encouragement from Vicky, he started to take forkfuls out of the bowl, feeling how good the pasta was on his taste buds. After the first, slow, bites, he began eating in earnest, focusing only on his plate without noticing that Vicky’s portion was quickly replaced with a more normal sized plate. After a while, though, as He had had more than half a bowl, Justin began to slow down, feeling his shirt a bit constricting on his filling up belly. As Vicky saw this, and after sharing a conspiratorial glance with Felipe, she proposed a toast, having so Cerys fill up Justin glass with some kind of tea.

“To a perfect Training course to make out of Justin the Biggest Superstar Around!”

Hearing her sincerely cheery voice, Justin couldn’t much but oblige, raising his glass and drinking the sweetened tea in it. As he drank it he shared a dubious glance toward Felipe, which imagining the question replied with his calm tone.

“Although the training start tomorrow, drinking alcohol before this kind of regime is not a good idea. I’m sorry but you’ll have to get used to tea, Justin.”

“No worries…*urp*…Man. It’s kinda too sweet…but it’s good.”

As he then returned to his plate, he began once more to scoop up forkful slowly but, after a few minutes his pace quickened again, as he felt his hunger rising anew. Although finding it strange, he didn’t seem to mind it too much, since the pasta he was having was so good. As he quickly polished the bowl, he emptied again his glass, which had been filled once more by Cerys.

Meeting the stare of Vicky made him blush and so, he didn’t see the bowl taken away, replaced by a platter filled with lasagna covered in beef sauce. As he looked at the, once more, big portion he had been given, he had wanted to raise some questions but, he felt down right starving, although his belly pushed against the confines of his shirt. As Vicky encouraged him to go on, saying that he was going to need the carbs to train, and Cerys freed his belly from the shirt, by lifting it up, Justin started again to dig in, enjoying the taste so much that he couldn’t refrain a moan.

Bite after bite, with Cerys at his side, helping him to clean his lips with a napkin, he cleared almost three fourths of the pan before stopping again.

“Oh man…*Burp* It’s all so good…feels full but…so hungry…”

“You’re just not used to eat a bit more than your normal. This meal is pretty common for people who wants to train their bodies as you wish to do.”

“It is?” He asked toward the amazon seated at his side.

“It sure is. A Real man who’s training, eat like this at all meals…”

“I didn’t know…guess I’ve got to step up my game then…”

Emptying his glass once more, he quickly went to work on the remaining food, having bite after bite, swallowing each morsel and feeling it travel and land heavily in his filling up stomach. His belly pushing out in front of him as it filled with the delicious food, he was having, began to move closer and closer to the table. Cerys saw that and distracting for a moment Justin by giving him a new refill of his tea, she managed to smooth it out so that it would grow under the table, instead of against it.

As he finally cleared the pan of lasagna, he loudly burped before excusing himself rapidly. Although nobody around the table seemed to be disturbed by it. Still, after a few minutes rest, during which Justin chit-chatted with Vicky, the pan was removed, and a new plate brought to him.

This time, he saw a small mountains of fried chicken pieces, while on the side, there were a small tower of onion rings and a few pieces of chicken nuggets. Forcing a second burp out of himself, Justin began tearing the chicken flesh with his own hands, munching with joy on the greasy fried skin on each piece, feeling its greasy, and yet not heavy, taste on his tongue. Beside him, Vicky stole quick glances at him, as she ate her grilled chicken breast, accompanying them with excited smiles. Thus pushing him to eat faster and faster.

Felipe, from the sidelines, watched interested as Vic managed to push and prod Justin to keep eating, although his belly was rounding out quite a bit, showing that he was getting pretty full. Knowing this, and wanting to avoid having him feel sick, Felipe quickly went into the kitchen and began to take out from the fridge the cheesecake they had prepared to close the dinner.

‘There will be time to push him for more than three courses…but for now, we’ve gotta make do with what we have…’

Hearing from the adjacent room that Justin had finished, hearing his most massive belch of the evening, Felipe gave him again a few minutes rest, before bringing to him the cheesecake.

The singer, feeling still a bit hungry, and also full, moved a tired glance toward the treat that Felipe had brought on the dining table.

“M-More? I…I don’t know if I can…”

“It’s just to close the dinner, Justin. Come on, just one slice…”

As Felipe said that, he cut a larger than most slice and left it in a plate in front of the singer, which was currently busy massaging his full belly with one hand, while he moved under it the hem of his sweat pants.

He was feeling full but, between the smiles from Vicky and his own residual hunger, he took his spoon and brought one morsel to his lips. As he chewed on the cake, he closed hi eyes in bliss. Although he was feeling pretty full, although everything had tasted delicious, that cake was heaven on his taste buds.

The soft, and yet sweet, taste of it seemed to cleanse his mind from any other concern. Morsel after morsel, in half an hour he finally managed to clean his plate lick-clean, yet forcing him to crash with his back against the chair, feeling himself get sleepy after such a meal. So he laid there, his tired eyes met for one last time with those of Vicky, noticing how satisfied she looked at him.

“You did a good job tonight, Justin, for a starlet. Will see you tomorrow afternoon at the Gym. Have a good night.”

Saying that, she rose from the table, sending him a wink and leaving the room, as he was then helped by Cerys to stand up. As he was up, sleepy as he was feeling he barely felt the tautness in his stomach, letting himself be carried away to his room. Before he could leave the dining room, though, Felipe stopped him for a moment.

“Justin, tomorrow we start your regime. I’ll send Cerys up to wake you at around 10 AM. Enjoy your night…”

As Justin was escorted to his room, undressed and redressed in his PJ’s, he felt sleep overtake him quickly, although a thought passed through his mind before he closed his eyes.

‘Man…hope the regime is always this good…Want to be the bigger thing of next year as soon as I can…’
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Dinner with a Goddess

1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Waking up on his own half an hour before Cerys scheduled wake up call, Justin rose slowly from the bed, almost wishing he hadn’t to leave it, so comfortable it had been. Still, as he was now standing from it, he slowly walked to the bathroom where he quickly showered himself and prepared for the day.

As he started to wear his sweats, he noticed that they weren’t as tight as he thought they should have been. Wondering for a moment about that, he suddenly forgot about the issue as he heard Cerys knocking on his door, informing him that breakfast was ready. Feeling strangely hungry at first morning, he left the room and went to the dining room, finding there Felipe drinking some coffee and having a bit of a croissant still on his plate.

“Good Morning, Justin. Ready for your first day of training?”

“Sure am, Man. Can’t wait to be started.”

“Good! Let’s have your breakfast and we can start. Now, breakfast is one of the most important meals of the day…be sure to have your fill.”

As Justin sat o his chair, he saw that the maids begun by bringing him three plates and a couple of tall milkshakes to wash the food down. On the first plate he had a stack of six, two inches thick pancakes covered in maple syrup and liquid butter, then there was the larger plate with a four egg omelet and a dozen or so strips of fried bacon and finally a slice of Sacher-Torte cake. As he licked his lips, he first grabbed one of the milkshakes and took a long gulp from its straw, tasting the chocolaty deliciousness from it.

After that he began his meal, taking a morsel from one plate and then another from a different one, feeling the amazing tastes spreading on his tongue, making him enjoy greatly the meal. A bite here and a bite there, it took him almost one hour to everything, leaving him slightly panting as he felt his now full belly weighing him down.

“Good Job, Justin. Now, give me a few minutes and then we can meet in the adjacent room.”

A few minutes later, slowly moving with his full belly, Justin ambled through the hallway until he reached the adjacent studio, whereas he sat heavily on a reinforced couch, trying hard to remain awake as Felipe began to explain to him how things were going to go.

“Very good, Justin. So, from today we will follow this schedule tightly.

Each morning, right after your breakfast, I’ll teach you the theory, the gestures and the mindset we have to mold into your persona in order to have you reach the level of greatness you can achieve.

Then we will have a break for lunch time, followed by a short rest to ‘recharge your batteries’ and then in the afternoon I will show you a few practical examples through movies and prepared clips. At around 6 PM you will join Vicky in the gym, where she’ll give you some assignment to prepare your body for the advanced exercise you will need to follow in the following months. After a quick break for shower, we will meet again at Dinner and, for a quick recap of the day’s lesson after it.

Then, with a fast, end of the day snack, you will go to bed and the cycle will continue.

Now, ready to start?”

Justin, feeling downright sleepy after the breakfast he just had, could barely follow what Felipe had said, still, trying his best he replied with a sleepy confirmation.

Afterwards, as Felipe began talking and explaining in boringly detail, Justin didn’t even realize that he had, slowly, fallen asleep. Felipe, smiling through his teeth, kept on with his explanation, though reducing his words to barely a whisper.

‘You’re getting into the spirit of things aren’t you, Justin?
Keep working like this and you’ll be the BIGGEST star around…just as we want you to be.’

Almost two hours later, Felipe raised his voice, waking up the singer from his nap, making sure to avoid noticing that the guy had fallen asleep. As he gave Justin a quick summary of what had been said that morning, he ushered him out, directing him toward the dining hall for lunch. As the singer walked through the hallway, he tried to remember what Felipe had explained to him but, he didn’t seem to recall.

‘Man, that was boring as hell.
No wonder I can’t recall anything…well, it’s only the first day. I’m sure I’ll get used to these lessons…’

As he entered the dining room, he quickly sat at his place, not feeling truly hungry but, neither sated. As he waited for lunch to arrive though, he graciously accepted a cup of tea from Cerys. As strange as that sounded to himself as well, h was getting rather used in having that particular brew of tea. He made a mental note to himself to ask Felipe to share which brew it was so that he could have some when he returned to his old life.

Just as he did that, he saw that Felipe was coming toward him bringing him his lunch for the day. As he looked at the plate he already started to drool a little. His coach had, in fact, prepared for him a plate with a couple of home made hamburgers and a ‘healthy’ amount of fries on the side.

The burgers were quite loaded, as far as he could see, since there were two patties of meat inside, separated by three layers of cheddar cheese, tomatoes, pickles and some strips of bacon. Without waiting anymore, as he felt his hunger raising just by looking at them, he quickly grabbed the first one, biting into it with gusto. Still, he turned a curious gaze toward Felipe, asking him the reason for such a meal, without actually saying anything.

“Why the burgers, Justin? Simple. Since you’ll need the energy for this afternoon gym session, I’m having you carbo-loading. Ejoy your meal.”

As if that answer cleared any doubt, Justin completely focused on the burgers and the fries, biting through them savagely and shoveling handfuls of fries within his maw. After devouring the first burger, and half of the fries, he felt quite parched and quickly emptied his glass of tea, seeing Cerys refilling it once more. After thanking her with a smile, he then proceeded to attack the second one with just as much hunger as before. Soon enough the plate was empty, licked clean of any crumbs and yet, he felt both filled and hungry.

Looking around he saw Felipe walking toward him, and before he could stop himself, Justin blurted out “Could I have some more, Felipe? I’m feeling really hungry…?”

The African guy simply smiled although he quickly added.

“Naturally, should you need a little more we will bring it to you but, consider that there is also a bit of dessert today.”

“Sure…*urf*…Man. Bring it on…”

With that Felipe quickly asked into the kitchen and, just as swiftly, another plate with the same quantities as before was ushered to the hungry Justin. The guy, although he knew he should be feeling full, he could only feel a strong hunger bubbling within himself and so rapidly began to clean out also the second plate, mowing down the burger a little slower than before but leaving, nonetheless, the plate licked clean once more.

Now, his already puffed out belly, pushed out even more, as he was still digesting his breakfast from before. Still, this didn’t seem to faze him as the dessert was brought to him, revealing quite the large slice of apple pie.

As Justing breathed in the delicious aroma from the pie, although his stomach bubbled and grumbled noisily, he still moved the plate closer to him, taking large forkful out the slice of pie he had received, enjoying its taste greatly. With also the dessert cleared out of the way, the singer felt once again stuffed to his fullest, yet, since lunch could be considered finished, he rose from the table and went into the living room for a quick nap, just as prescribed from the regime.

As soon as Cerys helped him sitting down on the couch he felt himself being overtaken anew by sleepiness, which was assisted as the head maid kneeled beside Justin, insisting in giving him a belly rub to, help him out with his stress. Right during the massage, Justin collapsed once more in a deep digestive sleep. Once sure that he had fallen asleep, Cerys stopped and began bringing the sacks that Justin was going to be surrounded by as the afternoon lesson would proceed.

After an hour and something, Felipe woke the guy up and began showing him a few gestures and situations he could end with, trying to appear as boring as possible, managing so to have Justin focus on the movie that Felipe was using as an example. As the singer kept watching the shows, he never realized that his hands were moving, slowly at first but taking the pace quite quickly, at the snacks that Cerys had surrounded him with.

Going from small chocolate bars, to cream puffs and to similar sugary pastries, Justin kept munching on throughout the afternoon, alternating the food he was eating with the herbal tea they kept bringing him. It was only when Felipe called the class over that Just felt himself overly full, although as he watched around himself all he could see was a single, meager plate with a few cookies missing.

As he had been in what was going to be called his ‘Eating trance’ Cerys and another maid made sure that the empty plates were swiftly taken away, to make sure the he wouldn’t realize how much he had really been eating. Although, as he rose from the couch unsteadily due to his full belly, Justin did have some thoughts about his eating, the only thing that stopped him from asking out loud was the fact that he had no physical proof.

‘Man…I feel so full and bloated…But I can’t seem to remember having anything apart a few cookies after lunch.

Maybe, since it’s the first day, I’m just not used to eating all those carbs… Yeah, that must be it.

Still, I feel so freaking full…’

As Felipe accompanied him toward the gym, he started to have a bit of a chat with his guest.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Day 1: Daily activities and training (Part 1)

choices: Day 7: Justin is getting used to his meals…
Day 14: As Justin start to pack on pounds, Vic let him exercise a little
Day 1: That night Justin wakes up hungrier than ever…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
“So, Justin, how does everything seem to be going today? Something unexpected?”

“Well, Felipe, in truth…I still got to get used to all these carbs…I think they may be bloating me a little. For the rest, though, everything seems ok… a bit boring but, ok.”

“Ha! I know how you feel, but before practice, theory must be learned. Don’t worry, I’m sure in a few weeks you’ll get used to it. Now, it’s time for your hour in the gym. After that, get a shower and at twenty hundred we’ll see each other in the dining room.”

With that, Felipe turned around leaving the bloated, in truth stuffed, Justin to meet Victoria in the gym.
He then moved slowly to the internal elevator while, tiredly thought of having to show himself in that way to that beautiful amazon.

For a fleeting moment, he thought about skipping gym but, he had an objective and he wanted to get it. As soon as she saw him walking slowly into the gym, his belly all puffed out and taut as a drum, she tried her best to hide the grin she had on her face. Still, the guy was there, supposedly, to train but, seeing as how filled up with food he was, she knew perfectly well he couldn’t do very much.

“Welcome back, Justin. Ready for some exercise?”

“S-Sure…*Huff*…j-just a…just a minute…”

“Take your time, Justin. Nobody’s hurrying after us.

After all, since today is your true first day, I think I’ll mostly give you a tour of the place, explaining you what we are going to do in the next few weeks.”

As Victoria showed him around, explaining to him in detail what each machine did and what he was going to do in the following days, Justin tried to keep the pace as much as he could but, after a bit he felt himself growing too tired to continue and had to sit on a bench to have a breather.

As he sat down, Vicky sat beside him and began chatting, distracting him from his stuffed belly, giving him the time to rest and digest a bit. In such a way, as they talked about their lives, the hour that was supposed to be gym quickly passed, leaving the two of them late of half an hour already from the schedule that Felipe had told the singer that morning.

Justin, feeling much better now that his stomach had had time to settle down, quickly realized that they were late but, being fascinated by Vicky, didn’t hurry out but simply followed her as they slowly moved to the dining room. As they arrived, Felipe didn’t comment or said anything, knowing full well that if Vicky had needed the extra time, the it was time well spent.

Still, as Justin sat at his place, although having done almost nothing but eating, he couldn’t stop from drooling in pleasure as a rich fish tartare was presented to him as a starting platter. Without waiting for any invitation, just as if he had passed the entire afternoon exercising, Justin started to rapidly clean the platter before him, although he found himself burping quite a lot since he was after all still digesting the afternoon filled with snack that he’s had in front of the television.

This didn’t stop him though from literally cleaning the fish tartare and the following platter, which was a rich ratatouille. Using bread to get even the most minuscule speck of sauce, the singer felt rather better now that his stomach was once again all filled up but, a few minutes after having drink from his glass, he found himself growing hungry once more.

This time his dubious expression stood longer on his face, especially since his next platter was late in being delivered. As he waited, he thought about the strangeness of the situation, trying to figure out why had he suddenly felt hungry once again.

Still, before he could reach a solution in his mind, Felipe was happy to leave in front of him the next dish which was a large tray with an assortment of pastries and slices of cakes.

Justin Bieber, feeling his sweet tooth called in, smiled widely as he began eating each treat at a faster pace than before, barely tasting them as he quickly munched on them, until the serving tray was void of anything edible, leaving the singer to realize how full he felt. For a moment he toyed with the idea of asking for a refill but, remembering that after a brief review of the day with Felipe he had scheduled a closing the day snack, he decided against it.

For about an hour, Felipe did a quick recount of the activities performed that day, neither punishing nor praising Justin for his attention (or lack of) but, soon enough, he closed the review while all were still seated around the table

“So, Justin, as a first day, this hasn’t gone bad…not as good as I had hoped but, it’s a start. For this week, and maybe the next too, we will focus on the theory and on the most basic gestures and mindsets. As soon as you manage to master them, we will proceed with the next step.

Now, as anybody knows, since going to rest on an empty stomach is bad for you.

You’ll have one last snack to close the day and we will see again tomorrow morning.”

Justin, who during the review hadn’t done anything else but drinking his tea and waiting, was more than ready for what the kitchen guys had prepared for him. Soon enough, as Vicky and Felipe left the room, Cerys began bringing a few snack to the already filled up singer. Felipe had known that Justin had done nothing but overeating that day but, it was only by stuffing him over his current limit that they were going to super size him.

Cerys quickly left in front of the induced starving musician a platter with half a dozen cupcakes covered in frosting, half a dozen jelly filled donuts and one last plate with an entire quart of chocolate cake. Poor Justin, feeling himself so hungry to be almost starving, began almost to swallow the cupcakes whole, as he tried desperately to sate his belly. Alas, it was only when he reached the cake that he crawled down to a stop, leaving most of half the cake on his plate.

Feeling completely full he hadn’t any energy left to continue and so, feeling his arms growing heavier he sat at the table trying to will himself to stand. Cerys, though, wasn’t going to let him leave the table without finishing his after dinner snack and so moved closer as she began to take forkful of cake toward Justin lips.

“Come on, Sir, a few more bites and you can go lie down…it is shameful to leave food on the table…”

Between her words and his own sweet tooth, as much as he was feeling stuffed, Justin finally managed to accept the last few forkful of cake, although it took him quite a long time to finish them. As soon as everything had been cleared, it was the head maid who helped him rising from the chair and accompanying to his own room.

As he was in is room, back on the bed, although his overfilled belly grumbled angrily in protest, Justin quickly fell into a deep sleep, during which his body absorbed and digested each calorie he had consumed that night. Cerys stood at his side for a few more minutes, slowly massaging his taut gut, until she felt it quiet down as the digestion process started, leaving the guy to sleep away the massive amount of food that had been stuffed within him in that day.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Day 1: Daily activities and training (Part 2)

12422233333233232233223.content: hmm what about some celebrity couples
12422233333233232233223.title: Nope! Let's try some more...

choices: The couple is invited in Africa
They’re having a field trip with a cannibal family
Their marriage is in danger and they seek help
12422233333233232233223131.title: brad pitt and angelina jolie

124222333332332322332231313.content:
The married couple Pitt/Jolie had been married for a long time now, but as of late the two were having almost constant fights with each other, often followed by a temporary reconciliation. Still the two of them did love each other and wanted to find a more permanent solution.

While checking on the internet they suddenly saw an AD for a counsellor, which seemed to have a huge amount of fans and followers.

After a quick search and confirmation of the info on the guy, they took an appointment and went with it.

A week later, the two of them entered his studio and seated on the couch as they waited for the guy to start their session. The Doctor’s name tag Recited ‘Dr. Sweet’ and he seemed quite the average Joe. The only thing that stood out on him was a strange glint in his eyes, a glint that some people seemed to find unnerving.

Apart for that, all reviews about him were extremely positive.

As he entered and sat on a small couch right opposite to the married couple he smled as he greeted them.

“Good Morning Mister Pitt, Miss Jolie. I’m Philodendron Sweet, but you may simply call me Phil. Now, I would like to keep this as informal as possible, if that is okay with you.”

The couple silently nodded with each other, at which the doctor smiled back.

“That’s good. Already from this I can see you’ve been a loving couple from many years. But it does seem you’re having some issues lately. Don’t worry though. We’ll find a solution, together.”

As they started to delve deeper and deeper into the issues that the couple was facing, the doctor began to formulate a plan on how to solve the situation with his new clients and to solve a minor matter that had been persecuting him lately.

You see, Philodendron had always been a different child. He had grown in a family that considered the rest of mankind as nothing more than an additional source of food. Growing up he was taught that to enjoy the taste of the human flesh was a good thing, something that most should have given out freely. But apparently he hadn’t ever found anybody who wanted to share their personal bounty and so he had to reinvent himself to satisfy this need he had.

It was for this that he decided one day to study the behavior of the human mind and, after mastering various degrees, he opened up his studio.

Helping people pair up…and then chewing’em down.

The two celebrities in front of him were going to be the icing on his figurative cake. He had just to let them grow together, both in happiness and in size, and then he could finally see if fame made the flesh taste better…just like a normal steak and one prepared by a gourmand were two different worlds apart.

After a bit of discussion, being able to discern that the two of them were simply having a normal issue with their own respective careers, he decided the best course of action for them.

“Brad, Angelina. I’ll be sincere. The two of you look perfect together but you’re letting your own greed getting in the way of your relationship.

I personally say that there is an easy solution to try to solve this and prevent any further fights between you.

You should try to take a breath of rest from your own careers, for a while at least, and following a specific schedule that I will prepare based on the information you’ve given me, you shall try to rest, relax and enjoy life together.

To have a better effect, I would suggest following you on a more personal level. By living with you and helping you on this journey. You will see that in no time you two will return to the best time of your relationship.

Would it be acceptable for you?

Otherwise we could find some other solutions. I could follow you one by one, but it would require a longer period. Or maybe, I can give you two some different objectives, thus forcing you to decide which you prefer best, if the objective or your true love.”
124222333332332322332231313.title: Marriage troubles

choices: A typical day of the couple
Angelina wish for a bigger Brad
Brad wish for a bigger Angelina
1242223333323323223322313131.content:
Brad and Angelina looked at each other for a moment, whispering between them for a few minutes but, in the end, they decided to try it and so gave their confirmation.

The following week we find the married couple sitting at their kitchen table, reading out from a report that Dr. Sweet had prepared for them, giving directions and pointers to what their weekly schedule were going to be, both Brad and Angelina read on with a quizzical look on their face, as they began discussing the schedule with the good doctor, who sat near them sipping a small cup of coffee.

“So, Phil…?”

“Yes. Brad?”

“Err…I get the whole ‘no work for a month’ thing but also no exercises? No workouts? Nothing at all?”

“You see, Brad, we are trying to bring peace and quiet within the two of you. Exercises bring the idea of competition and, through that, anger toward the less performing of the two of you. We do not need that. So, no work, no exercises, no workouts.

Just rest and restful activities that you can do as a couple.

Yes, Angelina?”

“Yeah…I was wondering…er, is this meal plan accurate? I mean, six meals per day doesn’t sound…too much?”

“That is a common misconception. It doesn’t matter what you eat but how often you eat. See, to reach an easier peace of the mind, you’ve got to be able to concentrate on what’s really important. By eating often, you give your body a constant intake of energies that will grant you additional resources to reach the bliss. Otherwise your body would have to spend precious energies to always be on the lookout to satisfy its hunger.”

For almost half an hour the married celebrities kept on discussing with the doctor but, in the end, they had to accept all his proposals. They were a bit worried about this turn in their lifestyle but, in the end, as they started following the schedule they both began to grow more and more complacent as time passed.

During that week the two of them didn’t do much more that wake up late, watch television together, sleep together and, of course, eat.

As they followed Dr. Phil’s diet of six meals a day, with a constant stream of snacks out of the mealtimes, it was no wonder that both their bodies began requesting more than what they were currently having. Still, in that week, both Brad and Angie, noticed that there were no fights, no arguments but a simple calm and acceptance of what was going on around them.

Phil followed the two celebrities all week, watching them from afar, pushing them from time to time in the correct direction…toward gluttony. And the results were promising so far.

Neither of the two had gained that much in that simple week but, it was normal. Phil knew that the week he had instructed them to follow was necessary to instigate their bodies to start slowing down their metabolism and to get them used to eating more. And that they had done.

As the new week began Phil made sure to be always reachable and, while doing so, to always have time to provide a few more detailed suggestion or instruction to his client. That morning, for example, as he was brewing some coffee in the kitchen he saw Brad coming down from their master bedroom and sit at the table beside him, while ordering around their servant to prepare him a hearty breakfast.

“Consuelo? Please, could you make me a few eggs with fried bacon? Four or five eggs should be enough… Oh, Hi Phil. How’s going?”

“Good Morning Brad. Well, shouldn’t be I to make that question to you? It’s fine, although, I wish I could see some better results from the two of you.”

As Brad began eating from the big plate he had received, he looked quizzically toward the doctor seated beside him.

“You see, Brad…Usually in the first week the couples grow closer through a common objective. You two instead are still on the ‘Finding your own peace’ moment. However, that’s okay, we will try to make your next week’s more relaxing.

Moreover, since we’re talking of this…I’ve been thinking of increasing your daily regime a little bit. As a couple you guys are way too singlehandedly active. That isn’t good. For this reason I’m going to implement some required nap time that the two of you will have to follow together.”

“But, Phil, how could we do that? If I haven’t need for any sleep how would I…?”

“Easy. Let Dr. Sweet work on it. You’ll soon see.”

That morning, as Brad and Agelina sat on the couch together, watching some tv shows, trying to follow the schedule from their doctor, their servants brought them their snacks for the mid-morning, but both watched stunned as their usual small bowls of snack was replaced with a large Devil Food’s cake for Brad and a large apple pie for Angelina.

As the two looked at the massive treat, Philodendron appeared behind them with a smile.

“Now, guys, you need to relax. To do so, you will eat some snacks until the both of you feel sleepy. This way, you will snuggles beside each other and move forward toward the peace and calm you so desire.

I already instructed your servants about this, so don’t worry about a thing. Just eat, sleep and relax.

Everything will be taken care of.”

‘Oh yes. Soon the two of you will get used to gorge all the time…I can’t wait to see it happens…’
1242223333323323223322313131.title: Philodendron in the house!

choices: Moving cost calories, let them stay in bed all day
12422233333233232233223131311.content:
It was near the end of the second week since Brad and Angelina had started to follow the advice from Dr. Sweet, and the two of them had never been as happy before.

As the clock ringed both woke up with a yawn, Brad was the first to rise to a sitting position, while scratching the beginning of a potbelly he was developing, while Angelina kept low on the bed but wide awake. Not a minute had passed since the clock ringing that their room door opened letting in two of their servants. These brought with them two tray, one for each actor, with their first pre-breakfast.

As both celebrities sat in their bed, they quickly accepted their trays and happily started digging in.

Brad began taking bite after bite at his large portion of fried eggs and bacon, washing it all down with the thick vanilla milkshake, his portion had been steadily growing since the previous week, reaching now a size that could have fed two normal people. Yet, Brad felt he could trust the good doctor advice and so didn’t see anything wrong in its size.
Angelina instead licked her lips as she surveyed her own pre-breakfast, it had been constantly changing in the last week but, apparently it had finally settled on a constant barrage of sweets. In front of her, in fact, there was a large bowl filled with chocolate brownies, a couple of large muffins and a big plate with a particularly large slice of devil’s food cake, with a side of three dollops of ice cream.

Both celebrities did a quick work of both trays and, as soon as they were cleaned, the two maid quickly took the tray’s away, leaving the two celebrities to rise from the bed, to prepare themselves for the continuation of the day. With a belly full of sweets, Angelina was the first one to rise and, as she did every morning, she began her day by taking a quick shower and then wear her usual attire for the day. A pair of short shorts in spandex, with matching sports bra. As it had become usual, she quickly inspected herself, noticing that she had become a bit softer than before but, with her new relaxed attitude she simply dismissed the thought and went on with her day.

Brad was in a similar position, after dressing up in a pair of sweater pants and shirt, he gave himself a good look in the mirror. He flexed a bit his slightly flabbier body and, as per instruction received he knew that by being bigger he was going to be stronger. As he finished, he too, left the room and followed his wife down toward the kitchen where their true breakfast was awaiting them, along with the good doctor.

As the two of them were seated at the kitchen table Doctor Phil smiled and greeted them, while sipping a bit of coffee, as they began to consume the first proper meal of the day. Brad, seated at one end of the table, happily munched on a dozen hot dogs, as he kept staring at both his wife and to his next plate, chocked full of fried bacon and sausages.

Beside him, always within reach, there were a couple of tall glasses full with an energy drink, spiked with some spoonful of bulk up powder.

Opposite to him sat Angelina, she too was rapidly consuming quite a large breakfast while feeling decidedly content in refilling her belly with the food she was starting to get addicted to. In front of her there were several plates, the nearest ones were full of fluffy pancakes drowned in syrup and butter, then there were a few more with chocolate covered waffles and finally a large platter with half of a massive chocolate cake covered in frosting.

Angelina smiled toward Phil as she began to dug in the delicious food. She had shown some resistance at the beginning but, as the doctor pointed out, she had to live more relaxed to return to her old love life.

Plus, she was beginning to enjoy following that diet.

As they both cleaned out their respective plates, both actors lay on their chairs panting slightly. As it was becoming a normal occurrence, both felt tired after eating their breakfast and always needed some minutes to just recover from it. Their bodies though began rapidly to digest and process all the food they had consumed, something that Phil loved to be able to see right in front of his eyes.
Still, after a few minutes rest, the two quite bloated celebrities slowly waddled toward the couch where they would spend most of their day. Sitting there, side by side, they began to watch some shows on the TV, as their maids began bringing them some snack every few minutes. Distracted by the shows Brad kept chowing down on all snacks that he received from the maids, chewing noisily on hot dogs and burgers and sloppily drinking soda after soda. Angelina, seated right beside him, wasn’t in a better position.

She too was so focused on the TV that she barely registered on how much she was eating, filling her mouth with more and more chocolaty snacks and treats. The maids, from their side, weren’t aware of what was going on but, as they had been ordered to follow the Doctor’s indication they simply did as he said.

And so for most of the morning the married couple kept on guzzling down food and drinks as they kept watching the television until, usually, Brad began to feel sleepy. It was at that moment that Phil, always checking on the two, proceeded to increase the quantities delivered to Angelina which, with more food on her hands, simply began to consume it faster and faster until she simply crumbled, falling asleep right beside her husband.

Leaving the two stuffed love birds napping for almost an hour, Phil began to organize for their next main meal of the day. Lunch.

As soon as the hour had passed, the maid went and began to wake up the two bloated celebrities, urging them to rise from the couch and, almost, pushing them to the dining room were their first lunch awaited.

Both Brad and Angelina, even though were still feeling somewhat full, couldn’t deny that they were growing addicted to the constant gorging and so, without too much of a fight, both began to eat once more. If they hadn’t been so focused on stuffing themselves to the fullest both could have noticed that their dietary regimen, apart from the sheer quantities, were very strange. Brad seemed to be following an all carbs and protein diet, with all of his meals consisting mostly in meats and baked breads. While Angelina was more on a carbs and sugar diet, being given for the most parts sweets and sugary treat and beverages.

Both celebrities tough, didn’t seem to mind how much they were eating, especially since they were so focused on eating that they didn’t seem to realize how much of it they were pushing down in their gullets.

It was at that moment, as the two were enthralled by their full six course meals that Doctor Phil began, as he did every day, to lay an additional insurance to have the two actors steadily growing bigger and fatter.

“Brad…” Phil began, whispering softly in the man ear, as he was still focused on eating away at the large one pounder burger in front of him.

“Brad…Keep going Brad. Keep eating.
Remember…the more you eat, the more you grow…the bigger you are, the stronger you’ll become.

And look at her, Brad…isn’t she beautiful? How could a skinny little thing like you stay with her…unless you grow bigger and stronger…

Be strong, Brad…be the biggest for her…”

The words, the tone, everything in Phil voice was calculated to impact on Brad subconsciousness, to force him to see the world as Philodendron wanted him to see it. Brad, focused as he was, couldn’t do much but listen to that voice and turn his world around it. Convincing himself that what the voice said was true.

After working his magic on Brad, Phil moved on Angelina.

“Angie…you’re such a good girl. Aren’t you, Angie?

But good girls will eat what they have on their plate. Eat Angie, eat and enjoy.
Remember, food is good. Exercise is bad.
Look at Brad, he’s awesome, isn’t he? But he’s like that because he eats his food.

Eat up, Angie. Remember, eating makes you grow more beautiful…the more you eat the more amazing you become…”

As soon as lunch finished, Brad and Angelina collapsed right where they were. Huffing and puffing, both celebrities felt good, due to Phil’s hypnotical suggestions, but as it was becoming a common occurrence, they both couldn’t move an inch. Brad leaned back on his chair, slowly and carefully caressing his overburdened belly. Forced to open up the zip of his sweater shirt he laid there breathing slowly as the literal weight of all the food consumed kept him from moving. Angelina, seated opposite from him, didn’t fare much better. Sure, she was wearing clothes more comfortable, without feeling them grow tight on her belly, but with the compulsion instilled in her by Phil, even though she was feeling full she kept on eating, trying with all of her resolve to lick clean her plates. Eventually though, she stopped and collapsed in a similar pose to her husband.

Slowly and carefully, as they were still full and overstuffed, they rose from their chairs and, helped along by their maids, they moved to their master bedroom, where they passed some time together. At first, they spent that time cuddling together…but as the days passed and their forms began to grow bigger and fuller, the two of them began to spend that time by sleeping and digesting together.

Returning to the present, she looked down at her mistress and, seeing that she truly wanted more she simply grabbed another piece from a sheet cake and brought it to her lips.

“Here you go, Miss…”

Angelina happily accepted the treat, moaning in pleasure from both the pain and the taste.

Philodendron was watching the scene from the camera feed. This was an unexpected result, and yet he wasn’t going to refuse it. He didn’t expect it from Angelina to grow attached to the feeling of being overfull, but he for sure was going to take advantage of it.
