In the days where he would reduce her feeding, to slow her down, instead of gulping down shake she had started to try to suck it from the hose. Trying her hardest to have as much as she could, and even more beyond that. But, Phil knew that she couldn’t grow too big or Brad would probably lose interest, so he kept alternating her full on days, with days were he was giving her a smaller quantity so he could have her on a good track for the future.

“Hello there, Brad, Angelina. Just came for the usual checkup.”

Angelina grunted a few times as her maids forced in between her lips slice after slice of cake, she tried to raise her arm to greet the doctor but found herself unable to. This lately had left her quite bewildered but, with so much food surrounding her, her focus didn’t last long on trivial matters.

Brad instead slowly managed to raise his arm closing his ham-sized fist in a thumbs up sign, but also him soon found himself tired from that single exercise and gave it up as he opened his mouth to accept more hot dogs and burgers. Christie, instead, overdosed with the weight gain stimulant was blind to anything but food.

“So Brad, Angelina. The diet is proving successful and the treatment will continue, but both of you have done huge progress and I’m confident that at year’s end, your marriage can be considered saved.

Still, there are many that can’t afford, or don’t know ho to ask for help. For them I was thinking to offer some assistance but, I can’t do it alone.

What would you say to help me in this endeavor?”

Angelina, as the feeding stopped at Phil’s command, burped quite loudly and, after gasping for a while she replied in a deep voice, through ragged for she was starting to have problems to do even the simplest of things at her size.

“…Y…Ye-he-rsh...”

Brad instead seemed to think long and hard on it, keeping a scrunched-up face as he downed burger after burger, chewing them hard in thought.

“*Burp!*…urff…Alright…seems…ok…also…for…me.
You did…a good…job…with us.”

“Excellent! I’ll start right away with the preparations. But this doesn’t mean I will stop with the two of you.”

As Phil said so, he motioned for the maids to start anew with the feeding and, although Angelina seemed to want to add something else, she quickly found herself unable to talk as her constant feeding started anew. Philodendron had received their agreements and, most important, had it recorded.

Now he could start to build his paradise.
1242223333323323223322313131111241.title: Establishing a new base of operations…

choices: Call some cannibals friends to assist him
Lay low for some more time
Take care of Jacob and his girl on his own
12422233333233232233223131311112413.content:
Philodendron had been ecstatic in the last few days. Thanks to the funds stored in his two new human banks (Brad and Angelina’s bank accounts) he had started the renovations on the mansion so that he could better host many new guests. But, as it always happens, something seemed to put a stop to his grandiose dream.

He was currently checking the camera feeds, after moving Brand and Angelina, along with Christie, in a more secluded section of the mansion he noticed that the bank accounts of the two actors had been suspended. At first, he thought that there had been a mistake. Between the two of them there had to be enough money to purchase a small nation but, as he checked more in detail he saw a suspension notice.

“Dear Miss Jolie,
As our client we are terribly sorry to inform you that we’ve had to place your accounts under suspension. As per our security checks it is possible that your bank accounts, and funds, may have been hacked and used for an enterprise for which you weren’t informed. Due to this we’re sending one of our agents to personally contact you since, it has been impossible from our side to contact you by any other means.
Hoping that this issue is only a simple misunderstanding,
Sincerely yours,
….”

Phil stopped reading, as he began to think on what the easiest solution to this issue could be.

For obvious reason he couldn’t let this lawyer to see the two over-grown actors.

He would simply get him arrested and tried to save the two from the path of gluttony upon which he had placed them. But there wasn’t also the time to let the lawyer grow slowly how it had been for Angelina & Brad.

Finally, after a long day of planning, Phil had a half idea on how to deal with this lawyer person. He had only to hope that the person coming wasn’t going to be one of those paranoids who saw troubles and dangers everywhere.

The following day, as Phil hastily finished his preparation against the lawyer representative, the doorbell of the mansion sounded and one of the maids informed him that a lawyer was requesting to enter and be shown the owners of the mansion. Phil let out a sigh, clearing his voice from any trembling and went to meet the person. As he entered the salon in which the lawyer was waiting Phil noticed that it was a young man, barely thirty, and was nervously fidgeting around.

Smiling the good doctor moved forward, greeting him with gentleness.

“Hello. You must be the Representative from Fitzgerald and Co., isn’t it?”

The guy turned and politely, albeit nervously, smiled to the doctor shaking his hand and then sitting opposite to him as he began the speech he had prepared for himself.

“Hello. Yes. I’m Jacob Vanderbird and I’ve been sent by the firm to verify the situation here for two of our best clients, Miss Jolie and Mister Pitt. There have been plenty of expenses in the last week alone and our firm had decided to investigate.
Especially since most of these expenses have been done in the name of a Philodendron Sweet.”

“That would be me. I see your worries but I can assure you that there is nothing illegal going on.

I’ve been employed by Miss Jolie to help her and her husband to keep a solid relationship with each other, something tha was crumbling down before my intervention.

The expenses have all been agreed first with them, as it is proved by the receipts that my accountant has in ours archive. I will gladly send copy of those to your firm.”

“Well, that solve most of our worries but, we still would like to meet our clients.”

“Unfortunately, that is a request to that I can’t satisfy as easily. You see both Miss Jolie and Mr. Pitt are currently undergoing long meditation session and cannot be disturbed for any reasons. Through these sessions the feelings they have for each other will be made stronger and so it is essential for them to keep all external influences away.”

“I see your point. But, we will not unfreeze their capitals until they have been met us. So, you could say, we’re in an impasse.”

“Hm. Mister Vanderbird, I think this matter shall be discussed further. Would you join me for a cup of tea? I understand your position, but I wouldn’t work for them if I let anyone through, disturbing them each and every time.”

“Gladly. And I’m sure you will make an exception for me as soon as we discuss it further.”

For the following two hours Phil and Jacob discussed about the situation, but, as time passed, Jacob began to feel somewhat strange. He didn’t feel ill, but it was as if he was getting more relaxed. Way too relaxed.

“Woah…I…I feel warm, all of a sudden…Uh? You…You were saying?”

“I understand your point and I would gladly agree but my employers do not wish to be disturbed. Now, If you were easy enough and calm enough we could talk about it in a gentle manner and reach finally a conclusion.”

Phil spoke clearly and willingly slow on certain words, knowing full well that the tea he had given to the lawyer was beginning to have its effects. It was a brew he had found to be used in the Amazonian jungles, one that those with his dietary preferences used to let someone willingly agree with them.

All it was needed were certain sounds and a certain emphasis on some words.

“I’m sure we can all agree that if my employer wanted to be disturbed, then Miss Jolie would personally tell you that she is willing to meet you. As she’s healthy of mind and body enough to let you know that.
Alas, there is no way that she will talk with you as she’s still in her meditation chamber. I’m afraid that you shall need to inform your superior about this situation. As we stand there’s really no point in letting this argument to continue.
What do you answer me, Jacob?”

“I…I thought…But…She said…I mean, she is healthy so…I don’t think…”

Phil smiled wickedly as if he could see the memories of the guy change thanks to the hypnotic effect of the tea he had drank.

There wasn’t much to it, just a few word here and there. Or, as in this case, he had just calmed him down at first with his ‘easy; calm; gentle’ and then he had simply began laying the trap emphasizing certain word until they formed a directive for Jacob to follow : ‘I agree, Miss Jolie is healthy, no need to continue.’.

He was now primed and ready to receive orders and memories.

“Tell me, Jacob. Do you agree?”

“Yes. She’s as healthy as I could find her. She’s just so busy. We won’t berate her further.”

“Good. Also, Jacob, do you have any family?”

“Yeah…I’ve got a girlfriend. Our parents are in another state…we rarely see each other nowadays.”

“Good. Listen to me, wait a few weeks and the leave that job.
Bring your girlfriend here. You both will live like royalty. You both deserve it.”

“I…I will. Yeah. We deserve to live a little. A vacation would do us good.”

“Yes it will, Jacob. Now, return to your bosses. Remember, everything is…?”

“Everything is clear. Both Miss Jolie and Mr. Pitt are alright.

They…uh? What just happened?”

Jacob Vanderbird felt as if he had just woken up from the quickest nap.

He was feeling some dizziness but, it was already passing so everything had to be ok. Still, he had closed an important job.

No matter how long that doctor had tried to prevent him, he still had managed to meet his clients and got their confirmation that everything was in order.

Sure, he felt a little bit embarrassed when they scolded him for the disturbance but, he still felt that he had done his job perfectly.

Phil’s voice shook him from his reverie.

“You alright there, Mr. Vanderbird?”

“Oh? Oh yeah. Just a bit dizzy. Thanks a lot Mr. Sweet. Now that I’ve been able to talk with them and assure myself that everything is in order there is no need for further disturbances.

And, sorry if I ask but, do you still work as a counselor for couples or are you working exclusively for them?”

“Well, I think I could spare some time for some advices… I’ll talk with Miss Jolie and, in case she agrees, will let my secretary to call you back.”

As the lawyer went away Phil grinned.

It wasn’t the first time he used that brew of tea but, it was the first time he had done it to purposely trick someone.

All he needed to do, now, was to call some friends over so that when Jacob would be back with his girlfriend there would be someone able to follow them in their life style change’… Or could it be better to keep things under the radar for a bit longer?

Choices, choices…
12422233333233232233223131311112413.title: Hiccups along the road…

choices: Starting slow on the couple, watch them growing slowly
Brainwash Jacob and fatten up Sara, Phil needs the contacts of the ex-lawyer
Between Phil regimen and the feeders in the house, the couple balloons quickly
Sara notices something wrong with the place…
124222333332332322332231313111124133.content:
Almost a month had passed leaving Dr. Phil enough time to finish the renovations needed to the mansion, to change it into the headquarters of what he saw as his very own secret society. His two personal piggy-banks, Miss Jolie and Mister Pitt, had almost reached their maximum potential. Both had seemingly reached their plateau and were barely able to gain a single pound more every few days. Still, Philodendron knew he couldn’t just take them out of the picture. He still needed their money and with them alive it was going to be easier for him to work from the shadows.

Still, even though he had moved both to an underground cell-like room, he went often to see them, to check on them. They both were glorious in their hugeness.
Angelina, seemed to have transformed herself in a jiggly mountain, her ass jutted out behind her, almost reaching her shoulder level in height, as it trembled with her every movement, or breath, just like a jelly dessert. Her breasts had grown humongous, falling each on her side, so big and blubbery that one person alone would have problems trying to lift it on his own. Then, there was her belly. A globular cascade of fatty belly rolls, it covered her entire front, leaving only the point of her feet visible. Phil loved to see her manic expression as she was now fed non-stop, twenty-four hours each day, using a feeding tube. The constant gorging and the pleasure she gained from feeling stuffed had reduced the once actress to a beast with simplistic desires. She was a slave to her hedonism and her gluttony. There wasn’t, anymore, any other reason for her to live.

Brad instead had to be moved to rest on his belly. Since all his gains seemed to go majorly there, Phil had seen the risk of him getting crushed by his own weight, so when he was relocated, they also changed his posture. Brad Pitt too, had reduced himself, mentally, to some sort of animal. He also followed his basic instinct, which could be described as “the need to feed” and “the need to see others grow”.
Since he had started to have emotions for the young maid who had only meant to trick him, Phil was happy enough to provide him with enough women to be watched as they inflated with food. Young Christie, unfortunately, had to be removed from the mansion. Brad, even in his own animal mentality, seemed to disregard those creatures that appeared to be larger than him and, since Christie had ended up way bigger than him, he quickly discarded her, focusing his needs on a different gal.

Philodendron moved closer to the huge pile of flab that Brad had become, forced to lay down on his stomach had rendered his arms and legs useless piles of flab. The actor was now so big he couldn’t move, even if he could manage to reach the ground. His middle was just so big that he literally was lifted from the floor, having his limbs flaying in the air by a couple of feet, if not more.
Christie, in the end, had to be moved away. She was currently staying in the same structure that was hosting her mother and Phil had deemed the two of them to be ready for their next transition.

Becoming a staple for his people.

Alas, his people were going to collect the first bounties he had spent so much time to prepare. And it would be awesome but, he had no time to celebrate. More pressing was the situation of Mr. Vanderbilt.
The lawyer, now ex-lawyer, had finally released himself from the contract and was going to come to the mansion to follow a healthy vacation there. Phil had a great opportunity right here in front of him. Through Vanderbilt list of contacts, he could easily have access to any major influence in the country.

He could barely contain himself as he thought of his next victim to be added into his collection. Would it be a singer? Or another actor? How fun could it be to turn an athlete in a morbidly obese blob? And why not target politicians? They could exponentially increase his web of contacts.

Still, focusing on the present, he had to prepare everything for his new guest.


A week later, after having been informed by Jacob that both he and his girl were coming, Phil began to prepare the trap for them. Just like a spider he perfected his web, hiring additional security to keep out any unwanted visitor, removing any personnel from the mansion which he couldn’t trust and replacing them with trusted people from his own structure. With the house stocked full of both food and feeders, he was just waiting for the new victims to arrive.

When Jacob Vanderbilt arrived at the mansion, he was surprised at first. The place was bristling with security guards, and yet, they were courteous and gentle in letting him pass, as they had been informed of his arrival. As he walked through the garden, followed by his girlfriend, she still seemed suspicious of the place.

“Jacob, are you sure about this place?”

“Come on, Sara, we already talked about this. Dr. Sweet has a clean slate on his file, excellent references and wonderful reviews. We need a vacation and what place could be better than L.A.?

Think about it, a whole three months’ vacation, being pampered and followed through by a dietician, living in one of the most fabulous mansions in Beverly Hills. What more could we want?”

Sara Manning was a simple girl, she had grown in a small little town in Minnesota but, thanks to a lucky roll, she had managed to find her future there in Los Angeles, where she then met Jacob. Their relationship had started slowly, as they started out as friends, until both seemed to grow attached, and attracted, by each other. She was a stout country girl, a busty, a bit more on the husky side, cowgirl with freckles on the bridge of her nose and curly red hair.

Due to her ‘humble’ origins she wasn’t used to the places where Jacob usually hanged out, being a bit too snobby for her tastes, and yet, for him, she did all she could to try and fit in. Similar situation was with the current place. She felt out of the picture there, as if she didn’t belong there, but she still supported her man and tried to play it cool.

“I could want to stay alone with my guy, even if only for two weeks…but, I suppose you’re right.
Come on, then, let’s get inside.”

As they passed the entrance, they found Dr. Sweet waiting for them, welcoming them with open arms.

“Mr. Vanderbilt! So good to see you again. And this lovely lady has to be your fiancée, I presume?”

Sara blushed a bit, as Jacob simply laughed while hugging her from the side.

“She sure is, Dr. Sweet. Sara Manning, this is Dr. Phil Sweet.”

“Pleasure to meet you, Sir.”

Phil smiled as he shown to their new guest the layout of the house, while replying to the girl.

“Sir, was my father…just call me Phil. Now, follow me, I’ll show you both where you’re going to stay, and we will talk about your vacation here.”

As Phil showed them the layout of the place, they also met most of the key figures of the household, although Jacob was surprised in seeing o many new faces around the place. As he tried to inquire about it, the doctor simply answered that it had been a shame, but he had to replace all the previous staff. There had been some issues with how the old staff perceived their living there and so, Phil had been forced to hire personnel he could trust.

Unknown to both Jacob and Sara, as they greeted each key figure, they had been evaluated by them as all the workforce in the mansion was either a feeder or a cannibal, as Phil was.

As the day progressed, both Jacob and Sara looked marveled at the massive mansion in which they were going to live, there was almost everything one could wish for. There was a private gym and pool, a secured garden, a vast library and even a small, private theater. Both were ecstatic but the biggest surprise for them arrived just during dinner. As they were enjoying a truly delicious dinner, with each plate brought to them masterfully prepared, Philodendron began to lay down his plan for the couple.

“Jacob, I was thinking. Since you both will be spending a so needed vacation here, why don’t you follow one of my courses in the duration of this break?”

“Uff...Gotta give my compliments to your chef, Dr. Phil. Dinner was amazing.
But, what do you mean with, one of your courses?”

Both Jacob and Sara had eaten way more than their usual fare, both were feeling stuffed to the gills and yet, everything had been so good that they weren’t feeling any remorse on overindulging.

“Well, Jacob. When we met, I’ve told you that a vacation was good and all to refresh the spirit of a couple but, in truth, since my job here for Miss Jolie and Mister Pitt is almost finished, and they agreed to devolve this mansion to be like a shelter for those who have problems in dealing with issues with living together, I thought I could offer to both of you my services, completely free.

I can see clearly see that, you guys, don’t have any trouble living together but, I’m sure that following one of my courses could only strengthen your relationship together.”

Jacob and Sara took the evening to discuss the proposal within themselves but, even though they hadn’t had a strong fight with each other in a long time, in the end they both accepted the offer, just to see what was so special about this regimen that the good doctor was offering.

They couldn’t know that by taking that decision, their whole lives would change forever…
124222333332332322332231313111124133.title: Lawyer vanishing

choices: Jacob will slowly get closer the bigger Sara gets
Jacob will ignore Sara, forcing her to go bigger faster
Sara will soon start enjoying herself, growing at her own pace
A few butlers will focus on Sara, making her balloon quickly
1242223333323323223322313131111241332.content:
Both Jacob and Sara were enjoying the place and even Sara’s misgivings about the place swiftly vanished as they both began to enjoy the life of being pampered and followed for all their needs. For the first couple of weeks, both of them tried to keep themselves busy, walking around, doing yoga together, exercising in the private gym and following the ‘relaxation method’ proposed by Dr. Sweet. But, as time passed, they started to get a bit lazier in their routine.

But more changes to their schedules were coming, and it all started one evening when Jacob was sitting on the porch, enjoying the fresh evening air. As he sat there, Dr. Phil emerged from within the house and sat with him, offering an after dinner cup of tea.

“Just to help you relax the most while sleeping tonight.”

As Jacob began drinking the tea, though, he began to feel rather buoyant, and yet as Phil kept talking to him, he seemed to grow rather attached to some particular phrases from the guy. Drinking more and more of that wonderful brew of tea, Jacob began to relax even more, growing more detached from the discussion, and yet, strange thoughts began to stick to his minds, as if he had thought of them on his own.

‘Man, Phil really is a good guy. I can really trust him as if he was a brother.

I love this place…maybe should extend the vacation here…it could do a lot of good for me and Sara, to stay here a bit more.

But it’s true that me and Sara have a few problems lately.
I…I can’t manage to arouse myself around her.

I still love her but…there is something missing…

Maybe, Phil can help us on this... ’

Day after day, Phil kept his evening conversation with Jacob happening, while giving to the guy that special kind of tea that Jacob was starting to love. The poor guy couldn’t know that he was in the middle of a trap, carefully laid down by the doctor. The tea he was using was the very same, in fact, that Philodendron had already used on him when they first met.

As days passed, Sara noticed that Jacob seemed a bit different and, one evening, after an especially large dinner, she called him to join her in bed, wanting to verify a thing or two with him.

“Jacob? Are you alright?”

“Mmh? Oh, yeah…yeah, it’s fine.”

“Are you sure? I’m used to seeing you much firmer on certain things…is there something that worries you? You do know you can tell me anything, right?”

Jacob, his mind swirling with those new thoughts in his mind, turned his stare onto his girlfriend, noticing, as if it was the first time how skinny she was. It was as if a curtain was lifted from his eyes. He knew now, what the issue was but, how could he broach the subject to her?

“Well, yeah…there is something, actually…”

“Then what is it? Is it something that Phil said?... It’s about us?”

“Er…no, no…don’t worry dear. It is nothing…really. Just a bit worried for the new job…you know how I am. I always worry about the littlest things…”

Still, Sara noticed that, even though she was caressing him and massaging him as she often did when she wanted some cuddles with him, he didn’t seem to react. Choosing instead to go directly to sleep, leaving her confused. As she tried to understand what had happened, she decided to go ask to Dr. Phil the following morning, asking for advices.

As morning came, Sara noticed right away that Jacob had already left the room. She felt sad that he hadn't woke her up or greeted her, and her decision to speak with the doctor was stronger than ever. So, after a good sized breakfast she wandered around the mansion, until she found him sitting in a studio, working on some papers.

“G-Good morning…I…I don’t want to disturb so, maybe I’ll come later…”

“Um? Oh, no. Please, come inside. I was just checking some notes on the shelter, but I can get back to it later. Is there something troubling you?”

Sara, entering the room and seating in front of the desk, felt herself completely opening up as she felt strangely safe in talking of her doubts and fears to the good doctor, after all he was a professional.

“Well, actually yes. I’ve been noticing that lately Jacob seems…rather distant. Or at least, he does it with me. I…I can’t seem to talk with him anymore. It’s as if he has become a different person. I…I don’t know what to do.”

“Umm…I want to be sincere with you, Sara.
Jacob has come to me yesterday, saying thing much similar to yours.”

“He…He did?”

“Yes. And, I wanted to speak with you, first, before calling both of you together. You see, as we talked he told me a bit of your relationship together and I’ve noticed, as he talked that he was growing rather excited on a certain part and then, that excitement, that passion seemed to vanish as he recollected another period together with you.
I have a theory in mind, but to be sure I need to have some details from you, if you’re willing to share.”

“O-Of course. Ask away, Doctor.”

Phil, seating more comfortably on the chair, began to check a few notes on his table until he began asking Sara about her past.

“Jacob told me that you both met one morning in a bar, when he mistakenly walked into you, splashing you a bit with his coffee, is it correct?”

“Yes. I was just so clumsy since I had arrived in LA, since barely a week. He was gentle, though, and gave me his phone number so that he could repay for the laundry expenses.”

“From then, slowly at first, you began seeing each other every morning, until it became an ‘expected routine’ to meet there.”

“Yes. He was so cultured, so gentle…I already was starting to develop a bit of a crush on him, although I didn’t have any hope for making it real, though.”

“Then, a few meeting after work, a few nights passed together at the movie theater and you both started to become friends. From there, slowly, your relationship grew until he asked you to become his girlfriend, during a weekend at your homeplace. Is that correct?”

“Oh, I was so afraid. I was embarrassed to show him my hometown, I thought he could think I was nothing but a hillbilly. Yet he smiled when he arrived and kept smiling for the entire weekend…and yes, he asked me to make our relationship grow official. I was so happy.”

“But despite growing attached, lately he doesn’t seem to be the same, especially since he could spend more time with you but, actually, he doesn’t.”

“True. I don’t know what’s wrong…did I do something? I didn’t do anything out of the ordinary…”

“And here, is the thing. You actually did, something. Let me explain.
When you two met at your hometown, you were the same girl you’re today?”

“I…Think so? Maybe I was a bit uncouth…a bit more like a country girl?”

“Sara. There is no need to feel ashamed. He told me about your diets and your training. You changed yourself to become what you thought was his ideal of beauty, didn’t you?”

“’Course I did. I saw how his friends looked at him, when they compared the chubby girl with the young lawyer. I…I didn’t want to shame him in front of his friends.”

“And yet…” Here Phil leaned forward on his desk, moving closer to the blushing girl in front of him. “…He never asked you to do that, did he?
You see, Sara, one of the things he loved in you was how…rich you were at the time.

Not only for your mind but also on your body.”

Sara, stood agape, shocked by this revelation.

“You...you mean he preferred me…Chubby?!”

“That is something that not all mates are capable to share, especially to their partners. Jacob, is conflicted. He doesn’t want you to do something against your wishes and yet, he is not capable of finding you as attractive as you once were. Now, this is something I always say to all my patients.

You guys must talk freely to each other. If you keep secrets, it will only harm your relations in the long term.

Still, as you admitted, you dieted and trained only for him, but what do you wish for yourself, Sara? What are your thoughts?”

“I…I admit that I rather like myself as I am today…but, can’t say that I love dieting and exercising. I often thought of going back to my old figure but I thought that Jacob…would love me more if I wasn’t…”

At that point she burst out in tears, feeling as if she had been the cause of the degradation of her life with Jacob.

“Now, now. None of that. There is nothing that can’t be solved with a bit of focus.

I’ll schedule your meals for this week so to have you gain around five pounds. This way, you can easily check Jacob’s reaction to your new body and will not be such an amount that you couldn’t lose by workout if you find yourself hating how the new you will feel.

Then, next week, we can meet again and see how things are going, ok?”


As Sara left the room, still a bit shocked by the news but, with new hope thanks to the doctor’s plan, Phil grinned maliciously. He had only to plan on how he wanted Jacob to react to Sara’s progress…
1242223333323323223322313131111241332.title: Between a cup of tea and a slice of cake…

choices: Keep following Sara as she slowly grows
Fast forward a couple of weeks into the new ‘Diet’
As Sara follows the diet, a butler entice her to indulge a bit more
How’s going with Angelina and Brad?
12422233333233232233223131311112413321.content:
As the week started, Sara wasn’t actually sure that the plan proposed to her by Dr. Phil was going to provide any results. Still, seeing as Jacob seemed to grow a bit more distant each day, she knew that she had to do something. Quickly she began to follow the instruction provided by the good doctor, eating quite the large meals, doing some light exercises and trying to pass as much time as she could with Jacob.

Initially, she had to admit, she found some difficulties in following the meal plan she had received. The portions weren’t all that big but, seeing as she was unused to them, it took quite the toll on her at first, forcing her to start a nap routine after every main meal during the day. Still, although no changes were exactly visible at first, she tried to spend as much time she could with her boyfriend.

At the beginning of the week, although they were relaxing together, she noticed here and there that he wasn’t really interested in checking her out, especially when she tried to entice him once with a skimpy bikini she had on.
Same situation would arise when they were together in bed, alone in their own room. Sara could see that Jacob was less active than usual, so she redoubled her efforts to match the plan prepared by Dr. Phil.

As the week progressed, though, and as the first couple of pounds already were creating a thin layer of softness on her once perfectly toned belly, she saw that Jacob seemed to show some sparks of interests in her. Noticing this made her aware that the assumption of Dr. Phil had been right on the mark, and yet, she was trying to figure out if she was truly willing to change herself for her lover passion.

If she had to be honest with herself, it was somewhat liberating not to follow her old diet anymore, furthermore, the meal plan that the doctor had prepared for her seemed to be rich in things that she had always adored to eat. So, it seemed to be a win-win situation for Sara.

In the shadows, Phil was enjoying how naïve Jacob’s girlfriend could be. But, in truth, she couldn’t know that Jacob was acting out as per his instructions, so it was fairly natural for her to react like that. Still, in his eyes, Sara had yet to grow in the right direction.

‘But that will come in time. I will order Jacob to open up the more she grows out, this way little shy sara will turn in just what I need.’

Phil, schemer he was, not only was watching how Sara began the plunge into the abyss of gluttony, but also began relaying more detailed instruction to Jacob, since the guy was more or less uer his thumb now that he had become addicted to the herbal tea that Phil used to control him.

In that instance, for example, both Phil and Jacob were seated in his personal studio, the doctor sat behind his desk while Jacob, busy drinking the tea he loved so much, listened carefully to what his Master, as his subdued subconscious identified Phil, said.

“So, Jacob, do you understand how you have to act around Sara?”

“Yes. Must act interested if she gains. The more she gains, the more interested I’ll become. Must compliment her figure as well as soon as she reaches 200 lbs. From then, will compliment her figure while hiding any further gain she has.”

“Good, Jacob. Very good. Now, remember, you mustn’t fall behind your own schedule. As she reached 200 pounds, you shall start gaining too.”

“Yes, Master. I shall do it and I shall find pleasure in it.”

Jacob, pausing here and there as he drank the tea, spoke with an emotionless tone of voice, since it was his subconscious that was doing the talking and not the conscious himself. Still, Philodendron, grinned at the brainwashed guy, providing him a few more detailed instructions before releasing him.

As the week came to an end, Sara noticed that he had actually managed to go over the weight limit she had agreed with the good doctor, gaining almost six pounds. Still, as surprised and shocked as she was, she couldn’t deny that Jacob had been interested in her, even checking her out, although she wasn’t completely sure about that, so the experiment in her eyes had been a glaring success.
That Sunday, as her fiancé was resting ear the poolside, she sneaked away and went to meet the doctor, to discuss how they were going to proceed from there. As she entered into his studio, she found him busy on the phone, but he motioned her to seat and wait for a bit.

“Yes? Yeah…No problem at all, Miss. I’ll make sure that Miss Jolie will be informed. Thanks, bye…. Sara! Sorry for the wait, was working a bit for Miss Jolie. So, tell me, how did it go with Jacob?”

“Oh, Doc. He’s been much more responsive than before. I…I really must thank you for your suggestion, it worked perfectly but,…I…I think I would like to keep going. I would love to have my Jacob back with me, the guy that loved me and that showed it to me every day…”

“Well, that is good to hear and don’t worry. As I said to you last week, this was only an experiment based on what you’d told me before.

Now that we know the issue, we can simply place a long-term solution to fix it. We only have to decide how far we want to bring this solution for. I mean, when the two of you met and decided to make your relationship official, how much would you say you weighted?”

At this, Sara blushed a bit, but managed to answer truthfully.

“Well at the time I was around the 200 pounds…but after seeing how his friends and colleagues I did manage to bring myself to 140 lbs.”

“Good. And now, more or less, you should be around that 140…probably something ore considering the week past. Good, good. All you’ve got to tell me, Sara, is if you want to bring the experiment further or, if you prefer to try by yourself. I understand it may seem shameful to lose the fit body you managed to model yourself but, there would be nothing wrong in letting yourself go a bit.

Most important, though, you must feel confident in your choice. Otherwise, it won’t end well.”

Sara thought about it for a bit. He was ecstatic about the results gotten in the past week. She hadn’t felt so carefree about her diet in a long time and, with the addition of doing it for her boyfriend, she felt even better. Though, was she sure she would like to return to her past self? She had to admit that before meeting Jacob she had never had any issue with her own size but, now that she had gotten used to be sixty pounds less then before, could she, in all honesty, return to her past weight without any guilt?
As she pondered, she thought of Jacob accepting her in his arms and smiled a bit, knowing now that she had her answer for the doctor.

“Dr. Phil? Y-yeah…I…I think I would like to keep on going with the experiment. At least until I return to my old weight. I think Jacob would love it and…if he loves it, I will too.”

“Excellent! Very well, Sara, I will immediately take in consideration your desire and prepare a revised meal plan to which you will have to follow. You’ll see, in a few months, you’ll be back with Jacob as if nothing had changed.”

The following morning, just as Sara was into the kitchen, having a sip of coffee, one of the maids of the mansion left for her a little booklet, prepared the day before by Philodendron, indicating her new and revised meal plan, which was going to start straight from that morning.

As she drank her coffee, seating herself down at the table, she looked through the pamphlet and felt herself growing strangely excited as she saw the delicacies, she was going to be eating for the next few months. Without her notice, a maid moved closer to her and quickly left a few plates near her, letting her now, suddenly that her breakfast was ready. Jumping a bit in surprise, Sara thanked the maid and looked at what she had brought to her.

It seemed to be a classic english breakfast, as it was a four egg omelet, with a side of sausages, fried tomatoes, mushrooms and fries. On a side plate, she also saw a small-ish slice of vanilla cake, a little less than half of a quart, and one tall glass of milkshake.

“Wow…didn’t expect so much on my first day…still, I’m doing it for Jacob…and yet, I will probably enjoy it for myself too.”

As she began to dig in, she saw that Jacob had just entered the kitchen and came to join her at the table.

“Morning, Sara. Woke up with an appetite, today, uh?”

Just as she was starting to feel embarrassed for his comment, Jacob continued, while giving her a peck on the cheek.

“Well, it’s good seeing you eating healthily for once.”

Having said that, she noticed that he sat there, with her, drinking a cup of coffee and having a small croissant for himself, as they chat a bit, she didn’t seem to notice how quickly she was going at her food, gulping it eagerly down, until both plates and the tall glass were empty.

As she swallowed the last morsel she felt full to burst and yet, she could see Jacob eyes riveted on her figure. Smiling a bit, she moved making so that her stuffed stomach was a bit more visible.

“That was so good, thanks for the company, hon…But I think I’ll have to go a nap a bit of this off…”
12422233333233232233223131311112413321.title: Love for size beats all…

choices: She’s aware of reaching her objective weight but wishes for a bit more
Phil manages to trick her into continuing, she believes of not being at 200 lbs
Sara is happy of reaching her limit. She wants to stay there though
Now that Sara is growing, it’s Jacob turn to grow out
124222333332332322332231313111124133213.content:
As days passed, Sara kept eating what the maids or the butlers I the house kept bringing her, at first she made sure to be following the pamphlet that the good doctor had given her but, as time passed, she began to let it be and just eat what they brought to her.

Much to her pleasure, at her every main meal she was constantly surprised with a new delicacy, so much so that sometimes she even asked for a second plate. Still, as much as she was enjoying the meals, she was still searching for attention from her fiancé and, as time passed and a soft layer of fat began to appear on her figure, she noticed that Jacob began to be more and more interested into her.

Satisfied with these results, in just a few weeks, she let herself go even more during her meals, enjoying anything they brought to her at the fullest. Still, one day, almost a month since she started to follow the diet, as she was resting at the poolside, working on her tan, she was surprised when a butler moved toward her, while carrying under his arm an empty tray.

“Good Afternoon, Miss, I’m Karl. May I bring you anything?”

“Hi…Well, I don’t know…I’m following a diet from Doctor Phil…I don’t know if I should…”

“Well, Miss, I’m sure that a little splurge once in a while won’t hurt any diet you’re on…”

As Sara thought about that, she had to admit that lately she had started to feel rather hungry in the afternoon, so many hours away from dinner time.

“Well, why not…what would you suggest?”

“Miss, I know that the chef has just prepared a batch of brownies that looked scrumptious enough and, if I may, I would also bring you a small shake to wash it all down.”

“Alright, then. Thank you.”

“My pleasure, Miss…”

At the thought of food, Sara’s belly began to gurgle a bit, providing further convincing to the girl the she indeed was in need of a small snack. A few minutes later, as she heard the door facig the pool opening, she saw the butler move her way, carrying the tray now filled with half a dozen brownies and a tall glass of shake. The guy, the left everything near Sara, on a small table, and quickly returned to his duties making sure that the girl knew she could call him for anything if she needed.

Sara, eyeing the treats, began to lick her lips in anticipation. Still laying down near the pool she moved her had and took the first of the brownies, bringing it closer to her mouth. As she bit into it she couldn’t refrain from moaning a bit.

‘This thing is Divine! My God!’

Quickly she managed to scarf it all down in another two bites, before starting to quickly take each of them, feeling their deliciousness into her mouth, as she cleaned them all from the plate. In a few minutes, she realized he had eaten the all and it was then that she stared hungrily at the shake. As Fast as before, she began slurping down the shake, smiling in pleasure at the wonderful taste of it, and yet, a short time later, she found herself staring into an empty glass. Pouting a bit, she placed it back on the tray, as she caressed a bit her belly, feeling herself sated for the moment and yet, still a bit hungry.

Seeing that the woman had cleaned the tray, Karl moved closer to take away the tray and, sensing she could clearly have some more, decided to inquire.

“Was everything good, Miss?”

“Oh, it was delicious…thanks again.”

“It’s my pleasure to serve. Would you care for something else?”

“Well…N...A-actually, yes. Could you do me a favor and bring something a bit more…substantial? The brownies were good and all but, I’m starting to feel like I need something more…”

“Of course, Miss. Will be a pleasure. Anything in particular you would wish for?”

“Nothing too sweet, please.”

“As you desire.”

As Karl returned into the kitchen he smiled within himself. Slipping an appetite stimulant in her shake had been a brilliant idea, if he could say so himself, but now he was in need for something more, and yet, nothing too sweet. Carefully looking through the kitchen he saw that one of the chef’s had just taken out of the grill a few hot dogs, and deciding that those were just what she needed, Karl proceeded to take them. As he brought back to Sara the tray with three, rather large, hot dogs drenched in ketchup and mayo, he knew for sure that if he played his cards right, the girl was going to be his in a short time.

“Here you go Miss, hope you enjoy…”

“Oh! Trust me…I will…”


Since that day, as time passed, Sara found herself enjoying these snacks more and more often, until they became almost part of her regular diet. And as those snacks grew in quantities and in size, also her main meals seemed to be growing larger and longer. Yet, Sara, as she was enjoying too much this new kind of lifestyle, didn’t seem to really notice, also since Jacob was growing more and more fond of her as time passed.

In all of this, Sara’s figure was changing rather heavily. As a couple of weeks passed, under the deluge of large snacks and massive meals, not only her appetite grew to new heights, making so that she required more and more to feel herself satisfied, but also her body began to grow softer and softer as more calories were ingested and never consumed.

In barely two months, she managed to jump from her toned 145 pounds to a bit more heavy 195 pounds, and yet, as she had now grown accustomed to the portions and to the constant snacking she didn’t seem able to discern that she was already that much closer to her objective.

When the second month of the new diet just passed, Sara found herself used to a very different lifestyle than before, not that she noticed the difference. She would wake up, finding herself in the loving embrace of Jacob, who would give her a quick morning kiss before letting her go to her breakfast, where she would usually be busy destroying it for the next two hours. Once breakfast had been cleared up, she would enjoy a lovingly napping sessions near the pool, up until almost midday, when the butler Karl would bring her some appetizers which, at first had been a few treats and sweets, but lately were becoming more and more often full sized cheese and bacon burgers.

Once the appetizer session was over, after consuming in average, from three to five burgers per session, she would then quickly being given a few shakes with the appetite stimulant, so to have her primed and ready for lunch time, where she would keep herself busy until the first hours of the afternoon. It was then, with her belly stuffed dull of food, that Sara would go in her room to a well-deserved nap, together with Jacob who would keep her company as she slept in their bed.

After her two hours resting session, it was yet again snack-time for her, which was quickly brought to her while in bed, loading her up with short cakes and sweets. During this time, she would ask Jacob to assist her since, often enough, she would start feeling tired, although she wasn’t really aware of the reasons behind it. Still, Jacob was eagerly helpful, making sure to have Sara nice and full just an hour before dinner time.

During dinner, she found herself trapped by both her rising gluttony and the pleasure she was starting to associate with the feeling of being stuffed full, letting her go full hog on whatever was prepared for her, usually forcing her to remain seated at the table for hours. When she first started the diet, she had thought that a three-course meal was quite the large meal but, as her stomach got used to bigger and bigger portions, she got used to meals of no less than seven courses.

After dinner, she would often spend some time with Jacob, cuddling together, up until midnight, when he would bring her a midnight snack made mainly of desserts. With Sara laying in bed, and Jacob busy fondling her quite large belly and feeding her, she would eat up to her bursting point and fall asleep within his arms.

This trend kept going for a bit more than two weeks, past the second month of diet plan, before Sara thought about going to meet the good doctor to thank him for his assistance. That fateful morning, as she stood up from the kitchen table, after having eaten enough breakfast food for four persons, she slowly began to waddle toward the studio of the good doctor.

In those two months and a half, as her weight rose higher and higher, along with her body as it got thicker and fatter, both maids and butler did all they could to adjust and repair any clothes that would rip and tear after being subjected to the stress of containing her growing forms. As she waddled through the hallways, she was completely blind to the way her body jiggled to and from at her every step.

Her massive thighs and puffy arms would jiggle slightly at her every step, as similarly acted her ass cheeks, which would jiggle from side to side as a wobbling jelly-like dessert. But her most impressive features were on her front. Her boobs had grown so laden with fat that were hardly perky anymore, as they started to sag due to all the extra weight in them down. Her gut too, was now nothing more than a billowing out mass of jiggly fat and cellulite, pushing out in front of her of at the very least one foot.

Her long, stout neck too had changed heavily, as fat accumulated on her body, so her neck rapidly vanished, replaced by two thick extra chins, as a third one seemed to be starting to appear. Yet, Sara slowly moved onward, until she finally reached the doctor studio and entered, a bit covered in sweat as if she had just returned from a small run.

As she sat in the studio, Phil was ecstatic about her progress, and couldn’t wait to see if he was able to keep her going as she was on her own or, if he could find a way to step her game up even more.
124222333332332322332231313111124133213.title: Never enough of a good thing

choices: Between food and feeders she’s reaching 250 pounds in a jiffy
Jacob is gaining quite a lot, Sara thinks he looks better this way
Phil believes is time to speed up a bit the couple gain…
Jacob starts to spill the beans to Phil, about his contacts…
1242223333323323223322313131111241332132.content:
As Sara sat in the studio of the good doctor, she found herself breathing a little hard as well as being slightly covered in a little sweat. Taking a napkin from a pocket, she cleaned herself up a bit as she waited for the Doctor to finishing whatever he was doing on his computer.

‘Man, gotta remember not to come here running…must be the heat, I feel myself sweating still…’

As Phil finished what he was doing, he turned toward the woman who had grown a lot in the past two months and something. As he greeted her and chat a bit with her, he stared carefully at her, taking mental notes of how she had grown, and where.

“So, Sara, I heard from the staff that Jacob seems pretty much enthusiast of your new you…”

“Yeah. He’s getting closer and closer, but I still have a lng way to go, haven’t I?”

At that, Phil understood immediately where the issue was and did his best to mask his surprise in hearing that question, as he coughed a bit in his hand, taking a bit of time. As soon as he thought to be ready, he addressed again the young woman.

“Yes, about that. Have you weighted yourself yet?”

“Well… No, actually no. Haven’t thought about that”

“Ok, then. Here, let me help you stand so that we can quickly take a reference of where we stand. If I’m not mistaken you were at 145 when we started with the experiment, correct?”

“Yes Doc. Although I hope I’ve put on a few since then…I wanted to discuss with you also on this point…”

“In a minute, Sara. Here, stand on top of it…just right.”

As she was helped by Phil to stand, she slowly waddled toward the scale on the floor, as she was directed by the doctor until she felt herself standing on it but, as she looked down, she couldn’t really see the scale under her, as it was covered by her still full belly.

“I…I can’t really see it…?”

‘Must remember next time, not to weight myself after breakfast…it bloats me so much I can’t even see the scale…’

Philodendron kneeled beside the growing girl, making sure she couldn’t see the malicious grin on his face as he thought about her unable to see the scale under herself, and then proceeded to take some fake measures, as he began touching both her legs and her middle, just to enjoy her softness. As he pretended to measure her he quickly glanced at the scale and almost whistled in surprise.

‘Wow…197 pounds! She’s really going at it…can’t tell her this though…’

“It’s pretty normal, Sara. Wouldn’t worry too much about it. You just had breakfast, right? It must simply be the bloating. Here…let’s see… Uhm. Well, I must confess, Sara, I was expecting a bit more…you’re still at 165.”

“Well I expected that, if I can be sincere…that’s what I wanted to talk about, Doc.”

“What do you mean, Sara?”

“Well…as of late I’ve noticed that the portions I receive at meal-times are always so small…no wonder I haven’t put on enough weight. Would it be possible to have some more ‘normal sized’ portions from now on?”

Phil, still kneeled, was on the verge of burst out laughing as he managed to resist it. He had met people who were naïve and blind for their surrounding but, hearing that phrase from someone who was so blatantly fat to not being able to see their own feet was too rich. Still, he managed to resist, as he calmed himself down, while racking his brain down for a good answer to give back.

“Well, I’m sure that there must have been some incomprehension with the staff. I assure you that the diet was prepared to consider a slight increase in the portions as months passed away. Still, I’ll check directly with our chefs to make sure that the…right sized portions will be brought to you, Sara.”

As he helped her sit down again, he silently offered her a few candies he had on his desk, noticing with glee how quickly she took him up on the offer, as she began gulping them down quite rapidly.

“So, Sara, I believe we shall just continue with the diet, as I make sure that the kitchen staff will update your meals as per the diet plan, alright?”

“Thanks, Doc. Really, thank you very much. Without your support I would still be having problems with Jacob, while now that we’re getting closer I think we shall do much better.”

From there, Sara, quickly saluted the good doctor and began once more her slow waddle toward the kitchen. Seriously thinking that she had run all the way to the doc’s office, she thought she deserved a little splurge. She was, after all, feeling growing hungry already. As she finally managed to reach the kitchen she was surprised in seeing Jacob there waiting for her.

“Jacob?”

“Honey! Here, would you join me for a quick snack?”

“Sure…I’m feeling quite hungry to say the truth.”

As they sat at the table, with the butlers and maid bringing them both a little feast of fast foods, Sara could barely wait before starting to eat, as she grabbed one of the hot dogs she had in front of her and began to voraciously eat it. As she did so, she noticed that Jacob too was eating a similar treat and yet, he seemed worried by something.

“Jacob….*gulp*…everything ok?”

“Uhm? Oh..yes, well… in truth…no, it’s fine…”

Sara, still unconsciously eating the food in front of her, thought back to that evening of so many days ago when Jacob had acted the exact same way. She had known that there was something he was worried about and she had wanted so much to know what it had been but, that time she didn’t press the issue. This time was going to be much different. As she almost pushed the other half of the hot dogs she had been eating into her maw, while taking a quite larger burger next, she swallowed and cleared her voice as she addressed her boyfriend directly.

“Jacob…*munch*…if you’ve got something...*crunch*….you want to tell me, don’t be afraid of being direct. I love you…*gulp*…with all of myself, whatever it is I’m sure we can…*munch*…find a solution together.”

“Well, Sara, the thing is…I feel so wrong…as if I’ve been betraying your trust…”

“What…*Gulp!*…for?“

“Well, I’ve to admit that I was losing interest in you…When we met, and later made it official, I found you irresistibly attractive. Then, I don’t know why, you started to diet and exercise all the time…our ‘together time’ began to dwindle to nothing and…as much as I loved you I…I didn’t you find anymore…exciting.

But then, since a couple of months I’ve seen you put on some weight and was so happy about it but, as time passed, I felt wrong since I didn’t tell you anything…as if I was doing something wrong…I…I should ave warned you but you seemed so happy and…”

As Jacob began to talk, Sara listened carefully, although she never once stopped eating. She kept munching down burger after burger, alternating it with a few slices of pie but didn’t say a word until she saw her boyfriend literally tearing himself apart.

“Jacob…listen…Listen to me. Do you want to know why I’ve started putting on some weight?

I did it because I was stressed about you hiding from me and, because I felt the need for freedom, since we are on vacation here.”

‘I can’t tell him that Phil told me about his fantasies…’

“Still, there is nothing for you to be feeling guilty about. I’m gaining a bit on purpose, because I felt I needed to do it…if it pleases you, I can only be happy for the bonus…”
As she said that, she returned to her meal, while smiling at her fiancé who also, had started again to go at his food.

Still, while she looked at him, she noticed that he seemed a bit smaller than her. Trying to not be noticed, she compared her own arm with that of Jacob and, indeed, she saw that he seemed a bit skinnier than her. As she mulled it over, she gave another bite to her burger, munching on it with gusto, until she gathered her courage to ask a dreaded question to Jacob.

“Jacob? May I ask you…*munch*…something?”

“Sure, babe…shoot.”

“Mmh…have you noticed that…you seems to be rather…uhmm…smaller than me?”

At this the ex-lawyer chuckled a bit as he patted a few times his non-existent belly.

“Ye. That was the other thing I wanted to ask you…I feel like I should put on some weight, to become a bit more buff, if you get my drift… Would it be a problem for you?”

Sara, as she gulped down the last bite of her fourth double bacon & cheese burger, could only smile at him languidly.

“Of course not, Babe…I always wondered how would you have been with a bit more fluff in you…”

From that point, during every meal, both Jacob and Sara kept eating together, starting to find a source of joy, and soon arousal, in seeing the other one eat their own meals. Sara, fueled up by the need of gaining more and more weight, seeing as she thought to have managed only twenty pounds in two months, began to eat more and more, asking for bigger portions almost every other day.

Jacob, instead, as he was forced by the brain washing from Doctor Sweet, began also to eat more than he what used to, although he couldn’t manage to compare his meals with those of his girlfriend.

As Sara’s third month of diet comes to an end…
1242223333323323223322313131111241332132.title: Blind about herself

choices: Sara notice how big her hips are. As she gets stuck into a doorframe!
Jacob keeps growing rounder, soon surpassing Sara in size!
Phil want the both of them bigger. Time for some stimulants…
Jacob gives a few contacts to Phil for people that would love his therapy
1242223333323323223322313131111241332132.content:
Another month under her belt, another day to follow the diet that Dr. Sweet had prescribed her. Sara was enjoying the freedom coming with the diet the good doctor had made for her. She could eat almost anything she wanted ans it was only going to help her reach the 200 pounds limit she had imposed for herself. Also, he had been pleasantly surprised in noticing that her meals had finally started to seem to her as normal sized once more.

She was so getting tired of the rabbit portions of food she had got at first, now instead she was more than happy.

Well, to be sincere, she sometimes (almost every day) had asked for seconds and third refills but, it was normal right? She had to grow a bit bigger than her lousy ten pound per month of before. So everything was just peachy.

Plus, she had noticed, as she started to spend more and more meals with Jacob he had started to return to his old passionate ways, making her feel like a teenager again. It was so good to have her loving boyfriend back to her. But, most importantly, since the time that he had seemed to be smaller than her, it seemed to her that Jacob had taken to his hearth her appreciation for a fluffier him and so he too was getting a bit bigger than before.

Just that morning, as she had woken up slowly at around 10 AM, she saw him dressing up in front of the mirror and had to admit that seeing the small-ish gut that was forming on his middle made her all giggly. In her eyes it was the cutest thing ever. He then turned and noticing she was awake had come to her side to give a quick kiss.

“Babe, I’m going down for breakfast…you’re coming?”

“Sure, Baby. Gimme five and I’ll be there.”

As Jacob left the room, she slowly rose from the bed, passing all those issues in standing up to simply the fact she had jut woken up. As she dressed, wearing quite the large camisole and similarly large spandex pants, she left the room and slowly waddled toward the kitchen. As she opened the door she almost guffawed in seeing Jacob already sitting down and dunking a donut into his cup of coffee.

“Baby! That’s not fair…you started already without me?”

“Sure.” He replied “You’ve got an advantage of two month on me, gotta keep it up.”

As she sat at the table, without taking notice in the rather large and sturdy chair that the staff had left for her, she began caressing her tummy in hungry anticipation as one of the butlers brought to her a large plate with a four eggs omelet and enough bacon strips to create a small mountain.

“Here you go, Miss. In a few I’ll bring you the rest.”


Nodding in anticipation to the words of the butler, as a double chin made aware it presence under her face as she nodded, Sara began taking forkfuls out of the eggs, while consuming the bacon strips at such speed that even Jacob looked at her with surprise, before returning to his own breakfast. Sara didn’t notice anything of her surroundings, all she cared now was the food under her nose and her lover sitting across of her. Just as she cleaned the eggs, the same butler as before collected the empty pates, while leaving in front of her a couple more plates with some kind of buttered toast.

“These, Miss, are a few different types of French toast which the cook was trying out today, just for you. The first one are the most common, being bread soaked in a mixture of eggs and milked, fried and served with strawberries and whipped cream.

On the side, here, we have French toast with some butter on top, and a bit of powdered sugar. Lastly, same plate but with the addition of maple syrup and nut’s freely sprinkled on top of it.

Hope you enjoy.”

Sara licked her lips as she began to chew the quite thick slices of French toast, while looking over to her boyfriend to see how he was faring. Jacob had cleared his four donuts and cup of coffee and, as he cleaned his lips a butler brought to him a large plate of chocolate covered waffles, along with a cup of the tea he so much loved.

Sara looked hungrily at those waffles and, as she was receiving her next plate, a six stack of pancakes, she also asked to have some of those waffles too. The butler could only nod in approval as he took the order and also, left another plate beside the one currently attacked by Jacob. Leaving near the guy a plate covered in small, yet spongy, pastries.

“Here you go, Sir. Enjoy your breakfast.”

As the two kept eating, so their bellies began filling up with food.

Jacob, being the smallest of the two had to stop earlier, although he had pushed himself quit a bit over his own limits. But, as he breathed out the fatigue, he could only look with admiration at how hard Sara was pushing herself, clearing plate after plate, totally destroying the pancakes and then turning on the waffles she had requested.

As she began inhaling them, he could see that she too was reaching her limit and, in fact, with only half waffle on the plate, she burped quite loudly as she let go of the fork.

“So full…so…*urp*… good. Can’t eat another bite.”

As she gave herself a belly rub, as much as she could due to how bloated and filled her belly was, Jacob scooped up the remaining biteful of waffle and moved it closer to Sara.

“Oh, c’mon, babe…I’m sure you can have one last bite…it is wasteful to leave food uneaten…”

“I…I don’t know, Jacob…feel so full…so…*urp!*…so heavy…”

Jacob was relentless, though, an moved the bite sized treat closer and closer to her, as he felt himself excited like never before. Sara, seeing as Jacob seemed so happy, gave it in and opened her outh accepting the treat, lapping up at his fingers still close to her lips.

“Mmmh…delicious…”

At every meal, both Sara and Jacob, began soon to overstuff themselves, eating enough for three of rour people by themselves, and yet, the both of them couldn’t be happier. Jacob, although brainwashed to be thinking so, couldn’t stop thinking that the bigger Sara was getting, the more beautiful she looked. Sara, instead, could only look at her lover with pleasure, finding his fluff rather enticing.

From then on a sort of schedule started to be followed.

If before, the couple, would do some activity together, since Sara had started to follow the doctor little diet, they started to pass most of their time sitting together at a table, eating away as their growing stomachs got rounder and fatter.

A few times something would seem to disturb their routine, as one time, for example, as Sara sat on a chair that was meat for Jacob, she rightly crushed it under her weight.

Yet, thanks to Jacob, and the butlers stationed around, food was rightly brought out to her making her forget about the incident. And so, the routine started anew, with food becoming the main activity that the two of them would follow throughout the day.

As it naturally is, a schedule oriented around only food started to produce results in both of their waistlines. Since both Jacob and Sara basically glutted themselves from morning till night, their bodies began to grow along, storing all the excess of calories as adipose. Sara, which already had been on the verge of the 200 pounds, after two more weeks of this endless gorging, was now teetering near the 225 pounds.

And as her body accumulated fat within itself, so her hips began to flare out massively, growing wider, even ripping out some of the old pants she still had with her from the time she had arrived in the mansion. This didn’t mean that only her ass seemed to be growing. Her breast too, took a lot of nutrients into them, as they started to inflate almost on a daily basis, covering whatever was in their shadow from view.

Jacob, instead, seemed to be growing rather round all over, although his weight seemed to be concentrating in both his belly and in his, recently sprouted, newfound moobs.

He wasn’t particularly fascinated by his growing out, but since he had been ordered to like it, he did his best. Still, brainwashed or not, when the two of them reached the end of the day, waddling side by side toward the bed they shared, each of them couldn’t deny that sleeping beside each other was much more satisfying than before.

One day, though…

131221.content:
Jacob finished up eating his meal which he finished with a solid burp. He was stuffed. Emily had been really out doing it with putting out food for everyone. Though with being a shape-shifter meant they had to eat a lot of food. Though it seemed whenever the pack was eating it seemed that Jacob was always getting the bigger portions than the rest of the pack. He wasn't sure why. But he didn't mind. Though it seemed like he was getting a little soft, which he though was impossible for beings like them given their fast metabolism and all. But he decided to shove that idea away and just rub his bloated gut after his meal.

But little did Jacob know that his pack was actually fattening him up. Sam had been telling Emily to increase Jacob's proportions of his meals and putting in this herb that would slow down someone's metabolism that even shape shifters like themselves would gain weight. Every now and them a pack would need a fattened member for their pack. This was a tradition of the pack to have a fattened up pack member to show the prosperity and status of the pack. the fattened pack member was to be pampered and live a life of luxury. Sam had chosen Jacob for this role due to his complex relationship with Bella and Sam wanting to have Jacob stop hurting over her. Plus he was the newest member what better way to show how strong and prosperous the pack was with its more younger pack members. Sam began to wonder just how bog Jacob was going to get.

Sam had yet to tell Jacob that he was chosen for this role in the pack, he wasn't sure how to tell him that he going to become fat for the pack as a sign of the packs prosperity. Sam was afraid how Jacob would react, no one would like to hear that they would have to get fat. Sam had to put this delicately.

Sam walked up to Jacob who was still nursing his stuffed gut. "Seems you've been eating well Jacob" Sam said with a smile.

Jacob looked over to see Sam grabbed a seat next to him, but then looked back at his bloated belly which needed his attention. "Eating well Jacob?" Sam asked.

"Oh yeah Sam" Jacob moaned. I could eat like this all day, Jacob said not turning his attention away from his gut.

Sam smiled hearing that.

"But man I need to stop eating like this, I'd get fat if it wasn't for our metabolism, I swore I gained a little weight." Jacob said.

Sam tried not to show his concern as it seemed Jacob was already noticing his weight gain, he couldn't hide it for much longer, he would have to tell Jacob eventually.
